engChrName: Apply temporary placement for event progression testing. Delete this once system choices and map movement is added.
engSearchText:
Apply temporary placement for event
progression testing. Delete this once system choices
and map movement is added.
jpnChrName: イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。 ※システム選択肢・マップ移動画面・クエスト等が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。
※システム選択肢・マップ移動画面・クエスト等が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: These settings are for checking NPC placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking NPC placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Risette.
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you
in addition to Van/Risette.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Risette.
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you
in addition to Van/Risette.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: Service has been up and stable for a while now. I can only assume it's that giant airship patching up the network.
engSearchText:
Service has been up and stable for a while now. I can
only assume it's that giant airship patching up
the network.
jpnChrName: 通信も復旧してだいぶ経つが、 あの巨大な飛行艦が中継しているのか……
jpnSearchText:
通信も復旧してだいぶ経つが、
あの巨大な飛行艦が中継しているのか……

engChrName: That really miffs me as a communications engineer, though... We shouldn't have to rely on them as a crutch.
engSearchText:
That really miffs me as a communications
engineer, though... We shouldn't have to rely on
them as a crutch.
jpnChrName: バーゼルの技術者としては……正直、 情けないというか、理不尽な気がするというか。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルの技術者としては……正直、
情けないというか、理不尽な気がするというか。

engChrName: We're talking about the lifeblood of modern society here, and now it's all going through some shady megacorp.
engSearchText:
We're talking about the lifeblood of modern society
here, and now it's all going through some
shady megacorp.
jpnChrName: 何せ、通信網という一つの大動脈を得体の知れない 会社に預けてしまっている訳だからな……
jpnSearchText:
何せ、通信網という一つの大動脈を得体の知れない
会社に預けてしまっている訳だからな……

engChrName: We're gonna have to put in the hours to make sure our comms don't go down like that again.
engSearchText:
We're gonna have to put in the hours to make sure
our comms don't go down like that again.
jpnChrName: 今後こういう事にならないためにも、 通信技術の研究開発は一層力を入れないと。
jpnSearchText:
今後こういう事にならないためにも、
通信技術の研究開発は一層力を入れないと。

engChrName: I'm glad she looks to be all right...or, physically, at least. I have no idea how she's holding up mentally...
engSearchText:
I'm glad she looks to be all right...or, physically,
at least. I have no idea how she's holding
up mentally...
jpnChrName: 彼女が無事でよかった、今回の一件で 心身に影響がないかも心配だったが……
jpnSearchText:
彼女が無事でよかった、今回の一件で
心身に影響がないかも心配だったが……

engChrName: ...but I hope she'll get through this. She's my coworker, and I wanna see her happy again.
engSearchText:
...but I hope she'll get through this. She's my
coworker, and I wanna see her happy again.
jpnChrName: 立ち直れそうで安心したよ、 立場は違えど仕事のパートナーだしな。
jpnSearchText:
立ち直れそうで安心したよ、
立場は違えど仕事のパートナーだしな。

engChrName: It just doesn't feel real... The special research building was attacked, and now Professor Callaghan's been kidnapped?
engSearchText:
It just doesn't feel real... The special research building
was attacked, and now Professor Callaghan's
been kidnapped?
jpnChrName: 特別研究棟が襲われキャラハン教授が 拉致されてしまったとは……
jpnSearchText:
特別研究棟が襲われキャラハン教授が
拉致されてしまったとは……

engChrName: I don't think this affects our work with the institute, but I'm still worried about him...
engSearchText:
I don't think this affects our work with the institute,
but I'm still worried about him...
jpnChrName: うちの会社との共同研究には影響していない とはいえ、彼の事も今後の不安だな。
jpnSearchText:
うちの会社との共同研究には影響していない
とはいえ、彼の事も今後の不安だな。

engChrName: If those criminals have their eyes on the institute, then the rank and file researchers might get caught in the crossfire.
engSearchText:
If those criminals have their eyes on the institute,
then the rank and file researchers might get caught in
the crossfire.
jpnChrName: 大学が犯罪に巻き込まれたとなると、 研究者なども同じように狙われないか……
jpnSearchText:
大学が犯罪に巻き込まれたとなると、
研究者なども同じように狙われないか……

engChrName: I'm really gonna have to help Athena weather all this.
engSearchText: I'm really gonna have to help Athena weather all this.
jpnChrName: アテナさんの事も一層気にかけて おいた方が良さそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
アテナさんの事も一層気にかけて
おいた方が良さそうだね。

engChrName: I thought Athena might be here by now, but nope. No sign of her...
engSearchText:
I thought Athena might be here by now, but nope.
No sign of her...
jpnChrName: うーむ、なかなか来ないなアテナさん。 せっかく上も乗り気になってくれたのになぁ……
jpnSearchText:
うーむ、なかなか来ないなアテナさん。
せっかく上も乗り気になってくれたのになぁ……

engChrName: She's a shy one, is the thing. I was hoping it'd go smoothly since the higher ups are all on board with it, but evidently not.
engSearchText:
She's a shy one, is the thing. I was hoping it'd go
smoothly since the higher ups are all on board with it,
but evidently not.
jpnChrName: まあ、あの人はなかなかシャイなところも あるっぽかったしな……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あの人はなかなかシャイなところも
あるっぽかったしな……

engChrName: I get she's nervous, but really, there's nothing for her to worry about. She needs to just relax...
engSearchText:
I get she's nervous, but really, there's nothing for her
to worry about. She needs to just relax...
jpnChrName: せっかくの共同研究なんだし、少しは肩肘張らず 一緒に前向きに協力できればいいのに……
jpnSearchText:
せっかくの共同研究なんだし、少しは肩肘張らず
一緒に前向きに協力できればいいのに……

engChrName: ...though she did say she was working on some other project, too. Maybe she's just really busy?
engSearchText:
...though she did say she was working on some other
project, too. Maybe she's just really busy?
jpnChrName: そういえば別口のプロジェクト参加もあると 言っていたし、忙しいところもあるのか。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば別口のプロジェクト参加もあると
言っていたし、忙しいところもあるのか。

engChrName: The net is pretty widespread now, but international calls still have a lot of kinks to work out. It can make meetings a bit difficult.
engSearchText:
The net is pretty widespread now, but international
calls still have a lot of kinks to work out. It can make
meetings a bit difficult.
jpnChrName: 導力ネットが普及した今でも、国際通信の 制約もあって不便に思う人もいるようでね。
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットが普及した今でも、国際通信の
制約もあって不便に思う人もいるようでね。

engChrName: We're working with Verne to make a new comms protocol that maximizes bandwidth and makes those long-distance calls easier.
engSearchText:
We're working with Verne to make a new comms
protocol that maximizes bandwidth and makes those
long-distance calls easier.
jpnChrName: 大学の情報工学科で導力波を研究している人と ヴェルヌで、制約の無い通信技術を作りたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
大学の情報工学科で導力波を研究している人と
ヴェルヌで、制約の無い通信技術を作りたいんだ。

engChrName: I was hoping Athena would be here by now, but she might be busy with something else. Maybe I should send her a message, just in case.
engSearchText:
I was hoping Athena would be here by now, but she
might be busy with something else. Maybe I should
send her a message, just in case.
jpnChrName: まあ、彼女には彼女のやり方もあるのかな。 一応、メールだけでも入れておくか……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、彼女には彼女のやり方もあるのかな。
一応、メールだけでも入れておくか……

engChrName: I get yesterday was rough... Here. I got you something. Hope it helps.
engSearchText:
I get yesterday was rough... Here. I got
you something. Hope it helps.
jpnChrName: 昨日は大変だったね……差し入れを 持ってきたんだが、どうかな？
jpnSearchText:
昨日は大変だったね……差し入れを
持ってきたんだが、どうかな？

engChrName: O-Oh... Thank you.
engSearchText: O-Oh... Thank you.
jpnChrName: あ、はい……ありがとうございます……
jpnSearchText: あ、はい……ありがとうございます……

engChrName: Are you, umm... Are you doing okay...?
engSearchText: Are you, umm... Are you doing okay...?
jpnChrName: く、クーリッジさんこそ…… 大丈夫ですか……？
jpnSearchText:
く、クーリッジさんこそ……
大丈夫ですか……？

engChrName: Yeah, I'm fine—the company, too. I'm more worried about all the damage to the institute.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I'm fine—the company, too. I'm more worried
about all the damage to the institute.
jpnChrName: ああ、私もうちの会社も大丈夫だ。 それより、大学の被害の方が気になる。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、私もうちの会社も大丈夫だ。
それより、大学の被害の方が気になる。

engChrName: I genuinely believe the work you're doing with them—whether it's comms or holos—will really shape Calvard's future.
engSearchText:
I genuinely believe the work you're doing with
them—whether it's comms or holos—will really shape
Calvard's future.
jpnChrName: アテナさんの研究は通信にせよホロウにせよ、 これからの時代に必ず必要な技術だしね。
jpnSearchText:
アテナさんの研究は通信にせよホロウにせよ、
これからの時代に必ず必要な技術だしね。

engChrName: So I say, have a little confidence in your research, yeah? It's a lot more impressive than you give it credit for.
engSearchText:
So I say, have a little confidence in your
research, yeah? It's a lot more impressive than you
give it credit for.
jpnChrName: ……こういう時だからこそ、君にはもっと 自信をもって研究をしてくれたらなと。
jpnSearchText:
……こういう時だからこそ、君にはもっと
自信をもって研究をしてくれたらなと。

engChrName: Really...?
engSearchText: Really...?
jpnChrName: そ、そうですか……？
jpnSearchText: そ、そうですか……？

engChrName: I... Thank you. That does make me feel a little better...
engSearchText:
I... Thank you. That does make me feel a
little better...
jpnChrName: そういってもらえると……、 励みになるかも……
jpnSearchText:
そういってもらえると……、
励みになるかも……

engChrName: Sorry, but we've got the crime scene blocked off here to preserve the evidence.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but we've got the crime scene blocked off here
to preserve the evidence.
jpnChrName: 現場保存のため、天文台内は 現在立ち入り禁止としています。
jpnSearchText:
現場保存のため、天文台内は
現在立ち入り禁止としています。

engChrName: If you have any questions or concerns, you can direct them to the local police department.
engSearchText:
If you have any questions or concerns, you can direct
them to the local police department.
jpnChrName: 事件への質問等は警察署の方を 通すようお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
事件への質問等は警察署の方を
通すようお願いいたします。

engChrName: She's out cold...
engSearchText: She's out cold...
jpnChrName: 気絶しているようです……
jpnSearchText: 気絶しているようです……

engChrName: I really don't like leaving her here, but we need to hurry!
engSearchText:
I really don't like leaving her here, but we need
to hurry!
jpnChrName: 今は先を急ぎましょう！
jpnSearchText: 今は先を急ぎましょう！

engChrName: I wanted to take another look at the crime scene, just to see if there were any leads about Professor Callaghan.
engSearchText:
I wanted to take another look at the crime scene, just
to see if there were any leads about
Professor Callaghan.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授の手がかりが無いか、 改めて現場検証をしたのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授の手がかりが無いか、
改めて現場検証をしたのだけど……

engChrName: There's just something strange about how disheveled the room was... It's like a tornado blew through or something.
engSearchText:
There's just something strange about how disheveled
the room was... It's like a tornado blew through
or something.
jpnChrName: あの痕跡……どうも気になるわね。 何か大きな存在が暴れ回ったかのような……
jpnSearchText:
あの痕跡……どうも気になるわね。
何か大きな存在が暴れ回ったかのような……

engChrName: Some of the damage implies they used slashing weapons over blunt force. I think we can rule out that man from Langport.
engSearchText:
Some of the damage implies they used slashing
weapons over blunt force. I think we can rule out that
man from Langport.
jpnChrName: ……打撃痕というより斬撃痕に近いし、煌都で 確認された幹部のナックルでもなさそうだわ。
jpnSearchText:
……打撃痕というより斬撃痕に近いし、煌都で
確認された幹部のナックルでもなさそうだわ。

engChrName: I dread to imagine running into whoever wrought that much damage...especially if they came from the Gardens.
engSearchText:
I dread to imagine running into whoever wrought
that much damage...especially if they came from
the Gardens.
jpnChrName: ……仮に例の“庭園”という連中の 得物だとしたら一筋縄ではいかないわね。
jpnSearchText:
……仮に例の“庭園”という連中の
得物だとしたら一筋縄ではいかないわね。

engChrName: We have some new intel to work with, courtesy of the capital branch. We'll have to make sure we investigate carefully.
engSearchText:
We have some new intel to work with, courtesy of the
capital branch. We'll have to make sure we
investigate carefully.
jpnChrName: 総支部から資料も回ってきているわ。 慎重に探る必要があるわね。
jpnSearchText:
総支部から資料も回ってきているわ。
慎重に探る必要があるわね。

engChrName: It's starting to sound like we really ARE dealing with the Gardens this time...
engSearchText:
It's starting to sound like we really ARE dealing with
the Gardens this time...
jpnChrName: でも不審な動きも確認されたようだし いよいよ当たりかもしれないわね……
jpnSearchText:
でも不審な動きも確認されたようだし
いよいよ当たりかもしれないわね……

engChrName: Hey, Alvis! Any luck with that job I gave you?
engSearchText: Hey, Alvis! Any luck with that job I gave you?
jpnChrName: ハァイ、アルヴィス！ さっき頼んだ件だけど……
jpnSearchText:
ハァイ、アルヴィス！
さっき頼んだ件だけど……

engChrName: ...Wait, wait! You're still not done?! What were you... Taking care of some kids? I mean... *sigh* Okay, I guess that's fair.
engSearchText:
...Wait, wait! You're still not done?! What were you...
Taking care of some kids? I mean... *sigh* Okay, I
guess that's fair.
jpnChrName: ってええ～！？　まだ終わってないの？ ……子供の対応をしてた？　仕方ないわね～。
jpnSearchText:
ってええ～！？　まだ終わってないの？
……子供の対応をしてた？　仕方ないわね～。

engChrName: Anyway, I've got another job for you... Yeah. Yeah, I saw somebody looking suspicious out on the edge of town.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I've got another job for you... Yeah. Yeah, I
saw somebody looking suspicious out on the edge
of town.
jpnChrName: ともかく１件追加で。 ……ええ、町はずれに人影があった気がして。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく１件追加で。
……ええ、町はずれに人影があった気がして。

engChrName: Could you have a look around and see if you find anything? Thanks! Give Regina my regards, too.
engSearchText:
Could you have a look around and see if you
find anything? Thanks! Give Regina my regards, too.
jpnChrName: 一応見回っておいてもらえる？ ……オッケー、レジーナにもよろしく！
jpnSearchText:
一応見回っておいてもらえる？
……オッケー、レジーナにもよろしく！

engChrName: No, no need to go overboard. It might just be nothing, but better safe than sorry, of course.
engSearchText:
No, no need to go overboard. It might just be
nothing, but better safe than sorry, of course.
jpnChrName: ええ、ちらっと見かけただけだから 念のためレベルで大丈夫よ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ちらっと見かけただけだから
念のためレベルで大丈夫よ。

engChrName: I'll head back to the guild in about thirty... Okay. Got it. You can fill me in once you get back.
engSearchText:
I'll head back to the guild in about thirty... Okay.
Got it. You can fill me in once you get back.
jpnChrName: ３０分後には支部に戻るわ。 ……ええ、報告はその時にでも！
jpnSearchText:
３０分後には支部に戻るわ。
……ええ、報告はその時にでも！

engChrName: Phew... We've smoothed out negotiations with Verne and Elsaim, thankfully.
engSearchText:
Phew... We've smoothed out negotiations with Verne
and Elsaim, thankfully.
jpnChrName: ふう、とりあえずヴェルヌやエルザイムとの 折衝も何とか見通しが立ってきました。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、とりあえずヴェルヌやエルザイムとの
折衝も何とか見通しが立ってきました。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan will be dearly missed here at the institute...but we should be able to fill his void in the short-term.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan will be dearly missed here at the
institute...but we should be able to fill his void in
the short-term.
jpnChrName: 教授に犠牲者が出てしまった事は痛ましいですが、 大学の体制自体は早めに立て直せそうです。
jpnSearchText:
教授に犠牲者が出てしまった事は痛ましいですが、
大学の体制自体は早めに立て直せそうです。

engChrName: What concerns me is the mental toll this has taken on the staff and students—they may not be ready to return to work yet.
engSearchText:
What concerns me is the mental toll this has taken on
the staff and students—they may not be ready to
return to work yet.
jpnChrName: もっとも、運営自体が出来ても学生や研究員の 方々のケアもまた別に必要になりますが……
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、運営自体が出来ても学生や研究員の
方々のケアもまた別に必要になりますが……

engChrName: I just can't wrap my head around everything we've had over the past few days...
engSearchText:
I just can't wrap my head around everything we've
had over the past few days...
jpnChrName: 想定外の事件が多過ぎる……
jpnSearchText: 想定外の事件が多過ぎる……

engChrName: It's our job as staff to keep thinking about the future, but what the heck is going on anymore? It's just too crazy to tell.
engSearchText:
It's our job as staff to keep thinking about the future,
but what the heck is going on anymore? It's just too
crazy to tell.
jpnChrName: 我々運営も、なかなかこの後の見通しが 立てられず……参ったものです。
jpnSearchText:
我々運営も、なかなかこの後の見通しが
立てられず……参ったものです。

engChrName: First the attack itself, and now in the aftermath, the whole city's on lockdown...
engSearchText:
First the attack itself, and now in the aftermath, the
whole city's on lockdown...
jpnChrName: おまけに、街そのものも被害を受けた上に 移動が制限されていますからね……
jpnSearchText:
おまけに、街そのものも被害を受けた上に
移動が制限されていますからね……

engChrName: I didn't wanna believe it when the chief engineer and the other professors told me about it. It just didn't make sense to me.
engSearchText:
I didn't wanna believe it when the chief engineer and
the other professors told me about it. It just didn't
make sense to me.
jpnChrName: まさかこの大学でこんな事が…… 技術長や他の教授より話は聞きましたが……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこの大学でこんな事が……
技術長や他の教授より話は聞きましたが……

engChrName: I can't help but wonder if we could have stopped this had someone noticed his behavior sooner...
engSearchText:
I can't help but wonder if we could have stopped this
had someone noticed his behavior sooner...
jpnChrName: ……もし、キャラハン先生の葛藤にどなたかが 早くに気づいていたら……防げたでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……もし、キャラハン先生の葛藤にどなたかが
早くに気づいていたら……防げたでしょうか？

engChrName: ...but, well, hindsight is 20/20. At any rate, I need to compile our documents on the incident to send to the police and the guild.
engSearchText:
...but, well, hindsight is 20/20. At any rate, I need to
compile our documents on the incident to send to the
police and the guild.
jpnChrName: とにかく、警察や遊撃士の方々に提供する 資料を纏めないと……
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、警察や遊撃士の方々に提供する
資料を纏めないと……

engChrName: Welcome to the Basel Institute of Science. Are you here to speak with researchers or students here?
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Basel Institute of Science. Are you
here to speak with researchers or students here?
jpnChrName: バーゼル理科大学へようこそ、 関係者へのご用事があれば伺いましょう。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル理科大学へようこそ、
関係者へのご用事があれば伺いましょう。

engChrName: We're a bit busier than usual, pardon us—we have a number of students visiting at the moment.
engSearchText:
We're a bit busier than usual, pardon us—we have a
number of students visiting at the moment.
jpnChrName: 視察研修の高校生らもいらしているので やや慌ただしいかもしれないですが……
jpnSearchText:
視察研修の高校生らもいらしているので
やや慌ただしいかもしれないですが……

engChrName: But if there's anything I can help you with, please do let me know.
engSearchText:
But if there's anything I can help you with, please do
let me know.
jpnChrName: 調整も含め、こちらでご案内しますので 何なりとお申し付けください。
jpnSearchText:
調整も含め、こちらでご案内しますので
何なりとお申し付けください。

engChrName: The hallway behind me leads to the special research building.
engSearchText:
The hallway behind me leads to the special
research building.
jpnChrName: 正面奥に見える扉が、特別研究棟への 通路となっています。
jpnSearchText:
正面奥に見える扉が、特別研究棟への
通路となっています。

engChrName: That building is off limits, I'm afraid—the institute conducts confidential research there.
engSearchText:
That building is off limits, I'm afraid—the institute
conducts confidential research there.
jpnChrName: 基本的にはセキュリティの関係上、 関係者以外立ち入り禁止となっています。
jpnSearchText:
基本的にはセキュリティの関係上、
関係者以外立ち入り禁止となっています。

engChrName: If you have any business with the staff inside, the guard there will be happy to help you.
engSearchText:
If you have any business with the staff inside, the
guard there will be happy to help you.
jpnChrName: 特別研究棟勤務の方にご用件でしたら、 警備員を通す形でお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
特別研究棟勤務の方にご用件でしたら、
警備員を通す形でお願いします。

engChrName: We're getting ready to open back up. Everybody's gotta eat, no matter how topsy-turvy everything is.
engSearchText:
We're getting ready to open back up.
Everybody's gotta eat, no matter how topsy-turvy
everything is.
jpnChrName: そろそろ平常通りに再開するよ、 やっぱり栄養摂らなきゃ始まらないからね。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ平常通りに再開するよ、
やっぱり栄養摂らなきゃ始まらないからね。

engChrName: A good meal's a great way to get back to normal. I think Professor Callaghan's students especially need to eat well.
engSearchText:
A good meal's a great way to get back to normal.
I think Professor Callaghan's students especially need
to eat well.
jpnChrName: 特にキャラハン先生のところの人たちには しっかりビタミン摂って欲しいね。
jpnSearchText:
特にキャラハン先生のところの人たちには
しっかりビタミン摂って欲しいね。

engChrName: Not to mention all the people working out there, cleaning up all the damage. They're really working up an appetite.
engSearchText:
Not to mention all the people working out there,
cleaning up all the damage. They're really working up
an appetite.
jpnChrName: 復旧作業とかで大変な人も多いし、 今も混乱が収まらない子もいるけど……
jpnSearchText:
復旧作業とかで大変な人も多いし、
今も混乱が収まらない子もいるけど……

engChrName: What a disaster yesterday turned out to be... I wasn't expecting those mechanical monsters to start rampaging through the place.
engSearchText:
What a disaster yesterday turned out to be... I wasn't
expecting those mechanical monsters to start
rampaging through the place.
jpnChrName: 昨日は本当に参ったわね…… まさかあんな機械の怪物が攻めてくるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
昨日は本当に参ったわね……
まさかあんな機械の怪物が攻めてくるなんて……

engChrName: I just bolted without a second thought. Still had my knife and my frying pan in my hands.
engSearchText:
I just bolted without a second thought. Still had my
knife and my frying pan in my hands.
jpnChrName: 逃げる時、思わずフライパンと出刃包丁を 持って飛び出しちゃったわ……
jpnSearchText:
逃げる時、思わずフライパンと出刃包丁を
持って飛び出しちゃったわ……

engChrName: Now everybody looks at me like I'm some kind of psycho! It's just silly, I tell you! C'mon, I'm still the same old lunch lady!
engSearchText:
Now everybody looks at me like I'm some kind
of psycho! It's just silly, I tell you! C'mon, I'm still the
same old lunch lady!
jpnChrName: お陰で学生の子らには怖がられちゃったけど、 私はいつも通りの食堂のお姉さん。
jpnSearchText:
お陰で学生の子らには怖がられちゃったけど、
私はいつも通りの食堂のお姉さん。

engChrName: You want something to eat, just let me know! You gotta keep your energy up in times like these, y'know?
engSearchText:
You want something to eat, just let me know!
You gotta keep your energy up in times like
these, y'know?
jpnChrName: 遠慮なく、ご飯を食べていってね。 こんな時こそ栄養は必要だから！
jpnSearchText:
遠慮なく、ご飯を食べていってね。
こんな時こそ栄養は必要だから！

engChrName: I can't believe what happened to Professor Callaghan...
engSearchText:
I can't believe what happened to
Professor Callaghan...
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授のところ、あんな事が あったなんてねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授のところ、あんな事が
あったなんてねぇ……

engChrName: First I hear those abuse allegations getting thrown around, which explained why all his students were so tired all the time...
engSearchText:
First I hear those abuse allegations getting thrown
around, which explained why all his students were so
tired all the time...
jpnChrName: パワハラって聞いて、助手さん達の やつれ具合も納得がいったわ……
jpnSearchText:
パワハラって聞いて、助手さん達の
やつれ具合も納得がいったわ……

engChrName: ...and now he's just gone! I can't imagine what it's like being one of his students right now.
engSearchText:
...and now he's just gone! I can't imagine what it's like
being one of his students right now.
jpnChrName: さらに、キャラハン教授も行方不明になって、 あの子達も心が休まらないだろうし……
jpnSearchText:
さらに、キャラハン教授も行方不明になって、
あの子達も心が休まらないだろうし……

engChrName: I wish I could do something about it, but I'll just have to keep putting hot meals on their plates and getting their spirits up.
engSearchText:
I wish I could do something about it, but I'll just have
to keep putting hot meals on their plates and getting
their spirits up.
jpnChrName: まあ、食欲が戻った時にほっとできるよう、 温かいものでも用意しておくとするわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、食欲が戻った時にほっとできるよう、
温かいものでも用意しておくとするわ。

engChrName: Hello there, and welcome to my kitchen!
engSearchText: Hello there, and welcome to my kitchen!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃーい、お姉さんの キッチンにようこそー。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃーい、お姉さんの
キッチンにようこそー。

engChrName: Everyone loves the food we serve here! Or...at least, I thought they did, but we have had one poorly-looking diner recently.
engSearchText:
Everyone loves the food we serve here! Or...at least, I
thought they did, but we have had one poorly-looking
diner recently.
jpnChrName: 食堂は好評営業中……と言いたいところだけど、 最近は具合悪そうな人もいて不安なのよねー。
jpnSearchText:
食堂は好評営業中……と言いたいところだけど、
最近は具合悪そうな人もいて不安なのよねー。

engChrName: He works in the special research building, and he's been eating a lot less lately. He looks terrible.
engSearchText:
He works in the special research building, and he's
been eating a lot less lately. He looks terrible.
jpnChrName: 特別研究棟の人なんだけど……前より食が細くて、 酷い時は吐いちゃったりもしててさ。
jpnSearchText:
特別研究棟の人なんだけど……前より食が細くて、
酷い時は吐いちゃったりもしててさ。

engChrName: He and his assistants always used to have these voracious appetites, too. What happened to them...?
engSearchText:
He and his assistants always used to have these
voracious appetites, too. What happened to them...?
jpnChrName: 前は、あそこの助手さん達も元気に食べてたのに。 一体何してるんだかね、あの教授は。
jpnSearchText:
前は、あそこの助手さん達も元気に食べてたのに。
一体何してるんだかね、あの教授は。

engChrName: Sugar is popular among the researchers here— eggheads need their glucose. We try to give them a healthy dose without going too overboard.
engSearchText:
Sugar is popular among the researchers here—
eggheads need their glucose. We try to give them a
healthy dose without going too overboard.
jpnChrName: 研究で脳みそを使うと糖分が欲しくなるしね、 そこら辺にも気ぃ使った一品をどうぞー。
jpnSearchText:
研究で脳みそを使うと糖分が欲しくなるしね、
そこら辺にも気ぃ使った一品をどうぞー。

engChrName: We've been getting a lot of tired-looking visitors lately, too, so we're trying to make comfortable, easy to digest dishes for them.
engSearchText:
We've been getting a lot of tired-looking visitors
lately, too, so we're trying to make comfortable, easy
to digest dishes for them.
jpnChrName: 最近は疲れてる人も多いし、 なるべく胃腸に優しいのを作ってるわよー。
jpnSearchText:
最近は疲れてる人も多いし、
なるべく胃腸に優しいのを作ってるわよー。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, Professor Callaghan started getting real stressed out a little while ago himself.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, Professor Callaghan
started getting real stressed out a little while
ago himself.
jpnChrName: ……今思えば、確かにキャラハン教授は 少し前から追い詰められていた気もするな。
jpnSearchText:
……今思えば、確かにキャラハン教授は
少し前から追い詰められていた気もするな。

engChrName: He was in a rush seemingly all the time—and he couldn't stop panicking about his budget, too.
engSearchText:
He was in a rush seemingly all the time—and he
couldn't stop panicking about his budget, too.
jpnChrName: 資料の手配を俺に頼む時も妙に切羽詰まった 感じはあったし、最初は予算も気にしてたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
資料の手配を俺に頼む時も妙に切羽詰まった
感じはあったし、最初は予算も気にしてたっけ。

engChrName: But I never imagined something like this would happen...
engSearchText:
But I never imagined something like this
would happen...
jpnChrName: だからってまあ……まさかここまでするとは 誰が予想できるってんだよ……
jpnSearchText:
だからってまあ……まさかここまでするとは
誰が予想できるってんだよ……

engChrName: What kind of world are we living in now where universities come under attack...? The library didn't suffer much damage, at least.
engSearchText:
What kind of world are we living in now where
universities come under attack...? The library didn't
suffer much damage, at least.
jpnChrName: まさかあんな襲撃があるとは……まあ、 蔵書の被害が最小限だったのは幸いか。
jpnSearchText:
まさかあんな襲撃があるとは……まあ、
蔵書の被害が最小限だったのは幸いか。

engChrName: The physical books are unharmed, too. My concern is more our digital library.
engSearchText:
The physical books are unharmed, too. My concern is
more our digital library.
jpnChrName: 書庫の方は荒らされていないし、 懸念すべきはデータ化した分の資料だな。
jpnSearchText:
書庫の方は荒らされていないし、
懸念すべきはデータ化した分の資料だな。

engChrName: Digital books are fragile in their own right. I can only hope we didn't lose our online archives.
engSearchText:
Digital books are fragile in their own right. I can only
hope we didn't lose our online archives.
jpnChrName: こいつらは繊細な代物だ、端末に入ってる分も 含めて破損が無いと良いのだが。
jpnSearchText:
こいつらは繊細な代物だ、端末に入ってる分も
含めて破損が無いと良いのだが。

engChrName: I can't believe they attacked the special research building... It sounds like it wasn't the work of that first intruder last night, either.
engSearchText:
I can't believe they attacked the special
research building... It sounds like it wasn't the work
of that first intruder last night, either.
jpnChrName: まさか特別研究棟が襲われちまうとはな…… 最初にいた侵入者とは別とも聞くが……？
jpnSearchText:
まさか特別研究棟が襲われちまうとはな……
最初にいた侵入者とは別とも聞くが……？

engChrName: Thankfully, our archives were left intact, but that's about all the good news. A professor disappearing is awful indeed.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, our archives were left intact, but that's
about all the good news. A professor disappearing is
awful indeed.
jpnChrName: 書庫の方は無事だったが……それにしても 教授が行方不明というのは洒落にならん。
jpnSearchText:
書庫の方は無事だったが……それにしても
教授が行方不明というのは洒落にならん。

engChrName: I hear it was Professor Callaghan, too. He used to have a real appetite for the books here—I would see him every day in the library.
engSearchText:
I hear it was Professor Callaghan, too. He used to
have a real appetite for the books here—I would see
him every day in the library.
jpnChrName: いなくなったのは、キャラハン先生か…… 前は熱心に資料の確保を頼んできてたが……
jpnSearchText:
いなくなったのは、キャラハン先生か……
前は熱心に資料の確保を頼んできてたが……

engChrName: But he started spending less and less time here, and more and more holed up in his lab poring over his computers.
engSearchText:
But he started spending less and less time here, and
more and more holed up in his lab poring over
his computers.
jpnChrName: 最近は、研究室に籠りきりで演算機と にらめっこしてたって話だよな……
jpnSearchText:
最近は、研究室に籠りきりで演算機と
にらめっこしてたって話だよな……

engChrName: There I was, thinking it was time to close for the evening. What's gotten into me?
engSearchText:
There I was, thinking it was time to close for
the evening. What's gotten into me?
jpnChrName: ようやく閉館作業に区切りが 付きそうだってのに……どうしたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ようやく閉館作業に区切りが
付きそうだってのに……どうしたんだ？

engChrName: Ah, well. The time will come eventually.
engSearchText: Ah, well. The time will come eventually.
jpnChrName: まあ良い、図書館はもう閉館だ。
jpnSearchText: まあ良い、図書館はもう閉館だ。

engChrName: Our closing routine is more complicated than you might think—we have to be real careful with the more important books in our archives.
engSearchText:
Our closing routine is more complicated than you
might think—we have to be real careful with the
more important books in our archives.
jpnChrName: 希少な書物もある分、閉館作業にも 相応に手間がかかるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
希少な書物もある分、閉館作業にも
相応に手間がかかるんだ。

engChrName: There's the security system, there's the underground storage... It's a lot to do. If you wouldn't mind steering clear, I'd appreciate it.
engSearchText:
There's the security system, there's the
underground storage... It's a lot to do. If you wouldn't
mind steering clear, I'd appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 警報装置やら地下書庫の確認やら…… あまり時間外に手間を取らせないでくれ。
jpnSearchText:
警報装置やら地下書庫の確認やら……
あまり時間外に手間を取らせないでくれ。

engChrName: Who would be the most likely to abuse staff and students...? Well, I'd have to say Professor Cronkite, honestly.
engSearchText:
Who would be the most likely to abuse staff and
students...? Well, I'd have to say Professor
Cronkite, honestly.
jpnChrName: パワハラって言うなら、 クロンカイト教授の事じゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
パワハラって言うなら、
クロンカイト教授の事じゃねえか？

engChrName: He's awfully quick to dismiss people. Haughty, in a word.
engSearchText:
He's awfully quick to dismiss people. Haughty, in
a word.
jpnChrName: アイツ、仕事が出来ないヤツが相手だと 相当冷たいそうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
アイツ、仕事が出来ないヤツが相手だと
相当冷たいそうじゃねえか。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan, though...?
engSearchText: Professor Callaghan, though...?
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授に関しては……
jpnSearchText: キャラハン教授に関しては……

engChrName: He's certainly not a bad person in my view, but he's gotten a bit of a bad rap after his work went south.
engSearchText:
He's certainly not a bad person in my view, but he's
gotten a bit of a bad rap after his work went south.
jpnChrName: 最近は余裕がないみたいで評判が落ちてる 気はするが、悪い人間じゃねえのは確かだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
最近は余裕がないみたいで評判が落ちてる
気はするが、悪い人間じゃねえのは確かだぜ。

engChrName: If you need anything from me, I'll just be reading here.
engSearchText:
If you need anything from me, I'll just be
reading here.
jpnChrName: 俺は適当に本を読んでいる、 用がある時だけ声をかけてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
俺は適当に本を読んでいる、
用がある時だけ声をかけてくれ。

engChrName: We do have plenty of papers here—though I don't know enough about them to make any recommendations.
engSearchText:
We do have plenty of papers here—though I don't
know enough about them to make
any recommendations.
jpnChrName: 目を通すだけなら資料は勝手に読むと良い、 俺から勧めるようなモンじゃないしな。
jpnSearchText:
目を通すだけなら資料は勝手に読むと良い、
俺から勧めるようなモンじゃないしな。

engChrName: Do handle them with care, though. They're very important papers.
engSearchText:
Do handle them with care, though. They're very
important papers.
jpnChrName: だが、ここには希少な専門文献も多い、 本を傷めないように注意してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、ここには希少な専門文献も多い、
本を傷めないように注意してくれ。

engChrName: Professor Epstein's essays—and those of his disciples—are very popular reads here, even among the more accomplished professors.
engSearchText:
Professor Epstein's essays—and those of his
disciples—are very popular reads here, even among
the more accomplished professors.
jpnChrName: エプスタイン博士や、三高弟の先生方の 著書はやはり偉い先生達もよく借りていく。
jpnSearchText:
エプスタイン博士や、三高弟の先生方の
著書はやはり偉い先生達もよく借りていく。

engChrName: And across the institute's long history, we've collected books dating back to well before the Orbal Revolution.
engSearchText:
And across the institute's long history, we've collected
books dating back to well before the
Orbal Revolution.
jpnChrName: 他にも、大学自体古いからな、 革命前の文献もそれなりに残っているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
他にも、大学自体古いからな、
革命前の文献もそれなりに残っているんだ。

engChrName: We don't just leave books that valuable on the shelves, though. You'll find them in our archives upon request.
engSearchText:
We don't just leave books that valuable on the
shelves, though. You'll find them in our archives
upon request.
jpnChrName: まあ、そこまで希少なものは書庫で 厳重保管して、必要な時だけ出しているが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そこまで希少なものは書庫で
厳重保管して、必要な時だけ出しているが。

engChrName: (Sounds like plenty of students and faculty come his way.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like plenty of students and faculty come
his way.)
jpnChrName: （ここなら、教授も学生も  	本を借りに顔を出してそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここなら、教授も学生も
本を借りに顔を出してそうだな。）

engChrName: (That tracks. Maybe he's overheard a word or two about the allegations.)
engSearchText:
(That tracks. Maybe he's overheard a word or two
about the allegations.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、司書なら何か知ってるかもしれねえ。  	ちょいと声をかけてみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、司書なら何か知ってるかもしれねえ。
ちょいと声をかけてみるか。）

engChrName: I had just started thinking that she was looking a little sunnier lately...and then the institute came under attack.
engSearchText:
I had just started thinking that she was looking a little
sunnier lately...and then the institute came
under attack.
jpnChrName: 昨日のあの後、多少は持ち直したと 思った矢先に例の襲撃事件だしね……
jpnSearchText:
昨日のあの後、多少は持ち直したと
思った矢先に例の襲撃事件だしね……

engChrName: She's being pushed to the breaking point, the poor girl... I want to try and support her however I can.
engSearchText:
She's being pushed to the breaking point, the
poor girl... I want to try and support her however
I can.
jpnChrName: 正直、シンディの精神状態も限界に 近いけど、できる限り力にならないと。
jpnSearchText:
正直、シンディの精神状態も限界に
近いけど、できる限り力にならないと。

engChrName: She has a bright future ahead of her—it would be a travesty if she were to lose that spark.
engSearchText:
She has a bright future ahead of her—it would be a
travesty if she were to lose that spark.
jpnChrName: 彼女のような優秀な研究員が、こんな形で 未来を閉ざされてはならないわ。
jpnSearchText:
彼女のような優秀な研究員が、こんな形で
未来を閉ざされてはならないわ。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan is widely respected by Cindy and his other peers. They really do look up to him...
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan is widely respected by Cindy and
his other peers. They really do look up to him...
jpnChrName: シンディをはじめ、他のキャラハン研究室の子も みんな心の底では教授を尊敬しているみたいなの。
jpnSearchText:
シンディをはじめ、他のキャラハン研究室の子も
みんな心の底では教授を尊敬しているみたいなの。

engChrName: ...and that's precisely what makes his recent behavior so incorrigible.
engSearchText:
...and that's precisely what makes his recent behavior
so incorrigible.
jpnChrName: それだけに、パワハラまがいの件は どうしたものかと思っていた所なんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
それだけに、パワハラまがいの件は
どうしたものかと思っていた所なんだけど……

engChrName: I'm just wondering how it even happened. Basel has airtight security, so it baffles me how he slipped through the cracks.
engSearchText:
I'm just wondering how it even happened. Basel has
airtight security, so it baffles me how he slipped
through the cracks.
jpnChrName: 警備が厳重なこのバーゼルで 行方不明になるだなんて、相当な事だと思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
警備が厳重なこのバーゼルで
行方不明になるだなんて、相当な事だと思うわ。

engChrName: I do hope he's all right...
engSearchText: I do hope he's all right...
jpnChrName: どうか無事でいてくれると良いんだけど……
jpnSearchText: どうか無事でいてくれると良いんだけど……

engChrName: Hmm... I worry for her, I really do, but I just don't have the time to check up on her.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I worry for her, I really do, but I just don't
have the time to check up on her.
jpnChrName: ふむ……あの子の事も心配だけど、 なかなか様子も見にいってあげられないし……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……あの子の事も心配だけど、
なかなか様子も見にいってあげられないし……

engChrName: Next time I see her, I think I'll recommend her these vitamins I like. I was on the advisory board for them, actually.
engSearchText:
Next time I see her, I think I'll recommend her these
vitamins I like. I was on the advisory board for
them, actually.
jpnChrName: まあ……次に会う時には、私が顧問をしている 製薬会社の栄養剤を差し入れようかしらね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ……次に会う時には、私が顧問をしている
製薬会社の栄養剤を差し入れようかしらね。

engChrName: I do worry about how she's the only woman on her team. I don't want her to feel afraid to speak her mind on things.
engSearchText:
I do worry about how she's the only woman on
her team. I don't want her to feel afraid to speak her
mind on things.
jpnChrName: 同僚に女性がいないのも心配だし…… その辺りも踏まえていった方が良さそうね。
jpnSearchText:
同僚に女性がいないのも心配だし……
その辺りも踏まえていった方が良さそうね。

engChrName: I just...I can't say that. I can't even talk to my friends about it, I'm so tired...
engSearchText:
I just...I can't say that. I can't even talk to my friends
about it, I'm so tired...
jpnChrName: ……それで、そんな事言い出せなくて…… 友達と連絡する余裕も無いから……
jpnSearchText:
……それで、そんな事言い出せなくて……
友達と連絡する余裕も無いから……

engChrName: I was so scared... I didn't know what was coming next, or even if my body would hold up...
engSearchText:
I was so scared... I didn't know what was coming
next, or even if my body would hold up...
jpnChrName: 身体の事も、この後どうなるのかも…… 本当に不安だったんです……！
jpnSearchText:
身体の事も、この後どうなるのかも……
本当に不安だったんです……！

engChrName: I'm not surprised... I wish you'd have felt comfortable bringing this to me earlier.
engSearchText:
I'm not surprised... I wish you'd have felt comfortable
bringing this to me earlier.
jpnChrName: うん……それは大変だったわね…… せめて私に一声言ってくれれば……
jpnSearchText:
うん……それは大変だったわね……
せめて私に一声言ってくれれば……

engChrName: But I can imagine you felt awkward about it, given... well, everything.
engSearchText:
But I can imagine you felt awkward about it, given...
well, everything.
jpnChrName: いや、そんな空気でもなかったのね……
jpnSearchText: いや、そんな空気でもなかったのね……

engChrName: Mhm. I know what he put us all through, but this is just... No...!
engSearchText:
Mhm. I know what he put us all through, but this
is just... No...!
jpnChrName: はい……でも、だからってこんな…… いきなり教授が攫われるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
はい……でも、だからってこんな……
いきなり教授が攫われるなんて……

engChrName: I never wanted him to get abducted like this...!
engSearchText: I never wanted him to get abducted like this...!
jpnChrName: こんな風になって欲しいなんて、全然……！
jpnSearchText: こんな風になって欲しいなんて、全然……！

engChrName: I know you didn't. You respect him deeply, that's plain to see.
engSearchText:
I know you didn't. You respect him deeply, that's
plain to see.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫、君が前からキャラハン教授も 尊敬していた事は分かっているから……
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫、君が前からキャラハン教授も
尊敬していた事は分かっているから……

engChrName: I think it's best we all try and get some rest for now. Once things have calmed down, I'd be happy to talk about this.
engSearchText:
I think it's best we all try and get some rest for now.
Once things have calmed down, I'd be happy to talk
about this.
jpnChrName: ともかく、今は休みなさい。 落ち着いたら、私の所に来ると良いわ。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、今は休みなさい。
落ち着いたら、私の所に来ると良いわ。

engChrName: Who you study under is your choice and yours alone. If Professor Callaghan's lab isn't the right place for you, I'd be delighted to have you.
engSearchText:
Who you study under is your choice and yours alone.
If Professor Callaghan's lab isn't the right place for
you, I'd be delighted to have you.
jpnChrName: 何なら、君ほどの人材なら回復次第、 私の所に転籍して欲しいくらいだし。
jpnSearchText:
何なら、君ほどの人材なら回復次第、
私の所に転籍して欲しいくらいだし。

engChrName: Thank you... Really, thank you. It's so nice to hear that...
engSearchText:
Thank you... Really, thank you. It's so nice to
hear that...
jpnChrName: はい……そう言ってもらえると 少し楽になれそうです……
jpnSearchText:
はい……そう言ってもらえると
少し楽になれそうです……

engChrName: They really went and locked down the roads. This is just nuts...
engSearchText:
They really went and locked down the roads. This is
just nuts...
jpnChrName: それにしても、全面的な交通封鎖ときたか……
jpnSearchText: それにしても、全面的な交通封鎖ときたか……

engChrName: Everywhere's backed up to hell, and our supply chain is at a dead stop. Even once it's lifted, we'll have a massive backlog to get through.
engSearchText:
Everywhere's backed up to hell, and our supply chain
is at a dead stop. Even once it's lifted, we'll have a
massive backlog to get through.
jpnChrName: 既に渋滞や物流の麻痺も起きている、封鎖が解除 された後も反動で交通網の混乱は続くだろう。
jpnSearchText:
既に渋滞や物流の麻痺も起きている、封鎖が解除
された後も反動で交通網の混乱は続くだろう。

engChrName: But y'know, maybe this is the wake-up call we needed. Our traffic systems need to handle stuff like this.
engSearchText:
But y'know, maybe this is the wake-up call
we needed. Our traffic systems need to handle stuff
like this.
jpnChrName: 今回の事も踏まえ、災害やテロにより対応しやすい 交通システムを提案していかないとな……
jpnSearchText:
今回の事も踏まえ、災害やテロにより対応しやすい
交通システムを提案していかないとな……

engChrName: Honestly, what is Lionel doing? All this chaos, and he's got mushrooms on the mind?
engSearchText:
Honestly, what is Lionel doing? All this chaos, and
he's got mushrooms on the mind?
jpnChrName: それにしても、この大変な時にもキノコの心配とは 我が同期ながらライオネルには困ったものだよ。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、この大変な時にもキノコの心配とは
我が同期ながらライオネルには困ったものだよ。

engChrName: The rest of us are up to our necks in work. I've got a whole mountain of infrastructure docs to get for Marduk...
engSearchText:
The rest of us are up to our necks in work. I've got a
whole mountain of infrastructure docs to get
for Marduk...
jpnChrName: 私でさえ、ＭＫ社に提供を要求されているインフラ 関係の資料を纏めるのに忙しいというのに……
jpnSearchText:
私でさえ、ＭＫ社に提供を要求されているインフラ
関係の資料を纏めるのに忙しいというのに……

engChrName: I don't want to trouble my students—they have enough on their plates. But you'd think he could help out with the workload a little...
engSearchText:
I don't want to trouble my students—they have
enough on their plates. But you'd think he could help
out with the workload a little...
jpnChrName: 各々事情がある教え子達の手を煩わせたくないし、 あいつにも雑用くらい手伝って欲しいのだが。
jpnSearchText:
各々事情がある教え子達の手を煩わせたくないし、
あいつにも雑用くらい手伝って欲しいのだが。

engChrName: I never thought some horror like that would befall our institute. The world these days, I swear...
engSearchText:
I never thought some horror like that would befall
our institute. The world these days, I swear...
jpnChrName: うちの大学がこのような事件に 見舞われる事になろうとは……
jpnSearchText:
うちの大学がこのような事件に
見舞われる事になろうとは……

engChrName: I'm relieved that my students are okay... Kei and Gimbat especially.
engSearchText:
I'm relieved that my students are okay... Kei and
Gimbat especially.
jpnChrName: ケイ君やジンバット君をはじめ、 教え子に被害が無かったのは幸いだが……
jpnSearchText:
ケイ君やジンバット君をはじめ、
教え子に被害が無かったのは幸いだが……

engChrName: But how's a kid supposed to study after all this? I don't know what to do... It's just awful, all of it.
engSearchText:
But how's a kid supposed to study after all this?
I don't know what to do... It's just awful, all of it.
jpnChrName: 今後、彼らが安心して学問に励むためにも 大学の体制も早めに立て直さねばな。
jpnSearchText:
今後、彼らが安心して学問に励むためにも
大学の体制も早めに立て直さねばな。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan will be deeply missed... Just a tragedy, what happened to him.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan will be deeply missed... Just a
tragedy, what happened to him.
jpnChrName: それにしても、キャラハン教授が 亡くなってしまうとは……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、キャラハン教授が
亡くなってしまうとは……

engChrName: I was really hoping I could talk it out with him, ask what was bothering him...but I can't anymore. He's just...gone.
engSearchText:
I was really hoping I could talk it out with him, ask
what was bothering him...but I can't anymore.
He's just...gone.
jpnChrName: 本当なら何を焦っているのか、助手たちを どう思うのか腹を割って話したかったのにな……
jpnSearchText:
本当なら何を焦っているのか、助手たちを
どう思うのか腹を割って話したかったのにな……

engChrName: I felt sick to my stomach when I heard the news... I can only hope they find him safe.
engSearchText:
I felt sick to my stomach when I heard the news...
I can only hope they find him safe.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授が行方不明とは…… 無事に見つかると良いが……
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授が行方不明とは……
無事に見つかると良いが……

engChrName: He used to be such a kind and compassionate man... What happened to him? What drove him to abuse his students like that...?
engSearchText:
He used to be such a kind and compassionate man...
What happened to him? What drove him to abuse his
students like that...?
jpnChrName: 前は面倒見の良かった彼がパワハラを していたという事は正直残念だが……
jpnSearchText:
前は面倒見の良かった彼がパワハラを
していたという事は正直残念だが……

engChrName: I hope he comes back safe...and I hope I get to sit down with him and find out why he's done all this.
engSearchText:
I hope he comes back safe...and I hope I get to sit
down with him and find out why he's done all this.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ今は見つかる事を祈ろう。 改めて、彼とも話した方が良さそうだしな……
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ今は見つかる事を祈ろう。
改めて、彼とも話した方が良さそうだしな……

engChrName: There's been a lot of grumbling about signal and power issues recently—and it got even worse yesterday.
engSearchText:
There's been a lot of grumbling about signal and
power issues recently—and it got even
worse yesterday.
jpnChrName: しかし……件の通信障害や導力供給の 不安定化は昨日より悪化していると聞く。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……件の通信障害や導力供給の
不安定化は昨日より悪化していると聞く。

engChrName: I'm in charge of the city's wiring system, and I'm pretty confident the wires aren't the problem. Something else is going on...
engSearchText:
I'm in charge of the city's wiring system, and I'm
pretty confident the wires aren't the problem.
Something else is going on...
jpnChrName: この街の配線などの監修はしている身だが、 どうにも聞く限り不自然なような……
jpnSearchText:
この街の配線などの監修はしている身だが、
どうにも聞く限り不自然なような……

engChrName: Still, if this doesn't let up, we'll pretty much HAVE to investigate the grid just to save face.
engSearchText:
Still, if this doesn't let up, we'll pretty much HAVE
to investigate the grid just to save face.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、長引くようなら私も 本格的に調査した方が良さそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、長引くようなら私も
本格的に調査した方が良さそうだ。

engChrName: Network engineering is my forte, but I do a lot of work with the civil engineering guys, too. Earthquake resistance, grid planning, that sorta thing.
engSearchText:
Network engineering is my forte, but I do a lot of
work with the civil engineering guys, too.
Earthquake resistance, grid planning, that sorta thing.
jpnChrName: 私は都市工学が専門だが……耐震構造や 設備関連では物理工学の方々との協力も多くてね。
jpnSearchText:
私は都市工学が専門だが……耐震構造や
設備関連では物理工学の方々との協力も多くてね。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan in particular, he's been a big help to me.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan in particular, he's been a big help
to me.
jpnChrName: 特にキャラハン教授には、前は世話になり、 随分と良くしてもらったものさ。
jpnSearchText:
特にキャラハン教授には、前は世話になり、
随分と良くしてもらったものさ。

engChrName: He's been awfully irritable lately, but he's a good person deep down. Maybe he just needs a drink or two to unwind.
engSearchText:
He's been awfully irritable lately, but he's a good
person deep down. Maybe he just needs a drink or
two to unwind.
jpnChrName: まあ、ここ最近は余裕が無いようだが 彼も根は良い人だ、また飲みに行きたいものだな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ここ最近は余裕が無いようだが
彼も根は良い人だ、また飲みに行きたいものだな。

engChrName: The orbal network is essential infrastructure now, and cities need to be designed around it.
engSearchText:
The orbal network is essential infrastructure now, and
cities need to be designed around it.
jpnChrName: 今や導力ネットも不可欠なインフラの一つだからな、 都市設計もそれを見越している必要があるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
今や導力ネットも不可欠なインフラの一つだからな、
都市設計もそれを見越している必要があるんだ。

engChrName: Network signal needs to reach every nook and cranny of the city, so that's lots of cables, lots of antennas, lots of planning.
engSearchText:
Network signal needs to reach every nook and cranny
of the city, so that's lots of cables, lots of antennas,
lots of planning.
jpnChrName: ケーブルやアンテナの設置も関係してくるし、 導力波塔も都市の中核となり得る。
jpnSearchText:
ケーブルやアンテナの設置も関係してくるし、
導力波塔も都市の中核となり得る。

engChrName: The computer science students here have been a big help with modernizing the grid.
engSearchText:
The computer science students here have been a big
help with modernizing the grid.
jpnChrName: その辺りの事情もあって、最近は情報工学系の 学生とも共同研究をする事も多いものさ。
jpnSearchText:
その辺りの事情もあって、最近は情報工学系の
学生とも共同研究をする事も多いものさ。

engChrName: We've finally gotten the comms to stabilize a bit. I'm doing what I can—I don't wanna let Coolidge down.
engSearchText:
We've finally gotten the comms to stabilize a bit.
I'm doing what I can—I don't wanna let
Coolidge down.
jpnChrName: 通信も安定してきたし……クーリッジさんの 期待にも応えなきゃですし……
jpnSearchText:
通信も安定してきたし……クーリッジさんの
期待にも応えなきゃですし……

engChrName: We've implemented some stopgap measures to try and keep the network together while we diagnose things.
engSearchText:
We've implemented some stopgap measures to try
and keep the network together while we
diagnose things.
jpnChrName: 今、破断した通信網を調べて…… 再構成までの繋ぎをしていたところで……
jpnSearchText:
今、破断した通信網を調べて……
再構成までの繋ぎをしていたところで……

engChrName: I don't want to leave it all to that security company, but I don't want to overload our servers again, either...
engSearchText:
I don't want to leave it all to that security company,
but I don't want to overload our servers again, either...
jpnChrName: 例の警備会社に頼りきりになる訳にもいかないし…… サーバーにまた負荷をかけたくないですし……
jpnSearchText:
例の警備会社に頼りきりになる訳にもいかないし……
サーバーにまた負荷をかけたくないですし……

engChrName: Holo cores are proving really useful here. They can search and diagnose stuff all on their own, like a little pocket partner.
engSearchText:
Holo cores are proving really useful here. They can
search and diagnose stuff all on their own, like a little
pocket partner.
jpnChrName: ホロウコアも……こういう非常時には 各種サポートやサーチにも役立ちますし……
jpnSearchText:
ホロウコアも……こういう非常時には
各種サポートやサーチにも役立ちますし……

engChrName: It really underlines how important they're gonna be once the technology takes the next step. I can't slack on my research.
engSearchText:
It really underlines how important they're gonna be
once the technology takes the next step. I can't slack
on my research.
jpnChrName: 今後のためにも……導力波もホロウコアも、 研究は滞らせたくありませんから……
jpnSearchText:
今後のためにも……導力波もホロウコアも、
研究は滞らせたくありませんから……

engChrName: This is my chance to make myself useful for once... I have to do what I can to get things back to normal.
engSearchText:
This is my chance to make myself useful for once...
I have to do what I can to get things back to normal.
jpnChrName: 無力な私だけど……大学の体制の立て直しに 出来る事はやっていかないと……
jpnSearchText:
無力な私だけど……大学の体制の立て直しに
出来る事はやっていかないと……

engChrName: He really shouldn't be worrying about me, but...I'm kinda happy that he is.
engSearchText:
He really shouldn't be worrying about me, but...I'm
kinda happy that he is.
jpnChrName: クーリッジさん……私なんか…… 心配してくれてたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
クーリッジさん……私なんか……
心配してくれてたなんて……

engChrName: Now I need to make it up to him with my research.
engSearchText: Now I need to make it up to him with my research.
jpnChrName: それなら……私もちゃんと 頑張って応えないと……
jpnSearchText:
それなら……私もちゃんと
頑張って応えないと……

engChrName: Yesterday's meeting was a wash, but my holo research is still moving along, at least.
engSearchText:
Yesterday's meeting was a wash, but my holo research
is still moving along, at least.
jpnChrName: き、昨日の打ち合わせ……アガっちゃったけど…… でも、ホロウの実験も進捗はあったし……
jpnSearchText:
き、昨日の打ち合わせ……アガっちゃったけど……
でも、ホロウの実験も進捗はあったし……

engChrName: Maybe Coolidge is right: should I try having more faith in myself? I just... I don't know...
engSearchText:
Maybe Coolidge is right: should I try having more
faith in myself? I just... I don't know...
jpnChrName: クーリッジさんの言うように…… もう少し自信持ったほうが良いのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
クーリッジさんの言うように……
もう少し自信持ったほうが良いのかな……？

engChrName: Oh, you're the guys who helped test my holo core...
engSearchText: Oh, you're the guys who helped test my holo core...
jpnChrName: あ……先ほど協力してくれた……
jpnSearchText: あ……先ほど協力してくれた……

engChrName: Thank you. The data you gathered really helped a lot.
engSearchText: Thank you. The data you gathered really helped a lot.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、 良いデータを確保できました……
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます、
良いデータを確保できました……

engChrName: I work with signals and communications—my project right now studies how they're used in Xiphas.
engSearchText:
I work with signals and communications—my project
right now studies how they're used in Xiphas.
jpnChrName: 本来、私は通信波の研究を中心にしていて…… 今回はザイファでの応用という事で……
jpnSearchText:
本来、私は通信波の研究を中心にしていて……
今回はザイファでの応用という事で……

engChrName: I was really honored, honestly. Being able to work alongside Professor Cronkite was just so... So...!
engSearchText:
I was really honored, honestly. Being able to work
alongside Professor Cronkite was just so... So...!
jpnChrName: あのクロンカイト教授も関わる研究に 携われて……こ、光栄でした……
jpnSearchText:
あのクロンカイト教授も関わる研究に
携われて……こ、光栄でした……

engChrName: Meeting time... *sigh* Can we not just handle it through text?
engSearchText:
Meeting time... *sigh* Can we not just handle it
through text?
jpnChrName: ……打ち合わせの時間…… 正直、メールで済ませたいのにな……
jpnSearchText:
……打ち合わせの時間……
正直、メールで済ませたいのにな……

engChrName: That's how they do it everywhere else...
engSearchText: That's how they do it everywhere else...
jpnChrName: 通信の研究も……こういうわずらわしさ、 無くしたくてやってるのに……
jpnSearchText:
通信の研究も……こういうわずらわしさ、
無くしたくてやってるのに……

engChrName: Who knows how long it'll take the institute to recover from this... With everything that's happened, they're really out of commission.
engSearchText:
Who knows how long it'll take the institute to recover
from this... With everything that's happened, they're
really out of commission.
jpnChrName: ……それにしても、こんな事件が立て続けに 起こるとは大学も苦難の時ってやつかね……
jpnSearchText:
……それにしても、こんな事件が立て続けに
起こるとは大学も苦難の時ってやつかね……

engChrName: And here I was hoping I might finally get a grant for my research. I was so close, but nope! That window's gone and closed.
engSearchText:
And here I was hoping I might finally get a grant for
my research. I was so close, but nope! That window's
gone and closed.
jpnChrName: ったく、この景気でいい加減俺の研究にも 予算つかねぇかなって思ってたのよ……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、この景気でいい加減俺の研究にも
予算つかねぇかなって思ってたのよ……

engChrName: *sigh* Will fungi EVER have their time in the limelight? Or are they doomed to wallow in the damp dark forever?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Will fungi EVER have their time in
the limelight? Or are they doomed to wallow in the
damp dark forever?
jpnChrName: はぁ、菌糸類の時代はいつ来るのやら。 やれやれだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、菌糸類の時代はいつ来るのやら。
やれやれだぜ。

engChrName: Those filthy mechanical monsters... They stole my darlings from me!
engSearchText:
Those filthy mechanical monsters... They stole my
darlings from me!
jpnChrName: あの機械人形どもめ……俺の……俺の 大切なものを奪っていきやがった……！
jpnSearchText:
あの機械人形どもめ……俺の……俺の
大切なものを奪っていきやがった……！

engChrName: Oh, Stephanie... Liam... Sally...! My poor babies!
engSearchText: Oh, Stephanie... Liam... Sally...! My poor babies!
jpnChrName: ああ、ステファニー、リアム、サリー……！
jpnSearchText: ああ、ステファニー、リアム、サリー……！

engChrName: Even Shirley, my ultra-rare slime...! I poured my blood, sweat, and tears into cultivating her, and they just struck her down!
engSearchText:
Even Shirley, my ultra-rare slime...! I poured my
blood, sweat, and tears into cultivating her, and they
just struck her down!
jpnChrName: 俺が大切に育てた……！　培養してきた 激レア粘菌のシャーレを割りやがった！！
jpnSearchText:
俺が大切に育てた……！　培養してきた
激レア粘菌のシャーレを割りやがった！！

engChrName: Oooh, if it isn't an Ored green navel! You don't see those growing here very often.
engSearchText:
Oooh, if it isn't an Ored green navel! You don't see
those growing here very often.
jpnChrName: お、こんなところに珍しい オレドミドリタケが生えてるじゃねぇか……！
jpnSearchText:
お、こんなところに珍しい
オレドミドリタケが生えてるじゃねぇか……！

engChrName: I'll have to take a sample. What brought it all the way out here, I wonder?
engSearchText:
I'll have to take a sample. What brought it all the way
out here, I wonder?
jpnChrName: カルバードでは希少だ、サンプルに摘もう。 しかし、何故ここに定着したんだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
カルバードでは希少だ、サンプルに摘もう。
しかし、何故ここに定着したんだろうな。

engChrName: Perhaps the local wind and weather patterns emulate their original habitat...! Oh, that's simply fascinating!
engSearchText:
Perhaps the local wind and weather patterns emulate
their original habitat...! Oh, that's simply fascinating!
jpnChrName: おそらく、渓谷の風と地熱とで奇蹟的に、 原産地に近い気温と湿度の条件が……（ブツブツ）
jpnSearchText:
おそらく、渓谷の風と地熱とで奇蹟的に、
原産地に近い気温と湿度の条件が……（ブツブツ）

engChrName: Huh, nighttime already? Man, time flies when you're watching slime molds grow.
engSearchText:
Huh, nighttime already? Man, time flies when you're
watching slime molds grow.
jpnChrName: ……粘菌の細胞分裂を観察してたら すっかり日が暮れちまった。
jpnSearchText:
……粘菌の細胞分裂を観察してたら
すっかり日が暮れちまった。

engChrName: I know, I know, it sounds like paint drying, but just give it a look! You'll be spellbound before you know it.
engSearchText:
I know, I know, it sounds like paint drying, but just
give it a look! You'll be spellbound before you
know it.
jpnChrName: 地味に見えて、一回見始めると 止まらねぇんだよな、あれが。
jpnSearchText:
地味に見えて、一回見始めると
止まらねぇんだよな、あれが。

engChrName: ...Wait, it's awfully crowded here. Did something happen? You don't get crowds like that this late at night.
engSearchText:
...Wait, it's awfully crowded here. Did
something happen? You don't get crowds like that
this late at night.
jpnChrName: ……んで、こんな夜更けに構内で 何かあったってのか？
jpnSearchText:
……んで、こんな夜更けに構内で
何かあったってのか？

engChrName: Fungi really are one of nature's greatest wonders.
engSearchText: Fungi really are one of nature's greatest wonders.
jpnChrName: 菌類ってのはなァ、偉大なんだぜ……
jpnSearchText: 菌類ってのはなァ、偉大なんだぜ……

engChrName: If not for them, we wouldn't have penicillin—and we'd all be worse off for it.
engSearchText:
If not for them, we wouldn't have penicillin—and
we'd all be worse off for it.
jpnChrName: 菌類が無きゃ疫病に大陸が冒されてても おかしくない、感謝しやがれ。
jpnSearchText:
菌類が無きゃ疫病に大陸が冒されてても
おかしくない、感謝しやがれ。

engChrName: What, you didn't know? Yeah, penicillin's made from mold! Show a little respect for our silent saviors, eh?
engSearchText:
What, you didn't know? Yeah, penicillin's made
from mold! Show a little respect for our silent
saviors, eh?
jpnChrName: “ペニシリン”系の薬がカビから生まれた事、 今じゃみんな忘れちまってやがる……
jpnSearchText:
“ペニシリン”系の薬がカビから生まれた事、
今じゃみんな忘れちまってやがる……

engChrName: It's such a shame the wonders of fungi go unrecognized. I've been trying to secure funding for my research, but to no avail.
engSearchText:
It's such a shame the wonders of fungi
go unrecognized. I've been trying to secure funding
for my research, but to no avail.
jpnChrName: 何故どいつも菌類の良さが判らねぇんだ…… 少しくらい投資してくれりゃ良いのになァ。
jpnSearchText:
何故どいつも菌類の良さが判らねぇんだ……
少しくらい投資してくれりゃ良いのになァ。

engChrName: I swear, my lab is the only one in the entire biochem building that gets so routinely snubbed. What gives?
engSearchText:
I swear, my lab is the only one in the entire biochem
building that gets so routinely snubbed. What gives?
jpnChrName: 生化学系で予算に余裕がねぇのは 俺んところくらいだろうなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
生化学系で予算に余裕がねぇのは
俺んところくらいだろうなぁ……

engChrName: Professor Esmeray, Professor Aurelie, they're just swimming in grants.
engSearchText:
Professor Esmeray, Professor Aurelie, they're just
swimming in grants.
jpnChrName: エスメレー准教授やオレリー教授もそれなりに 投資を受けて羽振りも良いっていうし。
jpnSearchText:
エスメレー准教授やオレリー教授もそれなりに
投資を受けて羽振りも良いっていうし。

engChrName: But the limitless potential of fungi goes untapped for another day. Woe is me...
engSearchText:
But the limitless potential of fungi goes untapped for
another day. Woe is me...
jpnChrName: 大学も企業も……菌類の可能性って モンを判っていねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
大学も企業も……菌類の可能性って
モンを判っていねぇ。

engChrName: I just don't understand it—time and time again, they go unnoticed. Not even Tain has anything nice to say about them.
engSearchText:
I just don't understand it—time and time again, they
go unnoticed. Not even Tain has anything nice to say
about them.
jpnChrName: どうして皆、菌類の有用性に気づかないんだか…… 同期のトウェインも微妙な小言しか言わねぇし……
jpnSearchText:
どうして皆、菌類の有用性に気づかないんだか……
同期のトウェインも微妙な小言しか言わねぇし……

engChrName: What is this, some bizarre prejudice? Anti-fungism? Is there really no one else on this earth who appreciates them like I do?
engSearchText:
What is this, some bizarre prejudice? Anti-fungism?
Is there really no one else on this earth who
appreciates them like I do?
jpnChrName: 何ていうか、菌類に先入観でもあんのかねぇ？ 型に捉われない同志ってのはいないもんかねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
何ていうか、菌類に先入観でもあんのかねぇ？
型に捉われない同志ってのはいないもんかねぇ……

engChrName: My family lives in Edith. I managed to get through to them today—I've let them know I'm all right.
engSearchText:
My family lives in Edith. I managed to get through to
them today—I've let them know I'm all right.
jpnChrName: 無事を知らせるためにさっき首都の実家と 連絡しましたが、やっぱり情報が錯綜しているようで……
jpnSearchText:
無事を知らせるためにさっき首都の実家と
連絡しましたが、やっぱり情報が錯綜しているようで……

engChrName: Sounds like nobody outside knows what's going on. Reporters can't get into Basel because the roads are all closed.
engSearchText:
Sounds like nobody outside knows what's going on.
Reporters can't get into Basel because the roads are
all closed.
jpnChrName: 他の街でも事件があったようですし、 バーゼルには記者も来れない状態ですし……
jpnSearchText:
他の街でも事件があったようですし、
バーゼルには記者も来れない状態ですし……

engChrName: I just feel like I've gotta help out somehow. Professor Tain has a lot on his hands—he shouldn't have to manage it all alone.
engSearchText:
I just feel like I've gotta help out somehow.
Professor Tain has a lot on his hands—he shouldn't
have to manage it all alone.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、私もできる事は探さないと。 トウェイン准教授も事後処理で忙しいと聞きます。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、私もできる事は探さないと。
トウェイン准教授も事後処理で忙しいと聞きます。

engChrName: I may be a student, but there has to be something I can do. I'll ask him when I get the chance.
engSearchText:
I may be a student, but there has to be something I
can do. I'll ask him when I get the chance.
jpnChrName: まだ学生の身ですが、事務や情報整理で 手伝えないか、後で話そうと思います。
jpnSearchText:
まだ学生の身ですが、事務や情報整理で
手伝えないか、後で話そうと思います。

engChrName: I can't believe Liz is still all nonchalant after everything that's happened... I need to set her straight as an upperclassman.
engSearchText:
I can't believe Liz is still all nonchalant after
everything that's happened... I need to set her straight
as an upperclassman.
jpnChrName: リズは相変わらず緊張感も無いようですが…… 先輩として、私も手本にならないとですね。
jpnSearchText:
リズは相変わらず緊張感も無いようですが……
先輩として、私も手本にならないとですね。

engChrName: I've had my hands full myself for a while, but I'm gonna try and make time for talking to Professor Tain about it.
engSearchText:
I've had my hands full myself for a while, but I'm
gonna try and make time for talking to Professor
Tain about it.
jpnChrName: さっきまでは自分の事でいっぱいでしたが、 准教授の手伝いに行きましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
さっきまでは自分の事でいっぱいでしたが、
准教授の手伝いに行きましょうか。

engChrName: Anything to stop Liz from ending up like...whatever Lionel's got going on.
engSearchText:
Anything to stop Liz from ending up like...whatever
Lionel's got going on.
jpnChrName: ……リズが、あちらにいるライオネルさんのような 人を真似たりしてはいけないですし。
jpnSearchText:
……リズが、あちらにいるライオネルさんのような
人を真似たりしてはいけないですし。

engChrName: Liz really needs to start acting like an adult. She goes to the Institute of Science, for crying out loud.
engSearchText:
Liz really needs to start acting like an adult. She goes
to the Institute of Science, for crying out loud.
jpnChrName: リズもそろそろ、理科大学の一員だって 自覚をちゃんと持って欲しいものです。
jpnSearchText:
リズもそろそろ、理科大学の一員だって
自覚をちゃんと持って欲しいものです。

engChrName: I'm glad that Professor Cronkite and Professor Esmeray are okay, at least.
engSearchText:
I'm glad that Professor Cronkite and Professor
Esmeray are okay, at least.
jpnChrName: しかし特別研究棟の件……クロンカイト教授と エスメレー准教授は無事で何よりですが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし特別研究棟の件……クロンカイト教授と
エスメレー准教授は無事で何よりですが……

engChrName: But Professor Callaghan disappearing is just... I can't even wrap my head around it.
engSearchText:
But Professor Callaghan disappearing is just... I can't
even wrap my head around it.
jpnChrName: まさかキャラハン教授のところが、 こんな事になるだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさかキャラハン教授のところが、
こんな事になるだなんて……

engChrName: Professor Tain's been really worried about him—even before all this went down.
engSearchText:
Professor Tain's been really worried about him—even
before all this went down.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授の事はトウェイン准教授も 気にかけられていたようですが……
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授の事はトウェイン准教授も
気にかけられていたようですが……

engChrName: Professor Cronkite and Professor Tain are both wonderful people.
engSearchText:
Professor Cronkite and Professor Tain are both
wonderful people.
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授もトウェイン准教授も 素晴らしい方ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授もトウェイン准教授も
素晴らしい方ですよ。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan calls this institute home, too! He's just unbelievably bright.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan calls this institute home, too!
He's just unbelievably bright.
jpnChrName: それに、この大学には かの高名なキャラハン教授がいますから！
jpnSearchText:
それに、この大学には
かの高名なキャラハン教授がいますから！

engChrName: I heard his big proposal got shot down in favor of someone else's, though.
engSearchText:
I heard his big proposal got shot down in favor of
someone else's, though.
jpnChrName: ──以前、とある教授と出し合った 技術構想案が負けてしまったとのことで。
jpnSearchText:
──以前、とある教授と出し合った
技術構想案が負けてしまったとのことで。

engChrName: He didn't really take that very well...
engSearchText: He didn't really take that very well...
jpnChrName: しばらく気落ちされているご様子でしたが……
jpnSearchText: しばらく気落ちされているご様子でしたが……

engChrName: But he's bounced back, from what I can tell. He's really putting his all into his new project.
engSearchText:
But he's bounced back, from what I can tell.
He's really putting his all into his new project.
jpnChrName: 近頃は以前にも増して 研究熱心に取り組んでいるそうですよ！
jpnSearchText:
近頃は以前にも増して
研究熱心に取り組んでいるそうですよ！

engChrName: Oh! I remember seeing you at that orbal café in Edith.
engSearchText:
Oh! I remember seeing you at that orbal café
in Edith.
jpnChrName: あら、あなた達は確か、 オーバルカフェでたまに見かける……
jpnSearchText:
あら、あなた達は確か、
オーバルカフェでたまに見かける……

engChrName: I live over here in Basel. I didn't expect to see you here, too.
engSearchText:
I live over here in Basel. I didn't expect to see you
here, too.
jpnChrName: あなた達もここに来ていたんですね。 私は実は本来、バーゼルに住んでいまして。
jpnSearchText:
あなた達もここに来ていたんですね。
私は実は本来、バーゼルに住んでいまして。

engChrName: My family lives over in the capital, so I'm out there a lot both to visit them and to do my civil engineering research.
engSearchText:
My family lives over in the capital, so I'm out there a
lot both to visit them and to do my civil
engineering research.
jpnChrName: 都市工学の調査のために首都に長居したのも、 実家が首都にあるからなんです。
jpnSearchText:
都市工学の調査のために首都に長居したのも、
実家が首都にあるからなんです。

engChrName: I'll be cooped up here for a while, though—I've got a big paper to finish up.
engSearchText:
I'll be cooped up here for a while, though—I've got a
big paper to finish up.
jpnChrName: 当分はレポートの調整に入るので、多分こちらの 学生寮での生活に戻るかなと思います。
jpnSearchText:
当分はレポートの調整に入るので、多分こちらの
学生寮での生活に戻るかなと思います。

engChrName: I'm a civil engineering major studying under Professor Tain.
engSearchText:
I'm a civil engineering major studying under
Professor Tain.
jpnChrName: 私はトウェイン准教授のもとで 都市工学を専攻しているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
私はトウェイン准教授のもとで
都市工学を専攻しているのですが……

engChrName: My family's over in the capital. It's a bit of a trip, but visiting them is a great excuse to do some field study.
engSearchText:
My family's over in the capital. It's a bit of a trip, but
visiting them is a great excuse to do some field study.
jpnChrName: 実家が首都にあるお陰で、実地調査も 頻繁に出来て本当に良かったですよ。
jpnSearchText:
実家が首都にあるお陰で、実地調査も
頻繁に出来て本当に良かったですよ。

engChrName: I haven't been back here in a while. It's a lot...tenser than I remember it being. Something just doesn't feel right...
engSearchText:
I haven't been back here in a while. It's a lot...tenser
than I remember it being. Something just doesn't
feel right...
jpnChrName: まあ、久しぶりに帰って来たら、何だか ギスギスしていたのは驚きましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、久しぶりに帰って来たら、何だか
ギスギスしていたのは驚きましたけど……

engChrName: (She's a student here, huh? We should try talkin' to her.)
engSearchText:
(She's a student here, huh? We should try talkin'
to her.)
jpnChrName: （大学の学生か……  	聞き込み先として丁度よさそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（大学の学生か……
聞き込み先として丁度よさそうだな。）

engChrName: People said they heard all kinds of weird sounds at the institute last night. Are you thinking what I'm thinking?!
engSearchText:
People said they heard all kinds of weird sounds at
the institute last night. Are you thinking what
I'm thinking?!
jpnChrName: 昨日の晩、構内で何か怪しい音がしたとか 何とかって噂を聞いたけど……まさか幽霊！？
jpnSearchText:
昨日の晩、構内で何か怪しい音がしたとか
何とかって噂を聞いたけど……まさか幽霊！？

engChrName: This place has been around since the Middle Ages. Those weird sounds can only mean one thing: GHOSTS! It's haunted, isn't it?!
engSearchText:
This place has been around since the Middle Ages.
Those weird sounds can only mean one
thing: GHOSTS! It's haunted, isn't it?!
jpnChrName: この大学、中世の頃からあるっていうし、 学校の七不思議みたいなのあったりとか！？
jpnSearchText:
この大学、中世の頃からあるっていうし、
学校の七不思議みたいなのあったりとか！？

engChrName: ...No? Not that I've heard.
engSearchText: ...No? Not that I've heard.
jpnChrName: いやいや、理科大学で七不思議って……
jpnSearchText: いやいや、理科大学で七不思議って……

engChrName: There was an attack over at the special research building last night. That's what that was.
engSearchText:
There was an attack over at the special research
building last night. That's what that was.
jpnChrName: そもそも……昨晩は特別研究棟の方で 事件があったって話は聞いていないんですか？
jpnSearchText:
そもそも……昨晩は特別研究棟の方で
事件があったって話は聞いていないんですか？

engChrName: Did you seriously not hear about it? I swear, you have the keenest ear for gossip, but the actual stories fly right over your head.
engSearchText:
Did you seriously not hear about it? I swear, you have
the keenest ear for gossip, but the actual stories fly
right over your head.
jpnChrName: ミーハーなわりに、肝心な部分に限って 聞いていないというか……
jpnSearchText:
ミーハーなわりに、肝心な部分に限って
聞いていないというか……

engChrName: Wait, really? The building got attacked? Huh, that's the first I've heard of it...
engSearchText:
Wait, really? The building got attacked? Huh, that's
the first I've heard of it...
jpnChrName: えっ、そんな事が……？
jpnSearchText: えっ、そんな事が……？

engChrName: Actually, now that you mention it... Yeah, I think some of the professors might've talked about it.
engSearchText:
Actually, now that you mention it... Yeah, I think
some of the professors might've talked about it.
jpnChrName: そういえば、先生たちがそんな話を していたのが聞こえたような……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、先生たちがそんな話を
していたのが聞こえたような……

engChrName: *sigh* It's just in one ear and out the other with you, isn't it?
engSearchText:
*sigh* It's just in one ear and out the other with you,
isn't it?
jpnChrName: 本当に興味ない話題は右から左ですね……
jpnSearchText: 本当に興味ない話題は右から左ですね……

engChrName: Gah, damn it, I'm too late! They've already cleared up all the wreckage from yesterday.
engSearchText:
Gah, damn it, I'm too late! They've already cleared up
all the wreckage from yesterday.
jpnChrName: くっ、あの無人兵器の残骸、 全て回収されてしまったか！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、あの無人兵器の残骸、
全て回収されてしまったか！

engChrName: I was hoping to take some samples to try and reverse-engineer their weaponry. I know it's not my field, but still...
engSearchText:
I was hoping to take some samples to try and
reverse-engineer their weaponry. I know it's not my
field, but still...
jpnChrName: うーむ、せっかくだから少々専門からはズレるが 中身や搭載武装を調べたかったというのに……！
jpnSearchText:
うーむ、せっかくだから少々専門からはズレるが
中身や搭載武装を調べたかったというのに……！

engChrName: I guess with that out of the question, all I can do now is try and study their methods. We need to be more prepared for attacks in the future.
engSearchText:
I guess with that out of the question, all I can do now
is try and study their methods. We need to be more
prepared for attacks in the future.
jpnChrName: 仕方ない、こうなれば何か次にテロがあった時に 役立ちそうな化学の研究でもしてみるか！
jpnSearchText:
仕方ない、こうなれば何か次にテロがあった時に
役立ちそうな化学の研究でもしてみるか！

engChrName: Some way of neutralizing their weapons, maybe... Oh, what about something that could melt them? You get it on the weapon and BAM, it's gone!
engSearchText:
Some way of neutralizing their weapons, maybe...
Oh, what about something that could melt them?
You get it on the weapon and BAM, it's gone!
jpnChrName: あの無人兵器どもを一瞬で溶かせるほどの 薬液があれば、防犯に役立たないかな！？
jpnSearchText:
あの無人兵器どもを一瞬で溶かせるほどの
薬液があれば、防犯に役立たないかな！？

engChrName: I was freaking out when I saw that explosion last night. I thought my samples might've gotten damaged in there.
engSearchText:
I was freaking out when I saw that explosion
last night. I thought my samples might've gotten
damaged in there.
jpnChrName: 昨晩、轟音が聞こえててっきり僕の放置した 試験体が偶然混合して爆発したのかと思えば……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩、轟音が聞こえててっきり僕の放置した
試験体が偶然混合して爆発したのかと思えば……

engChrName: They were fine, but then, Professor Callaghan went missing after they hit the special research building! That's even WORSE!
engSearchText:
They were fine, but then, Professor Callaghan went
missing after they hit the special research building!
That's even WORSE!
jpnChrName: 特別研究棟の事件でキャラハン教授が 行方不明と……それは残念でならない！
jpnSearchText:
特別研究棟の事件でキャラハン教授が
行方不明と……それは残念でならない！

engChrName: He was the only one who really understood me... As a weapons designer, he appreciated the beauty of blowing things up!
engSearchText:
He was the only one who really understood me... As a
weapons designer, he appreciated the beauty of
blowing things up!
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授も前時代兵器の第一人者だけあり、 爆発にも相応の興味はあったようでな！
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授も前時代兵器の第一人者だけあり、
爆発にも相応の興味はあったようでな！

engChrName: He was actually pretty excited about my proposal for a flamethrower weapon. Great minds think alike, haha!
engSearchText:
He was actually pretty excited about my proposal for a
flamethrower weapon. Great minds think alike, haha!
jpnChrName: 前には燃料を一瞬で気化させて点火する兵器の 事を提案してそこそこの反応だった事も……！
jpnSearchText:
前には燃料を一瞬で気化させて点火する兵器の
事を提案してそこそこの反応だった事も……！

engChrName: I've been hearing these huge explosions all day in the lab—and I like it that way.
engSearchText:
I've been hearing these huge explosions all day in the
lab—and I like it that way.
jpnChrName: 昼間は研究室で爆発音やらビリビリ音やら 散々聞いているからな！
jpnSearchText:
昼間は研究室で爆発音やらビリビリ音やら
散々聞いているからな！

engChrName: I want those sweet, sweet sounds to be the last things I hear before I hit the hay—none of this big city bilge!
engSearchText:
I want those sweet, sweet sounds to be the last things
I hear before I hit the hay—none of this big
city bilge!
jpnChrName: 寝る時まで街の喧騒に耳を痛めたくないし、 僕的には爆発音の方がよほど心地よい！
jpnSearchText:
寝る時まで街の喧騒に耳を痛めたくないし、
僕的には爆発音の方がよほど心地よい！

engChrName: That's the best thing about this area. It's nice and quiet, so it's the perfect place to zonk out.
engSearchText:
That's the best thing about this area. It's nice and
quiet, so it's the perfect place to zonk out.
jpnChrName: ──その点、ここは静かだ、生活音も 爆発音も無い、寝るならここと決めている。
jpnSearchText:
──その点、ここは静かだ、生活音も
爆発音も無い、寝るならここと決めている。

engChrName: I curl up on the grass and then I'm out like a light. Wake up in the morning and I'm perfectly refreshed! Got my routine down to a science.
engSearchText:
I curl up on the grass and then I'm out like a light.
Wake up in the morning and I'm perfectly refreshed!
Got my routine down to a science.
jpnChrName: 芝生に寝転がって静寂の中で寝る、そして 次の日は研究に集中！　これが僕のルーティーン！
jpnSearchText:
芝生に寝転がって静寂の中で寝る、そして
次の日は研究に集中！　これが僕のルーティーン！

engChrName: I used to sleep in the lab, but one time I forgot to air out some vapors I was working with, and it nearly straight-up killed me. Never again.
engSearchText:
I used to sleep in the lab, but one time I forgot to air
out some vapors I was working with, and it nearly
straight-up killed me. Never again.
jpnChrName: 前は実験室で寝ていたが、気化した薬液のせいで 一度酸欠になりかけたことがあってな！
jpnSearchText:
前は実験室で寝ていたが、気化した薬液のせいで
一度酸欠になりかけたことがあってな！

engChrName: Yeah, I COULD just leave a window open, but y'know what? Sleeping outside is just so much better anyway!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I COULD just leave a window open, but
y'know what? Sleeping outside is just so much
better anyway!
jpnChrName: 窓を開けるのも手だが、どうせならと思って 庭で寝てたら、これが中々良いモンなんだ！
jpnSearchText:
窓を開けるのも手だが、どうせならと思って
庭で寝てたら、これが中々良いモンなんだ！

engChrName: Hahaha! SUCCESS! That was a super-quick reaction there...way quicker than I expected.
engSearchText:
Hahaha! SUCCESS! That was a super-quick reaction
there...way quicker than I expected.
jpnChrName: はははは、またやってしまった！ まさかあそこまで気化反応が早いとは！
jpnSearchText:
はははは、またやってしまった！
まさかあそこまで気化反応が早いとは！

engChrName: That bodes well—it means it's even more flammable than I first thought. I've got a winner on my hands!
engSearchText:
That bodes well—it means it's even more flammable
than I first thought. I've got a winner on my hands!
jpnChrName: だが！　あれはあれで良い燃焼だ、ウン！ これしきで負けてはいられない！
jpnSearchText:
だが！　あれはあれで良い燃焼だ、ウン！
これしきで負けてはいられない！

engChrName: Just gonna take a swig of my special juice to recharge, then I'll be right back in action!
engSearchText:
Just gonna take a swig of my special juice to recharge,
then I'll be right back in action!
jpnChrName: 特別に調合したこいつを飲んで回復！ そして研究再開だ！
jpnSearchText:
特別に調合したこいつを飲んで回復！
そして研究再開だ！

engChrName: Moritz produced a vial of...something from his coat pocket, and downed it with gusto.
engSearchText:
Moritz produced a vial of...something from his coat
pocket, and downed it with gusto.
jpnChrName: 男子学生は懐から取り出した試験管の中身を 残らず飲み干した。
jpnSearchText:
男子学生は懐から取り出した試験管の中身を
残らず飲み干した。

engChrName: WOOOOO! Oh, yeah! I can feel my cells supercharging! I... Hey, what're you looking at me like that for?
engSearchText:
WOOOOO! Oh, yeah! I can feel my
cells supercharging! I... Hey, what're you looking at
me like that for?
jpnChrName: ゴクゴク……細胞が生き返る！ ……え、薬事法は大丈夫かって？
jpnSearchText:
ゴクゴク……細胞が生き返る！
……え、薬事法は大丈夫かって？

engChrName: 'Controlled substance'? Pfft, no worries there! Can't be 'controlled' if it's not for human consumption in the first place!
engSearchText:
'Controlled substance'? Pfft, no worries there!
Can't be 'controlled' if it's not for human
consumption in the first place!
jpnChrName: ハハハ心配ご無用！　何せコレはそもそも、 本来はヒトが飲む薬ですら無いからな！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ心配ご無用！　何せコレはそもそも、
本来はヒトが飲む薬ですら無いからな！

engChrName: I'm on to something with this, I swear—it's the perfect pick-me-up after my explosion tests. It was meant to be, I tell you! Hahahaha!
engSearchText:
I'm on to something with this, I swear—it's the
perfect pick-me-up after my explosion tests. It was
meant to be, I tell you! Hahahaha!
jpnChrName: だが、どういう訳か爆発で参った身体には効く！ 有効活用してるだけさ、ハハハハハ！
jpnSearchText:
だが、どういう訳か爆発で参った身体には効く！
有効活用してるだけさ、ハハハハハ！

engChrName: What's Professor Aurelie's problem? I ask to study under her, and she dismisses me like, 'You're just an arsonist in a lab coat!'
engSearchText:
What's Professor Aurelie's problem? I ask to study
under her, and she dismisses me like, 'You're just an
arsonist in a lab coat!'
jpnChrName: 仮にも同じ化学者だと言うのに、 オレリー教授は何故か僕を助手にしてくれない！
jpnSearchText:
仮にも同じ化学者だと言うのに、
オレリー教授は何故か僕を助手にしてくれない！

engChrName: But what's so wrong about that?! It's ART! What's more beautiful than great balls of fire?!
engSearchText:
But what's so wrong about that?! It's ART!
What's more beautiful than great balls of fire?!
jpnChrName: 何故だ！？　化学は芸術だろう！？
jpnSearchText: 何故だ！？　化学は芸術だろう！？

engChrName: That's what chemistry boils down to: it's the subtle art of making things go BOOM! Surely a fellow chemist would understand that! Bah...
engSearchText:
That's what chemistry boils down to: it's the subtle art
of making things go BOOM! Surely a fellow chemist
would understand that! Bah...
jpnChrName: それなら、芸術は爆発だというのと同じだ！ 化学も爆発あってこそじゃあないか！
jpnSearchText:
それなら、芸術は爆発だというのと同じだ！
化学も爆発あってこそじゃあないか！

engChrName: Phew... We finally have a plan. We're gonna ease the load on the servers and try to get them back online with a limited scope.
engSearchText:
Phew... We finally have a plan. We're gonna ease the
load on the servers and try to get them back online
with a limited scope.
jpnChrName: ふう、大学と関連施設の導力ネットサーバーの 負荷分散、思ったよりも早く目星が付きました。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、大学と関連施設の導力ネットサーバーの
負荷分散、思ったよりも早く目星が付きました。

engChrName: It took less time than I was figuring, at least. They took out the Aurora, but Marduk's been handling some of the load for us.
engSearchText:
It took less time than I was figuring, at least.
They took out the Aurora, but Marduk's been
handling some of the load for us.
jpnChrName: 導力ネットのメインターミナル《アウローラ》は 破壊され、ＭＫ社が肩代わりしていますが……
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットのメインターミナル《アウローラ》は
破壊され、ＭＫ社が肩代わりしていますが……

engChrName: If we can make this plan work, we should have Basel's network back to full capacity soon.
engSearchText:
If we can make this plan work, we should have Basel's
network back to full capacity soon.
jpnChrName: 分散管理を行えば、バーゼルの導力ネットも どうにか復旧できるはずです。
jpnSearchText:
分散管理を行えば、バーゼルの導力ネットも
どうにか復旧できるはずです。

engChrName: ...I do wonder why Professor Cronkite isn't lending us a hand with it, though.
engSearchText:
...I do wonder why Professor Cronkite isn't lending us
a hand with it, though.
jpnChrName: ……そういえば、この辺りは クロンカイト教授がお詳しいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば、この辺りは
クロンカイト教授がお詳しいのですが……

engChrName: This is his field—we really could've used his help.
engSearchText: This is his field—we really could've used his help.
jpnChrName: 復旧に協力される気はないようですね。 ……何か理由があるのでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
復旧に協力される気はないようですね。
……何か理由があるのでしょうか……

engChrName: If we can manage the load on Basel's orbal network, we should be able to get it back online.
engSearchText:
If we can manage the load on Basel's orbal network,
we should be able to get it back online.
jpnChrName: この分散管理がうまく行けば バーゼルの導力ネットも復旧できるはずです。
jpnSearchText:
この分散管理がうまく行けば
バーゼルの導力ネットも復旧できるはずです。

engChrName: Professor Cronkite would've had this all sorted out in seconds, though. He's one of the foremost authorities on network engineering.
engSearchText:
Professor Cronkite would've had this all sorted out in
seconds, though. He's one of the foremost authorities
on network engineering.
jpnChrName: しかし１年次の僕などより クロンカイト教授の方がお詳しいはず……
jpnSearchText:
しかし１年次の僕などより
クロンカイト教授の方がお詳しいはず……

engChrName: I just don't get why he's giving us the cold shoulder on this. I guess he has his reasons...?
engSearchText:
I just don't get why he's giving us the cold shoulder
on this. I guess he has his reasons...?
jpnChrName: 手伝っていただければ もっと早くに復旧できるはずなのですが。
jpnSearchText:
手伝っていただければ
もっと早くに復旧できるはずなのですが。

engChrName: My heart sank when I heard Professor Callaghan went missing... I hope he's all right, wherever he is.
engSearchText:
My heart sank when I heard Professor Callaghan
went missing... I hope he's all right, wherever he is.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授が行方不明になったとか…… 心配ですね、無事を祈るばかりです。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授が行方不明になったとか……
心配ですね、無事を祈るばかりです。

engChrName: Word is, he had a ton of computers in his lab running parallel processing. On what, I don't know.
engSearchText:
Word is, he had a ton of computers in his lab running
parallel processing. On what, I don't know.
jpnChrName: しかし……彼の研究室には大量の演算機が 運び込まれ、並列演算をしていたとも聞きます。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……彼の研究室には大量の演算機が
運び込まれ、並列演算をしていたとも聞きます。

engChrName: But that all got stolen, which means whatever research he was doing caught the criminals' attention...
engSearchText:
