But that all got stolen, which means whatever
research he was doing caught the
criminals' attention...
jpnChrName: もし、膨大な並列演算を要する研究が 犯罪に巻き込まれる原因になったとしたら……
jpnSearchText:
もし、膨大な並列演算を要する研究が
犯罪に巻き込まれる原因になったとしたら……

engChrName: That does shed some light on what he'd been doing this whole time, for better and for worse...
engSearchText:
That does shed some light on what he'd been doing
this whole time, for better and for worse...
jpnChrName: 研究の内容は幾らか絞られそうですが…… 彼はこの数ヶ月、何を目指していたのでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
研究の内容は幾らか絞られそうですが……
彼はこの数ヶ月、何を目指していたのでしょう……

engChrName: Why did I come here to study? Well, part of it is that I got a reference from a school back in Elsaim...
engSearchText:
Why did I come here to study? Well, part of it is that
I got a reference from a school back in Elsaim...
jpnChrName: 僕がバーゼルに来た理由ですか……エルザイムの 大学から推薦されて、というのもありますが……
jpnSearchText:
僕がバーゼルに来た理由ですか……エルザイムの
大学から推薦されて、というのもありますが……

engChrName: ...but it's mainly that I want to give back to my home country using the knowledge and the gifts I have.
engSearchText:
...but it's mainly that I want to give back to my home
country using the knowledge and the gifts I have.
jpnChrName: やはり、少なからず皆に数理の才を認められた以上、 祖国をより良くする知恵を追い求めたいですしね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり、少なからず皆に数理の才を認められた以上、
祖国をより良くする知恵を追い求めたいですしね。

engChrName: Professor Hamilton's research has helped develop more than just Calvard—it's helped Elsaim, and tons of other nations, too.
engSearchText:
Professor Hamilton's research has helped develop
more than just Calvard—it's helped Elsaim, and tons
of other nations, too.
jpnChrName: ハミルトン博士は、カルバードだけでなく公国の 発展にも大いに貢献してくれた……
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン博士は、カルバードだけでなく公国の
発展にも大いに貢献してくれた……

engChrName: I want to help bring Elsaim into this new age, just like she did for Calvard.
engSearchText:
I want to help bring Elsaim into this new age, just
like she did for Calvard.
jpnChrName: であれば、僕も可能性があるのなら、エルザイムに 新たな変革をもたらす力になりたいんです。
jpnSearchText:
であれば、僕も可能性があるのなら、エルザイムに
新たな変革をもたらす力になりたいんです。

engChrName: I'm convinced that data science is the future. The more I study it, the more I realize how important it's going to be.
engSearchText:
I'm convinced that data science is the future.
The more I study it, the more I realize how important
it's going to be.
jpnChrName: 今後はやはりデータサイエンスが時代を牽引する 一端になる、研究するほどそう確信出来ます。
jpnSearchText:
今後はやはりデータサイエンスが時代を牽引する
一端になる、研究するほどそう確信出来ます。

engChrName: Call it a pipe dream, but I think information systems will really help solve a lot of the world's problems.
engSearchText:
Call it a pipe dream, but I think information systems
will really help solve a lot of the world's problems.
jpnChrName: エルザイムに限らず中東ではまだまだ問題も ありますが情報システムで解決できるものも多い。
jpnSearchText:
エルザイムに限らず中東ではまだまだ問題も
ありますが情報システムで解決できるものも多い。

engChrName: It's just a matter of getting the technology there. It's not here yet, but once it hits, it's gonna change everything.
engSearchText:
It's just a matter of getting the technology there.
It's not here yet, but once it hits, it's gonna
change everything.
jpnChrName: 保守的な人には夢物語かもしれないですが、 自分なりにロジックを組み立てた上での結論です。
jpnSearchText:
保守的な人には夢物語かもしれないですが、
自分なりにロジックを組み立てた上での結論です。

engChrName: I wrote about that in my Formula paper. Central Eastern problems, like water, traffic, and supply chains? Logistics could solve all of that.
engSearchText:
I wrote about that in my Formula paper.
Central Eastern problems, like water, traffic, and
supply chains? Logistics could solve all of that.
jpnChrName: 《フォーミュラ》に載った論文も、応用すれば 中東の交通事情や水問題の解決に必ず──
jpnSearchText:
《フォーミュラ》に載った論文も、応用すれば
中東の交通事情や水問題の解決に必ず──

engChrName: One of my papers was published in the scientific journal Formula last month.
engSearchText:
One of my papers was published in the scientific
journal Formula last month.
jpnChrName: 先月号の科学誌《フォーミュラ》に 僕の論文が掲載されましてね。
jpnSearchText:
先月号の科学誌《フォーミュラ》に
僕の論文が掲載されましてね。

engChrName: It was about a hypothetical social experiment where you gather big data from personal computers, and use data science to crunch the numbers.
engSearchText:
It was about a hypothetical social experiment where
you gather big data from personal computers, and use
data science to crunch the numbers.
jpnChrName: 個人用導力端末とデータサイエンスを 組み合わせた社会実験の可能性──
jpnSearchText:
個人用導力端末とデータサイエンスを
組み合わせた社会実験の可能性──

engChrName: I'm honored that the scientific community received it so well—even Professor Cronkite gave it a thumbs up!
engSearchText:
I'm honored that the scientific community received it
so well—even Professor Cronkite gave it a
thumbs up!
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授にＯＫを貰っただけあって 学会での反応もいいようですね。
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授にＯＫを貰っただけあって
学会での反応もいいようですね。

engChrName: I still wanna explore that concept some more, though.
engSearchText: I still wanna explore that concept some more, though.
jpnChrName: しかし……まだまだ考察が足りません。
jpnSearchText: しかし……まだまだ考察が足りません。

engChrName: I really want to use one of the giant orbal calculators they have in the labs here. I just can't, and that really grinds my gears...
engSearchText:
I really want to use one of the giant orbal calculators
they have in the labs here. I just can't, and that really
grinds my gears...
jpnChrName: 嗚呼、早く研究室に入って 大型導力演算器を使用したいものです。
jpnSearchText:
嗚呼、早く研究室に入って
大型導力演算器を使用したいものです。

engChrName: I want to put my paper to practice with some simulations, but consumer-grade computers just don't have the power for it.
engSearchText:
I want to put my paper to practice with some
simulations, but consumer-grade computers just don't
have the power for it.
jpnChrName: 考察のためにシミュレーションしたいのですが 汎用端末では全く性能不足なのです。
jpnSearchText:
考察のためにシミュレーションしたいのですが
汎用端末では全く性能不足なのです。

engChrName: I tried making a super-optimized program for the number-crunching I need, but that still wasn't enough. I need something bigger.
engSearchText:
I tried making a super-optimized program for the
number-crunching I need, but that still
wasn't enough. I need something bigger.
jpnChrName: この論文のために専用の高速化プログラムを 書きましたが……やはり限界はありまして。
jpnSearchText:
この論文のために専用の高速化プログラムを
書きましたが……やはり限界はありまして。

engChrName: I really wish I could use the lab facilities here, but they don't open those up to freshmen. I have to wait for those...
engSearchText:
I really wish I could use the lab facilities here, but
they don't open those up to freshmen. I have to wait
for those...
jpnChrName: 僕はまだ１年次ですから 研究室の設備を使うわけにもいかず……
jpnSearchText:
僕はまだ１年次ですから
研究室の設備を使うわけにもいかず……

engChrName: I'm just dying to get my hands on one of those huge orbal calculators already.
engSearchText:
I'm just dying to get my hands on one of those huge
orbal calculators already.
jpnChrName: うーむ、早く大型導力演算器を 思う存分使用したいものです。
jpnSearchText:
うーむ、早く大型導力演算器を
思う存分使用したいものです。

engChrName: I was sitting in a lecture when everything went down yesterday. I'm still not over it...
engSearchText:
I was sitting in a lecture when everything went
down yesterday. I'm still not over it...
jpnChrName: き、昨日は授業中にあんな事になって…… 本当にビビったよ……
jpnSearchText:
き、昨日は授業中にあんな事になって……
本当にビビったよ……

engChrName: The Artisanal District was attacked, too... I was really worried for my dad over there. He's all right, thank Goddess.
engSearchText:
The Artisanal District was attacked, too... I was really
worried for my dad over there. He's all right,
thank Goddess.
jpnChrName: 街の方も襲撃されたって聞いたからな…… 親父の工房が無事で本当に良かった……
jpnSearchText:
街の方も襲撃されたって聞いたからな……
親父の工房が無事で本当に良かった……

engChrName: I've been worried for ages that it'll go under because of the changing times, but monsters destroying it would've been even worse.
engSearchText:
I've been worried for ages that it'll go under because
of the changing times, but monsters destroying it
would've been even worse.
jpnChrName: 親父の工房は時代に取り残されやしないか 心配だが……こんな形で潰れて良いもんじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
親父の工房は時代に取り残されやしないか
心配だが……こんな形で潰れて良いもんじゃない。

engChrName: ...I think I'll go home early today.
engSearchText: ...I think I'll go home early today.
jpnChrName: ……今日は早く帰ろう。
jpnSearchText: ……今日は早く帰ろう。

engChrName: I can't believe they attacked the institute... I hope it doesn't throw a wrench into my studies, but being realistic, it probably will.
engSearchText:
I can't believe they attacked the institute... I hope it
doesn't throw a wrench into my studies, but being
realistic, it probably will.
jpnChrName: まさかうちの大学で事件があったなんて…… これ、この後何か俺らの勉学に影響出るのかな？
jpnSearchText:
まさかうちの大学で事件があったなんて……
これ、この後何か俺らの勉学に影響出るのかな？

engChrName: I want to... No, I HAVE to prove myself to my dad. I wanna hurry up and land some big project I can be proud of.
engSearchText:
I want to... No, I HAVE to prove myself to my dad.
I wanna hurry up and land some big project I can be
proud of.
jpnChrName: 早く結果を出して、 親父を認めさせなきゃいけないのに……
jpnSearchText:
早く結果を出して、
親父を認めさせなきゃいけないのに……

engChrName: *sigh* Life's been really busy since I started at the institute—in a good way, though.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Life's been really busy since I started at the
institute—in a good way, though.
jpnChrName: ふう……大学に入ってからは 色々と充実はしているが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう……大学に入ってからは
色々と充実はしているが……

engChrName: But I always hate going home because Dad's just gonna give me an earful about 'tradition.'
engSearchText:
But I always hate going home because Dad's just
gonna give me an earful about 'tradition.'
jpnChrName: 家帰って親父に色々言われると思うと…… 正直気が滅入るんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
家帰って親父に色々言われると思うと……
正直気が滅入るんだよなぁ。

engChrName: Does he just think I'm incapable of choosing my own career path? Is that it?
engSearchText:
Does he just think I'm incapable of choosing my own
career path? Is that it?
jpnChrName: 親父は色々言うが……俺だって 考えて自分の道を選んだんだってのに。
jpnSearchText:
親父は色々言うが……俺だって
考えて自分の道を選んだんだってのに。

engChrName: If he really wants me to take up the workshop, then the workshop needs to get with the times.
engSearchText:
If he really wants me to take up the workshop, then
the workshop needs to get with the times.
jpnChrName: 親父も……本気で工房を守りたいんなら、 少しは柔軟に考えてみろって……
jpnSearchText:
親父も……本気で工房を守りたいんなら、
少しは柔軟に考えてみろって……

engChrName: Professor Cronkite's theses are like these windows into the future. It's crazy just how smart he is.
engSearchText:
Professor Cronkite's theses are like these windows
into the future. It's crazy just how smart he is.
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授の論文はどれも、 まさに未来を見ている感じで……圧巻だ。
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授の論文はどれも、
まさに未来を見ている感じで……圧巻だ。

engChrName: His foresight really helps him get ahead of the curve and develop new technologies before people even realize they need them.
engSearchText:
His foresight really helps him get ahead of the curve
and develop new technologies before people even
realize they need them.
jpnChrName: やはり、これほどの大局観があってこその イノベーションなんだろうなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
やはり、これほどの大局観があってこその
イノベーションなんだろうなぁ……

engChrName: I doubt I'll ever be half the scholar he is, but I really want to learn what I can from him all the same.
engSearchText:
I doubt I'll ever be half the scholar he is, but I really
want to learn what I can from him all the same.
jpnChrName: 俺の手に及ぶかはさておき…… やっぱり価値観としては学んでいきたいな。
jpnSearchText:
俺の手に及ぶかはさておき……
やっぱり価値観としては学んでいきたいな。

engChrName: Dad's factory is a relic of the past. It has nothing to do with me, and I have no reason to cling to it.
engSearchText:
Dad's factory is a relic of the past. It has nothing to
do with me, and I have no reason to cling to it.
jpnChrName: 親父の工房にしがみついていても…… イノベーションには程遠いだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
親父の工房にしがみついていても……
イノベーションには程遠いだろうし。

engChrName: I wish Dad wasn't so darn stubborn. All I'm saying is that he should be more forward thinking...
engSearchText:
I wish Dad wasn't so darn stubborn. All I'm saying is
that he should be more forward thinking...
jpnChrName: しかし……親父は本当に頑固でさぁ。 俺は先進的な視野が重要と言ってるだけなのに。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……親父は本当に頑固でさぁ。
俺は先進的な視野が重要と言ってるだけなのに。

engChrName: ...but nope. He's always trying to push the factory onto me, trying to tie me down to his old business.
engSearchText:
...but nope. He's always trying to push the factory
onto me, trying to tie me down to his old business.
jpnChrName: 何で今更、あの工房のやり方を俺に 押し付けようとするんだか……
jpnSearchText:
何で今更、あの工房のやり方を俺に
押し付けようとするんだか……

engChrName: Time marches on—if he doesn't get with the times, they'll leave him behind.
engSearchText:
Time marches on—if he doesn't get with the times,
they'll leave him behind.
jpnChrName: あんな古いやり方じゃ……きっといつか、 新技術も手に余るようになるだけなのに……
jpnSearchText:
あんな古いやり方じゃ……きっといつか、
新技術も手に余るようになるだけなのに……

engChrName: Professor Callaghan is... Is he really dead...?
engSearchText: Professor Callaghan is... Is he really dead...?
jpnChrName: キャラハンって先生……死んじゃったの？
jpnSearchText: キャラハンって先生……死んじゃったの？

engChrName: He always seemed kinda scary, but the upperclassmen really respected him. I wanted to talk to him myself someday...
engSearchText:
He always seemed kinda scary, but the upperclassmen
really respected him. I wanted to talk to him
myself someday...
jpnChrName: 怖いと思ってたけど、先輩たちが立派な人って 言うし、一回は話したかったのに……
jpnSearchText:
怖いと思ってたけど、先輩たちが立派な人って
言うし、一回は話したかったのに……

engChrName: I'm glad everybody else is okay, but...what do we even do now?
engSearchText:
I'm glad everybody else is okay, but...what do we even
do now?
jpnChrName: でも……本当にこの後どうなるのかしら？ 友達や先輩が無事だったのは良かったけど……
jpnSearchText:
でも……本当にこの後どうなるのかしら？
友達や先輩が無事だったのは良かったけど……

engChrName: I thought it was weird how everybody was whispering today... Now it makes sense.
engSearchText:
I thought it was weird how everybody was
whispering today... Now it makes sense.
jpnChrName: 何かざわざわしてるなって思ってたら、 本当に事件があったのね……
jpnSearchText:
何かざわざわしてるなって思ってたら、
本当に事件があったのね……

engChrName: I had no idea about it—I overslept this morning. Last I heard was the gossip from last night.
engSearchText:
I had no idea about it—I overslept this morning.
Last I heard was the gossip from last night.
jpnChrName: いやあ……今朝寝坊しちゃってて、 昨晩のメールより新しい話聞いてなかったのー。
jpnSearchText:
いやあ……今朝寝坊しちゃってて、
昨晩のメールより新しい話聞いてなかったのー。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan's kinda freaking me out nowadays. All the other professors say he's a really nice guy, though.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan's kinda freaking me
out nowadays. All the other professors say he's a really
nice guy, though.
jpnChrName: キャラハンって教授、ピリピリしてて怖いなと 思ったけど、先輩方は良い人だって言うのよね。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハンって教授、ピリピリしてて怖いなと
思ったけど、先輩方は良い人だって言うのよね。

engChrName: They talked about how he used to help mentor younger researchers at the institute. Are they really talking about the same guy, though?
engSearchText:
They talked about how he used to help mentor
younger researchers at the institute. Are they really
talking about the same guy, though?
jpnChrName: 前は結構、若手の研究も助けてくれたとか。 今のあの先生からは、考えにくいかも。
jpnSearchText:
前は結構、若手の研究も助けてくれたとか。
今のあの先生からは、考えにくいかも。

engChrName: All I get from him are evil glares, like he's fed up with me already... Yeesh.
engSearchText:
All I get from him are evil glares, like he's fed up with
me already... Yeesh.
jpnChrName: 入学早々にあんな怖い顔で睨んでくる 先生なんて他にいないもん。
jpnSearchText:
入学早々にあんな怖い顔で睨んでくる
先生なんて他にいないもん。

engChrName: Ahh, seeing those wide-eyed Aramis students visiting brings back memories. I came to visit when I was younger, just like them.
engSearchText:
Ahh, seeing those wide-eyed Aramis students visiting
brings back memories. I came to visit when I was
younger, just like them.
jpnChrName: それにしても、アラミスの視察研修懐かしいわね。 あたしも視察研修で来てここに入ったのー。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、アラミスの視察研修懐かしいわね。
あたしも視察研修で来てここに入ったのー。

engChrName: Crazy how young they look. I'm only two or three years older than them... I wonder if I looked that young when I visited, too?
engSearchText:
Crazy how young they look. I'm only two or three
years older than them... I wonder if I looked that
young when I visited, too?
jpnChrName: 今見てみると、２、３歳くらいしか違わないのに、 すんごく若く見えるね、私もあんな時が……
jpnSearchText:
今見てみると、２、３歳くらいしか違わないのに、
すんごく若く見えるね、私もあんな時が……

engChrName: Their uniforms are really cute. Maybe that's what it is... W-Wait, am I ogling them?! No, bad thoughts! Bad thoughts!
engSearchText:
Their uniforms are really cute. Maybe that's what
it is... W-Wait, am I ogling them?! No, bad thoughts!
Bad thoughts!
jpnChrName: 制服も可愛く見えるし…… ヤバイ、何かに目覚めちゃいそう……！
jpnSearchText:
制服も可愛く見えるし……
ヤバイ、何かに目覚めちゃいそう……！

engChrName: The institute's calmed down a bit. We should have this area secured now.
engSearchText:
The institute's calmed down a bit. We should have
this area secured now.
jpnChrName: ……大学構内、及び市内の混乱も ある程度は落ち着いてきたようですが……
jpnSearchText:
……大学構内、及び市内の混乱も
ある程度は落ち着いてきたようですが……

engChrName: But we can't let our guard down. We've dealt with one problem, but there could be another lurking around the corner.
engSearchText:
But we can't let our guard down. We've dealt with
one problem, but there could be another lurking
around the corner.
jpnChrName: このような事があった以上、また何かが 起こる可能性も否定できません。
jpnSearchText:
このような事があった以上、また何かが
起こる可能性も否定できません。

engChrName: We need to maintain our security detail here until this all blows over.
engSearchText:
We need to maintain our security detail here until
this all blows over.
jpnChrName: 大学としても警備体制を 強化していかなくては。
jpnSearchText:
大学としても警備体制を
強化していかなくては。

engChrName: I still can't believe that really happened yesterday... Even the police and the bracers were overwhelmed.
engSearchText:
I still can't believe that really happened yesterday...
Even the police and the bracers were overwhelmed.
jpnChrName: まさかこのような事になるとは…… 駆け付けてくれた警察や遊撃士までも……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこのような事になるとは……
駆け付けてくれた警察や遊撃士までも……

engChrName: I'm trying not to let it get to me, as a security officer... What's done is done. We have to help get things back under control now.
engSearchText:
I'm trying not to let it get to me, as a security officer...
What's done is done. We have to help get things back
under control now.
jpnChrName: 我々も責任を感じざるを得ませんが とにかく、早急に体制を立て直さなくては。
jpnSearchText:
我々も責任を感じざるを得ませんが
とにかく、早急に体制を立て直さなくては。

engChrName: Man, I really screwed the pooch... Let an intruder blow right by me into the special research building.
engSearchText:
Man, I really screwed the pooch... Let an intruder
blow right by me into the special research building.
jpnChrName: 特別研究棟への侵入者に気づけず、 不覚の至りです……
jpnSearchText:
特別研究棟への侵入者に気づけず、
不覚の至りです……

engChrName: The investigation's still ongoing here, but I'll report whatever I find out here. Anything helps.
engSearchText:
The investigation's still ongoing here, but I'll report
whatever I find out here. Anything helps.
jpnChrName: 今も事件の調査が続いていますが…… 我々もできる限り協力しなくては。
jpnSearchText:
今も事件の調査が続いていますが……
我々もできる限り協力しなくては。

engChrName: I hear you're investigating this yourselves—and I see Mr. Salision is with you, too.
engSearchText:
I hear you're investigating this yourselves—and I see
Mr. Salision is with you, too.
jpnChrName: 皆さんも調査の関係でいらしているようですね。 サリシオンさんも一緒のようですし……
jpnSearchText:
皆さんも調査の関係でいらしているようですね。
サリシオンさんも一緒のようですし……

engChrName: I don't see the harm in letting you guys in. Go on through.
engSearchText:
I don't see the harm in letting you guys in. Go
on through.
jpnChrName: ええ、問題無いでしょう。 どうぞお通りください。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、問題無いでしょう。
どうぞお通りください。

engChrName: I'm really worried about Professor Callaghan's disappearance... I think I speak for everyone here in saying I want to help bring him back.
engSearchText:
I'm really worried about Professor Callaghan's
disappearance... I think I speak for everyone here in
saying I want to help bring him back.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授の行方が気がかりです。 我々もできる限り協力しなくては。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授の行方が気がかりです。
我々もできる限り協力しなくては。

engChrName: I hear you're helping with the investigation. Head on in.
engSearchText:
I hear you're helping with the investigation.
Head on in.
jpnChrName: 皆さんも調査の関係でいらしているようですね。 どうぞお通りください。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんも調査の関係でいらしているようですね。
どうぞお通りください。

engChrName: Do you have business here at the institute? Most of the students and staff have gone home already.
engSearchText:
Do you have business here at the institute? Most of
the students and staff have gone home already.
jpnChrName: おや、何か御用でしょうか。 ほとんどの大学関係者はお帰りになりましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
おや、何か御用でしょうか。
ほとんどの大学関係者はお帰りになりましたよ。

engChrName: Our security system is on night mode, too, so you can't get in without special permission.
engSearchText:
Our security system is on night mode, too, so you
can't get in without special permission.
jpnChrName: 警備システムも作動させていますので 入館も基本的にはお断りしています。
jpnSearchText:
警備システムも作動させていますので
入館も基本的にはお断りしています。

engChrName: Unless you already have clearance or your business is just that urgent, I'd suggest you come back in the morning.
engSearchText:
Unless you already have clearance or your business is
just that urgent, I'd suggest you come back in
the morning.
jpnChrName: ご用事であれば明日にでも 来ていただけますと幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
ご用事であれば明日にでも
来ていただけますと幸いです。

engChrName: This door here leads to the special research building.
engSearchText: This door here leads to the special research building.
jpnChrName: この先は特別研究棟になります。
jpnSearchText: この先は特別研究棟になります。

engChrName: They do a lot of top-secret research in there, so it's closed to the general public.
engSearchText:
They do a lot of top-secret research in there, so it's
closed to the general public.
jpnChrName: 機密性の高い研究内容も多いため 関係者以外は立入禁止ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
機密性の高い研究内容も多いため
関係者以外は立入禁止ですよ。

engChrName: (Seems this building requires a higher security clearance than the rest of the city.)
engSearchText:
(Seems this building requires a higher security
clearance than the rest of the city.)
jpnChrName: （特別研究棟……他よりも   セキュリティレベルが高いようですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（特別研究棟……他よりも
セキュリティレベルが高いようですね。）

engChrName: (Top-secret, huh? Sounds like the perfect place to harass your coworkers and get away with it.)
engSearchText:
(Top-secret, huh? Sounds like the perfect place to
harass your coworkers and get away with it.)
jpnChrName: （ハン、ってことは表沙汰にならねえ   “パワハラ”が横行してやがる可能性も……）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン、ってことは表沙汰にならねえ
“パワハラ”が横行してやがる可能性も……）

engChrName: (Wouldn't jump to conclusions, but yeah, it's worth lookin' into. Let's ask around and see what the people 'round here know.)
engSearchText:
(Wouldn't jump to conclusions, but yeah, it's worth
lookin' into. Let's ask around and see what the people
'round here know.)
jpnChrName: （ま、その辺りも含めて   それとなく探ってみんぞ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、その辺りも含めて
それとなく探ってみんぞ。）

engChrName: It was bad enough hearing that the professor was abducted... And then we got attacked, too...
engSearchText:
It was bad enough hearing that the professor
was abducted... And then we got attacked, too...
jpnChrName: 教授が攫われたと思いきや…… 次はあんな得体の知れないテロが……
jpnSearchText:
教授が攫われたと思いきや……
次はあんな得体の知れないテロが……

engChrName: Why does this keep happening, just one horrible thing after another? I just wanna do my research and get my degree...
engSearchText:
Why does this keep happening, just one horrible
thing after another? I just wanna do my research and
get my degree...
jpnChrName: 何で……何でこんな事が続くんでしょう…… 私はただ……物理の研究がしたかっただけ……
jpnSearchText:
何で……何でこんな事が続くんでしょう……
私はただ……物理の研究がしたかっただけ……

engChrName: What do I even do now? I feel like I don't belong here...
engSearchText:
What do I even do now? I feel like I don't
belong here...
jpnChrName: 私は……これからどこに行けば…… 私に居場所は……
jpnSearchText:
私は……これからどこに行けば……
私に居場所は……

engChrName: It's been really painful for me these last few months. I was this close to dropping out of the institute altogether...
engSearchText:
It's been really painful for me these last few months.
I was this close to dropping out of the
institute altogether...
jpnChrName: ここ数か月間、本当に辛い事ばかりで…… 大学を辞める事まで考えました。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数か月間、本当に辛い事ばかりで……
大学を辞める事まで考えました。

engChrName: But everybody here's been so kind and supportive... My coworkers, too. I'm really happy they reached out to me.
engSearchText:
But everybody here's been so kind and supportive...
My coworkers, too. I'm really happy they reached out
to me.
jpnChrName: でも、こうして気にかけてくれる方がいますし 研究室の仲間もいますから。
jpnSearchText:
でも、こうして気にかけてくれる方がいますし
研究室の仲間もいますから。

engChrName: I think maybe I should stick it out a little longer... Maybe it'll get better.
engSearchText:
I think maybe I should stick it out a little longer...
Maybe it'll get better.
jpnChrName: 私、もう少しだけ頑張ってみようかな……
jpnSearchText: 私、もう少しだけ頑張ってみようかな……

engChrName: I hope Professor Callaghan is safe, too. I won't forget what happened in that lab, but...I just can't hate him.
engSearchText:
I hope Professor Callaghan is safe, too. I won't forget
what happened in that lab, but...I just can't hate him.
jpnChrName: それにしても、 何よりキャラハン教授の事は心配ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、
何よりキャラハン教授の事は心配ですけど……

engChrName: Professor Callaghan was my whole world. All I wanted was to be special to him, and now...
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan was my whole world. All I
wanted was to be special to him, and now...
jpnChrName: 教授が僕の全てだったのに…… 教授の特別な存在になりたくて、僕は……
jpnSearchText:
教授が僕の全てだったのに……
教授の特別な存在になりたくて、僕は……

engChrName: ...No, I'm sorry. I shouldn't be trauma dumping on you like this. I just... I don't know anymore.
engSearchText:
...No, I'm sorry. I shouldn't be trauma dumping on
you like this. I just... I don't know anymore.
jpnChrName: ……ごめん、君たちにこんな事を 言っても仕方ないよな。
jpnSearchText:
……ごめん、君たちにこんな事を
言っても仕方ないよな。

engChrName: I hope that whatever monsters did this are brought to justice.
engSearchText:
I hope that whatever monsters did this are brought
to justice.
jpnChrName: せめて犯人が正当に 裁かれる事を祈るばかりだよ。
jpnSearchText:
せめて犯人が正当に
裁かれる事を祈るばかりだよ。

engChrName: I thought the officers looking for him had been acting strangely this morning...
engSearchText:
I thought the officers looking for him had been acting
strangely this morning...
jpnChrName: ……今朝、キャラハン教授の行方を 捜索しているはずの警察の動きが妙でね。
jpnSearchText:
……今朝、キャラハン教授の行方を
捜索しているはずの警察の動きが妙でね。

engChrName: ...so I pressed them, and they ended up telling me.
engSearchText: ...so I pressed them, and they ended up telling me.
jpnChrName: 気になって食い下がってみたら…… それとなく教えてくれたよ。
jpnSearchText:
気になって食い下がってみたら……
それとなく教えてくれたよ。

engChrName: I just can't believe it... Why? How could this happen to him?
engSearchText:
I just can't believe it... Why? How could this happen
to him?
jpnChrName: ……信じられないよ…… まさかキャラハン教授が……なんて……
jpnSearchText:
……信じられないよ……
まさかキャラハン教授が……なんて……

engChrName: I'm sorry. I need some time alone right now...
engSearchText: I'm sorry. I need some time alone right now...
jpnChrName: ……悪いけど、少し一人にさせてくれ…………
jpnSearchText: ……悪いけど、少し一人にさせてくれ…………

engChrName: I know it's not the time to talk about it, but...well, I won't be taking legal action against Professor Callaghan for this.
engSearchText:
I know it's not the time to talk about it, but...well, I
won't be taking legal action against Professor
Callaghan for this.
jpnChrName: それどころじゃない状況だけど…… やっぱり、教授を訴えるのは止めておこうと思う。
jpnSearchText:
それどころじゃない状況だけど……
やっぱり、教授を訴えるのは止めておこうと思う。

engChrName: I just can't bring myself to do that to him—I respect him too much. I can't ruin his reputation over this.
engSearchText:
I just can't bring myself to do that to him—I respect
him too much. I can't ruin his reputation over this.
jpnChrName: 尊敬する教授の名誉に傷が付くのは 望む所では無いからね。
jpnSearchText:
尊敬する教授の名誉に傷が付くのは
望む所では無いからね。

engChrName: But I'll hold on to the evidence you gathered for me.
engSearchText: But I'll hold on to the evidence you gathered for me.
jpnChrName: だからパワハラの証拠はこちらで 大事に保管させてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
だからパワハラの証拠はこちらで
大事に保管させてもらうよ。

engChrName: For now, all I can do is just pray he comes back safe...
engSearchText: For now, all I can do is just pray he comes back safe...
jpnChrName: まずは教授が無事に 見つかる事を祈るばかりだ……
jpnSearchText:
まずは教授が無事に
見つかる事を祈るばかりだ……

engChrName: Hmm... This theory could greatly simplify the equations we're using. I'll have to test that out at the lab.
engSearchText:
Hmm... This theory could greatly simplify the
equations we're using. I'll have to test that out at
the lab.
jpnChrName: ……つまりこの理論を応用すれば 計算式を簡略化できるという事か。
jpnSearchText:
……つまりこの理論を応用すれば
計算式を簡略化できるという事か。

engChrName: ...Or, wait, no. I forgot, it's a total mess right now. I have to wait until it's cleared up.
engSearchText:
...Or, wait, no. I forgot, it's a total mess right now.
I have to wait until it's cleared up.
jpnChrName: それなら早速研究室に戻って入力作業を…… いや、荒れていて使い物にならないんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
それなら早速研究室に戻って入力作業を……
いや、荒れていて使い物にならないんだったか。

engChrName: I need to do the professor proud. I can't screw this up...
engSearchText:
I need to do the professor proud. I can't screw
this up...
jpnChrName: もっと教授の役に立たないと…… だって僕はその為に……ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText:
もっと教授の役に立たないと……
だって僕はその為に……ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: Who could have imagined Professor Esmeray's research would be so relevant so quickly?
engSearchText:
Who could have imagined Professor Esmeray's
research would be so relevant so quickly?
jpnChrName: しかし、エスメレー准教授の研究成果が あんな形で応用されていたとは。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、エスメレー准教授の研究成果が
あんな形で応用されていたとは。

engChrName: I did briefly consider the possibility, but it seemed so far-fetched at the time. And yet here we are.
engSearchText:
I did briefly consider the possibility, but it seemed so
far-fetched at the time. And yet here we are.
jpnChrName: 研究を手伝っていて、薄々可能性くらいは 考えた事はありましたが……
jpnSearchText:
研究を手伝っていて、薄々可能性くらいは
考えた事はありましたが……

engChrName: Just what does Marduk intend to use this technology for, I wonder?
engSearchText:
Just what does Marduk intend to use this technology
for, I wonder?
jpnChrName: ……ＭＫ社はこうした研究を取り込んだ先に、 一体何を目指しているというのでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
……ＭＫ社はこうした研究を取り込んだ先に、
一体何を目指しているというのでしょうか……

engChrName: Ah, welcome... If you're looking for Risette, she's in the room to your right. The associate professor is with her.
engSearchText:
Ah, welcome... If you're looking for Risette, she's in
the room to your right. The associate professor is
with her.
jpnChrName: 皆さん……リゼットさんでしたら、右手の 実験室にて准教授が責任を持って治療中です。
jpnSearchText:
皆さん……リゼットさんでしたら、右手の
実験室にて准教授が責任を持って治療中です。

engChrName: She's through the worst of it now, at least—I've been in there helping her throughout the day.
engSearchText:
She's through the worst of it now, at least—I've been
in there helping her throughout the day.
jpnChrName: 私も先ほどまで手伝っておりましたが…… とりあえず山場は超えたはずです。
jpnSearchText:
私も先ほどまで手伝っておりましたが……
とりあえず山場は超えたはずです。

engChrName: I never expected we would be putting her research to the test so soon—especially not under these circumstances.
engSearchText:
I never expected we would be putting her research to
the test so soon—especially not under
these circumstances.
jpnChrName: しかし、まさか実際の措置に初めて関わるのが こんな形になってしまうとは……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、まさか実際の措置に初めて関わるのが
こんな形になってしまうとは……

engChrName: I suspect Professor Cronkite is at that roaming café I mentioned.
engSearchText:
I suspect Professor Cronkite is at that roaming café
I mentioned.
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授でしたらおそらく、 移動カフェに行ったのではないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授でしたらおそらく、
移動カフェに行ったのではないでしょうか。

engChrName: It's a guessing game where it'll be, but that's part of what makes it so popular here.
engSearchText:
It's a guessing game where it'll be, but that's part of
what makes it so popular here.
jpnChrName: 毎回違う場所で営業しているカフェですが、 うちの大学にも結構常連の人もいましてね。
jpnSearchText:
毎回違う場所で営業しているカフェですが、
うちの大学にも結構常連の人もいましてね。

engChrName: Professor Cronkite's started to catch on to some kind of pattern—he can predict where it'll be with astonishing accuracy.
engSearchText:
Professor Cronkite's started to catch on to some kind
of pattern—he can predict where it'll be with
astonishing accuracy.
jpnChrName: でも……今のところクロンカイト教授以外、 カフェの移動は予測できないもので。
jpnSearchText:
でも……今のところクロンカイト教授以外、
カフェの移動は予測できないもので。

engChrName: I've heard loud shouting from one of the other labs, yes. It stunned me out of the work I was doing.
engSearchText:
I've heard loud shouting from one of the other
labs, yes. It stunned me out of the work I was doing.
jpnChrName: ええ、初めてあの研究室から怒鳴り声が 聞こえて来た時は私も驚きました……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、初めてあの研究室から怒鳴り声が
聞こえて来た時は私も驚きました……

engChrName: I don't know who was shouting, but they sounded awfully jaded—like they didn't care who heard them.
engSearchText:
I don't know who was shouting, but they sounded
awfully jaded—like they didn't care who heard them.
jpnChrName: なりふり構わずといいますか、 人の目も憚らない様子で……
jpnSearchText:
なりふり構わずといいますか、
人の目も憚らない様子で……

engChrName: I'm afraid I can't recall any more than that, though. Forgive me.
engSearchText:
I'm afraid I can't recall any more than that, though.
Forgive me.
jpnChrName: 申し訳ないですけど、 私の口からこれ以上の事は言えません。
jpnSearchText:
申し訳ないですけど、
私の口からこれ以上の事は言えません。

engChrName: Something has to give, the way I see it. That lab is just woefully self-destructive...
engSearchText:
Something has to give, the way I see it. That lab is
just woefully self-destructive...
jpnChrName: でも、このままじゃいけないって みんな思ってるはずですよ……
jpnSearchText:
でも、このままじゃいけないって
みんな思ってるはずですよ……

engChrName: I work as an assistant in Professor Archette's lab over there.
engSearchText:
I work as an assistant in Professor Archette's lab
over there.
jpnChrName: 私は向こうのアーチェット研究室で 助手を勤めているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
私は向こうのアーチェット研究室で
助手を勤めているのですが……

engChrName: I've noticed some troubling things coming out of the other labs, though. This one woman, she's looked absolutely drained every day.
engSearchText:
I've noticed some troubling things coming out of the
other labs, though. This one woman, she's looked
absolutely drained every day.
jpnChrName: ここのところ、他の研究室の女性職員が 相当追い詰めてられているみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
ここのところ、他の研究室の女性職員が
相当追い詰めてられているみたいで……

engChrName: I wish there was something I could do to help her, but I really shouldn't go butting into other labs' business.
engSearchText:
I wish there was something I could do to help her, but
I really shouldn't go butting into other labs' business.
jpnChrName: できれば力になってあげたいのですが、他の研究室の 事情に首を突っ込む訳に行きませんからね。
jpnSearchText:
できれば力になってあげたいのですが、他の研究室の
事情に首を突っ込む訳に行きませんからね。

engChrName: I just hope she has someone she can talk to, be it a coworker, a professor, or someone else.
engSearchText:
I just hope she has someone she can talk to, be it a
coworker, a professor, or someone else.
jpnChrName: せめてオフの時などに、同期や他の 教授らを頼ってくだされば……
jpnSearchText:
せめてオフの時などに、同期や他の
教授らを頼ってくだされば……

engChrName: I wonder where Professor Esmeray's gotten to...?
engSearchText: I wonder where Professor Esmeray's gotten to...?
jpnChrName: 何にせよ……エスメレー准教授はどちらに 行かれたのでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ……エスメレー准教授はどちらに
行かれたのでしょうか。

engChrName: I wanted to report back to her with the latest on our budget and samples, but she's nowhere to be found.
engSearchText:
I wanted to report back to her with the latest on our
budget and samples, but she's nowhere to be found.
jpnChrName: 研究予算と試料の確保に関しての進展を 一応報告しておきたかったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
研究予算と試料の確保に関しての進展を
一応報告しておきたかったのですが……

engChrName: Well, I can always just wait, I suppose. She must have been busy to have dumped so much work on me... as usual.
engSearchText:
Well, I can always just wait, I suppose. She must have
been busy to have dumped so much work on me...
as usual.
jpnChrName: まあ、戻られたらでも良いか。 いつも通りに私に投げっぱなしですし。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、戻られたらでも良いか。
いつも通りに私に投げっぱなしですし。

engChrName: (That's a bit fishy there. Might have to ask him about that.)
engSearchText:
(That's a bit fishy there. Might have to ask him
about that.)
jpnChrName: （ん？　気になる事を言ってやがったな……  	詳しく話を聞いてみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ん？　気になる事を言ってやがったな……
詳しく話を聞いてみるか。）

engChrName: He did promise me earlier, but I can't guarantee it'll happen just yet. You never know, with how plans can change.
engSearchText:
He did promise me earlier, but I can't guarantee it'll
happen just yet. You never know, with how plans
can change.
jpnChrName: さっき言質を取っておいたのだけど── うまく行くかは一つの賭けね♪
jpnSearchText:
さっき言質を取っておいたのだけど──
うまく行くかは一つの賭けね♪

engChrName: Still, I can hardly think of a place in Basel I'm more interested in, so it's worth a shot!
engSearchText:
Still, I can hardly think of a place in Basel I'm more
interested in, so it's worth a shot!
jpnChrName: 個人的にも興味がある場所だから この機会に覗いておきたいのだけれど。
jpnSearchText:
個人的にも興味がある場所だから
この機会に覗いておきたいのだけれど。

engChrName: Oh, hello, everyone! I didn't think I'd run into you all here.
engSearchText:
Oh, hello, everyone! I didn't think I'd run into you
all here.
jpnChrName: あ、レン先輩達…… こちらに来ていたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、レン先輩達……
こちらに来ていたんですね。

engChrName: We just finished touring the Epstein Foundation and ZCF branches here, so now we're taking a brief tour of the institute.
engSearchText:
We just finished touring the Epstein Foundation and
ZCF branches here, so now we're taking a brief tour
of the institute.
jpnChrName: ええ、財団とＺＣＦの見学も終えたし、 大学も軽く見て回った所よ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、財団とＺＣＦの見学も終えたし、
大学も軽く見て回った所よ。

engChrName: There's really not much we can do, though, since we can't attend any of the lectures here. Being honest, it's rather boring.
engSearchText:
There's really not much we can do, though, since we
can't attend any of the lectures here. Being honest, it's
rather boring.
jpnChrName: といっても講義が受けられる訳じゃないし 見ているだけじゃ退屈だけど。
jpnSearchText:
といっても講義が受けられる訳じゃないし
見ているだけじゃ退屈だけど。

engChrName: Boring for you, maybe... You sound like you already know about a lot of the stuff here.
engSearchText:
Boring for you, maybe... You sound like you already
know about a lot of the stuff here.
jpnChrName: う～ん、退屈というほどでも ないと思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、退屈というほどでも
ないと思いますが……

engChrName: We're not as...encyclopedic as you, y'know? All this Epstein and ZCF stuff is brand new to me.
engSearchText:
We're not as...encyclopedic as you, y'know? All this
Epstein and ZCF stuff is brand new to me.
jpnChrName: 財団やＺＣＦの内容だって 先輩はほとんど知っていたようですけど……
jpnSearchText:
財団やＺＣＦの内容だって
先輩はほとんど知っていたようですけど……

engChrName: She's just full of secrets, isn't she? But hey, we got to see and learn some really cool stuff because of it!
engSearchText:
She's just full of secrets, isn't she? But hey, we got to
see and learn some really cool stuff because of it!
jpnChrName: まあ謎は深まってるけど 色々貴重な物を見せてもらってるって事で♪
jpnSearchText:
まあ謎は深まってるけど
色々貴重な物を見せてもらってるって事で♪

engChrName: Renne said she might have something extra special for us after we're done here, too!
engSearchText:
Renne said she might have something extra special for
us after we're done here, too!
jpnChrName: あ、そういえばこの後も “とっておき”が見られるかもって──
jpnSearchText:
あ、そういえばこの後も
“とっておき”が見られるかもって──

engChrName: Heehee. Might is the key word, mind—I can't make any promises.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Might is the key word, mind—I can't make
any promises.
jpnChrName: フフ、これに関しては うまく行くかは分からないけれど。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、これに関しては
うまく行くかは分からないけれど。

engChrName: (What does she mean by that...?)
engSearchText: (What does she mean by that...?)
jpnChrName: （それって……）
jpnSearchText: （それって……）

engChrName: (Beats me. I'm not too worried about her—let her do her thing and us do ours.)
engSearchText:
(Beats me. I'm not too worried about her—let her do
her thing and us do ours.)
jpnChrName: （……チートかましてるみてえだが   ま、俺たちもやる事をやらねえとな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……チートかましてるみてえだが
ま、俺たちもやる事をやらねえとな。）

engChrName: The Epstein Foundation was really something special!
engSearchText:
The Epstein Foundation was really
something special!
jpnChrName: さっきのエプスタイン財団支部の 見学も凄かったよ～！
jpnSearchText:
さっきのエプスタイン財団支部の
見学も凄かったよ～！

engChrName: We got to hear lots of interesting stories at the ZCF branch, too. Renne said that her best friend works there, even!
engSearchText:
We got to hear lots of interesting stories at the ZCF
branch, too. Renne said that her best friend works
there, even!
jpnChrName: あとＺＣＦには親友がいるとかで そっち方面の話も聞けたし♪
jpnSearchText:
あとＺＣＦには親友がいるとかで
そっち方面の話も聞けたし♪

engChrName: She has so many of those connections... It's really mysterious. But hey, I'm not complaining!
engSearchText:
She has so many of those connections... It's
really mysterious. But hey, I'm not complaining!
jpnChrName: レン先輩の人脈がますます謎だけど…… 今は貴重な経験をさせてもらうとしますか！
jpnSearchText:
レン先輩の人脈がますます謎だけど……
今は貴重な経験をさせてもらうとしますか！

engChrName: So, uh, how's everything been going on your end, Agnès?
engSearchText:
So, uh, how's everything been going on your
end, Agnès?
jpnChrName: その、アニエスの方も順調か？
jpnSearchText: その、アニエスの方も順調か？

engChrName: If it all gets to be too much, you can join back up with us, okay?
engSearchText:
If it all gets to be too much, you can join back up with
us, okay?
jpnChrName: 辛くなったらいつでも 戻ってきていいんだからな？
jpnSearchText:
辛くなったらいつでも
戻ってきていいんだからな？

engChrName: Miss Perfect is Miss Popular, too, huh?
engSearchText: Miss Perfect is Miss Popular, too, huh?
jpnChrName: だとよ、モテモテだねぇ～。
jpnSearchText: だとよ、モテモテだねぇ～。

engChrName: Thanks, Albert. But I'm fine right now, honestly.
engSearchText: Thanks, Albert. But I'm fine right now, honestly.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、アルベール君。 でも大丈夫ですから。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、アルベール君。
でも大丈夫ですから。

engChrName: Well...all right. Glad to hear that.
engSearchText: Well...all right. Glad to hear that.
jpnChrName: そ、そうか……ならいいんだが。
jpnSearchText: そ、そうか……ならいいんだが。

engChrName: Just, I worry sometimes. There's some dangerous stuff out there, so don't go charging into all that, okay?
engSearchText:
Just, I worry sometimes. There's some dangerous stuff
out there, so don't go charging into all that, okay?
jpnChrName: ……まあ、危ない事に巻き込まれそうになったら すぐにこっちに戻ってくるといい。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、危ない事に巻き込まれそうになったら
すぐにこっちに戻ってくるといい。

engChrName: We'll always be here for you.
engSearchText: We'll always be here for you.
jpnChrName: 僕達はいつでも君の味方だからな。
jpnSearchText: 僕達はいつでも君の味方だからな。

engChrName: I've heard much about the institute of science, and I must say, it does live up to its reputation.
engSearchText:
I've heard much about the institute of science, and I
must say, it does live up to its reputation.
jpnChrName: やはり視察研修の目玉は バーゼル理科大学ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり視察研修の目玉は
バーゼル理科大学ですよね。

engChrName: It's the highest seat of learning in Calvard, after all. You have many of the country's brightest minds all under one roof.
engSearchText:
It's the highest seat of learning in Calvard, after all.
You have many of the country's brightest minds all
under one roof.
jpnChrName: 共和国最高の頭脳が集結しているとも 言われる最高学府（アカデミア）──
jpnSearchText:
共和国最高の頭脳が集結しているとも
言われる最高学府（アカデミア）──

engChrName: We won't be able to see the entire thing in one trip, but I hope I can at least catch the highlights while we're here.
engSearchText:
We won't be able to see the entire thing in one trip,
but I hope I can at least catch the highlights while
we're here.
jpnChrName: 広すぎて流石に一日では見切れませんが、 見所だけは押さえたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
広すぎて流石に一日では見切れませんが、
見所だけは押さえたいものです。

engChrName: Yooo, Julian, did you get a look at that researcher who just walked by?
engSearchText:
Yooo, Julian, did you get a look at that researcher
who just walked by?
jpnChrName: なあユリアン……さっき通りかかった 研究者風のお姉さんなんだが──
jpnSearchText:
なあユリアン……さっき通りかかった
研究者風のお姉さんなんだが──

engChrName: She was a total knockout...! She had that science-y look to her, with the glasses and the messed-up hair...
engSearchText:
She was a total knockout...! She had that science-y
look to her, with the glasses and the messed-up hair...
jpnChrName: “リケジョ”って言うのか？ 髪ボサボサだけど謎の魅力があるというか──
jpnSearchText:
“リケジョ”って言うのか？
髪ボサボサだけど謎の魅力があるというか──

engChrName: It's not just me dreaming, is it? We've gotta be a match!
engSearchText:
It's not just me dreaming, is it? We've gotta be
a match!
jpnChrName: ズバリ、オレとお似合いじゃね！？
jpnSearchText: ズバリ、オレとお似合いじゃね！？

engChrName: Huh? Sorry, but I have no idea what you're on about.
engSearchText: Huh? Sorry, but I have no idea what you're on about.
jpnChrName: えっ？　ごめん、 何を言ってるのかちょっと……
jpnSearchText:
えっ？　ごめん、
何を言ってるのかちょっと……

engChrName: ...Is she more beautiful than the aerotram attendant you were fawning over half an hour ago?
engSearchText:
...Is she more beautiful than the aerotram attendant
you were fawning over half an hour ago?
jpnChrName: さっきまでエアロトラムの案内役の お姉さんが最高って言ってなかったっけ。
jpnSearchText:
さっきまでエアロトラムの案内役の
お姉さんが最高って言ってなかったっけ。

engChrName: Dude, EVERYBODY here is a ten! There's something about this town, I swear... It's awakening something in me!
engSearchText:
Dude, EVERYBODY here is a ten!
There's something about this town, I swear...
It's awakening something in me!
jpnChrName: ああ……想像以上だぜ、この街は…… オレの中で何かが目覚めちまいそうだ……
jpnSearchText:
ああ……想像以上だぜ、この街は……
オレの中で何かが目覚めちまいそうだ……

engChrName: Uh, Lyle? Maybe quit while you're ahead.
engSearchText: Uh, Lyle? Maybe quit while you're ahead.
jpnChrName: って全然カッコついてないけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText: って全然カッコついてないけどねぇ。

engChrName: I always assumed the institute was full of dudes. I didn't know there'd be so many chicks here, too. And man, some of 'em are bombshells!
engSearchText:
I always assumed the institute was full of dudes.
I didn't know there'd be so many chicks here, too.
And man, some of 'em are bombshells!
jpnChrName: 理科大学ってオトコばっかかと思ったら 魅力的なお姉さんも多いんだな……
jpnSearchText:
理科大学ってオトコばっかかと思ったら
魅力的なお姉さんも多いんだな……

engChrName: ...All right, that settles it. I'm applying to this place.
engSearchText: ...All right, that settles it. I'm applying to this place.
jpnChrName: ……オレもここ、目指してみっかな？
jpnSearchText: ……オレもここ、目指してみっかな？

engChrName: Oh, man! The Epstein tour was outta this world! I got to see some vintage memory quartz in there— how far we've come, huh?
engSearchText:
Oh, man! The Epstein tour was outta this world!
I got to see some vintage memory quartz in there—
how far we've come, huh?
jpnChrName: エプスタイン財団の見学も良かったよね～！ 初期の記憶結晶（メモリークオーツ）の資料なんてもう！
jpnSearchText:
エプスタイン財団の見学も良かったよね～！
初期の記憶結晶（メモリークオーツ）の資料なんてもう！

engChrName: I didn't know that photos and videos were first developed for astronomy.
engSearchText:
I didn't know that photos and videos were first
developed for astronomy.
jpnChrName: あっ、そうそう、写真とか導力映像って 元は天体観測を記録するためだったんだって。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、そうそう、写真とか導力映像って
元は天体観測を記録するためだったんだって。

engChrName: But soon enough, it branched out into other things, and that led to orbal films as we know them today!
engSearchText:
But soon enough, it branched out into other things,
and that led to orbal films as we know them today!
jpnChrName: それが映像技術の発展につながって、 ついに《導力映画》が誕生──くぅぅっ！！
jpnSearchText:
それが映像技術の発展につながって、
ついに《導力映画》が誕生──くぅぅっ！！

engChrName: It's just so cool to see how the medium took off!
engSearchText: It's just so cool to see how the medium took off!
jpnChrName: はぁぁ～、あたしは今 映画の生い立ちに触れてるんだねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
はぁぁ～、あたしは今
映画の生い立ちに触れてるんだねぇ！

engChrName: Heehee. Glad to hear you're having fun.
engSearchText: Heehee. Glad to hear you're having fun.
jpnChrName: ふふ、シニョンったら…… でもみんなも楽しそうで良かった。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、シニョンったら……
でもみんなも楽しそうで良かった。

engChrName: You bet!
engSearchText: You bet!
jpnChrName: うんうん、めちゃくちゃ楽しいよ～！
jpnSearchText: うんうん、めちゃくちゃ楽しいよ～！

engChrName: I know you're busy with work and all, but you should see the sights yourself, Agnès!
engSearchText:
I know you're busy with work and all, but you should
see the sights yourself, Agnès!
jpnChrName: アニエスも大変そうだけど、 ちゃんと視察も楽しんでよねっ！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスも大変そうだけど、
ちゃんと視察も楽しんでよねっ！

engChrName: I heard the institute has the largest astral observatory in all of Calvard!
engSearchText:
I heard the institute has the largest astral observatory
in all of Calvard!
jpnChrName: 理科大学には確か 国内最大級の天文台があるんだっけ。
jpnSearchText:
理科大学には確か
国内最大級の天文台があるんだっけ。

engChrName: I really want to go and see that now... Would we even be allowed inside, though?
engSearchText:
I really want to go and see that now... Would we even
be allowed inside, though?
jpnChrName: ちょっと興味湧いてきちゃったんだよね。 ……あたしたちでも見学できるのかな～？
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと興味湧いてきちゃったんだよね。
……あたしたちでも見学できるのかな～？

engChrName: The hell'd Sasha run off to? She's always tellin' me not to go off on my own, but I guess she doesn't have to follow her own rules. Tch.
engSearchText:
The hell'd Sasha run off to? She's always tellin' me
not to go off on my own, but I guess she doesn't have
to follow her own rules. Tch.
jpnChrName: チッ、サーシャの奴、どこに行った。 オレには勝手に動くなってウルセェくせに……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、サーシャの奴、どこに行った。
オレには勝手に動くなってウルセェくせに……

engChrName: I ain't cut out for this tour guide crap! Why'd she dump it all on me?
engSearchText:
I ain't cut out for this tour guide crap! Why'd she
dump it all on me?
jpnChrName: ったく、オレに引率の代わりなんざ できる訳ねぇだろ……とっとと戻ってきやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
ったく、オレに引率の代わりなんざ
できる訳ねぇだろ……とっとと戻ってきやがれ！

engChrName: Yeah, there was a bit of trouble over at the institute.
engSearchText: Yeah, there was a bit of trouble over at the institute.
jpnChrName: あーうんうん、理科大学でちょっと 事件があったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
あーうんうん、理科大学でちょっと
事件があったみたいで。

engChrName: Looks like the CID's on the ground, too, so I was wondering if you'd heard anything?
engSearchText:
Looks like the CID's on the ground, too, so I was
wondering if you'd heard anything?
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤも動いてるみたいだし 何か情報が入ってないかと思ってさ♪
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤも動いてるみたいだし
何か情報が入ってないかと思ってさ♪

engChrName: Oh, come on! You can't do one little favor to help some frightened schoolchildren?
engSearchText:
Oh, come on! You can't do one little favor to help
some frightened schoolchildren?
jpnChrName: ……ええ～っ、ケチ言わないでよ～。 可愛い生徒たちのためなんだからさ～！
jpnSearchText:
……ええ～っ、ケチ言わないでよ～。
可愛い生徒たちのためなんだからさ～！

engChrName: (Who is she talking to?)
engSearchText: (Who is she talking to?)
jpnChrName: （サーシャ先輩……？   誰と話しているんだろう……）
jpnSearchText:
（サーシャ先輩……？
誰と話しているんだろう……）

engChrName: (Hard to say... Can't deny I'm curious, but we got bigger fish to fry right now.)
engSearchText:
(Hard to say... Can't deny I'm curious, but we got
bigger fish to fry right now.)
jpnChrName: （ふむ……ちょいと気になるが   まあ事件とは関係なさそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふむ……ちょいと気になるが
まあ事件とは関係なさそうだな。）

engChrName: I've gone over it with the Student Council president, but I'm still really unnerved about it.
engSearchText:
I've gone over it with the Student Council president,
but I'm still really unnerved about it.
jpnChrName: 生徒会長やってる友達とも話したんだけど、 ちょっと不安があってね～。
jpnSearchText:
生徒会長やってる友達とも話したんだけど、
ちょっと不安があってね～。

engChrName: C'mon, won't you help out some worried schoolchildren? Pleeeeease?
engSearchText:
C'mon, won't you help out some
worried schoolchildren? Pleeeeease?
jpnChrName: お・ね・が・い㈱ 可愛い生徒たちのためにさ～！
jpnSearchText:
お・ね・が・い㈱
可愛い生徒たちのためにさ～！

engChrName: I've always liked seeing people react to the things I make. I just never expected it would happen like this...
engSearchText:
I've always liked seeing people react to the things
I make. I just never expected it would happen
like this...
jpnChrName: ふむ、自分が作った産物に対する他人の反応を 見るのは好きだけど、こういう形になるとはね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、自分が作った産物に対する他人の反応を
見るのは好きだけど、こういう形になるとはね。

engChrName: Still, I'm glad it's available for her. The painkiller should make the limb fitting much easier for her.
engSearchText:
Still, I'm glad it's available for her. The painkiller
should make the limb fitting much easier for her.
jpnChrName: まあ、あの彼女への“擬体パーツ”の接続も あの鎮痛剤が無ければ相当な苦痛だったはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あの彼女への“擬体パーツ”の接続も
あの鎮痛剤が無ければ相当な苦痛だったはずだ。

engChrName: Funny how it all worked out: you helped us and helped yourselves.
engSearchText:
Funny how it all worked out: you helped us and
helped yourselves.
jpnChrName: その意味では、君達は僕に協力したのが 巡り巡って仲間を救ったという事になる……
jpnSearchText:
その意味では、君達は僕に協力したのが
巡り巡って仲間を救ったという事になる……

engChrName: Man, same. Never expected one of our own would need the stuff we were helpin' to make.
engSearchText:
Man, same. Never expected one of our own would
need the stuff we were helpin' to make.
jpnChrName: ハッ……俺達もまさかあいつに使うのを 目の当たりにするとは思わなかったが……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……俺達もまさかあいつに使うのを
目の当たりにするとは思わなかったが……

engChrName: We really owe you for that, even if we helped out with it.
engSearchText:
We really owe you for that, even if we helped out
with it.
jpnChrName: 結果的にはあんたのお陰でリゼットの苦しみを 和らげられたしな、協力した身だが礼は言うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
結果的にはあんたのお陰でリゼットの苦しみを
和らげられたしな、協力した身だが礼は言うぜ。

engChrName: Don't worry about it. I just chipped in here and there—the research was mostly Esmeray's—but I'm still honored I could help.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it. I just chipped in here and
there—the research was mostly Esmeray's—but I'm
still honored I could help.
jpnChrName: ハハ、僕はあくまで植物学の助っ人で来たに 過ぎないがお役に立てたなら光栄だ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、僕はあくまで植物学の助っ人で来たに
過ぎないがお役に立てたなら光栄だ。

engChrName: All we can do now is leave the rest to her. She knows what she's doing.
engSearchText:
All we can do now is leave the rest to her. She knows
what she's doing.
jpnChrName: まあ、彼女については後はエスメレー君に 任せるとしよう、ここから先は彼女の領分だ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、彼女については後はエスメレー君に
任せるとしよう、ここから先は彼女の領分だ。

engChrName: I'll still be out and about in the city helping treat the wounded.
engSearchText:
I'll still be out and about in the city helping treat
the wounded.
jpnChrName: もっとも、僕は僕で一応、市内の負傷者のために 薬草などの事では協力するつもりではあるがね。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、僕は僕で一応、市内の負傷者のために
薬草などの事では協力するつもりではあるがね。

engChrName: I came to Basel in part because I was deeply curious about the research here... It's just awful that this had to happen now.
engSearchText:
I came to Basel in part because I was deeply curious
about the research here... It's just awful that this had
to happen now.
jpnChrName: せっかく興味深い研究を拝見したいのもあって バーゼルに来たのに、残念な事になってしまった。
jpnSearchText:
せっかく興味深い研究を拝見したいのもあって
バーゼルに来たのに、残念な事になってしまった。

engChrName: But I plan on coming back someday, so I might as well help out here while I can. That way, I can help the city rebuild for my next visit.
engSearchText:
But I plan on coming back someday, so I might as
well help out here while I can. That way, I can help
the city rebuild for my next visit.
jpnChrName: まあ、今後改めて来た際に存分に楽しむためにも 今はせいぜい力になるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今後改めて来た際に存分に楽しむためにも
今はせいぜい力になるとするか。

engChrName: Those cleanup volunteers must be all tuckered out... Perhaps an acerbic sandwich or two is what they need. Heh heh...
engSearchText:
Those cleanup volunteers must be all tuckered out...
Perhaps an acerbic sandwich or two is what
they need. Heh heh...
jpnChrName: フフ、復興作業で疲れた人たちに 『にがトマト』を振る舞うのも一興かな？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、復興作業で疲れた人たちに
『にがトマト』を振る舞うのも一興かな？

engChrName: I came here to put my botanical chops to use. I was hoping to get a better look at the research they were conducting here...
engSearchText:
I came here to put my botanical chops to use. I was
hoping to get a better look at the research they were
conducting here...
jpnChrName: ふむ、せっかく植物学の協力で来れたのだし、 ついでにユニークな研究の数々を拝見したかったが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、せっかく植物学の協力で来れたのだし、
ついでにユニークな研究の数々を拝見したかったが……

engChrName: ...but never in my wildest dreams did I expect this would happen. Now I'm at a loss...
engSearchText:
...but never in my wildest dreams did I expect this
would happen. Now I'm at a loss...
jpnChrName: よもやこの国でもこの手の災厄に出くわすとは。 まあ、僕もいずれまた来るとは思うが……
jpnSearchText:
よもやこの国でもこの手の災厄に出くわすとは。
まあ、僕もいずれまた来るとは思うが……

engChrName: I do want to come back again someday... I think I'd best help the recovery effort—that way, there IS a city to come back to.
engSearchText:
I do want to come back again someday... I think I'd
best help the recovery effort—that way, there IS a city
to come back to.
jpnChrName: 今はせいぜい、次に来た時に後腐れなく やるためにも力になるとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
今はせいぜい、次に来た時に後腐れなく
やるためにも力になるとしようか。

engChrName: I like to think I know my herbs. I might be able to put that knowledge to work by treating the wounded here.
engSearchText:
I like to think I know my herbs. I might be able to
put that knowledge to work by treating the
wounded here.
jpnChrName: 薬草の類なら相談に乗れるだろうし……栄養満点の 『アレ』を皆に提供するのも……
jpnSearchText:
薬草の類なら相談に乗れるだろうし……栄養満点の
『アレ』を皆に提供するのも……

engChrName: (Who's this guy? Foreign researcher, if I had to guess...and a real whack job, at that.)
engSearchText:
(Who's this guy? Foreign researcher, if I had to
guess...and a real whack job, at that.)
jpnChrName: （外国の研究者のようだが……随分と   変わった雰囲気だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（外国の研究者のようだが……随分と
変わった雰囲気だな。）

engChrName: (Guy ain't hurtin' anybody, at least, but I'll make a little mental note of him.)
engSearchText:
(Guy ain't hurtin' anybody, at least, but I'll make a
little mental note of him.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、協力はしているようだし一応   気にはとどめておくとするか……）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、協力はしているようだし一応
気にはとどめておくとするか……）

engChrName: Once we're done here, we're heading back to the lab to synthesize some of that new painkiller.
engSearchText:
Once we're done here, we're heading back to the lab
to synthesize some of that new painkiller.
jpnChrName: 早速、これから実験室を借りて サンプルを作ってみようと思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
早速、これから実験室を借りて
サンプルを作ってみようと思うんだ。

engChrName: Now that we have the theory down, we should have some working samples soon.
engSearchText:
Now that we have the theory down, we should have
some working samples soon.
jpnChrName: 製法は確立してあるし、 数回試作すれば完成にこぎ着けられると思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
製法は確立してあるし、
数回試作すれば完成にこぎ着けられると思うよ。

engChrName: I'm kind of excited to use it in the field for the first time. I think it'll really help.
engSearchText:
I'm kind of excited to use it in the field for the
first time. I think it'll really help.
jpnChrName: 義手の方の為にも実用化するのが楽しみだね。
jpnSearchText: 義手の方の為にも実用化するのが楽しみだね。

engChrName: Bioengineering is a real hot field right now, and I can't deny I'm proud that my research could prove useful in it.
engSearchText:
Bioengineering is a real hot field right now, and I
can't deny I'm proud that my research could prove
useful in it.
jpnChrName: 僕の研究が、今注目を集めている 生体工学にも応用できるとは光栄だな。
jpnSearchText:
僕の研究が、今注目を集めている
生体工学にも応用できるとは光栄だな。

engChrName: I hope this painkiller makes life easier for amputees and other patients.
engSearchText:
I hope this painkiller makes life easier for amputees
and other patients.
jpnChrName: 義手の方の負担を少しでも減らすためにも 責任を持って鎮痛剤を開発させてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
義手の方の負担を少しでも減らすためにも
責任を持って鎮痛剤を開発させてもらうよ。

engChrName: The attachment process does hurt, unfortunately, but I'll do my best to make it as quick as possible.
engSearchText:
The attachment process does hurt, unfortunately, but
I'll do my best to make it as quick as possible.
jpnChrName: この後の接合措置には苦痛も伴うけど…… 少しでも和らげる努力はするから～。
jpnSearchText:
この後の接合措置には苦痛も伴うけど……
少しでも和らげる努力はするから～。

engChrName: Risette is already familiar with artificial limbs, as it happens, so that should make it easier for her to adjust to them.
engSearchText:
Risette is already familiar with artificial limbs, as it
happens, so that should make it easier for her to
adjust to them.
jpnChrName: 接合後の諸々の調整も、リゼットさんに知識と経験が ある分、ある程度円滑に出来そうだし……
jpnSearchText:
接合後の諸々の調整も、リゼットさんに知識と経験が
ある分、ある程度円滑に出来そうだし……

engChrName: And I've got Marduk helping me out, too. We'll make sure it's done right!
engSearchText:
And I've got Marduk helping me out, too.
We'll make sure it's done right!
jpnChrName: とにかく、私もＭＫ社の方とも連絡しながら ちゃんとやるから、安心してね～。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、私もＭＫ社の方とも連絡しながら
ちゃんとやるから、安心してね～。

engChrName: Heehee. I knew I could rely on all of you!
engSearchText: Heehee. I knew I could rely on all of you!
jpnChrName: ふふ、やっぱり裏解決屋さんを 頼って正解だったみたいですね～。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、やっぱり裏解決屋さんを
頼って正解だったみたいですね～。

engChrName: And Quatre, I'm worried about Professor Callaghan as well, but please don't burn yourself out trying to fix this all by yourself.
engSearchText:
And Quatre, I'm worried about Professor Callaghan
as well, but please don't burn yourself out trying to fix
this all by yourself.
jpnChrName: それと、わたしもキャラハン教授の事は心配だけど カトル君も無理し過ぎないようにね～。
jpnSearchText:
それと、わたしもキャラハン教授の事は心配だけど
カトル君も無理し過ぎないようにね～。

engChrName: Now, Ray didn't catch my eye just for his Zemuria Moss research alone.
engSearchText:
Now, Ray didn't catch my eye just for his Zemuria
Moss research alone.
jpnChrName: ゼムリア苔以外のレイさんの研究内容も すごく興味深いんですよね～。
jpnSearchText:
ゼムリア苔以外のレイさんの研究内容も
すごく興味深いんですよね～。

engChrName: I hope I get the chance to ask him about his other projects. For now, though, we need to focus on this painkiller.
engSearchText:
I hope I get the chance to ask him about his other
projects. For now, though, we need to focus on
this painkiller.
jpnChrName: 色々と相談したい事はありますけど、 まずは鎮痛剤の開発を完成させないと～。
jpnSearchText:
色々と相談したい事はありますけど、
まずは鎮痛剤の開発を完成させないと～。

engChrName: Do let me know if you find any moss down there!
engSearchText: Do let me know if you find any moss down there!
jpnChrName: ゼムリア苔が取れたら わたしの所までもって来て下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
ゼムリア苔が取れたら
わたしの所までもって来て下さいね。

engChrName: Just please don't get yourselves hurt in the process! That would be quite bad.
engSearchText:
Just please don't get yourselves hurt in the process!
That would be quite bad.
jpnChrName: 怪我をしないようにお気を付けて～。
jpnSearchText: 怪我をしないようにお気を付けて～。

engChrName: Oh... Hello... How is your investigation going...?
engSearchText: Oh... Hello... How is your investigation going...?
jpnChrName: あ……皆さま…… 調査は……順調でしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
あ……皆さま……
調査は……順調でしょうか……

engChrName: Oh! You're up already?
engSearchText: Oh! You're up already?
jpnChrName: リゼットさん……目が覚めて……
jpnSearchText: リゼットさん……目が覚めて……

engChrName: Please take it easy, Risette.
engSearchText: Please take it easy, Risette.
jpnChrName: リゼットさん、無理はしないでね～？
jpnSearchText: リゼットさん、無理はしないでね～？

engChrName: We just have you awake temporarily before we start doing the nerve work.
engSearchText:
We just have you awake temporarily before we start
doing the nerve work.
jpnChrName: 神経系の事前処置で一時的に覚醒した だけなんだから……
jpnSearchText:
神経系の事前処置で一時的に覚醒した
だけなんだから……

engChrName: Oh, shit, sorry. We didn't mean to bother you.
engSearchText: Oh, shit, sorry. We didn't mean to bother you.
jpnChrName: ……そうか、悪かったな、 まだキツイところに邪魔しちまって。
jpnSearchText:
……そうか、悪かったな、
まだキツイところに邪魔しちまって。

engChrName: Not at all... I'm glad to see you... And it's good that you're still hard at work...
engSearchText:
Not at all... I'm glad to see you... And it's good that
you're still hard at work...
jpnChrName: いえ……改めて……皆さまが…… 変わらず業務を続けられているところを……
jpnSearchText:
いえ……改めて……皆さまが……
変わらず業務を続けられているところを……

engChrName: I'll be going back to sleep now... Thank you for visiting me...
engSearchText:
I'll be going back to sleep now... Thank you for
visiting me...
jpnChrName: 皆さまの様子を……見てはおきたかったですし…… 改めて……お声も聞けて……安心です……
jpnSearchText:
皆さまの様子を……見てはおきたかったですし……
改めて……お声も聞けて……安心です……

engChrName: Be careful...out there...
engSearchText: Be careful...out there...
jpnChrName: どうか皆さま……くれぐれもお気をつけて……
jpnSearchText: どうか皆さま……くれぐれもお気をつけて……

engChrName: Damn. Out like a light. She's really got it rough.
engSearchText: Damn. Out like a light. She's really got it rough.
jpnChrName: また眠ったか……やっぱり、この身体でも 相当キツイみたいだな……
jpnSearchText:
また眠ったか……やっぱり、この身体でも
相当キツイみたいだな……

engChrName: She really does... I wasn't expecting her to wake up like that. She must have really wanted to see you.
engSearchText:
She really does... I wasn't expecting her to wake up
like that. She must have really wanted to see you.
jpnChrName: うん……でも、今目を醒ましたのは本当に 貴方達に会いたかったからだと思うよ～？
jpnSearchText:
うん……でも、今目を醒ましたのは本当に
貴方達に会いたかったからだと思うよ～？

engChrName: She might be conscious again, but she's not lucid most of the time. She must have heard your footsteps or otherwise noticed you coming.
engSearchText:
She might be conscious again, but she's not lucid
most of the time. She must have heard your footsteps
or otherwise noticed you coming.
jpnChrName: 覚醒状態と言っても、まどろんでいるような 感じだし……足音とか気配を感じたのかな～？
jpnSearchText:
覚醒状態と言っても、まどろんでいるような
感じだし……足音とか気配を感じたのかな～？

engChrName: Man... She's a real trooper. All the more reason to make good on her.
engSearchText:
Man... She's a real trooper. All the more reason to
make good on her.
jpnChrName: そうか……それならなおの事、リゼットの 痛みを無駄にするわけにはいかねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……それならなおの事、リゼットの
痛みを無駄にするわけにはいかねぇな。

engChrName: She's in your hands. We'll give her the good news when she wakes up.
engSearchText:
She's in your hands. We'll give her the good news
when she wakes up.
jpnChrName: リゼットの事は頼んだ、俺達はリゼットに 後悔させない結果を持って帰るだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
リゼットの事は頼んだ、俺達はリゼットに
後悔させない結果を持って帰るだけだ。

engChrName: Don't worry. I'll take good care of her.
engSearchText: Don't worry. I'll take good care of her.
jpnChrName: うん……彼女の事は任せて～。
jpnSearchText: うん……彼女の事は任せて～。

engChrName: She'll be all better by the time you get back, and that's a promise!
engSearchText:
She'll be all better by the time you get back, and that's
a promise!
jpnChrName: 朗報をちゃんと聞けるように、 しっかり治しておいてあげるから～。
jpnSearchText:
朗報をちゃんと聞けるように、
しっかり治しておいてあげるから～。

engChrName: Let's leave her be for now.
engSearchText: Let's leave her be for now.
jpnChrName: ……今は休ませておいてやろう。
jpnSearchText: ……今は休ませておいてやろう。

engChrName: We got our own work to do—let's come back with good news for her.
engSearchText:
We got our own work to do—let's come back with
good news for her.
jpnChrName: 俺達はリゼットのためにも、 目の前の事を確実に片付けるだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺達はリゼットのためにも、
目の前の事を確実に片付けるだけだ。

engChrName: This would not fall within the purview of a researcher, but if needs must, I'll not stop you.
engSearchText:
This would not fall within the purview of a
researcher, but if needs must, I'll not stop you.
jpnChrName: カトル、彼らへの同行は最早研究者の 領分ではないが、その気なら否定はしない。
jpnSearchText:
カトル、彼らへの同行は最早研究者の
領分ではないが、その気なら否定はしない。

engChrName: I'm sure they would appreciate a mind as wise and rational as yours—provided you can control your impulses, of course.
engSearchText:
I'm sure they would appreciate a mind as wise and
rational as yours—provided you can control your
impulses, of course.
jpnChrName: お前の知識や技術を要する場面もあるだろう。 合理的に活用できるのであればだがな。
jpnSearchText:
お前の知識や技術を要する場面もあるだろう。
合理的に活用できるのであればだがな。

engChrName: I'll make sure of it! Please be careful yourself, Yang!
engSearchText: I'll make sure of it! Please be careful yourself, Yang!
jpnChrName: うん、僕も役に立って見せるよ……！ ヤン兄も、どうか気を付けて……！
jpnSearchText:
うん、僕も役に立って見せるよ……！
ヤン兄も、どうか気を付けて……！

engChrName: You needn't worry about me. I've started to recognize our enemy's patterns and movements.
engSearchText:
You needn't worry about me. I've started to recognize
our enemy's patterns and movements.
jpnChrName: 私については心配無用だ。 敵の動きの傾向も見えてきたからな。
jpnSearchText:
私については心配無用だ。
敵の動きの傾向も見えてきたからな。

engChrName: You'd be wise not to overexert yourself. Bear your limits and abilities in mind.
engSearchText:
You'd be wise not to overexert yourself. Bear your
limits and abilities in mind.
jpnChrName: ……お前こそ、無理はするな。 自らの限界も論理的に見極めて動くがいい。
jpnSearchText:
……お前こそ、無理はするな。
自らの限界も論理的に見極めて動くがいい。

engChrName: (He's always so calm and collected, no matter what's happening around him... I have to be more like him!)
engSearchText:
(He's always so calm and collected, no matter what's
happening around him... I have to be more like him!)
jpnChrName: （やっぱりヤン兄はいつだって冷静だ。   僕も見習わないと──！）
jpnSearchText:
（やっぱりヤン兄はいつだって冷静だ。
僕も見習わないと──！）

engChrName: I leave Quatre in your hands.
engSearchText: I leave Quatre in your hands.
jpnChrName: お前達にもカトルを頼むと言っておこう。
jpnSearchText: お前達にもカトルを頼むと言っておこう。

engChrName: In the meantime, I will help the institute's evacuation efforts and direct security countermeasures as needed.
engSearchText:
In the meantime, I will help the institute's evacuation
efforts and direct security countermeasures as needed.
jpnChrName: ……私の方は引き続き避難誘導と、必要性が生じれば 追加のセキュリティ対策も機を見て行うとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
……私の方は引き続き避難誘導と、必要性が生じれば
追加のセキュリティ対策も機を見て行うとしよう。

engChrName: This is RIDICULOUS!
engSearchText: This is RIDICULOUS!
jpnChrName: ──いい加減にしろ！！
jpnSearchText: ──いい加減にしろ！！

engChrName: You've had more than enough time! Why are the calculations still not done?!
engSearchText:
You've had more than enough time! Why are the
calculations still not done?!
jpnChrName: いつまで計算に 時間を掛けているつもりだ！？
jpnSearchText:
いつまで計算に
時間を掛けているつもりだ！？

engChrName: B-But, Professor, it's impossible to be any more precise with our current equipment!
engSearchText:
B-But, Professor, it's impossible to be any more
precise with our current equipment!
jpnChrName: で、ですが現状の機材では これ以上の精度は無理です！
jpnSearchText:
で、ですが現状の機材では
これ以上の精度は無理です！

engChrName: Not even the most cutting-edge engineering science or orbal science will allow for—
engSearchText:
Not even the most cutting-edge engineering science
or orbal science will allow for—
jpnChrName: 現代物理工学、 最新導力工学の見地からも──
jpnSearchText:
現代物理工学、
最新導力工学の見地からも──

engChrName: I will not be told what is or isn't possible by ASSISTANTS! We knew about an inevitable lack of precision going into this!
engSearchText:
I will not be told what is or isn't possible
by ASSISTANTS! We knew about an inevitable lack
of precision going into this!
jpnChrName: 助手風情が私に講釈をたれるのか！？ 精度不足は分かり切っていたはずだ！
jpnSearchText:
助手風情が私に講釈をたれるのか！？
精度不足は分かり切っていたはずだ！

engChrName: The theory is complete—now do your job and find a way to realize it! It's as simple as that!
engSearchText:
The theory is complete—now do your job and find a
way to realize it! It's as simple as that!
jpnChrName: “理論”はすでに構築済み── どう実現するかは君たちの役割だろう！？
jpnSearchText:
“理論”はすでに構築済み──
どう実現するかは君たちの役割だろう！？

engChrName: You are working in the finest laboratory in all of Calvard, and it is high time that you started thinking like it!
engSearchText:
You are working in the finest laboratory in all of
Calvard, and it is high time that you started thinking
like it!
jpnChrName: カルバード最高の研究室に 所属している自覚を持ちたまえ！！
jpnSearchText:
カルバード最高の研究室に
所属している自覚を持ちたまえ！！

engChrName: Mmgh... Whatever. I'll be back to hear your results in the morning. Just get to making progress!
engSearchText:
Mmgh... Whatever. I'll be back to hear your results in
the morning. Just get to making progress!
jpnChrName: もういい──明朝結果を聞くから 可能な限り進めておけ、いいな！！
jpnSearchText:
もういい──明朝結果を聞くから
可能な限り進めておけ、いいな！！

engChrName: *sigh* Not another all-nighter...
engSearchText: *sigh* Not another all-nighter...
jpnChrName: ……はあ、また徹夜か……
jpnSearchText: ……はあ、また徹夜か……

engChrName: I didn't think losing to Professor Cronkite would push him this far off the deep end...
engSearchText:
I didn't think losing to Professor Cronkite would
push him this far off the deep end...
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授に負けたからって 余裕なさすぎでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授に負けたからって
余裕なさすぎでしょう……

engChrName: *sigh* I don't disagree, but complaining isn't gonna get us anywhere. All we can do is get back to work...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I don't disagree, but complaining isn't gonna
get us anywhere. All we can do is get back to work...
jpnChrName: ……愚痴っても仕方ない…… 僕たちは進めるしか……
jpnSearchText:
……愚痴っても仕方ない……
僕たちは進めるしか……

engChrName: I knew it. This is the best time of day to see the Great Schedar Triangle.
engSearchText:
I knew it. This is the best time of day to see the Great
Schedar Triangle.
jpnChrName: シェダル大三角── やっぱりこの時間がベストかな。
jpnSearchText:
シェダル大三角──
やっぱりこの時間がベストかな。

engChrName: I just wish there was a little less cloud cover...
engSearchText: I just wish there was a little less cloud cover...
jpnChrName: もう少し雲が少なければ もっと良かったけど。
jpnSearchText:
もう少し雲が少なければ
もっと良かったけど。

engChrName: By the looks of it, their conjunction will be about ten months from now, so that should do it for my homework.
engSearchText:
By the looks of it, their conjunction will be about ten
months from now, so that should do it for
my homework.
jpnChrName: 宿題だった“合”のタイミングは およそ１０ヶ月後、か……
jpnSearchText:
宿題だった“合”のタイミングは
およそ１０ヶ月後、か……

engChrName: I just hope she'll be back before then...
engSearchText: I just hope she'll be back before then...
jpnChrName: ……それまでに 帰ってくるといいんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
……それまでに
帰ってくるといいんだけど。

engChrName: Who will be back?
engSearchText: Who will be back?
jpnChrName: カエッテクル？
jpnSearchText: カエッテクル？

engChrName: Oh, don't mind me. It's nothing.
engSearchText: Oh, don't mind me. It's nothing.
jpnChrName: ゴメン、何でもないさ。
jpnSearchText: ゴメン、何でもないさ。

engChrName: GRR... RUFF!
engSearchText: GRR... RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲ……ＢＯＷ．
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲ……ＢＯＷ．

engChrName: They said, 'Are you all right?'
engSearchText: They said, 'Are you all right?'
jpnChrName: 『問題ナイカ？』ト告ゲテイル。
jpnSearchText: 『問題ナイカ？』ト告ゲテイル。

engChrName: Heh. Yeah, I'm fine. How could I not be when I've got the two of you?
engSearchText:
Heh. Yeah, I'm fine. How could I not be when I've
got the two of you?
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、大丈夫。 ＦＩＯにＸＥＲＯＳも一緒だからね。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、大丈夫。
ＦＩＯにＸＥＲＯＳも一緒だからね。

engChrName: And I'm not a child anymore. I can keep things safe in Gran's absence.
engSearchText:
And I'm not a child anymore. I can keep things safe
in Gran's absence.
jpnChrName: もう、子供じゃないんだ。 グランマ（おばあちゃん）の留守くらいしっかり守らないと。
jpnSearchText:
もう、子供じゃないんだ。
グランマ（おばあちゃん）の留守くらいしっかり守らないと。

engChrName: Aidios above, you're too young to always be so serious.
engSearchText:
Aidios above, you're too young to always be
so serious.
jpnChrName: ったく、ガキが一丁前に ナマ言ってんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、ガキが一丁前に
ナマ言ってんじゃねえ。

engChrName: Hey there. How's it going so far?
engSearchText: Hey there. How's it going so far?
jpnChrName: よう、調子はどんなもんだ？
jpnSearchText: よう、調子はどんなもんだ？

engChrName: I assume you mean with the new lens? I couldn't try it out fast enough.
engSearchText:
I assume you mean with the new lens? I couldn't try it
out fast enough.
jpnChrName: 親方……新型レンズなら さっそく試させてもらってます。
jpnSearchText:
親方……新型レンズなら
さっそく試させてもらってます。

engChrName: It's accurate to 0.03 microarge. The engineers of the Artisanal District really are second to none.
engSearchText:
It's accurate to 0.03 microarge. The engineers of the
Artisanal District really are second to none.
jpnChrName: 誤差0.03μａ（ﾏｲｸﾛｱｰｼﾞｭ）以内の高精度── 流石は職人街の皆さんですね。
jpnSearchText:
誤差0.03μａ（ﾏｲｸﾛｱｰｼﾞｭ）以内の高精度──
流石は職人街の皆さんですね。

engChrName: Haha! Wasn't gonna settle for less than perfect on one of the professor's homework assignments.
engSearchText:
Haha! Wasn't gonna settle for less than perfect on
one of the professor's homework assignments.
jpnChrName: ガハハ、たりめぇだ。 博士の宿題の一つだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ガハハ、たりめぇだ。
博士の宿題の一つだからな。

engChrName: But I was really asking about you. You sure you're not working yourself too hard lately?
engSearchText:
But I was really asking about you. You sure you're
not working yourself too hard lately?
jpnChrName: じゃなくてお前さんの話だよ。 ……最近、根詰めすぎてねえか？
jpnSearchText:
じゃなくてお前さんの話だよ。
……最近、根詰めすぎてねえか？

engChrName: I'm fine—honestly, I am. But thank you for always caring about me.
engSearchText:
I'm fine—honestly, I am. But thank you for always
caring about me.
jpnChrName: いえ、このくらいは余裕ですよ。 ……すみません、いつも気遣ってもらって。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、このくらいは余裕ですよ。
……すみません、いつも気遣ってもらって。

engChrName: It means a lot—especially since I'm sure you already have your hands full with work from above as it is.
engSearchText:
It means a lot—especially since I'm sure you already
have your hands full with work from above as it is.
jpnChrName: でも、いいんですか？ 上も煩いでしょうに、僕なんかのために──
jpnSearchText:
でも、いいんですか？
上も煩いでしょうに、僕なんかのために──

engChrName: Oh, I won't hear a word of that. You just leave worrying about that kinda stuff to me.
engSearchText:
Oh, I won't hear a word of that. You just leave
worrying about that kinda stuff to me.
jpnChrName: だからガキが細けぇことを気にすんな。
jpnSearchText: だからガキが細けぇことを気にすんな。

engChrName: Everyone's got their role to play in the world, whether it's as a researcher or as an engineer.
engSearchText:
Everyone's got their role to play in the world, whether
it's as a researcher or as an engineer.
jpnChrName: ──研究者には研究者の、 技術屋には技術屋の本分ってのがある。
jpnSearchText:
──研究者には研究者の、
技術屋には技術屋の本分ってのがある。

engChrName: And we wouldn't be fit to call ourselves artisans of Basel if we weren't willing to come help the professor's favorite student.
engSearchText:
And we wouldn't be fit to call ourselves artisans of
Basel if we weren't willing to come help the
professor's favorite student.
jpnChrName: ましてや博士の秘蔵っ子を手伝わないなんざ、 バーゼル職人の名が廃るってもんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ましてや博士の秘蔵っ子を手伝わないなんざ、
バーゼル職人の名が廃るってもんだろう。

engChrName: Well, uh...thank you very much, then.
engSearchText: Well, uh...thank you very much, then.
jpnChrName: ……親方…… ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
……親方……
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Oh! Excuse me.
engSearchText: Oh! Excuse me.
jpnChrName: と、すみません。
jpnSearchText: と、すみません。

engChrName: ...Mr. Tausend? What could the CEO want with someone like me?
engSearchText:
...Mr. Tausend? What could the CEO want with
someone like me?
jpnChrName: ……タウゼントＣＥＯ？ 僕なんかにどうして──……
jpnSearchText:
……タウゼントＣＥＯ？
僕なんかにどうして──……

engChrName: What?! Hold on a second! What do you—
engSearchText: What?! Hold on a second! What do you—
jpnChrName: っ……！？　待ってください、 どうして急にそんな……！
jpnSearchText:
っ……！？　待ってください、
どうして急にそんな……！

engChrName: But th-this is the professor's—I'm on my way!
engSearchText: But th-this is the professor's—I'm on my way!
jpnChrName: で、ですがここは博士の── っ……とにかくすぐ伺います……！
jpnSearchText:
で、ですがここは博士の──
っ……とにかくすぐ伺います……！

engChrName: Ugh... What nasty crap is Tausend up to this time?
engSearchText: Ugh... What nasty crap is Tausend up to this time?
jpnChrName: タウゼントめ…… ロクでもねえことを考えつきやがったな？
jpnSearchText:
タウゼントめ……
ロクでもねえことを考えつきやがったな？

engChrName: October 23rd, 4:02PM
engSearchText: October 23rd, 4:02PM

engChrName: Here we are: the Basel Institute of Science. The place where much of the Republic's most cutting-edge research gets done.
engSearchText:
Here we are: the Basel Institute of Science. The place
where much of the Republic's most cutting-edge
research gets done.
jpnChrName: ここが共和国最高峰の学術研究機関…… 《バーゼル理科大学》ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ここが共和国最高峰の学術研究機関……
《バーゼル理科大学》ですね。

engChrName: It's situated in such a beautiful location, too. The views of the canyon from here are just stunning.
engSearchText:
It's situated in such a beautiful location, too.
The views of the canyon from here are just stunning.
jpnChrName: ふふ、峡谷地帯が一望できる 素晴らしいロケーションですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、峡谷地帯が一望できる
素晴らしいロケーションですね。

engChrName: Yeah. This area's supposed to be popular with tourists for exactly that reason—though even they need a card right now.
engSearchText:
Yeah. This area's supposed to be popular with tourists
for exactly that reason—though even they need a card
right now.
jpnChrName: 観光地としても人気みたいだな。 今は臨時カードが必要みたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
観光地としても人気みたいだな。
今は臨時カードが必要みたいだが。

engChrName: This isn't that bad of a spot to sightsee, I guess, but there's no real place to live it up in town.
engSearchText:
This isn't that bad of a spot to sightsee, I guess, but
there's no real place to live it up in town.
jpnChrName: 悪くはねぇが娯楽は少なそうだな、 どこか遊べる場所なんかは……
jpnSearchText:
悪くはねぇが娯楽は少なそうだな、
どこか遊べる場所なんかは……

engChrName: Oh, speaking of tourism!
engSearchText: Oh, speaking of tourism!
jpnChrName: あ、そういえば……！
jpnSearchText: あ、そういえば……！

engChrName: What's that rounded building over there? I've been wondering this whole time.
engSearchText:
What's that rounded building over there? I've been
wondering this whole time.
jpnChrName: ずっと気になってたんですけど あの丸い建物はなんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
ずっと気になってたんですけど
あの丸い建物はなんでしょう？

engChrName: That's the astronomy observatory.
engSearchText: That's the astronomy observatory.
jpnChrName: ああ、《天文台》だね。
jpnSearchText: ああ、《天文台》だね。

engChrName: That's a place where you look at the stars, right?
engSearchText: That's a place where you look at the stars, right?
jpnChrName: あ…… たしか星を観察するっていう？
jpnSearchText:
あ……
たしか星を観察するっていう？

engChrName: That's right. There's a very powerful telescope there that lets you see far more of them than you could with the naked eye.
engSearchText:
That's right. There's a very powerful telescope there
that lets you see far more of them than you could with
the naked eye.
jpnChrName: うん、肉眼より遙かに多くの星を 観測できる、高性能望遠鏡があってね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、肉眼より遙かに多くの星を
観測できる、高性能望遠鏡があってね。

engChrName: There are many who believe that astronomy is the discipline from which all others draw their roots, even if others disagree.
engSearchText:
There are many who believe that astronomy is the
discipline from which all others draw their roots, even
if others disagree.
jpnChrName: 諸説あるけど、天文学は全ての学問の 基礎になったとも言われているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
諸説あるけど、天文学は全ての学問の
基礎になったとも言われているんだ。

engChrName: It actually originated in the Central East, if you didn't know.
engSearchText:
It actually originated in the Central East, if you
didn't know.
jpnChrName: ちなみに発祥は大陸中東部だそうだね。
jpnSearchText: ちなみに発祥は大陸中東部だそうだね。

engChrName: Whoa! Really?!
engSearchText: Whoa! Really?!
jpnChrName: ！　そうなんですかっ……！
jpnSearchText: ！　そうなんですかっ……！

engChrName: Pretty sure they were big on stargazing in that fallen empire to the east back in the day, too.
engSearchText:
Pretty sure they were big on stargazing in that fallen
empire to the east back in the day, too.
jpnChrName: ハン、東の滅びた皇国でも 星見は盛んだったらしいが……
jpnSearchText:
ハン、東の滅びた皇国でも
星見は盛んだったらしいが……

engChrName: Heehee. This is turning out to be very educational.
engSearchText: Heehee. This is turning out to be very educational.
jpnChrName: ふふ、勉強になります。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、勉強になります。

engChrName: Ahem! So, where would you like to start? I'd be happy to show you around if you want.
engSearchText:
Ahem! So, where would you like to start? I'd be
happy to show you around if you want.
jpnChrName: コホン……それでどちらへ？ よかったらこのまま案内しますが。
jpnSearchText:
コホン……それでどちらへ？
よかったらこのまま案内しますが。

engChrName: Nah, it's fine. We're just gonna wander around for a while and see what we find.
engSearchText:
Nah, it's fine. We're just gonna wander around for a
while and see what we find.
jpnChrName: いや、ここまでで大丈夫だ。 見学がてらブラブラしたくてな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、ここまでで大丈夫だ。
見学がてらブラブラしたくてな。

engChrName: If you can tell us where the main facilities and research labs are, that'd be plenty.
engSearchText:
If you can tell us where the main facilities and
research labs are, that'd be plenty.
jpnChrName: 主だった施設と、研究室の場所だけ 教えてくれないか？
jpnSearchText:
主だった施設と、研究室の場所だけ
教えてくれないか？

engChrName: Well, if you're sure... They're marked on the building's map already, but here you go.
engSearchText:
Well, if you're sure... They're marked on the
building's map already, but here you go.
jpnChrName: ……そうですか？ 構内案内図に載っているくらいなら。
jpnSearchText:
……そうですか？
構内案内図に載っているくらいなら。

engChrName: Well, then. I've got work of my own to take care of, so I'll get going for now.
engSearchText:
Well, then. I've got work of my own to take care of,
so I'll get going for now.
jpnChrName: それでは── 僕も助手の仕事があるのでここで。
jpnSearchText:
それでは──
僕も助手の仕事があるのでここで。

engChrName: If anything comes up, you're always welcome to contact me on my Xipha.
engSearchText:
If anything comes up, you're always welcome to
contact me on my Xipha.
jpnChrName: 何かあったらまた ザイファで連絡していただければ。
jpnSearchText:
何かあったらまた
ザイファで連絡していただければ。

engChrName: Thanks.
engSearchText: Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、お疲れさん。
jpnSearchText: ああ、お疲れさん。

engChrName: Aww... I was hoping we could stay with him longer. He knows so many cool things.
engSearchText:
Aww... I was hoping we could stay with him longer.
He knows so many cool things.
jpnChrName: うーん、もうちょっと色々 お話を聞いてみたかったです。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、もうちょっと色々
お話を聞いてみたかったです。

engChrName: I feel the same way, but it would be...difficult.
engSearchText: I feel the same way, but it would be...difficult.
jpnChrName: そうですね、でも……
jpnSearchText: そうですね、でも……
