engChrName: Yeah. He's just gonna get in the way when we start poking our noses around in dark places.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He's just gonna get in the way when we start
poking our noses around in dark places.
jpnChrName: ま、後ろ暗い所を嗅ぎ回る時には どうしたって邪魔になるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、後ろ暗い所を嗅ぎ回る時には
どうしたって邪魔になるだろ。

engChrName: I doubt we're gonna get any new 4SPGs here, but here's hopin' we can learn more about this abusive professor, wherever they are.
engSearchText:
I doubt we're gonna get any new 4SPGs here, but
here's hopin' we can learn more about this abusive
professor, wherever they are.
jpnChrName: ああ、４ｓｐｇは出てなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText: ああ、４ｓｐｇは出てなさそうだが。

engChrName: Let's get to work. Remember to act casual and not make it obvious what we're here for.
engSearchText:
Let's get to work. Remember to act casual and not
make it obvious what we're here for.
jpnChrName: 例の“パワハラ教授”について それとなく調べながら回ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
例の“パワハラ教授”について
それとなく調べながら回ってみるぞ。

engChrName: Understood.
engSearchText: Understood.
jpnChrName: 了解しました──活動再開ですね。
jpnSearchText: 了解しました──活動再開ですね。

engChrName: I can't believe you managed to deceive your way past someone again...
engSearchText:
I can't believe you managed to deceive your way past
someone again...
jpnChrName: もう……またあんな風に 言いくるめて入るなんて。
jpnSearchText:
もう……またあんな風に
言いくるめて入るなんて。

engChrName: Hey, nothin' I said was a lie. Not my fault if someone else takes what I said the wrong way.
engSearchText:
Hey, nothin' I said was a lie. Not my fault if someone
else takes what I said the wrong way.
jpnChrName: 別に嘘は言ってねぇだろ？ どう受け取るかは相手次第ってな。
jpnSearchText:
別に嘘は言ってねぇだろ？
どう受け取るかは相手次第ってな。

engChrName: Bet you tell yourself that every single time, huh?
engSearchText: Bet you tell yourself that every single time, huh?
jpnChrName: クク、否定はしねぇが しれっと具合が半端ねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、否定はしねぇが
しれっと具合が半端ねぇな。

engChrName: Yeah... You must be a real pro at this.
engSearchText: Yeah... You must be a real pro at this.
jpnChrName: うーん、よっぽど やり慣れてるんですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、よっぽど
やり慣れてるんですねっ。

engChrName: I mean...it's not something to be proud of.
engSearchText: I mean...it's not something to be proud of.
jpnChrName: いや……まあ、 感心するようなモンでは。
jpnSearchText:
いや……まあ、
感心するようなモンでは。

engChrName: Haha. As your sudden embarrassment suggests.
engSearchText: Haha. As your sudden embarrassment suggests.
jpnChrName: ふふ、目が泳がれましたね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、目が泳がれましたね。

engChrName: *sigh* I wish you would at least stop to think about the bad influence you might be having on Feri.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I wish you would at least stop to think about
the bad influence you might be having on Feri.
jpnChrName: ふう、もう少しフェリちゃんの 教育にも考慮して頂けると……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、もう少しフェリちゃんの
教育にも考慮して頂けると……

engChrName: So you're trying to blame all of this on me, are you?!
engSearchText: So you're trying to blame all of this on me, are you?!
jpnChrName: ──難癖をつける気かね、クロンカイト君！
jpnSearchText: ──難癖をつける気かね、クロンカイト君！

engChrName: Not at all. I am in no way trying to suggest your latest research is the cause.
engSearchText:
Not at all. I am in no way trying to suggest your latest
research is the cause.
jpnChrName: いえ──先生の最新研究が 原因だとは言っていません。
jpnSearchText:
いえ──先生の最新研究が
原因だとは言っていません。

engChrName: If anything, the approach you're taking with your latest project rather fascinates me.
engSearchText:
If anything, the approach you're taking with your
latest project rather fascinates me.
jpnChrName: それに先生の今回のアプローチは 個人的にもなかなか興味深くはある。
jpnSearchText:
それに先生の今回のアプローチは
個人的にもなかなか興味深くはある。

engChrName: ...Does it, now?
engSearchText: ...Does it, now?
jpnChrName: ……ほう？
jpnSearchText: ……ほう？

engChrName: That being said, work on my own project has reached a critical juncture.
engSearchText:
That being said, work on my own project has reached
a critical juncture.
jpnChrName: ──ですが、こちらのプロジェクトも そろそろ佳境に入っていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
──ですが、こちらのプロジェクトも
そろそろ佳境に入っていましてね。

engChrName: I cannot afford any issues with net traffic at this time.
engSearchText: I cannot afford any issues with net traffic at this time.
jpnChrName: 導力網はともかく、ネットトラフィックの トラブルだけは勘弁していただきたい。
jpnSearchText:
導力網はともかく、ネットトラフィックの
トラブルだけは勘弁していただきたい。

engChrName: Gah... That certainly sounds like blame to me, Cronkite!
engSearchText:
Gah... That certainly sounds like blame to
me, Cronkite!
jpnChrName: ッ……だからそれが 私のせいとでも言うのかね！？
jpnSearchText:
ッ……だからそれが
私のせいとでも言うのかね！？

engChrName: You may be one of Professor Hamilton's students, but that doesn't give you the right to—
engSearchText:
You may be one of Professor Hamilton's students, but
that doesn't give you the right to—
jpnChrName: 博士の門下だからといって これ以上の無礼は──
jpnSearchText:
博士の門下だからといって
これ以上の無礼は──

engChrName: So sorry for the delay!
engSearchText: So sorry for the delay!
jpnChrName: いや～、遅れてすみませんね。
jpnSearchText: いや～、遅れてすみませんね。

jpnChrName: ほう………
jpnSearchText: ほう………

engChrName: Who the devil are you? This is a restricted area, you know!
engSearchText:
Who the devil are you? This is a restricted area,
you know!
jpnChrName: なんだね、君たちは！？ ここは関係者以外立入禁止だぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
なんだね、君たちは！？
ここは関係者以外立入禁止だぞ！？

engChrName: Not to worry. We have permission to be here.
engSearchText: Not to worry. We have permission to be here.
jpnChrName: ええ、一応許可はもらってまして。
jpnSearchText: ええ、一応許可はもらってまして。

engChrName: Could either of you direct us to Professor David Callaghan's office?
engSearchText:
Could either of you direct us to Professor David
Callaghan's office?
jpnChrName: デビッド・キャラハン教授の 研究室ってのはどちらですかね？
jpnSearchText:
デビッド・キャラハン教授の
研究室ってのはどちらですかね？

engChrName: Ah! So you're the ones I just heard about.
engSearchText: Ah! So you're the ones I just heard about.
jpnChrName: 先ほどアポがあった…… そうか、君たちが。
jpnSearchText:
先ほどアポがあった……
そうか、君たちが。

engChrName: We're finished here, Cronkite. Now, if you would all follow me...
engSearchText:
We're finished here, Cronkite. Now, if you would all
follow me...
jpnChrName: 話はここまでだ、クロンカイト君。 それじゃあ君たちはこちらに──
jpnSearchText:
話はここまでだ、クロンカイト君。
それじゃあ君たちはこちらに──

engChrName: Yang—erm, Professors Cronkite and Callaghan!
engSearchText: Yang—erm, Professors Cronkite and Callaghan!
jpnChrName: ヤンに──いえクロンカイト教授に、 キャラハン教授も……
jpnSearchText:
ヤンに──いえクロンカイト教授に、
キャラハン教授も……

engChrName: ...Huh? Funny running into you guys here.
engSearchText: ...Huh? Funny running into you guys here.
jpnChrName: あれーっ？ どうしたのアニエスたち？
jpnSearchText:
あれーっ？
どうしたのアニエスたち？

engChrName: (...Whoops.)
engSearchText: (...Whoops.)

engChrName: (We could say the same thing...)
engSearchText: (We could say the same thing...)
jpnChrName: （カトル君にオデットたち……   どうしてここに……？）
jpnSearchText:
（カトル君にオデットたち……
どうしてここに……？）

engChrName: Mr. Arkride? Do you have business here?
engSearchText: Mr. Arkride? Do you have business here?
jpnChrName: アークライドさんたちも…… ？　どうして特別研究棟に……
jpnSearchText:
アークライドさんたちも……
？　どうして特別研究棟に……

engChrName: Quatre.
engSearchText: Quatre.
jpnChrName: ……カトルか。
jpnSearchText: ……カトルか。

engChrName: What are you doing here, Salision? And who are these people with you?
engSearchText:
What are you doing here, Salision? And who are
these people with you?
jpnChrName: サリシオン君……？ 誰だね、そちらの面々は。
jpnSearchText:
サリシオン君……？
誰だね、そちらの面々は。

engChrName: They are students here on an educational visitation from the capital. I've been assisting them during their stay.
engSearchText:
They are students here on an educational visitation
from the capital. I've been assisting them during
their stay.
jpnChrName: 首都から研修にきた学生さんたちです。 さっき相談を受けまして。
jpnSearchText:
首都から研修にきた学生さんたちです。
さっき相談を受けまして。

engChrName: Professor Cronkite was gracious enough to extend us an invitation to visit him when we happened to see each other in town.
engSearchText:
Professor Cronkite was gracious enough to extend us
an invitation to visit him when we happened to see
each other in town.
jpnChrName: ふふ、街でお会いした時に クロンカイト教授にお誘い頂いたので。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、街でお会いした時に
クロンカイト教授にお誘い頂いたので。

engChrName: So we asked Mr. Salision if he could lead the way. ❤
engSearchText: So we asked Mr. Salision if he could lead the way. ❤
jpnChrName: 何とか案内してもらえないかと サリシオン君にお願いしちゃいました❤
jpnSearchText:
何とか案内してもらえないかと
サリシオン君にお願いしちゃいました❤

engChrName: *sigh* I do not believe I invited anyone but you—nor did I imply we should meet quite this soon.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I do not believe I invited anyone but you—nor
did I imply we should meet quite this soon.
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ、すぐのつもりも、 君以外を誘ったつもりもなかったのだが。
jpnSearchText:
……やれやれ、すぐのつもりも、
君以外を誘ったつもりもなかったのだが。

engChrName: But I suppose chasing you away here would be more work than just humoring you. Very well. Follow me.
engSearchText:
But I suppose chasing you away here would be more
work than just humoring you. Very well. Follow me.
jpnChrName: まあ、ここで追い返すのも無駄が多いか。 来たまえ、案内しよう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ここで追い返すのも無駄が多いか。
来たまえ、案内しよう。

engChrName: Really?!
engSearchText: Really?!
jpnChrName: わわっ、いいんですか～？
jpnSearchText: わわっ、いいんですか～？

engChrName: It would be nothing short of incredible to see your work up close, Professor Cronkite!
engSearchText:
It would be nothing short of incredible to see your
work up close, Professor Cronkite!
jpnChrName: 名高きクロンカイト教授の研究を 拝見できるなんて光栄です……！
jpnSearchText:
名高きクロンカイト教授の研究を
拝見できるなんて光栄です……！

engChrName: ...Hmph.
engSearchText: ...Hmph.
jpnChrName: ……フン。
jpnSearchText: ……フン。

engChrName: Well, we'll get out of your hair now. We apologize for the interruption.
engSearchText:
Well, we'll get out of your hair now. We apologize for
the interruption.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それじゃあ。 お取込み中に失礼しました。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それじゃあ。
お取込み中に失礼しました。

engChrName: I can see that you're very busy, but it would be a pleasure to speak more on another occasion, Professor Callaghan.
engSearchText:
I can see that you're very busy, but it would be a
pleasure to speak more on another occasion,
Professor Callaghan.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授も──お忙しそうですが いずれ話を伺わせていただけると。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授も──お忙しそうですが
いずれ話を伺わせていただけると。

engChrName: ...Oh? Hmph. I suppose that can be arranged.
engSearchText: ...Oh? Hmph. I suppose that can be arranged.
jpnChrName: む……コホン、まあいいだろう。
jpnSearchText: む……コホン、まあいいだろう。

engChrName: It must be nice to have enough free time to spend on such frivolous nonsense as 'educational visitations.'
engSearchText:
It must be nice to have enough free time to spend on
such frivolous nonsense as 'educational visitations.'
jpnChrName: ふん、よく分からんが 研修などと呑気なものだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふん、よく分からんが
研修などと呑気なものだ。

engChrName: Well, come with me. I want to make this brief.
engSearchText: Well, come with me. I want to make this brief.
jpnChrName: まあいい、私の研究室に来たまえ。 手短に話を聞かせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい、私の研究室に来たまえ。
手短に話を聞かせてもらおう。

engChrName: Of course, Professor.
engSearchText: Of course, Professor.
jpnChrName: ああ、こちらこそお願いしますよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、こちらこそお願いしますよ。

engChrName: Wait.
engSearchText: Wait.
jpnChrName: ──待ってください。
jpnSearchText: ──待ってください。

engChrName: I'd like to listen in on this conversation, too, if you don't mind.
engSearchText:
I'd like to listen in on this conversation, too, if you
don't mind.
jpnChrName: その話……できれば僕も 立ち会わせてもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText:
その話……できれば僕も
立ち会わせてもらえませんか？

engChrName: As their guide, I suspect it has EVERYTHING to do with me.
engSearchText:
As their guide, I suspect it has EVERYTHING to do
with me.
jpnChrName: 一応、彼らを案内した身として 無関係ではなさそうなので。
jpnSearchText:
一応、彼らを案内した身として
無関係ではなさそうなので。

engChrName: Take a ten-minute break. Do not return late.
engSearchText: Take a ten-minute break. Do not return late.
jpnChrName: １０分休憩にする。 遅れずに戻るように。
jpnSearchText:
１０分休憩にする。
遅れずに戻るように。

engChrName: Y-Yes, Professor...
engSearchText: Y-Yes, Professor...

engChrName: Excuse us...
engSearchText: Excuse us...
jpnChrName: ……失礼します……
jpnSearchText: ……失礼します……

engChrName: As you know, my name is David Callaghan.
engSearchText: As you know, my name is David Callaghan.
jpnChrName: 改めて──デビッド・キャラハンだ。
jpnSearchText: 改めて──デビッド・キャラハンだ。

engChrName: I believe you're here to talk about Elsaim and Marduk investing in my research?
engSearchText:
I believe you're here to talk about Elsaim and Marduk
investing in my research?
jpnChrName: エルザイムとマルドゥック社から 投資がしたいという話だったな。
jpnSearchText:
エルザイムとマルドゥック社から
投資がしたいという話だったな。

engChrName: That makes for a very interesting combination, if you don't mind me saying. What exactly led to this?
engSearchText:
That makes for a very interesting combination, if you
don't mind me saying. What exactly led to this?
jpnChrName: 背景を考えると興味深い組み合わせだが、 どういう風の吹き回しかね？
jpnSearchText:
背景を考えると興味深い組み合わせだが、
どういう風の吹き回しかね？

engChrName: Is that what you were told? There seems to have been a misunderstanding, then.
engSearchText:
Is that what you were told? There seems to have been
a misunderstanding, then.
jpnChrName: あれ、そんな風に伝わってます？ だとしたら連絡の行き違いってヤツですか。
jpnSearchText:
あれ、そんな風に伝わってます？
だとしたら連絡の行き違いってヤツですか。

engChrName: We are currently working for Elsaim, and we do have a Marduk employee with us, but that's all.
engSearchText:
We are currently working for Elsaim, and we do have
a Marduk employee with us, but that's all.
jpnChrName: 確かに公国からの依頼で動いてますし ＭＫ社の出向スタッフも同行していますが。
jpnSearchText:
確かに公国からの依頼で動いてますし
ＭＫ社の出向スタッフも同行していますが。

engChrName: Wh-What...?
engSearchText: Wh-What...?
jpnChrName: な、なに……？
jpnSearchText: な、なに……？

engChrName: We're currently in the middle of an investigation, you see—and a lead happened to bring us here.
engSearchText:
We're currently in the middle of an investigation, you
see—and a lead happened to bring us here.
jpnChrName: あくまで俺たちは“調査”の一環で こちらに伺わせてもらっただけでして。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで俺たちは“調査”の一環で
こちらに伺わせてもらっただけでして。

engChrName: Wanted to follow up on a rumor that some extreme abuse of power has been taking place in a laboratory here.
engSearchText:
Wanted to follow up on a rumor that some extreme
abuse of power has been taking place in a
laboratory here.
jpnChrName: そう──とある研究室で相当悪質な パワハラが起きてるって噂の裏を取りに。
jpnSearchText:
そう──とある研究室で相当悪質な
パワハラが起きてるって噂の裏を取りに。

engChrName: Heh. That's the face of a guy who's got something to tell.
engSearchText:
Heh. That's the face of a guy who's got something
to tell.
jpnChrName: ハッ、その顔を見るに 心当たりありまくりみてぇだな？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、その顔を見るに
心当たりありまくりみてぇだな？

engChrName: ...Who asked you to investigate this?
engSearchText: ...Who asked you to investigate this?
jpnChrName: ……誰が、そんな依頼を出したのだね？
jpnSearchText: ……誰が、そんな依頼を出したのだね？

engChrName: Couldn't tell you—didn't leave their name. But they did tell us all about what's been happening.
engSearchText:
Couldn't tell you—didn't leave their name. But they
did tell us all about what's been happening.
jpnChrName: さて、匿名からの依頼だったんでね。 だが話は色々と聞かせてもらいました。
jpnSearchText:
さて、匿名からの依頼だったんでね。
だが話は色々と聞かせてもらいました。

engChrName: We've heard all about the ridiculous workloads and insane hours they and their colleagues have been forced to endure.
engSearchText:
We've heard all about the ridiculous workloads and
insane hours they and their colleagues have been
forced to endure.
jpnChrName: 助手たちに振った非常識な超過業務に 理不尽なスケジューリング……
jpnSearchText:
助手たちに振った非常識な超過業務に
理不尽なスケジューリング……

engChrName: About how they're never allowed any rest, are woefully underpaid, and how they receive vicious, constant verbal abuse from their superior.
engSearchText:
About how they're never allowed any rest, are
woefully underpaid, and how they receive vicious,
constant verbal abuse from their superior.
jpnChrName: 休みも取らせず、ロクな手当ても出さず、 人格を破壊するかのような言動の数々。
jpnSearchText:
休みも取らせず、ロクな手当ても出さず、
人格を破壊するかのような言動の数々。

engChrName: Even to the point that someone collapsed from overwork and has been driven to the brink of suicide.
engSearchText:
Even to the point that someone collapsed from
overwork and has been driven to the brink of suicide.
jpnChrName: 一部では過労で倒れ、自殺寸前まで 追い込まれた助手もいるんだとか……？
jpnSearchText:
一部では過労で倒れ、自殺寸前まで
追い込まれた助手もいるんだとか……？

engChrName: That's just...
engSearchText: That's just...
jpnChrName: っ……それは……
jpnSearchText: っ……それは……

engChrName: We have all the testimony and evidence we need to act if that's what it comes to.
engSearchText:
We have all the testimony and evidence we need to
act if that's what it comes to.
jpnChrName: ──証言、証拠は揃っている。 “最後の手段”に訴えるのは簡単だ。
jpnSearchText:
──証言、証拠は揃っている。
“最後の手段”に訴えるのは簡単だ。

engChrName: But we thought it better to come and hear your thoughts first.
engSearchText:
But we thought it better to come and hear your
thoughts first.
jpnChrName: ですが、先生自身の腹積もりも 確認しておこうかと思いましてね。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、先生自身の腹積もりも
確認しておこうかと思いましてね。

engChrName: ...Excuse me?
engSearchText: ...Excuse me?

engChrName: It's... It's not too late to turn things around.
engSearchText: It's... It's not too late to turn things around.
jpnChrName: その……まだ間に合うと思うんです。
jpnSearchText: その……まだ間に合うと思うんです。

engChrName: So many people we spoke to were quick to say that you weren't always like this.
engSearchText:
So many people we spoke to were quick to say that
you weren't always like this.
jpnChrName: 『あんな人じゃなかった』 『最初は何かの間違いと思った』
jpnSearchText:
『あんな人じゃなかった』
『最初は何かの間違いと思った』

engChrName: They mentioned how they almost had trouble believing just what you'd become.
engSearchText:
They mentioned how they almost had trouble
believing just what you'd become.
jpnChrName: 依頼内容や聞き込みでも、 そんな言葉を何度か聞きました。
jpnSearchText:
依頼内容や聞き込みでも、
そんな言葉を何度か聞きました。

engChrName: We could see how afraid people are of you now, and how they dislike what you've become...
engSearchText:
We could see how afraid people are of you now, and
how they dislike what you've become...
jpnChrName: えと……みんな怯えていて 恨んだり憎んだりしてましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
えと……みんな怯えていて
恨んだり憎んだりしてましたけど。

engChrName: ...but at the same time, we could see how deeply they respect you, too.
engSearchText:
...but at the same time, we could see how deeply they
respect you, too.
jpnChrName: それでも、同じくらい尊敬している “息吹”も伝わってきました。
jpnSearchText:
それでも、同じくらい尊敬している
“息吹”も伝わってきました。

engChrName: We're not heroes of justice like the cops or the guild.
engSearchText: We're not heroes of justice like the cops or the guild.
jpnChrName: 俺たちは警察やギルドみたいな 正義の味方じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちは警察やギルドみたいな
正義の味方じゃない。

engChrName: We're just about findin' common ground and puttin' things to right.
engSearchText:
We're just about findin' common ground and puttin'
things to right.
jpnChrName: こういうケースじゃ、 “落とし所”を探すのが流儀でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
こういうケースじゃ、
“落とし所”を探すのが流儀でしてね。

engChrName: Long as you're willing to work with us, we can—
engSearchText: Long as you're willing to work with us, we can—
jpnChrName: 先生の返答次第じゃ、 こちらで取り計らうことも──
jpnSearchText:
先生の返答次第じゃ、
こちらで取り計らうことも──

engChrName: That is ENOUGH!
engSearchText: That is ENOUGH!

engChrName: Don't talk to me about respect and then immediately resort to blackmail!
engSearchText:
Don't talk to me about respect and then
immediately resort to blackmail!
jpnChrName: 何が尊敬だ……！ やっていることはただの脅しだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
何が尊敬だ……！
やっていることはただの脅しだろう！？

engChrName: I cannot believe one of my assistants would try to set me up like this... Unbelievable!
engSearchText:
I cannot believe one of my assistants would try to set
me up like this... Unbelievable!
jpnChrName: 助手どもめ、誰だか知らんが この私を嵌めようとするとは……！
jpnSearchText:
助手どもめ、誰だか知らんが
この私を嵌めようとするとは……！

engChrName: I give them a golden chance to help me obtain glory beyond their imagination, and THIS is how they choose to repay me?!
engSearchText:
I give them a golden chance to help me
obtain glory beyond their imagination, and
THIS is how they choose to repay me?!
jpnChrName: 共に栄誉を掴ませてやろうという親心を こんな形で裏切るとはな！！
jpnSearchText:
共に栄誉を掴ませてやろうという親心を
こんな形で裏切るとはな！！

engChrName: How could you say that...?
engSearchText: How could you say that...?
jpnChrName: ……あなたは……
jpnSearchText: ……あなたは……

engChrName: You know we've got evidence of what you're doing, right? Sure you wanna pick this fight?
engSearchText:
You know we've got evidence of what you're
doing, right? Sure you wanna pick this fight?
jpnChrName: オイオイ、分かってんのか？ こっちには証言が揃ってんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ、分かってんのか？
こっちには証言が揃ってんだぜ？

engChrName: Do what you will with your 'evidence.' All I have to do is cover it up!
engSearchText:
Do what you will with your 'evidence.' All I have to
do is cover it up!
jpnChrName: 好きにするがいい、 いくらでも揉み消してやるわ！
jpnSearchText:
好きにするがいい、
いくらでも揉み消してやるわ！

engChrName: No one's going to believe some lowly assistants over an esteemed professor!
engSearchText:
No one's going to believe some lowly assistants over
an esteemed professor!
jpnChrName: 助手ごときの証言と教授である私、 世間は一体どちらを信じるかな！？
jpnSearchText:
助手ごときの証言と教授である私、
世間は一体どちらを信じるかな！？

engChrName: Professor...
engSearchText: Professor...

engChrName: I am one—no—two mere steps away from completing my research, and they pick now to sabotage my efforts?!
engSearchText:
I am one—no—two mere steps away from
completing my research, and they pick now to
sabotage my efforts?!
jpnChrName: 研究もあと一歩、いや二歩で届く── そんな時にこんな仕打ちを受けるとは……！
jpnSearchText:
研究もあと一歩、いや二歩で届く──
そんな時にこんな仕打ちを受けるとは……！

engChrName: Very well! Then damn the human cost! I'll start working them to the bone to make up for their—
engSearchText:
Very well! Then damn the human cost! I'll start
working them to the bone to make up for their—
jpnChrName: こうなったら擦り切れようが潰れようが、 遠慮なく働かせて──
jpnSearchText:
こうなったら擦り切れようが潰れようが、
遠慮なく働かせて──

engChrName: Just listen to yourself, Professor!
engSearchText: Just listen to yourself, Professor!
jpnChrName: いい加減にしてくださいっ！！ ──キャラハン先生っ！！
jpnSearchText:
いい加減にしてくださいっ！！
──キャラハン先生っ！！

engChrName: What has gotten into you?!
engSearchText: What has gotten into you?!
jpnChrName: 一体どうしてしまったんですか……！？
jpnSearchText: 一体どうしてしまったんですか……！？

engChrName: You used to be so kind and supportive! Professor Hamilton held you in such high regard!
engSearchText:
You used to be so kind and supportive!
Professor Hamilton held you in such high regard!
jpnChrName: あれだけ面倒見の良かった貴方が── 博士も一目置いていた貴方が！！
jpnSearchText:
あれだけ面倒見の良かった貴方が──
博士も一目置いていた貴方が！！

engChrName: Even though I was one of her students, you would still take the time to look after me...
engSearchText:
Even though I was one of her students, you would
still take the time to look after me...
jpnChrName: ハミルトン門下である僕にも 昔は色々と指南してくれて……
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン門下である僕にも
昔は色々と指南してくれて……

engChrName: I-I just can't understand why all you do lately is spit in the face of her achievements!
engSearchText:
I-I just can't understand why all you do lately is spit
in the face of her achievements!
jpnChrName: なのに最近は博士の功績を 否定するようなことばかり……！
jpnSearchText:
なのに最近は博士の功績を
否定するようなことばかり……！

engChrName: Quatre...
engSearchText: Quatre...
jpnChrName: カトル君……
jpnSearchText: カトル君……

engChrName: (I suspected as much.)
engSearchText: (I suspected as much.)

engChrName: ...Sorry. That's a private matter between us.
engSearchText: ...Sorry. That's a private matter between us.
jpnChrName: いえ、それはいい…… あくまで先生と僕たちの問題でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、それはいい……
あくまで先生と僕たちの問題でしょう。

engChrName: But please, at least stop and think about how you're treating the people who work under you.
engSearchText:
But please, at least stop and think about how you're
treating the people who work under you.
jpnChrName: でも──せめて考え直してください！
jpnSearchText: でも──せめて考え直してください！

engChrName: They took their positions because they dreamed of being like you—don't belittle them or their work!
engSearchText:
They took their positions because they dreamed of
being like you—don't belittle them or their work!
jpnChrName: 貴方に憧れて助手となった皆さんを、 どうか貶めないであげてください……！
jpnSearchText:
貴方に憧れて助手となった皆さんを、
どうか貶めないであげてください……！

engChrName: Salision...
engSearchText: Salision...
jpnChrName: ……サリシオン君………
jpnSearchText: ……サリシオン君………

engChrName: Don't tell me what I can and can't do, you third-rate apprentice!
engSearchText:
Don't tell me what I can and can't do, you
third-rate apprentice!
jpnChrName: 調子に乗るんじゃない、丁稚小僧が！！
jpnSearchText: 調子に乗るんじゃない、丁稚小僧が！！

engChrName: Quatre!
engSearchText: Quatre!
jpnChrName: カトル君……！？
jpnSearchText: カトル君……！？

engChrName: What do you think you're doing?!
engSearchText: What do you think you're doing?!
jpnChrName: なにを……！
jpnSearchText: なにを……！

engChrName: Listen, asshole...
engSearchText: Listen, asshole...
jpnChrName: おいおいオッサン……
jpnSearchText: おいおいオッサン……

engChrName: You're talking to the famous David Callaghan!
engSearchText: You're talking to the famous David Callaghan!
jpnChrName: 私はデビッド・キャラハンだぞ！？
jpnSearchText: 私はデビッド・キャラハンだぞ！？

engChrName: The preeminent scholar of engineering science and military technology who has long upheld the very foundation of this nation's national defense!
engSearchText:
The preeminent scholar of engineering science and
military technology who has long upheld the very
foundation of this nation's national defense!
jpnChrName: カルバードの国防を支えてきた 物理工学と軍事技術の第一人者だ！
jpnSearchText:
カルバードの国防を支えてきた
物理工学と軍事技術の第一人者だ！

engChrName: I've had enough of youngsters like Cronkite and Esmeray acting like they're above me after all I've achieved!
engSearchText:
I've had enough of youngsters like Cronkite and
Esmeray acting like they're above me after all
I've achieved!
jpnChrName: クロンカイトといいエスメレーといい、 若造どもがいい気になるのもこれまでだ！
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイトといいエスメレーといい、
若造どもがいい気になるのもこれまでだ！

engChrName: My latest research will propel Calvard to even greater heights—change the power balance of the entire continent!
engSearchText:
My latest research will propel Calvard to even greater
heights—change the power balance of the
entire continent!
jpnChrName: 私の最新研究は共和国を更に押し上げ、 いや大陸の勢力図すら一変させる……！
jpnSearchText:
私の最新研究は共和国を更に押し上げ、
いや大陸の勢力図すら一変させる……！

engChrName: Why can no one understand just how much of a privilege it is to help with that?!
engSearchText:
Why can no one understand just how much
of a privilege it is to help with that?!
jpnChrName: それが手伝える栄誉が何故分からないッ！？
jpnSearchText: それが手伝える栄誉が何故分からないッ！？

engChrName: Professor...
engSearchText: Professor...
jpnSearchText: ………先生…………

engChrName: Well, you're free to have whatever lofty goals you want...
engSearchText:
Well, you're free to have whatever lofty goals
you want...
jpnChrName: ……そのご高説はともかく。
jpnSearchText: ……そのご高説はともかく。

engChrName: ...but I think we've had our ten minutes. Don't you?
engSearchText: ...but I think we've had our ten minutes. Don't you?
jpnChrName: そろそろ１０分、 経つんじゃないですかね？
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ１０分、
経つんじゃないですかね？

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: We came here to explain the situation and offer a solution we thought would benefit everyone.
engSearchText:
We came here to explain the situation and offer a
solution we thought would benefit everyone.
jpnChrName: 自分たちはあくまで状況説明と “落とし所”の提案に来ただけですよ。
jpnSearchText:
自分たちはあくまで状況説明と
“落とし所”の提案に来ただけですよ。

engChrName: You're welcome to try and cover up all the evidence and testimonies we've gathered, but I promise you—it ain't gonna be easy.
engSearchText:
You're welcome to try and cover up all the evidence
and testimonies we've gathered, but I promise you—it
ain't gonna be easy.
jpnChrName: こちらには確たる証拠と証言がある。 揉み消すったって簡単じゃないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
こちらには確たる証拠と証言がある。
揉み消すったって簡単じゃないでしょう。

engChrName: If you're as close to this 'revolution' as you claim to be, then I'd give it another thinking through if I were you.
engSearchText:
If you're as close to this 'revolution' as you claim to
be, then I'd give it another thinking through if I
were you.
jpnChrName: ──“あと二歩”だっつうんなら なおさら検討してみちゃどうですかね？
jpnSearchText:
──“あと二歩”だっつうんなら
なおさら検討してみちゃどうですかね？

engChrName: ...Hmph. I am done wasting time with you.
engSearchText: ...Hmph. I am done wasting time with you.
jpnChrName: ………フン、話はこれで終わりだ。
jpnSearchText: ………フン、話はこれで終わりだ。

engChrName: I will be raising the issue of your illegal trespassing and appalling brazenness with Mr. Tausend.
engSearchText:
I will be raising the issue of your illegal trespassing
and appalling brazenness with Mr. Tausend.
jpnChrName: 今回の“不法侵入”と無礼の数々は タウゼントＣＥＯにも厳重抗議しておく。
jpnSearchText:
今回の“不法侵入”と無礼の数々は
タウゼントＣＥＯにも厳重抗議しておく。

engChrName: ...I admit that I may have been a little too harsh.
engSearchText: ...I admit that I may have been a little too harsh.
jpnChrName: ……若干言い過ぎたのは認めよう。
jpnSearchText: ……若干言い過ぎたのは認めよう。

engChrName: But as long as you intend to cling to Professor Hamilton instead of aiming for something more, I have no interest in you.
engSearchText:
But as long as you intend to cling to Professor
Hamilton instead of aiming for something more, I
have no interest in you.
jpnChrName: だがハミルトン門下に留まるなら これ以上君に興味はない。
jpnSearchText:
だがハミルトン門下に留まるなら
これ以上君に興味はない。

engChrName: Unless you now see the benefits of developing your talents under me after all?
engSearchText:
Unless you now see the benefits of developing your
talents under me after all?
jpnChrName: いや、それこそ私の下で才能を伸ばせるよう この機会に改めて勧誘しておこうか？
jpnSearchText:
いや、それこそ私の下で才能を伸ばせるよう
この機会に改めて勧誘しておこうか？

engChrName: I would wager that would be a far better use of your time than waiting like a little girl for an old woman who's long gone.
engSearchText:
I would wager that would be a far better use of your
time than waiting like a little girl for an old woman
who's long gone.
jpnChrName: ──帰ってこない年寄りを 女々しく待つより遙かに有意義だろう。
jpnSearchText:
──帰ってこない年寄りを
女々しく待つより遙かに有意義だろう。

engChrName: ...Excuse me!
engSearchText: ...Excuse me!
jpnChrName: っ…… ……失礼します……！
jpnSearchText:
っ……
……失礼します……！

engChrName: Quatre!
engSearchText: Quatre!
jpnChrName: カトル君……！
jpnSearchText: カトル君……！

engChrName: ...Pardon us.
engSearchText: ...Pardon us.
jpnChrName: ……失礼致します。
jpnSearchText: ……失礼致します。

engChrName: Like a little girl...
engSearchText: Like a little girl...
jpnChrName: ……女々しく、か……
jpnSearchText: ……女々しく、か……

engChrName: There you are.
engSearchText: There you are.
jpnChrName: ──ここだったか。
jpnSearchText: ──ここだったか。

engChrName: So this is what it looks like inside, huh?
engSearchText: So this is what it looks like inside, huh?
jpnChrName: へえ、中はこうなってたのかよ。
jpnSearchText: へえ、中はこうなってたのかよ。

engChrName: It's so cool seeing the observatory... Ah! Is that the telescope?
engSearchText:
It's so cool seeing the observatory... Ah! Is that
the telescope?
jpnChrName: これが天文台…… あっ、あれが“望遠鏡”ですかっ？
jpnSearchText:
これが天文台……
あっ、あれが“望遠鏡”ですかっ？

engChrName: That's right. Professor Hamilton had it specially made.
engSearchText:
That's right. Professor Hamilton had it
specially made.
jpnChrName: うん……博士の特注品でね。
jpnSearchText: うん……博士の特注品でね。

engChrName: I'm sorry you had to witness that earlier...but I'm impressed you knew where to find me.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry you had to witness that earlier...but I'm
impressed you knew where to find me.
jpnChrName: すみません、さっきは見苦しい所を。 ……よくここが分かりましたね？
jpnSearchText:
すみません、さっきは見苦しい所を。
……よくここが分かりましたね？

engChrName: Just had a feeling.
engSearchText: Just had a feeling.
jpnChrName: ま、なんとなくな。
jpnSearchText: ま、なんとなくな。

engChrName: We're happy to forget what we saw as long as you forget about us forcin' our way into the research building.
engSearchText:
We're happy to forget what we saw as long as you
forget about us forcin' our way into the
research building.
jpnChrName: おっと、見苦しいのは忘れるから こっちの研究棟入りも見逃してくれや。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、見苦しいのは忘れるから
こっちの研究棟入りも見逃してくれや。

engChrName: Van, behave...
engSearchText: Van, behave...
jpnChrName: も、もうヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: も、もうヴァンさん……

engChrName: Haha...
engSearchText: Haha...

engChrName: You can go ahead and have a seat over there. I'll go make us some tea.
engSearchText:
You can go ahead and have a seat over there. I'll go
make us some tea.
jpnChrName: 良かったらそっちに座ってください。 今、お茶を出しますから。
jpnSearchText:
良かったらそっちに座ってください。
今、お茶を出しますから。

engChrName: So there aren't actually any astronomy professors here?
engSearchText:
So there aren't actually any astronomy
professors here?
jpnChrName: ──じゃあ、今は天文学専攻の 教授はいらっしゃらないんですか……
jpnSearchText:
──じゃあ、今は天文学専攻の
教授はいらっしゃらないんですか……

engChrName: Not at the moment. I'm the only one who comes here every day right now.
engSearchText:
Not at the moment. I'm the only one who comes here
every day right now.
jpnChrName: うん、毎日寄るのは僕くらいかな。
jpnSearchText: うん、毎日寄るのは僕くらいかな。

engChrName: But there was a time when quite a few researchers and students who all adored Professor Hamilton would come.
engSearchText:
But there was a time when quite a few researchers
and students who all adored Professor Hamilton
would come.
jpnChrName: 昔は兄弟子に姉弟子、 博士を慕う学生や研究者たち……
jpnSearchText:
昔は兄弟子に姉弟子、
博士を慕う学生や研究者たち……

engChrName: Even Professor Callaghan would from time to time.
engSearchText: Even Professor Callaghan would from time to time.
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン教授なんかも 来てくれていたんだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
……キャラハン教授なんかも
来てくれていたんだけどね。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: He never used to be like he is now.
engSearchText: He never used to be like he is now.
jpnChrName: ……昔はあんな風じゃなかったんだ。
jpnSearchText: ……昔はあんな風じゃなかったんだ。

engChrName: He's always seen Professor Hamilton as a rival, sure...
engSearchText: He's always seen Professor Hamilton as a rival, sure...
jpnChrName: たしかにハミルトン博士に 対抗意識はあったんだろうけれど……
jpnSearchText:
たしかにハミルトン博士に
対抗意識はあったんだろうけれど……

engChrName: ...but it used to be the friendly kind of rivalry that was beneficial to both sides. He taught me so much, too.
engSearchText:
...but it used to be the friendly kind of rivalry that was
beneficial to both sides. He taught me so much, too.
jpnChrName: それでも、お互いに認め合って、 僕にも色々な事を教えてくれたから。
jpnSearchText:
それでも、お互いに認め合って、
僕にも色々な事を教えてくれたから。

engChrName: He really must have changed, then...
engSearchText: He really must have changed, then...
jpnChrName: そうなんですね……
jpnSearchText: そうなんですね……

engChrName: Yeah. From that to the uptight abusive asshole we saw earlier's some kinda fall.
engSearchText:
Yeah. From that to the uptight abusive asshole we
saw earlier's some kinda fall.
jpnChrName: ハン、あの余裕のなさそうな パワハラ野郎がねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、あの余裕のなさそうな
パワハラ野郎がねぇ。

engChrName: Professor Hamilton left the Republic two years ago, if I recall.
engSearchText:
Professor Hamilton left the Republic two years ago, if
I recall.
jpnChrName: ハミルトン博士……２年半前に 共和国を離れたと聞いていますが。
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン博士……２年半前に
共和国を離れたと聞いていますが。

engChrName: And you're one of her students?
engSearchText: And you're one of her students?
jpnChrName: さっきも言ってたが、 お前さんも博士の門下なんだな？
jpnSearchText:
さっきも言ってたが、
お前さんも博士の門下なんだな？

engChrName: That's right. I owe more to her than I can ever hope to repay.
engSearchText:
That's right. I owe more to her than I can ever hope
to repay.
jpnChrName: ええ、昔からお世話になっていて……
jpnSearchText: ええ、昔からお世話になっていて……

engChrName: I've been looking after the observatory and her house since she left the country.
engSearchText:
I've been looking after the observatory and her house
since she left the country.
jpnChrName: 博士が外国で研究を始めてからは 自宅や天文台の留守を任されています。
jpnSearchText:
博士が外国で研究を始めてからは
自宅や天文台の留守を任されています。

engChrName: Though I think it's debatable whether I'm doing a good job of it...
engSearchText:
Though I think it's debatable whether I'm doing a
good job of it...
jpnChrName: ……守れているかは怪しいですけどね。
jpnSearchText: ……守れているかは怪しいですけどね。

engChrName: The CEO of Verne, Mr. Tausend, is also one of the directors on the institute's board.
engSearchText:
The CEO of Verne, Mr. Tausend, is also one of the
directors on the institute's board.
jpnChrName: タウゼントＣＥＯからは── この大学の理事でもあるんですけれど。
jpnSearchText:
タウゼントＣＥＯからは──
この大学の理事でもあるんですけれど。

engChrName: And he told me that he's considering shutting this place down because so few people are using it...
engSearchText:
And he told me that he's considering shutting this
place down because so few people are using it...
jpnChrName: 利用者数の減少を理由に ここの閉鎖を打診されていますし……
jpnSearchText:
利用者数の減少を理由に
ここの閉鎖を打診されていますし……

engChrName: Oh, no...
engSearchText: Oh, no...

engChrName: So that's why you've been doing all kinds of miscellaneous tasks to score points with him?
engSearchText:
So that's why you've been doing all kinds of
miscellaneous tasks to score points with him?
jpnChrName: なるほど──だから諸々の雑用で 点数を稼ぐ必要が出てきたわけか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど──だから諸々の雑用で
点数を稼ぐ必要が出てきたわけか。

engChrName: That's awful...
engSearchText: That's awful...
jpnChrName: そう、だったんですね……
jpnSearchText: そう、だったんですね……

engChrName: ...I really am sorry about earlier, though. I ended up interfering in your investigation by jumping in, didn't I?
engSearchText:
...I really am sorry about earlier, though. I ended up
interfering in your investigation by jumping in,
didn't I?
jpnChrName: ……すみません、さっきは 引っ掻き回した形になってしまって。
jpnSearchText:
……すみません、さっきは
引っ掻き回した形になってしまって。

engChrName: If I hadn't said anything...
engSearchText: If I hadn't said anything...
jpnChrName: 僕が割り込んだりしなければ……
jpnSearchText: 僕が割り込んだりしなければ……

engChrName: Don't sweat it. We ended up getting some useful info outta that whole outburst.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it. We ended up getting some useful info
outta that whole outburst.
jpnChrName: ま、そっちも気にするな。 おかげで見えてきたこともある。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そっちも気にするな。
おかげで見えてきたこともある。

engChrName: My guess is you've noticed this by now, too...
engSearchText: My guess is you've noticed this by now, too...
jpnChrName: ──お前さんも 気づいてるんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
──お前さんも
気づいてるんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: ...but his piss-poor attitude isn't the only bad thing going on with him.
engSearchText:
...but his piss-poor attitude isn't the only bad thing
going on with him.
jpnChrName: あの先生が、パワハラとは別に “何か”をやらかしてるってのは。
jpnSearchText:
あの先生が、パワハラとは別に
“何か”をやらかしてるってのは。

engChrName: Y-You really think so?
engSearchText: Y-You really think so?
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか？
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですか？

engChrName: I have the same feeling.
engSearchText: I have the same feeling.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりそうなんですね。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱりそうなんですね。

engChrName: It would explain why someone so respected has stooped to such irrational behavior.
engSearchText:
It would explain why someone so respected has
stooped to such irrational behavior.
jpnChrName: それだけ尊敬もされていた人が 常軌を逸したような言動で……
jpnSearchText:
それだけ尊敬もされていた人が
常軌を逸したような言動で……

engChrName: Feels like the question is, what is he trying to do that he's willing to go so far off the deep end for it?
engSearchText:
Feels like the question is, what is he trying to do that
he's willing to go so far off the deep end for it?
jpnChrName: 形（なり）振り構わず、パワハラしてまで 何の研究をしてんのかって話だよな。
jpnSearchText:
形（なり）振り構わず、パワハラしてまで
何の研究をしてんのかって話だよな。

engChrName: The computer hardware in his laboratory was state of the art.
engSearchText:
The computer hardware in his laboratory was state of
the art.
jpnChrName: 研究室にあった最新演算器……
jpnSearchText: 研究室にあった最新演算器……

engChrName: I suspect he's using it to perform vast calculations.
engSearchText: I suspect he's using it to perform vast calculations.
jpnChrName: 何らかの“膨大な計算”を 行っているように見受けられました。
jpnSearchText:
何らかの“膨大な計算”を
行っているように見受けられました。

engChrName: The kind that would be equally difficult to properly manage.
engSearchText:
The kind that would be equally difficult to
properly manage.
jpnChrName: おそらくは尋常ではないレベルでの “制御”を必要とする分野での。
jpnSearchText:
おそらくは尋常ではないレベルでの
“制御”を必要とする分野での。

engChrName: I agree.
engSearchText: I agree.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、僕も同意見です。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ、僕も同意見です。

engChrName: I've never seen a simulation of this extent before— and it seemed even that wasn't getting the results he wanted.
engSearchText:
I've never seen a simulation of this extent before—
and it seemed even that wasn't getting the results
he wanted.
jpnChrName: あのレベルのシミュレーションは見た事がない…… しかも、それでもまだ足りないみたいだった。
jpnSearchText:
あのレベルのシミュレーションは見た事がない……
しかも、それでもまだ足りないみたいだった。

engChrName: (He couldn't be... No, but that would...)
engSearchText: (He couldn't be... No, but that would...)

engChrName: (...I see now.)
engSearchText: (...I see now.)
jpnChrName: （……なるほど、ひょっとして。）
jpnSearchText: （……なるほど、ひょっとして。）

engChrName: Well, we'd better keep an eye on that guy for a while.
engSearchText: Well, we'd better keep an eye on that guy for a while.
jpnChrName: ……とりあえず、あの先生から しばらく目を離さない方がよさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
……とりあえず、あの先生から
しばらく目を離さない方がよさそうだ。

engChrName: We ain't in Basel for that long, but we're gonna be here for the next couple of days, at least.
engSearchText:
We ain't in Basel for that long, but we're gonna be
here for the next couple of days, at least.
jpnChrName: こっちは明日明後日まで バーゼルに滞在する予定でな。
jpnSearchText:
こっちは明日明後日まで
バーゼルに滞在する予定でな。

engChrName: Feels like we can afford to scratch each other's backs a bit, yeah? Whether that CEO wants us to or not.
engSearchText:
Feels like we can afford to scratch each other's backs
a bit, yeah? Whether that CEO wants us to or not.
jpnChrName: ＣＥＯ殿の意向はともかく── お互い協力はできるんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
ＣＥＯ殿の意向はともかく──
お互い協力はできるんじゃないか？

engChrName: ...All right. I do have my doubts about you, but I believe that Agnès is worthy of my trust.
engSearchText:
...All right. I do have my doubts about you, but I
believe that Agnès is worthy of my trust.
jpnChrName: ……分かりました、貴方はともかく アニエスさんは信用できそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
……分かりました、貴方はともかく
アニエスさんは信用できそうですし。

engChrName: So if anything comes up, I'll be sure to let you know—to keep what the professor left behind safe, if nothing else.
engSearchText:
So if anything comes up, I'll be sure to let you
know—to keep what the professor left behind safe, if
nothing else.
jpnChrName: 博士の留守を守る意味でも── 何かあれば相談させて頂きますよ。
jpnSearchText:
博士の留守を守る意味でも──
何かあれば相談させて頂きますよ。

engChrName: *sigh* Nothin' comes from not bein' honest with yourself, y'know.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Nothin' comes from not bein' honest with
yourself, y'know.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、素直じゃないねぇ。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、素直じゃないねぇ。

engChrName: Heehee. We'll be counting on you, Quatre.
engSearchText: Heehee. We'll be counting on you, Quatre.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… よろしくお願いします、カトル君。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
よろしくお願いします、カトル君。

engChrName: Sure seems like he's being honest with himself to me. Not trusting you is the right call.
engSearchText:
Sure seems like he's being honest with himself to me.
Not trusting you is the right call.
jpnChrName: クク、殊勝になったじゃねえか？ まあコイツはともかくってのは同意だが。
jpnSearchText:
クク、殊勝になったじゃねえか？
まあコイツはともかくってのは同意だが。

engChrName: Oh, you are very much in the same boat with how boorish you are.
engSearchText:
Oh, you are very much in the same boat with how
boorish you are.
jpnChrName: ああ、貴方も同じかな？ なんか妙にオラついちゃってるし。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、貴方も同じかな？
なんか妙にオラついちゃってるし。

engChrName: 'Scuse me? You trying to pick a fight, kiddo?
engSearchText: 'Scuse me? You trying to pick a fight, kiddo?
jpnChrName: オラっ……… ハッ、上等じゃねえか小僧……？
jpnSearchText:
オラっ………
ハッ、上等じゃねえか小僧……？

engChrName: That's only proving my point, you know.
engSearchText: That's only proving my point, you know.
jpnChrName: だからそういう所がさ。
jpnSearchText: だからそういう所がさ。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Are you interested in the telescope?
engSearchText: Are you interested in the telescope?
jpnChrName: ああ…… 天体望遠鏡に興味があるかい？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
天体望遠鏡に興味があるかい？

engChrName: I-I just... I was just wondering what it's like, that's all.
engSearchText: I-I just... I was just wondering what it's like, that's all.
jpnChrName: あ、いえそんなっ…… ただ、どんな感じなのかな～って。
jpnSearchText:
あ、いえそんなっ……
ただ、どんな感じなのかな～って。

engChrName: Haha... It's only just past five o'clock, so we won't be getting a great view of the stars quite yet.
engSearchText:
Haha... It's only just past five o'clock, so we won't be
getting a great view of the stars quite yet.
jpnChrName: ふふ……まだ五時過ぎだから ちゃんとは見られないと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……まだ五時過ぎだから
ちゃんとは見られないと思うけど。

engChrName: But come with me—you still might be able to get a good view of the Great Schedar Triangle.
engSearchText:
But come with me—you still might be able to get a
good view of the Great Schedar Triangle.
jpnChrName: おいで、シェダル大三角だったら けっこう見えるかもしれないよ。
jpnSearchText:
おいで、シェダル大三角だったら
けっこう見えるかもしれないよ。

engChrName: Really?! Yay!
engSearchText: Really?! Yay!
jpnChrName: わあ、いいんですかっ？
jpnSearchText: わあ、いいんですかっ？

engChrName: Aww...
engSearchText: Aww...
jpnChrName: ふふっ……
jpnSearchText: ふふっ……

engChrName: Course the two kids of the group would hit it off.
engSearchText: Course the two kids of the group would hit it off.
jpnChrName: ケッ…… ガキ同士気が合ってやがんな。
jpnSearchText:
ケッ……
ガキ同士気が合ってやがんな。

engChrName: You're also still a damn kid from my perspective.
engSearchText: You're also still a damn kid from my perspective.
jpnChrName: 俺にしてみりゃお前も同じだっつの。
jpnSearchText: 俺にしてみりゃお前も同じだっつの。

engChrName: ...By the way, Agnès.
engSearchText: ...By the way, Agnès.
jpnChrName: ……そういや、アニエス。
jpnSearchText: ……そういや、アニエス。

engChrName: Was it just me, or did you seem surprised by somethin' when that professor was shoutin' up a storm?
engSearchText:
Was it just me, or did you seem surprised by
somethin' when that professor was shoutin' up
a storm?
jpnChrName: あの先生が怒鳴り散らした時、 何か驚いてなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
あの先生が怒鳴り散らした時、
何か驚いてなかったか？

engChrName: ...It wasn't just you.
engSearchText: ...It wasn't just you.
jpnChrName: ……はい、実は……
jpnSearchText: ……はい、実は……

engChrName: I cannot believe one of my assistants would try to set me up like this... Unbelievable!
engSearchText:
I cannot believe one of my assistants would try to set
me up like this... Unbelievable!
jpnChrName: 助手どもめ、誰だか知らんが この私を嵌めようとするとは……！
jpnSearchText:
助手どもめ、誰だか知らんが
この私を嵌めようとするとは……！

engChrName: I give them a golden chance to help me obtain glory beyond their imagination, and THIS is how they choose to repay me?!
engSearchText:
I give them a golden chance to help me
obtain glory beyond their imagination, and
THIS is how they choose to repay me?!
jpnChrName: 共に栄誉を掴ませてやろうという親心を こんな形で裏切るとはな！！
jpnSearchText:
共に栄誉を掴ませてやろうという親心を
こんな形で裏切るとはな！！

engChrName: So it picked then of all times to shine...
engSearchText: So it picked then of all times to shine...
jpnChrName: ……そんなタイミングで。
jpnSearchText: ……そんなタイミングで。

engChrName: It's not doing it now, though... Do you think it could just be a coincidence?
engSearchText:
It's not doing it now, though... Do you think it could
just be a coincidence?
jpnChrName: 今は光っていませんけど。 偶然、なんでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
今は光っていませんけど。
偶然、なんでしょうか……？

engChrName: ...You gotta wonder.
engSearchText: ...You gotta wonder.
jpnChrName: ……さて、な。
jpnSearchText: ……さて、な。

engChrName: Not like it'd be the first time it shone at an odd time. Like when we first ran into Grimcat.
engSearchText:
Not like it'd be the first time it shone at an odd time.
Like when we first ran into Grimcat.
jpnChrName: 今までも変なタイミングはあった。 あのグリムキャッツといい──
jpnSearchText:
今までも変なタイミングはあった。
あのグリムキャッツといい──

engChrName: Whoa! What's THIS room for?
engSearchText: Whoa! What's THIS room for?
jpnChrName: わわっ、何ここっ？
jpnSearchText: わわっ、何ここっ？

engChrName: Odette? What brings you all here?
engSearchText: Odette? What brings you all here?
jpnChrName: オデット、みんなも……
jpnSearchText: オデット、みんなも……

engChrName: Found you! We've been looking for all of you!
engSearchText: Found you! We've been looking for all of you!
jpnChrName: あ、いたいた。 探したよアニエス～、ヴァンさんたちも！
jpnSearchText:
あ、いたいた。
探したよアニエス～、ヴァンさんたちも！

engChrName: We couldn't find you anywhere in the main building, so we wondered if you might be here.
engSearchText:
We couldn't find you anywhere in the main building,
so we wondered if you might be here.
jpnChrName: 本棟で見つからなかったから ここじゃないかと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
本棟で見つからなかったから
ここじゃないかと思ってね。

engChrName: Heh. Sorry for puttin' you guys out.
engSearchText: Heh. Sorry for puttin' you guys out.
jpnChrName: そりゃわざわざご苦労さんだ。
jpnSearchText: そりゃわざわざご苦労さんだ。

engChrName: Well, not all of us are here for you.
engSearchText: Well, not all of us are here for you.
jpnChrName: フン、別にアンタに 会いに来たわけじゃないけどな。
jpnSearchText:
フン、別にアンタに
会いに来たわけじゃないけどな。

engChrName: So this is their giant telescope! I've seen one in the Imperial Museum, too, but it's so cool!
engSearchText:
So this is their giant telescope! I've seen one in the
Imperial Museum, too, but it's so cool!
jpnChrName: これが噂の大望遠鏡……！ 帝國博物館でも見ましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
これが噂の大望遠鏡……！
帝國博物館でも見ましたけど……

engChrName: Oooh! Can we take a look through it?!
engSearchText: Oooh! Can we take a look through it?!
jpnChrName: わあっ、ひょっとして 私たちも見れちゃったり……！？
jpnSearchText:
わあっ、ひょっとして
私たちも見れちゃったり……！？

engChrName: (It's nice seeing this place this lively again... It's been so long.)
engSearchText:
(It's nice seeing this place this lively again... It's been
so long.)
jpnChrName: （久しぶりだな……   ここがこんなに賑やかなのは。）
jpnSearchText:
（久しぶりだな……
ここがこんなに賑やかなのは。）

engChrName: October 23rd, 6:10PM
engSearchText: October 23rd, 6:10PM

engChrName: Again...?
engSearchText: Again...?
jpnChrName: ……またか。
jpnSearchText: ……またか。

engChrName: Some of our research was supposedly used in making it, too.
engSearchText:
Some of our research was supposedly used in making
it, too.
jpnChrName: うちの技術成果も 入ってるみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
うちの技術成果も
入ってるみたいだけど……

engChrName: What is it, FIO?
engSearchText: What is it, FIO?
jpnChrName: ……ＦＩＯ？
jpnSearchText: ……ＦＩＯ？

engChrName: October 23rd, 10:05PM
engSearchText: October 23rd, 10:05PM

engChrName: There you are. I'm glad you all came.
engSearchText: There you are. I'm glad you all came.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、お疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、お疲れ様です。

engChrName: Yep. Hey there.
engSearchText: Yep. Hey there.
jpnChrName: ああ、お前さんもな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、お前さんもな。

engChrName: Wait a sec. Haven't we met this chick?
engSearchText: Wait a sec. Haven't we met this chick?
jpnChrName: あん、そっちのソバカス眼鏡は……
jpnSearchText: あん、そっちのソバカス眼鏡は……

engChrName: That's right! Earlier today!
engSearchText: That's right! Earlier today!
jpnChrName: あれっ、昼間にお会いした……？
jpnSearchText: あれっ、昼間にお会いした……？

engChrName: Ohh! I remember you, too!
engSearchText: Ohh! I remember you, too!
jpnChrName: ああ～！　貴方たちは～！
jpnSearchText: ああ～！　貴方たちは～！

engChrName: I wasn't aware that you had already met.
engSearchText: I wasn't aware that you had already met.
jpnChrName: えっと、面識があったんですか？
jpnSearchText: えっと、面識があったんですか？

engChrName: This is Associate Professor Esmeray, another one of Professor Hamilton's students.
engSearchText:
This is Associate Professor Esmeray, another one
of Professor Hamilton's students.
jpnChrName: こちらは博士の直弟子の一人、 エスメレー准教授です。
jpnSearchText:
こちらは博士の直弟子の一人、
エスメレー准教授です。

engChrName: Heehee. That's meee. My full name is Esmeray Archette.
engSearchText:
Heehee. That's meee. My full name is
Esmeray Archette.
jpnChrName: えへへ、カトル君の姉弟子にあたる エスメレー・アーチェットで～す。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、カトル君の姉弟子にあたる
エスメレー・アーチェットで～す。

engChrName: What a surprise. So YOU are the problem solvers I've heard so much about.
engSearchText:
What a surprise. So YOU are the problem solvers I've
heard so much about.
jpnChrName: うーん、まさか貴方たちが 噂の裏解決屋さんだったなんて～……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、まさか貴方たちが
噂の裏解決屋さんだったなんて～……

engChrName: And one of you is just TOO ADOOORABLE!
engSearchText: And one of you is just TOO ADOOORABLE!
jpnChrName: あ～ん、さっきも思ったけど やっぱり可愛い～～❤
jpnSearchText:
あ～ん、さっきも思ったけど
やっぱり可愛い～～❤

engChrName: Aaah!
engSearchText: Aaah!
jpnChrName: はわっ……！？
jpnSearchText: はわっ……！？

engChrName: Please, Essy. This isn't the time for that.
engSearchText: Please, Essy. This isn't the time for that.
jpnChrName: エレ姉、そんな場合じゃないってば……
jpnSearchText: エレ姉、そんな場合じゃないってば……

engChrName: Umm... I did tell her to go home, but she insisted on staying to help us.
engSearchText:
Umm... I did tell her to go home, but she insisted on
staying to help us.
jpnChrName: その、先に帰るように言ったんですが どうしても協力したいって聞かなくって。
jpnSearchText:
その、先に帰るように言ったんですが
どうしても協力したいって聞かなくって。

engChrName: Hmph! Why must you be so cold, Quatre?
engSearchText: Hmph! Why must you be so cold, Quatre?
jpnChrName: む～、水臭いよ～カトル君は。
jpnSearchText: む～、水臭いよ～カトル君は。

engChrName: I could never abandon my little brother in his moment of need!
engSearchText:
I could never abandon my little brother in his
moment of need!
jpnChrName: お姉ちゃんとして、居合わせた以上は 放っておけるわけないでしょ～？
jpnSearchText:
お姉ちゃんとして、居合わせた以上は
放っておけるわけないでしょ～？

engChrName: 'Little brother'? We're just students under the same professor...
engSearchText:
'Little brother'? We're just students under the
same professor...
jpnChrName: お姉ちゃんって…… ただの姉弟子じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
お姉ちゃんって……
ただの姉弟子じゃない。

engChrName: What do you mean, 'just'? Here's what you get for being so mean! C'meeere!
engSearchText:
What do you mean, 'just'? Here's what you get for
being so mean! C'meeere!
jpnChrName: ただのなんてひどいっ…… そんなカトル君にはこうだ～！
jpnSearchText:
ただのなんてひどいっ……
そんなカトル君にはこうだ～！

engChrName: Oof! St-Stop that, please!
engSearchText: Oof! St-Stop that, please!
jpnChrName: わぷっ…… や、やめてよエレ姉っ……！
jpnSearchText:
わぷっ……
や、やめてよエレ姉っ……！

engChrName: Man... Think we could swap bodies for a sec, kiddo?
engSearchText: Man... Think we could swap bodies for a sec, kiddo?
jpnChrName: チッ、裏山ケシカラン小僧だな。
jpnSearchText: チッ、裏山ケシカラン小僧だな。

engChrName: Well, the more people familiar with this place that we have to show us around, the better.
engSearchText:
Well, the more people familiar with this place that we
have to show us around, the better.
jpnChrName: ま、構内に詳しいのが 他にもいるのは助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、構内に詳しいのが
他にもいるのは助かるぜ。

engChrName: The bigger our group, the higher our chances of finding this intruder we're here for.
engSearchText:
The bigger our group, the higher our chances of
finding this intruder we're here for.
jpnChrName: 侵入者ってのを探すにも 人手が必要だろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
侵入者ってのを探すにも
人手が必要だろうしな。

engChrName: That's true. I didn't see them directly, just to be clear.
engSearchText: That's true. I didn't see them directly, just to be clear.
jpnChrName: ……はい、 直接見たわけじゃありませんが……
jpnSearchText:
……はい、
直接見たわけじゃありませんが……

engChrName: But FIO's sensors detected an unregistered individual entering the building.
engSearchText:
But FIO's sensors detected an unregistered individual
entering the building.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯの高感度センサーが 未登録人物の侵入を感知したんです。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯの高感度センサーが
未登録人物の侵入を感知したんです。

engChrName: So they didn't use that stupid card to get in there?
engSearchText: So they didn't use that stupid card to get in there?
jpnChrName: あの七面倒くせぇカードも 使われてねぇって話だったな？
jpnSearchText:
あの七面倒くせぇカードも
使われてねぇって話だったな？

engChrName: It's also worth considering that the security system used here is too advanced for just anyone to be able to slip through it.
engSearchText:
It's also worth considering that the security system
used here is too advanced for just anyone to be able to
slip through it.
jpnChrName: こちらで採用されている警備システムは 容易に潜り抜けられるものではないかと。
jpnSearchText:
こちらで採用されている警備システムは
容易に潜り抜けられるものではないかと。

engChrName: I would consider that this could be FIO's sensors malfunctioning, but as it is a drone based on Xipha technology, I very much doubt it.
engSearchText:
I would consider that this could be FIO's sensors
malfunctioning, but as it is a drone based on Xipha
technology, I very much doubt it.
jpnChrName: 誤作動の可能性も──ザイファベースの 導力ドローンならば考えにくいでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
誤作動の可能性も──ザイファベースの
導力ドローンならば考えにくいでしょうし。

engChrName: The reading is correct. I am sure.
engSearchText: The reading is correct. I am sure.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯ、確カニ記録シタ。
jpnSearchText: ＦＩＯ、確カニ記録シタ。

engChrName: Well, let's see what we can do.
engSearchText: Well, let's see what we can do.
jpnChrName: ……ま、そういうことなら やるだけやってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、そういうことなら
やるだけやってみるか。

engChrName: We might find ourselves stumblin' on clues we couldn't find earlier today, if we're lucky.
engSearchText:
We might find ourselves stumblin' on clues we
couldn't find earlier today, if we're lucky.
jpnChrName: 場合によっちゃ、昼には見えてこなかった 手がかりなんかも見えてきそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
場合によっちゃ、昼には見えてこなかった
手がかりなんかも見えてきそうだ。

engChrName: We're takin' you two with us, but just be careful, okay?
engSearchText:
We're takin' you two with us, but just be
careful, okay?
jpnChrName: ──アンタたちも一応手伝ってもらうが くれぐれも気を付けてくれよ？
jpnSearchText:
──アンタたちも一応手伝ってもらうが
くれぐれも気を付けてくれよ？

engChrName: We'll be fine. We have FIO and XEROS with us, after all.
engSearchText:
We'll be fine. We have FIO and XEROS with us,
after all.
jpnChrName: こちらの心配は要りません。 ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳもいますしね。
jpnSearchText:
こちらの心配は要りません。
ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳもいますしね。

engChrName: Let's get to work!
engSearchText: Let's get to work!
jpnChrName: よ～し、はりきって行きましょ～！
jpnSearchText: よ～し、はりきって行きましょ～！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ．
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ．

engChrName: Engaging search mode.
engSearchText: Engaging search mode.
jpnChrName: 索敵モードニ移行スル。
jpnSearchText: 索敵モードニ移行スル。

engChrName: Wouldn't kill us to be more tense here.
engSearchText: Wouldn't kill us to be more tense here.
jpnChrName: ……微妙に緊張感がねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ……微妙に緊張感がねぇな。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: The institute is so...moody at this time of night.
engSearchText: The institute is so...moody at this time of night.
jpnChrName: ……夜の学校って、 ちょっと雰囲気ありますね。
jpnSearchText:
……夜の学校って、
ちょっと雰囲気ありますね。

engChrName: Oh? Feelin' scared?
engSearchText: Oh? Feelin' scared?
jpnChrName: なんだ、怖くなったか？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、怖くなったか？

engChrName: O-Of course not! A Kruga warrior would never be afraid of something like ghosts!
engSearchText:
O-Of course not! A Kruga warrior would never be
afraid of something like ghosts!
jpnChrName: ま、まさか、クルガ戦士は オバケになんか負けませんっ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさか、クルガ戦士は
オバケになんか負けませんっ。

engChrName: I-I'm not remembering all the ghost stories I heard at school or anything. That would be s-silly!
engSearchText:
I-I'm not remembering all the ghost stories I heard at
school or anything. That would be s-silly!
jpnChrName: 七耀寺院で聞いた怪談話を 思い出したとかないですからっ！
jpnSearchText:
七耀寺院で聞いた怪談話を
思い出したとかないですからっ！

engChrName: All right, all right.
engSearchText: All right, all right.
jpnChrName: 分かった分かった。
jpnSearchText: 分かった分かった。

engChrName: Small quantity of residual shards detected.
engSearchText: Small quantity of residual shards detected.
jpnChrName: 微量ナ残留シャード反応ヲ感知。
jpnSearchText: 微量ナ残留シャード反応ヲ感知。

engChrName: Shards? Here?
engSearchText: Shards? Here?
jpnChrName: シャードだって……？ こんなところに？
jpnSearchText:
シャードだって……？
こんなところに？

engChrName: So someone used their Xipha here?
engSearchText: So someone used their Xipha here?
jpnChrName: 誰かがここでザイファを 使ったってことですか？
jpnSearchText:
誰かがここでザイファを
使ったってことですか？

engChrName: Let's have a quick look around just in case.
engSearchText: Let's have a quick look around just in case.
jpnChrName: ……とにかく軽く調べるか。
jpnSearchText: ……とにかく軽く調べるか。

engChrName: The cafeteria's empty, huh?
engSearchText: The cafeteria's empty, huh?
jpnChrName: 食堂は空、みたいですね。
jpnSearchText: 食堂は空、みたいですね。

engChrName: Whew... I can't sense anyone here, either.
engSearchText: Whew... I can't sense anyone here, either.
jpnChrName: ふう…… 人の気配も特にありません。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
人の気配も特にありません。

engChrName: By the way, was that green-haired girl the only one left in the building when we got here, apart from our intruder?
engSearchText:
By the way, was that green-haired girl the only one
left in the building when we got here, apart from
our intruder?
jpnChrName: そういや、あの姉弟子の他に 構内に残ってる奴はいないのか？
jpnSearchText:
そういや、あの姉弟子の他に
構内に残ってる奴はいないのか？

engChrName: Not quite. Professor Cronkite already returned home for the day, so he won't be here...
engSearchText:
Not quite. Professor Cronkite already returned home
for the day, so he won't be here...
jpnChrName: ええ、今日はヤン兄── クロンカイト教授も帰ったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、今日はヤン兄──
クロンカイト教授も帰ったみたいで。

engChrName: ...but there are also several security guards, along with Professor Callaghan and his assistants.
engSearchText:
...but there are also several security guards, along with
Professor Callaghan and his assistants.
jpnChrName: 残っているのは警備の人が数名と…… キャラハン教授たちくらいでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
残っているのは警備の人が数名と……
キャラハン教授たちくらいでしょうか。

engChrName: I tried calling out to them from the other side of the door, but they were too focused on their work to notice.
engSearchText:
I tried calling out to them from the other side of the
door, but they were too focused on their work
to notice.
jpnChrName: 扉越しに声はかけたんですが、 ……その、没頭していたみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
扉越しに声はかけたんですが、
……その、没頭していたみたいで。

engChrName: No surprise there, I guess.
engSearchText: No surprise there, I guess.
jpnChrName: そうですか……
jpnSearchText: そうですか……

engChrName: Well, let's just put them out of our minds for the time being.
engSearchText:
Well, let's just put them out of our minds for the
time being.
jpnChrName: まあ、今は放っておくしかねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、今は放っておくしかねぇだろ。

engChrName: Professor Hamilton's students sure are an eclectic bunch, huh? You included.
engSearchText:
Professor Hamilton's students sure are an eclectic
bunch, huh? You included.
jpnChrName: しかしハミルトン門下ってのは お前さんも含めて個性的なのばかりだな。
jpnSearchText:
しかしハミルトン門下ってのは
お前さんも含めて個性的なのばかりだな。

engChrName: I don't want to hear that from you... Still, I think that just goes to show how open-minded she is.
engSearchText:
I don't want to hear that from you... Still, I think that
just goes to show how open-minded she is.
jpnChrName: 貴方に言われたくないんですが…… ひとえに博士の懐の深さなんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
貴方に言われたくないんですが……
ひとえに博士の懐の深さなんでしょう。

engChrName: She doesn't care about race, upbringing, or anything other than finding the good in everyone, then working to better bring it out.
engSearchText:
She doesn't care about race, upbringing, or anything
other than finding the good in everyone, then
working to better bring it out.
jpnChrName: 人種や生まれにとらわれず、 その人の良さを見つけて、育てて……
jpnSearchText:
人種や生まれにとらわれず、
その人の良さを見つけて、育てて……

engChrName: Everyone knows her as the mother of the Orbal Revolution, but even to this day, she's striving to develop technology to help those in need.
engSearchText:
Everyone knows her as the mother of the Orbal
Revolution, but even to this day, she's striving to
develop technology to help those in need.
jpnChrName: 導力革命の母であることはもちろんですが、 困っている人のために技術を編み出して。
jpnSearchText:
導力革命の母であることはもちろんですが、
困っている人のために技術を編み出して。

engChrName: On top of that, she's kind, considerate... I've never met anyone like her.
engSearchText:
On top of that, she's kind, considerate... I've never
met anyone like her.
jpnChrName: 優しくて、思いやりがあって…… 凄い人なんです、本当に。
jpnSearchText:
優しくて、思いやりがあって……
凄い人なんです、本当に。

engChrName: She sounds amazing. She was the one responsible for reviving and expanding Tharbad's oasis, too, wasn't she?
engSearchText:
She sounds amazing. She was the one responsible for
reviving and expanding Tharbad's oasis, too,
wasn't she?
jpnChrName: サルバッドのオアシスもだとか。 えへへ、本当に立派な方なんですね。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドのオアシスもだとか。
えへへ、本当に立派な方なんですね。

engChrName: I can really tell just how much you respect her.
engSearchText: I can really tell just how much you respect her.
jpnChrName: 尊敬してるんだな、本当に。
jpnSearchText: 尊敬してるんだな、本当に。

engChrName: I could never NOT respect her.
engSearchText: I could never NOT respect her.
jpnChrName: ええ、当たり前でしょう？
jpnSearchText: ええ、当たり前でしょう？

engChrName: (This feels like...)
engSearchText: (This feels like...)
jpnChrName: （……この感じは……）
jpnSearchText: （……この感じは……）

engChrName: So the house we visited earlier today is where Mr. Salision and Professor Hamilton live, then?
engSearchText:
So the house we visited earlier today is where Mr.
Salision and Professor Hamilton live, then?
jpnChrName: では……昼に訪れたのがカトル様と ハミルトン博士のご自宅だったのですね。
jpnSearchText:
では……昼に訪れたのがカトル様と
ハミルトン博士のご自宅だったのですね。

engChrName: That's right. The professor took him in nine years ago, and he's been living with her since.
engSearchText:
That's right. The professor took him in nine years
ago, and he's been living with her since.
jpnChrName: ええ、カトル君は９年くらい前に とある事情で博士が引き取ったんです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、カトル君は９年くらい前に
とある事情で博士が引き取ったんです。

engChrName: The two of them, along with me and Professor Cronkite, are like a family now.
engSearchText:
The two of them, along with me and Professor
Cronkite, are like a family now.
jpnChrName: わたしとクロンカイト先輩も含めて 家族同然の付き合いなんですよね～。
jpnSearchText:
わたしとクロンカイト先輩も含めて
家族同然の付き合いなんですよね～。

engChrName: So that's why people call him her favorite.
engSearchText: So that's why people call him her favorite.
jpnChrName: ハン、博士の秘蔵っ子ってのは そういうことかよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、博士の秘蔵っ子ってのは
そういうことかよ。

engChrName: If she left the country two and a half years ago, however...
engSearchText:
If she left the country two and a half years
ago, however...
jpnChrName: ですがハミルトン博士が２年半前に 外国へ旅立たれたとなると……
jpnSearchText:
ですがハミルトン博士が２年半前に
外国へ旅立たれたとなると……

engChrName: That's right... He puts on a brave face, but he misses her so much.
engSearchText:
That's right... He puts on a brave face, but he misses
her so much.
jpnChrName: そうですねぇ、強がってるけど ずっと寂しそうにしていて……
jpnSearchText:
そうですねぇ、強がってるけど
ずっと寂しそうにしていて……

engChrName: She's off trying to solve the problems in the East, so there's no telling when she's going to be back.
engSearchText:
She's off trying to solve the problems in the East, so
there's no telling when she's going to be back.
jpnChrName: 大陸東部の問題についての研究…… いつ帰ってくるかも分かりませんし～。
jpnSearchText:
大陸東部の問題についての研究……
いつ帰ってくるかも分かりませんし～。

engChrName: ...The story about closing down the observatory seemed to come about because of me and Professor Cronkite, too.
engSearchText:
...The story about closing down the observatory
seemed to come about because of me and Professor
Cronkite, too.
jpnChrName: ……あの天文台の閉鎖の話も、 わたしや先輩のシワ寄せみたいなんです。
jpnSearchText:
……あの天文台の閉鎖の話も、
わたしや先輩のシワ寄せみたいなんです。

engChrName: But he never confided in us. Instead, he tried to fix the problem all on his own.
engSearchText:
But he never confided in us. Instead, he tried to fix
the problem all on his own.
jpnChrName: なのに“僕が何とかするから”なんて 内緒にされちゃってたんですよね……
jpnSearchText:
なのに“僕が何とかするから”なんて
内緒にされちゃってたんですよね……

engChrName: And Professor Cronkite's really busy at the moment, so he can't be around very much.
engSearchText:
And Professor Cronkite's really busy at the moment,
so he can't be around very much.
jpnChrName: 先輩は先輩で最近、 色んな方面で忙しいみたいですし……
jpnSearchText:
先輩は先輩で最近、
色んな方面で忙しいみたいですし……

engChrName: I just wish I could pick up the slack and support Quatre like a real big sister should.
engSearchText:
I just wish I could pick up the slack and support
Quatre like a real big sister should.
jpnChrName: せめてわたしが、本当のお姉ちゃんみたいに 支えてあげられたらって思うんですけど～……
jpnSearchText:
せめてわたしが、本当のお姉ちゃんみたいに
支えてあげられたらって思うんですけど～……

engChrName: Kiddo's got a pattern, huh? He was trying to sort out that problem down in the mine alone, too.
engSearchText:
Kiddo's got a pattern, huh? He was trying to sort out
that problem down in the mine alone, too.
jpnChrName: ……ハン、そういや坑道の時も てめぇだけで解決しようとしてたな。
jpnSearchText:
……ハン、そういや坑道の時も
てめぇだけで解決しようとしてたな。

engChrName: But he's at the kinda age when kids wanna act older than they are. Better to just leave him be if you ask me.
engSearchText:
But he's at the kinda age when kids wanna act older
than they are. Better to just leave him be if you
ask me.
jpnChrName: つっても１５なら背伸びもしたい年頃だ。 構いすぎんのもって気もするけどな。
jpnSearchText:
つっても１５なら背伸びもしたい年頃だ。
構いすぎんのもって気もするけどな。

engChrName: Perhaps you're right—but being there for one another is what families do.
engSearchText:
Perhaps you're right—but being there for one another
is what families do.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ですがそれでもというのが やはり“家族”なのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ですがそれでもというのが
やはり“家族”なのでしょう。

engChrName: I'm a little envious, to be honest...
engSearchText: I'm a little envious, to be honest...
jpnChrName: ………少し、羨ましいです。
jpnSearchText: ………少し、羨ましいです。

jpnChrName: アン……？
jpnSearchText: アン……？

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: Did you find something, XEROS?!
engSearchText: Did you find something, XEROS?!
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳ君、何か見つけたの～！？
jpnSearchText: ＸＥＲＯＳ君、何か見つけたの～！？

engChrName: Guess we'd better give it a look. We sure didn't find anything downstairs, though, so I'm not getting my hopes up.
engSearchText:
Guess we'd better give it a look. We sure didn't find
anything downstairs, though, so I'm not getting my
hopes up.
jpnChrName: フン、下の階には何もなかったが……
jpnSearchText: フン、下の階には何もなかったが……

engChrName: I agree. Let's see if we can find anything.
engSearchText: I agree. Let's see if we can find anything.
jpnChrName: こちらも調べてみましょうか。
jpnSearchText: こちらも調べてみましょうか。

engChrName: See? Nothing here.
engSearchText: See? Nothing here.
jpnChrName: あん、何もねーじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: あん、何もねーじゃねえか。

engChrName: Well, that's strange...
engSearchText: Well, that's strange...
jpnChrName: あれ～、おかしいですねぇ。
jpnSearchText: あれ～、おかしいですねぇ。

engChrName: GRR...
engSearchText: GRR...
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲＲ…
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲＲ…

engChrName: The door is ajar...
engSearchText: The door is ajar...

engChrName: Did it just open itself? No, that doesn't—
engSearchText: Did it just open itself? No, that doesn't—
jpnChrName: 勝手に開きやがった……？ ……いや──
jpnSearchText:
勝手に開きやがった……？
……いや──

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！！

engChrName: Where are you going, XEROS?
engSearchText: Where are you going, XEROS?
jpnChrName: わわっ、ＸＥＲＯＳ君っ？
jpnSearchText: わわっ、ＸＥＲＯＳ君っ？

engChrName: ...Hmm?
engSearchText: ...Hmm?

engChrName: What is it, XEROS?
engSearchText: What is it, XEROS?
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳ……？
jpnSearchText: ＸＥＲＯＳ……？

engChrName: There!
engSearchText: There!
jpnChrName: そこか……！
jpnSearchText: そこか……！
ッ……

engChrName: Wait. Was that—?
engSearchText: Wait. Was that—?
jpnChrName: おい、今のは……！
jpnSearchText: おい、今のは……！

engChrName: Whoever they are, they ain't just usin' stealth shards.
engSearchText: Whoever they are, they ain't just usin' stealth shards.
jpnChrName: ステルスシャード、だけじゃねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ステルスシャード、だけじゃねぇな。

engChrName: They appear to be combining them with something else.
engSearchText:
They appear to be combining them with
something else.
jpnChrName: ええ、おそらく複合的な……
jpnSearchText: ええ、おそらく複合的な……

engChrName: FIO! We're going after them!
engSearchText: FIO! We're going after them!
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯ、続くよ！
jpnSearchText: ＦＩＯ、続くよ！

engChrName: Understood.
engSearchText: Understood.
jpnChrName: ＯＫ、カトル。
jpnSearchText: ＯＫ、カトル。

engChrName: We're going, too!
engSearchText: We're going, too!
jpnChrName: こっちも続くぞ──！
jpnSearchText: こっちも続くぞ──！

engChrName: W-Wait for meee...!
engSearchText: W-Wait for meee...!
jpnChrName: ま、待ってくださぁ～い……
jpnSearchText: ま、待ってくださぁ～い……

engChrName: Heat signature detected!
engSearchText: Heat signature detected!
jpnChrName: 熱源反応ヲ感知！
jpnSearchText: 熱源反応ヲ感知！

engChrName: XEROS!
engSearchText: XEROS!
jpnChrName: ──ＸＥＲＯＳ！！
jpnSearchText: ──ＸＥＲＯＳ！！

engChrName: GRR... RUFF!
engSearchText: GRR... RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲ…ＢＯＷ！！
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲ…ＢＯＷ！！

engChrName: Ack!
engSearchText: Ack!
jpnSearchText: くっ……！？

engChrName: W-Wait! I surrender, I surrender!
engSearchText: W-Wait! I surrender, I surrender!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと待ちなさい……！ 降参よ、降参！
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっと待ちなさい……！
降参よ、降参！

engChrName: A woman...? She looks kind of familiar.
engSearchText: A woman...? She looks kind of familiar.
jpnChrName: 女の人……？ 見覚えがあるような、ないような……
jpnSearchText:
女の人……？
見覚えがあるような、ないような……

engChrName: And there was me thinking it'd be that kinky cat or someone from the mafia.
engSearchText:
And there was me thinking it'd be that kinky cat or
someone from the mafia.
jpnChrName: ハン、マフィアか 例の痴女あたりかと思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、マフィアか
例の痴女あたりかと思ったが。

engChrName: *pant* Huh? Who's that?
engSearchText: *pant* Huh? Who's that?
jpnChrName: はあはあ…… あれ～、誰ですかその人？
jpnSearchText:
はあはあ……
あれ～、誰ですかその人？

engChrName: ...She must not be a member of the faculty, then.
engSearchText: ...She must not be a member of the faculty, then.
jpnChrName: ……大学関係者でもなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText: ……大学関係者でもなさそうですね。

engChrName: Man... It did cross my mind it might be you, but I wouldn't have put mira on it.
engSearchText:
Man... It did cross my mind it might be you, but I
wouldn't have put mira on it.
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ、 可能性くらいは考えてたが。
jpnSearchText:
……やれやれ、
可能性くらいは考えてたが。

engChrName: This here is one of Kincaid's subordinates. I don't think I ever caught your name?
engSearchText:
This here is one of Kincaid's subordinates. I don't
think I ever caught your name?
jpnChrName: キンケイドの部下か── 名前は聞いていなかったな？
jpnSearchText:
キンケイドの部下か──
名前は聞いていなかったな？

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: So it's the desk jockey's gofer, huh?
engSearchText: So it's the desk jockey's gofer, huh?
jpnChrName: なるほどな。 スカシ眼鏡のパシリってワケか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな。
スカシ眼鏡のパシリってワケか。

engChrName: Y-You watch what you're calling me!
engSearchText: Y-You watch what you're calling me!
jpnChrName: だ、誰がパシリよ……！
jpnSearchText: だ、誰がパシリよ……！

engChrName: Hmm? Is this an acquaintance of yours?
engSearchText: Hmm? Is this an acquaintance of yours?
jpnChrName: ……？　知り合いですか？
jpnSearchText: ……？　知り合いですか？

engChrName: *sigh* I was hoping not to make contact with you while I was here...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I was hoping not to make contact with you
while I was here...
jpnChrName: ふう…… 接触するつもりは無かったけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
接触するつもりは無かったけど。

engChrName: ...but I see I underestimated just how friendly you would get with the faculty here in less than twenty-four hours.
engSearchText:
...but I see I underestimated just how friendly you
would get with the faculty here in less than
twenty-four hours.
jpnChrName: まさか今日一日だけで理科大学側と ここまで信頼関係を結んでるなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
まさか今日一日だけで理科大学側と
ここまで信頼関係を結んでるなんてね。

engChrName: I did hear you had a way of conning everyone you meet into liking you, Arkride, but you work fast.
engSearchText:
I did hear you had a way of conning everyone you
meet into liking you, Arkride, but you work fast.
jpnChrName: 噂に違わぬ“人たらし”ぶりじゃない、 ヴァン・アークライド所長？
jpnSearchText:
噂に違わぬ“人たらし”ぶりじゃない、
ヴァン・アークライド所長？

engChrName: I ain't connin' anyone. I'm just that likeable.
engSearchText: I ain't connin' anyone. I'm just that likeable.
jpnChrName: 人聞きの悪いこと言うんじゃねぇよ。
jpnSearchText: 人聞きの悪いこと言うんじゃねぇよ。

engChrName: Also, if you're gonna try to burn someone, maybe try doin' it when you're not pinned under a dog.
engSearchText:
Also, if you're gonna try to burn someone, maybe try
doin' it when you're not pinned under a dog.
jpnChrName: つうか、その格好を何とかしてから 決め台詞を言うべきなんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
つうか、その格好を何とかしてから
決め台詞を言うべきなんじゃないか？

engChrName: Y-You think I'm enjoying this?! Just get it off me!
engSearchText: Y-You think I'm enjoying this?! Just get it off me!
jpnChrName: う、うるさいわね…… とっとと解放して頂戴っ！
jpnSearchText:
う、うるさいわね……
とっとと解放して頂戴っ！

engChrName: My name's Kaela McMillan. That's my real name, for what it's worth.
engSearchText:
My name's Kaela McMillan. That's my real name, for
what it's worth.
jpnChrName: カエラ・マクミラン、一応本名よ。
jpnSearchText: カエラ・マクミラン、一応本名よ。

engChrName: I'm a second lieutenant in the CID—and I'd prefer it if that and all we discuss are kept off the record.
engSearchText:
I'm a second lieutenant in the CID—and I'd prefer it
if that and all we discuss are kept off the record.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤ所属の特務少尉── こちらはオフレコで頼むわ。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤ所属の特務少尉──
こちらはオフレコで頼むわ。

engChrName: I thought you were here on a job from Elsaim?
engSearchText: I thought you were here on a job from Elsaim?
jpnChrName: ……エルザイム公国からの 依頼とは聞いていましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
……エルザイム公国からの
依頼とは聞いていましたけど……

engChrName: So the CID is also involved, then?
engSearchText: So the CID is also involved, then?
jpnChrName: なるほど～…… 中央情報省（ＣＩＤ）も関わってたんですね～？
jpnSearchText:
なるほど～……
中央情報省（ＣＩＤ）も関わってたんですね～？

engChrName: Yeah. We knew that CEO might try to hide stuff from us, so we kept one of our clients a secret.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We knew that CEO might try to hide stuff
from us, so we kept one of our clients a secret.
jpnChrName: ああ、あのＣＥＯの隠蔽を見越して 俺たちが雇われた背景のもう一方でな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あのＣＥＯの隠蔽を見越して
俺たちが雇われた背景のもう一方でな。

engChrName: We just didn't expect one of their guys to use a mix of Xipha and RAMDA stealth to sneak in here.
engSearchText:
We just didn't expect one of their guys to use a mix of
Xipha and RAMDA stealth to sneak in here.
jpnChrName: ザイファとＲＡＭＤＡの複合ステルスで 潜入してるとは思わなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
ザイファとＲＡＭＤＡの複合ステルスで
潜入してるとは思わなかったが。

engChrName: I apologize for the trouble I ended up causing.
engSearchText: I apologize for the trouble I ended up causing.
jpnChrName: ……それについては 余計な混乱を招いて失礼しました。
jpnSearchText:
……それについては
余計な混乱を招いて失礼しました。

engChrName: My intention was to investigate so we had a backup in the event you didn't succeed. I never expected to be found.
engSearchText:
My intention was to investigate so we had a backup
in the event you didn't succeed. I never expected to
be found.
jpnChrName: “保険”のため調べるつもりが まさか感知されてしまうなんて……
jpnSearchText:
“保険”のため調べるつもりが
まさか感知されてしまうなんて……

engChrName: Clearly, I shouldn't have underestimated the Institute of Science's technological prowess.
engSearchText:
Clearly, I shouldn't have underestimated the Institute
of Science's technological prowess.
jpnChrName: 理科大学の技術力を甘く見ていたようです。
jpnSearchText: 理科大学の技術力を甘く見ていたようです。

engChrName: FIO is cool?
engSearchText: FIO is cool?
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=XVO_FIO_01}ＦＩＯ、スゴイ？
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=XVO_FIO_01}ＦＩＯ、スゴイ？

engChrName: Of course. Very cool.
engSearchText: Of course. Very cool.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうだね。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうだね。

engChrName: I don't get it. Why sneak in here at all? You couldn't just let us do our thing?
engSearchText:
I don't get it. Why sneak in here at all? You couldn't
just let us do our thing?
jpnChrName: つーか、そもそもなんで 忍び込んでたって話だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
つーか、そもそもなんで
忍び込んでたって話だろうが。

engChrName: I assume she concluded that the current situation was too serious NOT to do anything.
engSearchText:
I assume she concluded that the current situation was
too serious NOT to do anything.
jpnChrName: この地の状況を見て、 独自に動く必要があると判断した──
jpnSearchText:
この地の状況を見て、
独自に動く必要があると判断した──

engChrName: That about the long and short of it?
engSearchText: That about the long and short of it?
jpnChrName: そんなところか？
jpnSearchText: そんなところか？

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: The current state of the orbal network and distribution network is definitely a problem.
engSearchText:
The current state of the orbal network and
distribution network is definitely a problem.
jpnChrName: んー、確かに最近の導力ネットと エネルギー網の不調は困るよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
んー、確かに最近の導力ネットと
エネルギー網の不調は困るよねぇ。

engChrName: I had them go down on me the other day, too. We managed to get things running again, but it was still a big hassle.
engSearchText:
I had them go down on me the other day, too.
We managed to get things running again, but it was
still a big hassle.
jpnChrName: わたしの所も一時ダウンしちゃったし…… 何とか復旧はできたけど。
jpnSearchText:
わたしの所も一時ダウンしちゃったし……
何とか復旧はできたけど。

engChrName: But just why is this happening at all?
engSearchText: But just why is this happening at all?
jpnChrName: えと、結局どうして そんな事が起きているんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
えと、結局どうして
そんな事が起きているんでしょう？

engChrName: There's only one possibility that I can propose.
engSearchText: There's only one possibility that I can propose.
jpnChrName: ……一つ、心当たりがあるとすれば。
jpnSearchText: ……一つ、心当たりがあるとすれば。

engChrName: That would be unusually intensive parallel-distributed computing.
engSearchText:
That would be unusually intensive
parallel-distributed computing.
jpnChrName: 異常な処理負荷を伴うような “並列分散処理”でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
異常な処理負荷を伴うような
“並列分散処理”でしょうか。

engChrName: Hmm... I'm no expert in the field, but that's all that comes to mind for me, too.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I'm no expert in the field, but that's all that
comes to mind for me, too.
jpnChrName: うーん、専門外ですけど やっぱりそれくらいですよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、専門外ですけど
やっぱりそれくらいですよねぇ。

engChrName: Then we're of the same mind.
engSearchText: Then we're of the same mind.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、私もそれを睨んでいます。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ、私もそれを睨んでいます。

engChrName: I'm totally lost...
engSearchText: I'm totally lost...
jpnChrName: その、まったくもって よく分からないんですが……
jpnSearchText:
その、まったくもって
よく分からないんですが……

engChrName: Yeah. The hell're you guys talking about?
engSearchText: Yeah. The hell're you guys talking about?
jpnChrName: 俺らにも分かるように言えや。
jpnSearchText: 俺らにも分かるように言えや。

engChrName: Orbal computers have been getting bigger and faster over the past few years.
engSearchText:
Orbal computers have been getting bigger and faster
over the past few years.
jpnChrName: ……近年、導力演算器は急速に 大型化、高速化されている分野だ。
jpnSearchText:
……近年、導力演算器は急速に
大型化、高速化されている分野だ。

engChrName: And the bigger they get, the more orbal energy they consume.
engSearchText:
And the bigger they get, the more orbal energy
they consume.
jpnChrName: それに合わせて、導力の消費量自体も 上がっていると聞いたことがある。
jpnSearchText:
それに合わせて、導力の消費量自体も
上がっていると聞いたことがある。

engChrName: In short, yes. The larger and more complex the tasks you require of them, the more power they will consume.
engSearchText:
In short, yes. The larger and more complex the tasks
you require of them, the more power they
will consume.
jpnChrName: ええ…… 計算が複雑で、膨大になるにつれて。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……
計算が複雑で、膨大になるにつれて。

engChrName: Orbments regenerate orbal energy over time and don't generally need an external power source.
engSearchText:
Orbments regenerate orbal energy over time and
don't generally need an external power source.
jpnChrName: 本来、オーブメントは駆動に必要な導力を 自然回復できる特性を持ちますが……
jpnSearchText:
本来、オーブメントは駆動に必要な導力を
自然回復できる特性を持ちますが……

engChrName: That changes, however, when the amount of energy consumed vastly exceeds the orbment's ability to generate it.
engSearchText:
That changes, however, when the amount of energy
consumed vastly exceeds the orbment's ability to
generate it.
jpnChrName: 消費量が回復量を遙かに上回る場合、 外部の導力供給網に頼る必要があります。
jpnSearchText:
消費量が回復量を遙かに上回る場合、
外部の導力供給網に頼る必要があります。

engChrName: Yet if the orbal distribution network that serves as that external source is also heavily taxed...
engSearchText:
Yet if the orbal distribution network that serves as
that external source is also heavily taxed...
jpnChrName: ですが仮に、導力供給網までもが 過剰に消費された場合、何が起きるか……
jpnSearchText:
ですが仮に、導力供給網までもが
過剰に消費された場合、何が起きるか……

engChrName: ...that leads to a temporary decrease in the amount of energy available, and a spike in the amount of orbal network traffic.
engSearchText:
...that leads to a temporary decrease in the amount of
energy available, and a spike in the amount of orbal
network traffic.
jpnChrName: ……一時的なエネルギー網の低下に 導力ネットのトラフィック増大……
jpnSearchText:
……一時的なエネルギー網の低下に
導力ネットのトラフィック増大……

engChrName: That theory alone would be enough to explain the issues you're here to investigate.
engSearchText:
That theory alone would be enough to explain the
issues you're here to investigate.
jpnChrName: 正に皆さんが調べていた現象に 繋がることは否定できないかと。
jpnSearchText:
正に皆さんが調べていた現象に
繋がることは否定できないかと。
