engChrName: Still, while it's possible on paper, I can't imagine parallel-distributed computing taking place on such a vast scale.
engSearchText:
Still, while it's possible on paper, I can't imagine
parallel-distributed computing taking place on such a
vast scale.
jpnChrName: ……ですが、流石に不可能ですよ。 これだけの大規模な分散処理なんて。
jpnSearchText:
……ですが、流石に不可能ですよ。
これだけの大規模な分散処理なんて。

engChrName: As for controlling the orbal distribution network itself...that's simply unimaginable with current technology.
engSearchText:
As for controlling the orbal distribution network
itself...that's simply unimaginable with
current technology.
jpnChrName: しかも導力供給網まで制御しているなんて 現在の技術じゃそこまでは……！
jpnSearchText:
しかも導力供給網まで制御しているなんて
現在の技術じゃそこまでは……！

engChrName: We still don't know all there is about orbal energy and how it works.
engSearchText:
We still don't know all there is about orbal energy
and how it works.
jpnChrName: そもそも“導力”そのものが 完全に解明されてない現象だからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも“導力”そのものが
完全に解明されてない現象だからねぇ。

engChrName: Oh! But wait...
engSearchText: Oh! But wait...
jpnChrName: あ、でも……
jpnSearchText: あ、でも……

engChrName: Yeah. A situation mirroring that unimaginable scenario happened not all that long ago.
engSearchText:
Yeah. A situation mirroring that unimaginable
scenario happened not all that long ago.
jpnChrName: ええ── 似たケースが近年あった筈です。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──
似たケースが近年あった筈です。

engChrName: Indeed. We analyzed that situation ourselves at Marduk and reached the same conclusion about what happened.
engSearchText:
Indeed. We analyzed that situation ourselves at
Marduk and reached the same conclusion about
what happened.
jpnChrName: ええ──当時の状況分析をしていた マルドゥック社としても同意見です。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──当時の状況分析をしていた
マルドゥック社としても同意見です。

engChrName: Risette...
engSearchText: Risette...
jpnChrName: リゼットさん……
jpnSearchText: リゼットさん……

engChrName: That confirms it, then.
engSearchText: That confirms it, then.

engChrName: She finally clues us in.
engSearchText: She finally clues us in.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ようやく認めやがったか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ようやく認めやがったか。

engChrName: I've heard some about what went down in Crossbell, but if this is the same as that, well, that spells trouble for us.
engSearchText:
I've heard some about what went down in Crossbell,
but if this is the same as that, well, that spells trouble
for us.
jpnChrName: 再事変の話は色々聞いてるが ……どうにも気に食わねぇ状況だな。
jpnSearchText:
再事変の話は色々聞いてるが
……どうにも気に食わねぇ状況だな。

engChrName: Right. And this isn't the first time we've run into something connected to that whole incident, either.
engSearchText:
Right. And this isn't the first time we've run into
something connected to that whole incident, either.
jpnChrName: はい、再事変と似てるといえば サルバッドでも……
jpnSearchText:
はい、再事変と似てるといえば
サルバッドでも……

engChrName: Don't know if they're deliberately settin' out to replicate Crossbell's deal, but there's one thing we need to get cleared up right off the bat.
engSearchText:
Don't know if they're deliberately settin' out to
replicate Crossbell's deal, but there's one thing we
need to get cleared up right off the bat.
jpnChrName: ……これが連中の“再現”かは分からねえが ひとつ、明らかにすべき点がある。
jpnSearchText:
……これが連中の“再現”かは分からねえが
ひとつ、明らかにすべき点がある。

engChrName: We've gotta assume someone's out there tryin' to do research they shouldn't that can only be done with parallel-distributed computing.
engSearchText:
We've gotta assume someone's out there tryin' to do
research they shouldn't that can only be done with
parallel-distributed computing.
jpnChrName: そんな並列分散処理を必要とする──
jpnSearchText: そんな並列分散処理を必要とする──

engChrName: So the question becomes: who is it?
engSearchText: So the question becomes: who is it?
jpnChrName: 言わば身の丈に合わないような研究を いったい“誰”がやってるのかってな。
jpnSearchText:
言わば身の丈に合わないような研究を
いったい“誰”がやってるのかってな。

engChrName: What's the point in asking a question with only one clear answer?
engSearchText:
What's the point in asking a question with only one
clear answer?
jpnChrName: 回りくどいわね……貴方たちも とっくに見当はついてるんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
回りくどいわね……貴方たちも
とっくに見当はついてるんでしょう？

engChrName: Professor Callaghan...
engSearchText: Professor Callaghan...
jpnChrName: ………キャラハン教授…………
jpnSearchText: ………キャラハン教授…………

engChrName: ...Just what does he think he's doing?!
engSearchText: ...Just what does he think he's doing?!
jpnChrName: っ…… 何をしてるんだ、あの先生（ひと）は……！？
jpnSearchText:
っ……
何をしてるんだ、あの先生（ひと）は……！？

engChrName: He's changed a ton over the past few years, but I didn't think he was up to something of this magnitude...
engSearchText:
He's changed a ton over the past few years, but I
didn't think he was up to something of
this magnitude...
jpnChrName: ……うーん、ここ１、２年で 人が変わっちゃった感じだったけど……
jpnSearchText:
……うーん、ここ１、２年で
人が変わっちゃった感じだったけど……

engChrName: ...? Th-This number belongs to...!
engSearchText: ...? Th-This number belongs to...!

engChrName: Is... Is that you, Salision...?
engSearchText: Is... Is that you, Salision...?
jpnChrName: ……サリシオン君、か……？
jpnSearchText: ……サリシオン君、か……？

engChrName: P-Professor Callaghan? What's wrong, sir?
engSearchText: P-Professor Callaghan? What's wrong, sir?
jpnChrName: キャ、キャラハン先生？ ……どうしたんですか……？
jpnSearchText:
キャ、キャラハン先生？
……どうしたんですか……？

engChrName: I'm so sorry... I screwed up...
engSearchText: I'm so sorry... I screwed up...
jpnChrName: ……すまない……… どうやらしくじってしまったようだ……
jpnSearchText:
……すまない………
どうやらしくじってしまったようだ……

engChrName: Please, stop this... Th-They want my—
engSearchText: Please, stop this... Th-They want my—
jpnChrName: ……どうか、止めてくれ…… あいつらは、私の──
jpnSearchText:
……どうか、止めてくれ……
あいつらは、私の──

engChrName: Aaaaargh!
engSearchText: Aaaaargh!
jpnChrName: うわああああっ……！！
jpnSearchText: うわああああっ……！！

engChrName: Professor?! Professor Callaghan!
engSearchText: Professor?! Professor Callaghan!
jpnChrName: 教授……！？ ──キャラハン先生っ！？
jpnSearchText:
教授……！？
──キャラハン先生っ！？

engChrName: What just happened?
engSearchText: What just happened?

engChrName: He's in the special research building, right?!
engSearchText: He's in the special research building, right?!
jpnChrName: 特別研究棟か……！？
jpnSearchText: 特別研究棟か……！？

engChrName: We must hurry!
engSearchText: We must hurry!
jpnChrName: ──急ぎましょう！
jpnSearchText: ──急ぎましょう！

engChrName: Damn...
engSearchText: Damn...
jpnChrName: おいおい……
jpnSearchText: おいおい……

engChrName: Ngh...
engSearchText: Ngh...

engChrName: Professor! Where are you, Professor?!
engSearchText: Professor! Where are you, Professor?!
jpnChrName: 先生っ──どこですか、先生っ！？
jpnSearchText: 先生っ──どこですか、先生っ！？

engChrName: October 24th, 10:00AM
engSearchText: October 24th, 10:00AM

engChrName: Heeeeeelp! There's mechanical monsters coming!
engSearchText: Heeeeeelp! There's mechanical monsters coming!
jpnChrName: ひいっ、機械の化物が……！
jpnSearchText: ひいっ、機械の化物が……！

engChrName: The aerotrams are inoperable! Use the bridge to cross into the Artisanal District!
engSearchText:
The aerotrams are inoperable! Use the bridge to cross
into the Artisanal District!
jpnChrName: エアロトラムは使えん！ 連絡橋で職人街へ向かうがいい！
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラムは使えん！
連絡橋で職人街へ向かうがいい！

engChrName: Evacuate into the church for the time being! Bracers will be there in roughly ten minutes!
engSearchText:
Evacuate into the church for the time being!
Bracers will be there in roughly ten minutes!
jpnChrName: まずは教会に避難するように！ １０分ほどで遊撃士が来るだろう！
jpnSearchText:
まずは教会に避難するように！
１０分ほどで遊撃士が来るだろう！

engChrName: Yang! You're okay!
engSearchText: Yang! You're okay!
jpnChrName: ヤン兄、無事だったんだね……！
jpnSearchText: ヤン兄、無事だったんだね……！

engChrName: You made it—and roughly two minutes ahead of what I expected, at that.
engSearchText:
You made it—and roughly two minutes ahead of
what I expected, at that.
jpnChrName: カトル、裏解決屋も戻ったか。 予想より２分早いな。
jpnSearchText:
カトル、裏解決屋も戻ったか。
予想より２分早いな。

engChrName: Just about. You're weirdly calm with everything goin' on.
engSearchText:
Just about. You're weirdly calm with everything
goin' on.
jpnChrName: ま、なんとかね。 ……えらく落ち着いてますね？
jpnSearchText:
ま、なんとかね。
……えらく落ち着いてますね？

engChrName: Didn't Almata come through here?
engSearchText: Didn't Almata come through here?
jpnChrName: アルマータどもが 乗り込んで来たんじゃねぇのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
アルマータどもが
乗り込んで来たんじゃねぇのかよ？

engChrName: They did—as I predicted.
engSearchText: They did—as I predicted.
jpnChrName: 想定の範囲内だったのでな。
jpnSearchText: 想定の範囲内だったのでな。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan's death also did not come as a surprise.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan's death also did not come as
a surprise.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授がすでに 亡くなっていた可能性も含めて。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授がすでに
亡くなっていた可能性も含めて。

engChrName: Then you...
engSearchText: Then you...
jpnChrName: ……それって……
jpnSearchText: ……それって……

engChrName: I have implemented security measures to temporarily block all unauthorized external interference into the laboratories.
engSearchText:
I have implemented security measures to temporarily
block all unauthorized external interference into
the laboratories.
jpnChrName: 既に、独自のセキュリティ対策により、 研究室への不正干渉は一時的に排除した。
jpnSearchText:
既に、独自のセキュリティ対策により、
研究室への不正干渉は一時的に排除した。

engChrName: As a result, my work in the city has been complete since noon today.
engSearchText:
As a result, my work in the city has been complete
since noon today.
jpnChrName: その結果、正午の時点でバーゼルでの 私のプロジェクト工程は完了している。
jpnSearchText:
その結果、正午の時点でバーゼルでの
私のプロジェクト工程は完了している。

engChrName: In light of that, I would be well within my rights to be out of the city by now, but I owe the students at least this much.
engSearchText:
In light of that, I would be well within my rights to be
out of the city by now, but I owe the students at least
this much.
jpnChrName: このまま去ってもよかったが 流石に学生たちに不義理なのでな。
jpnSearchText:
このまま去ってもよかったが
流石に学生たちに不義理なのでな。

engChrName: That is why I have been assisting the one formerly known as Kitty with evacuating everyone while awaiting your arrival.
engSearchText:
That is why I have been assisting the one formerly
known as Kitty with evacuating everyone while
awaiting your arrival.
jpnChrName: 元仔猫に協力して避難誘導を手伝いつつ、 お前たちを待っていたというわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
元仔猫に協力して避難誘導を手伝いつつ、
お前たちを待っていたというわけだ。

engChrName: Yang...you're really going to leave?
engSearchText: Yang...you're really going to leave?
jpnChrName: ヤン兄…… それにバーゼルを去るって……
jpnSearchText:
ヤン兄……
それにバーゼルを去るって……

engChrName: I can't believe you were able to conceive of effective countermeasures to that parallel-distributed computing in such a short time.
engSearchText:
I can't believe you were able to conceive of effective
countermeasures to that parallel-distributed
computing in such a short time.
jpnChrName: しかもこの短期間で “並列分散処理”への対策を……
jpnSearchText:
しかもこの短期間で
“並列分散処理”への対策を……

engChrName: Don't really care what goes on in that head of yours, but I see you're at least willin' to cooperate with us some.
engSearchText:
Don't really care what goes on in that head of yours,
but I see you're at least willin' to cooperate with
us some.
jpnChrName: アンタの事情はどうでもいいが…… 少しは協力してくれるみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
アンタの事情はどうでもいいが……
少しは協力してくれるみたいだな？

engChrName: I know there's a lot of archaisms inside now, but did we just see the last people in the building leave?
engSearchText:
I know there's a lot of archaisms inside now, but did
we just see the last people in the building leave?
jpnChrName: 人形兵器が侵入したみたいだが 構内にいた人間は今ので全部か？
jpnSearchText:
人形兵器が侵入したみたいだが
構内にいた人間は今ので全部か？

engChrName: All of the faculty and the students of Aramis, together with tourists and other accounted-for visitors, have left.
engSearchText:
All of the faculty and the students of Aramis,
together with tourists and other accounted-for
visitors, have left.
jpnChrName: 大学関係者にアラミスの生徒、 その他の観光客などは全員避難させた。
jpnSearchText:
大学関係者にアラミスの生徒、
その他の観光客などは全員避難させた。

engChrName: However, security camera footage captured a young man with mint-colored hair and a young woman adorned with bandages inside.
engSearchText:
However, security camera footage captured a young
man with mint-colored hair and a young woman
adorned with bandages inside.
jpnChrName: ただし──監視カメラでミント髪の青年と 包帯を巻いた娘の姿を確認している。
jpnSearchText:
ただし──監視カメラでミント髪の青年と
包帯を巻いた娘の姿を確認している。

engChrName: A bracer and two police officers also passed through here earlier and have yet to return.
engSearchText:
A bracer and two police officers also passed through
here earlier and have yet to return.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士と警官が駆け付けて先行したが 未だに戻ってきていない。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士と警官が駆け付けて先行したが
未だに戻ってきていない。

engChrName: So that sadistic bastard is here.
engSearchText: So that sadistic bastard is here.
jpnChrName: サイコ野郎（メルキオル）か……！
jpnSearchText: サイコ野郎（メルキオル）か……！

engChrName: And so is that puppeteer we met in Tharbad...
engSearchText: And so is that puppeteer we met in Tharbad...
jpnChrName: ……あの人形遣いも……！
jpnSearchText: ……あの人形遣いも……！

engChrName: I'm worried about the bracer and the police officers now...
engSearchText:
I'm worried about the bracer and the police
officers now...
jpnChrName: 遊撃士と警官の方々も心配ですが……
jpnSearchText: 遊撃士と警官の方々も心配ですが……

engChrName: So they're part of the mafia that deceived Professor Callaghan and then cast him aside...
engSearchText:
So they're part of the mafia that deceived Professor
Callaghan and then cast him aside...
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン先生を唆し、 結局は切り捨てたマフィア……
jpnSearchText:
……キャラハン先生を唆し、
結局は切り捨てたマフィア……

engChrName: I won't let them make a mess of Professor Hamilton's home a moment longer!
engSearchText:
I won't let them make a mess of Professor Hamilton's
home a moment longer!
jpnChrName: これ以上、博士の大切な場所に 勝手な手出しをさせない……！
jpnSearchText:
これ以上、博士の大切な場所に
勝手な手出しをさせない……！

engChrName: You're going inside, then?
engSearchText: You're going inside, then?
jpnChrName: ……行くつもりか、カトル？
jpnSearchText: ……行くつもりか、カトル？

engChrName: Surely you know that this is no task for a researcher.
engSearchText: Surely you know that this is no task for a researcher.
jpnChrName: 研究者の領分からは明らかに 逸脱しているのは分かっているだろう。
jpnSearchText:
研究者の領分からは明らかに
逸脱しているのは分かっているだろう。

engChrName: ...Please continue to help with the evacuation efforts, Yang.
engSearchText:
...Please continue to help with the evacuation
efforts, Yang.
jpnChrName: ……ヤン兄はこのまま みんなの避難誘導をお願い。
jpnSearchText:
……ヤン兄はこのまま
みんなの避難誘導をお願い。

engChrName: Don't worry about me. I have FIO and XEROS with me!
engSearchText:
Don't worry about me. I have FIO and XEROS
with me!
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳもいるから 心配しないで……！
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳもいるから
心配しないで……！

engChrName: We'll help keep him safe, of course.
engSearchText: We'll help keep him safe, of course.
jpnChrName: 勿論、私たちもついてます。
jpnSearchText: 勿論、私たちもついてます。

engChrName: There's no way this is ending peacefully anymore, but we'll at least try and stop things from getting any worse.
engSearchText:
There's no way this is ending peacefully anymore, but
we'll at least try and stop things from getting
any worse.
jpnChrName: 穏便ってのは難しくなっちまったが、 事態を悪化させないようにはしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
穏便ってのは難しくなっちまったが、
事態を悪化させないようにはしますよ。

engChrName: Don't overdo it, then, is all I ask. Even if you do have FIO and XEROS with you.
engSearchText:
Don't overdo it, then, is all I ask. Even if you do have
FIO and XEROS with you.
jpnChrName: ならば、せめて無理だけはするな。 ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳがいたとしても。
jpnSearchText:
ならば、せめて無理だけはするな。
ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳがいたとしても。

engChrName: I know! I won't!
engSearchText: I know! I won't!
jpnChrName: うん、分かってる……！
jpnSearchText: うん、分かってる……！

engChrName: Look! There's people on the ground!
engSearchText: Look! There's people on the ground!
jpnChrName: ！　誰か倒れてます……！
jpnSearchText: ！　誰か倒れてます……！

engChrName: Are you all right?!
engSearchText: Are you all right?!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですか……！？
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫ですか……！？

engChrName: Ngh...
engSearchText: Ngh...

engChrName: You're...
engSearchText: You're...
jpnChrName: ……アンタたちは………
jpnSearchText: ……アンタたちは………

engChrName: They look heavily wounded, but their lives aren't in immediate danger.
engSearchText:
They look heavily wounded, but their lives aren't in
immediate danger.
jpnChrName: ……かなりの深手ですが 命に別状はなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……かなりの深手ですが
命に別状はなさそうですね。

engChrName: What happened?
engSearchText: What happened?
jpnChrName: おい、何があった？
jpnSearchText: おい、何があった？

engChrName: A guy with a dagger and a girl with a giant puppet went...inside...
engSearchText:
A guy with a dagger and a girl with a giant puppet
went...inside...
jpnChrName: ダガー使いと、人形使いが、中に………
jpnSearchText: ダガー使いと、人形使いが、中に………

engChrName: They... They activated...
engSearchText: They... They activated...
jpnChrName: ……を、起動して………
jpnSearchText: ……を、起動して………

engChrName: I imagine she was going to mention the central terminal. But how could someone from the outside know about that?
engSearchText:
I imagine she was going to mention the
central terminal. But how could someone from the
outside know about that?
jpnChrName: ……中央端末のことでしょう。 どうして外部の人間が……
jpnSearchText:
……中央端末のことでしょう。
どうして外部の人間が……

engChrName: Maybe the professor told them before they killed him? Well, we got them cornered now.
engSearchText:
Maybe the professor told them before they
killed him? Well, we got them cornered now.
jpnChrName: 殺られた教授がゲロったのか？ ──何にせよ、そこにいるわけだな。
jpnSearchText:
殺られた教授がゲロったのか？
──何にせよ、そこにいるわけだな。

engChrName: Yeah. Let's get inside.
engSearchText: Yeah. Let's get inside.
jpnChrName: ああ、気を引き締めて行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、気を引き締めて行くぞ。

engChrName: It's time to put an end to this!
engSearchText: It's time to put an end to this!
jpnChrName: ……今度こそ、止めてみせます。
jpnSearchText: ……今度こそ、止めてみせます。

engChrName: The telescope's nowhere to be seen now...
engSearchText: The telescope's nowhere to be seen now...
jpnChrName: 天体望遠鏡があった場所に……
jpnSearchText: 天体望遠鏡があった場所に……

engChrName: That's the main terminal, then?
engSearchText: That's the main terminal, then?
jpnChrName: あれがメインターミナルか。
jpnSearchText: あれがメインターミナルか。

engChrName: That's right. It's also known as the Aurora, and it's the pride of Basel.
engSearchText:
That's right. It's also known as the Aurora, and it's
the pride of Basel.
jpnChrName: ええ、工学都市バーゼルが誇る、 中央端末《アウローラ》……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、工学都市バーゼルが誇る、
中央端末《アウローラ》……

engChrName: Professors Hamilton and Callaghan led the charge in making it four years ago with the institute, Verne, the Epstein Foundation, and ZCF's support.
engSearchText:
Professors Hamilton and Callaghan led the charge in
making it four years ago with the institute, Verne, the
Epstein Foundation, and ZCF's support.
jpnChrName: ４年前に博士と……キャラハン先生が主導して、 理科大学とヴェルヌ、財団やＺＣＦも協力した……
jpnSearchText:
４年前に博士と……キャラハン先生が主導して、
理科大学とヴェルヌ、財団やＺＣＦも協力した……

engChrName: ...But what program is it running?
engSearchText: ...But what program is it running?
jpnChrName: ……何かのプログラムが走っている……？
jpnSearchText: ……何かのプログラムが走っている……？

engChrName: I can't make heads or tails of such complex code...
engSearchText: I can't make heads or tails of such complex code...
jpnChrName: あの複雑すぎるコードは一体……
jpnSearchText: あの複雑すぎるコードは一体……

engChrName: Look up there!
engSearchText: Look up there!
jpnChrName: ！　あれは……！
jpnSearchText: ！　あれは……！

engChrName: ...The fifth Genesis. Figures we'd find it here.
engSearchText: ...The fifth Genesis. Figures we'd find it here.
jpnChrName: ……第五の《ゲネシス》。 やっぱり絡んでやがったか。
jpnSearchText:
……第五の《ゲネシス》。
やっぱり絡んでやがったか。

engChrName: Along with...
engSearchText: Along with...
jpnChrName: そして──
jpnSearchText: そして──

engChrName: I suspected you would come, Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: I suspected you would come, Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: ──やはり来ましたか、 アークライド解決事務所。
jpnSearchText:
──やはり来ましたか、
アークライド解決事務所。

engChrName: Oh, that we would meet again so soon after the film festival.
engSearchText:
Oh, that we would meet again so soon after the
film festival.
jpnChrName: ウフフ、半月前の映画祭ぶりか。
jpnSearchText: ウフフ、半月前の映画祭ぶりか。

engChrName: It must be Aidios' will bringing us together. The threads of fate bind us ever so strongly indeed.
engSearchText:
It must be Aidios' will bringing us together.
The threads of fate bind us ever so strongly indeed.
jpnChrName: これも女神の導き── 運命の赤い糸ってヤツかな？
jpnSearchText:
これも女神の導き──
運命の赤い糸ってヤツかな？

engChrName: Heheheh... Can't say I'm not a fan of that kinda thing.
engSearchText: Heheheh... Can't say I'm not a fan of that kinda thing.
jpnChrName: クク、いいねぇ…… 嫌いじゃねえぜ、そういうのも。
jpnSearchText:
クク、いいねぇ……
嫌いじゃねえぜ、そういうのも。

engChrName: The monsters from the Gardens who stole Aida from us!
engSearchText:
The monsters from the Gardens who stole Aida
from us!
jpnChrName: 《庭園（ガーデン）》という…… ……アイーダさんたちの仇……
jpnSearchText:
《庭園（ガーデン）》という……
……アイーダさんたちの仇……

engChrName: Oho! You learned the name of my old home, did you?
engSearchText: Oho! You learned the name of my old home, did you?
jpnChrName: ああ、僕の古巣の名前も とうとう知られちゃったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、僕の古巣の名前も
とうとう知られちゃったんだ？

engChrName: And I see that Marduk concierge has officially joined your ranks.
engSearchText:
And I see that Marduk concierge has officially joined
your ranks.
jpnChrName: しかしマルドゥックのＳＣが正式加入──
jpnSearchText: しかしマルドゥックのＳＣが正式加入──

engChrName: Professor Hamilton's favorite little one, too. Aren't we getting popular?
engSearchText:
Professor Hamilton's favorite little one, too.
Aren't we getting popular?
jpnChrName: ハミルトン門下の秘蔵っ子君まで たらし込んでるなんて中々やるねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン門下の秘蔵っ子君まで
たらし込んでるなんて中々やるねぇ？

engChrName: Hmph. This kid's just with us as an advisor.
engSearchText: Hmph. This kid's just with us as an advisor.
jpnChrName: ハン……こっちの若いのは あくまで“相談窓口”だけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……こっちの若いのは
あくまで“相談窓口”だけどな。

engChrName: So you're the ones who led Professor Callaghan astray.
engSearchText:
So you're the ones who led Professor
Callaghan astray.
jpnChrName: ……アンタたちが キャラハン先生を惑わした……
jpnSearchText:
……アンタたちが
キャラハン先生を惑わした……

engChrName: What are you trying to do with the Aurora?! You have no right to be using it!
engSearchText:
What are you trying to do with the Aurora?!
You have no right to be using it!
jpnChrName: 《アウローラ》を勝手に使って 何をしようとしているんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
《アウローラ》を勝手に使って
何をしようとしているんだ！？

engChrName: Oh, how misunderstood I am! I'll have you know that the professor and I had quite a special connection.
engSearchText:
Oh, how misunderstood I am! I'll have you know that
the professor and I had quite a special connection.
jpnChrName: 人聞きが悪いなあ。 教授とはそれなりの付き合いなんだけど？
jpnSearchText:
人聞きが悪いなあ。
教授とはそれなりの付き合いなんだけど？

engChrName: In fact, he gave us permission to use it. And since he was one of the developers, I think that DOES give us the right.
engSearchText:
In fact, he gave us permission to use it. And since he
was one of the developers, I think that DOES give us
the right.
jpnChrName: この端末にしたって、開発者の一人である 彼の許可も“一応は”貰ってるからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
この端末にしたって、開発者の一人である
彼の許可も“一応は”貰ってるからねぇ。

engChrName: This was very different from the relationship I had with President Dillon, by the way. It was more one of mutual benefit.
engSearchText:
This was very different from the relationship I had
with President Dillon, by the way. It was more one of
mutual benefit.
jpnChrName: ギャスパー社長の時と違って 完全にギブアンドテイクってワケさ♪
jpnSearchText:
ギャスパー社長の時と違って
完全にギブアンドテイクってワケさ♪

engChrName: Though I'll admit that...certain inclinations of his did make my job a lot easier.
engSearchText:
Though I'll admit that...certain inclinations of his did
make my job a lot easier.
jpnChrName: ああ、彼にそっちの気があったのも 色々とやりやすかったかな……？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、彼にそっちの気があったのも
色々とやりやすかったかな……？

engChrName: A sensual whisper here, a little buttering up there, and he was more than ready to break every taboo I ever wanted. ❤
engSearchText:
A sensual whisper here, a little buttering up there,
and he was more than ready to break every taboo I
ever wanted. ❤
jpnChrName: おだてて、その気にさせたら 次々と一線を踏み越えてくれたからね❤
jpnSearchText:
おだてて、その気にさせたら
次々と一線を踏み越えてくれたからね❤

engChrName: How could you exploit someone so?
engSearchText: How could you exploit someone so?
jpnChrName: ……そんな下種な手も……
jpnSearchText: ……そんな下種な手も……

engChrName: Eh, it's not our place to judge what turns someone on. That stuff's personal.
engSearchText:
Eh, it's not our place to judge what turns someone on.
That stuff's personal.
jpnChrName: ああ、いいんじゃねぇか？ 性癖なんざソイツの自由だしなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、いいんじゃねぇか？
性癖なんざソイツの自由だしなァ。

engChrName: But you're still a piece of shit with a parking spot reserved in Gehenna.
engSearchText:
But you're still a piece of shit with a parking spot
reserved in Gehenna.
jpnChrName: ──てめぇが煉獄に堕ちるべき クソ野郎ってのは変わらねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
──てめぇが煉獄に堕ちるべき
クソ野郎ってのは変わらねぇが。

engChrName: Right. And we'll be happy to give you a taste of the flames that await you right here.
engSearchText:
Right. And we'll be happy to give you a taste of the
flames that await you right here.
jpnChrName: ええ……わたしたちは その焔の代わりを果たしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……わたしたちは
その焔の代わりを果たしましょう。

engChrName: We're going to recover that Genesis and avenge those you've taken from this world!
engSearchText:
We're going to recover that Genesis and avenge those
you've taken from this world!
jpnChrName: ゲネシスを取り戻し、 みんなの“仇”を討つためにも！
jpnSearchText:
ゲネシスを取り戻し、
みんなの“仇”を討つためにも！

engChrName: Ahaha! Look at me, public enemy number one. Think you could lend me a shoulder to cry on, Olympia?
engSearchText:
Ahaha! Look at me, public enemy number one.
Think you could lend me a shoulder to cry
on, Olympia?
jpnChrName: アハハ、すっかり嫌われちゃったなぁ。 ──オランピア、慰めてくれない？
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、すっかり嫌われちゃったなぁ。
──オランピア、慰めてくれない？

engChrName: You are only reaping what you sowed.
engSearchText: You are only reaping what you sowed.
jpnChrName: 自業自得でしょう、完全に。
jpnSearchText: 自業自得でしょう、完全に。

engChrName: Of course, the terms of my contract also do not allow me to simply give you all what you want.
engSearchText:
Of course, the terms of my contract also do not allow
me to simply give you all what you want.
jpnChrName: ですが契約上── こちらも従うわけには参りません。
jpnSearchText:
ですが契約上──
こちらも従うわけには参りません。

engChrName: That angelic being we saw in Tharbad!
engSearchText: That angelic being we saw in Tharbad!
jpnChrName: サルバッドでも現れた……！
jpnSearchText: サルバッドでも現れた……！

engChrName: FIO!
engSearchText: FIO!
jpnChrName: ……ＦＩＯ！！
jpnSearchText: ……ＦＩＯ！！

engChrName: Scanning material makeup... Unknown. High probability that the target is a form of artifact.
engSearchText:
Scanning material makeup... Unknown.
High probability that the target is a form of artifact.
jpnChrName: 構成物質ヲ走査（スキャン）──測定不能。 古代遺物（アーティファクト）ノ一種ト推測。
jpnSearchText:
構成物質ヲ走査（スキャン）──測定不能。
古代遺物（アーティファクト）ノ一種ト推測。

engChrName: Thought so. It's about the only thing that explains how it can fight like it does.
engSearchText:
Thought so. It's about the only thing that explains
how it can fight like it does.
jpnChrName: やっぱりそっちだったか…… あり得ねぇ動きだとは思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりそっちだったか……
あり得ねぇ動きだとは思ったが。

engChrName: There's more to it than meets the eye, too.
engSearchText: There's more to it than meets the eye, too.
jpnChrName: それに──何か仕込んでやがるな。
jpnSearchText: それに──何か仕込んでやがるな。

engChrName: Indeed. Take care, everyone.
engSearchText: Indeed. Take care, everyone.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、どうかご注意を。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ、どうかご注意を。

engChrName: Your instincts serve you well.
engSearchText: Your instincts serve you well.
jpnChrName: 良い判断です、 裏解決屋にマルドゥックのＳＣ殿。
jpnSearchText:
良い判断です、
裏解決屋にマルドゥックのＳＣ殿。

engChrName: Incidentally, as I did not have the opportunity to introduce myself in Tharbad...
engSearchText:
Incidentally, as I did not have the opportunity to
introduce myself in Tharbad...
jpnChrName: そういえば、サルバッドでは 名乗る機会がありませんでしたか。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、サルバッドでは
名乗る機会がありませんでしたか。

engChrName: I am Olympia, overseer of the Garden of Aurum. This is Ishtanti.
engSearchText:
I am Olympia, overseer of the Garden of Aurum.
This is Ishtanti.
jpnChrName: 《金の庭園（アウルムガーデン）》の管理人、オランピア。 ──こちらは《イシュタンティ》。
jpnSearchText:
《金の庭園（アウルムガーデン）》の管理人、オランピア。
──こちらは《イシュタンティ》。

engChrName: Our contract is with Almata at this time, so we remain focused on their needs...
engSearchText:
Our contract is with Almata at this time, so we
remain focused on their needs...
jpnChrName: アルマータとの契約完了後、 という条件付きにはなりますが──
jpnSearchText:
アルマータとの契約完了後、
という条件付きにはなりますが──

engChrName: ...but should you require our services after that, we would be happy to oblige.
engSearchText:
...but should you require our services after that, we
would be happy to oblige.
jpnChrName: いずれご用命を検討の際には ご贔屓のほどを。
jpnSearchText:
いずれご用命を検討の際には
ご贔屓のほどを。

engChrName: Y-You're asking if we want to hire an assassin...?
engSearchText: Y-You're asking if we want to hire an assassin...?
jpnChrName: あ、暗殺の依頼を……？
jpnSearchText: あ、暗殺の依頼を……？

engChrName: This some kinda joke? Or are you really out of your damn mind?
engSearchText:
This some kinda joke? Or are you really out of your
damn mind?
jpnChrName: オイ……舐めてんのか？
jpnSearchText: オイ……舐めてんのか？

engChrName: ...Hmm? I was only trying to promote my services.
engSearchText: ...Hmm? I was only trying to promote my services.
jpnChrName: ……？ 単なる営業にすぎませんが。
jpnSearchText:
……？
単なる営業にすぎませんが。

engChrName: It's true! She's not capable of joking, I'm afraid. As you can see, she's got work on the brain.
engSearchText:
It's true! She's not capable of joking, I'm afraid.
As you can see, she's got work on the brain.
jpnChrName: フフ、大マジだから勘弁してあげてよ。 見ての通り仕事人間、いや仕事人形でね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、大マジだから勘弁してあげてよ。
見ての通り仕事人間、いや仕事人形でね。

engChrName: Well, I think that's enough preamble. Been a good while, you know...since I tapped into my power as an overseer.
engSearchText:
Well, I think that's enough preamble. Been a good
while, you know...since I tapped into my power as
an overseer.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ僕も久々に── “管理人”としての力、披露しようかな？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ僕も久々に──
“管理人”としての力、披露しようかな？
……っ……！

engChrName: *gasp* Their auras!
engSearchText: *gasp* Their auras!
jpnSearchText:
……！？
この“息吹”は………！

engChrName: Tch. Of course they've been suppressin' their power all this time.
engSearchText:
Tch. Of course they've been suppressin' their power
all this time.
jpnChrName: チッ、やはり今まで “抑えて”いやがったか……！
jpnSearchText:
チッ、やはり今まで
“抑えて”いやがったか……！

engChrName: We'll need to use shards however we can to survive! Do whatever it takes to hold out!
engSearchText:
We'll need to use shards however we can to survive!
Do whatever it takes to hold out!
jpnChrName: 皆様、最大限のシャード活用を！ 何とか凌いでください──！
jpnSearchText:
皆様、最大限のシャード活用を！
何とか凌いでください──！

engChrName: I can barely keep up with what's happening...but let's do this, FIO! XEROS!
engSearchText:
I can barely keep up with what's happening...but let's
do this, FIO! XEROS!
jpnChrName: よく分からないけど── 行くよＦＩＯ、ＸＥＲＯＳ！！
jpnSearchText:
よく分からないけど──
行くよＦＩＯ、ＸＥＲＯＳ！！

engChrName: We can't allow these intruders to defile this sacred place a moment longer!
engSearchText:
We can't allow these intruders to defile this sacred
place a moment longer!
jpnChrName: 招かれざる客を この聖域から追い払うために！
jpnSearchText:
招かれざる客を
この聖域から追い払うために！

engChrName: Understood! / RUFF!
engSearchText: Understood! / RUFF!
jpnChrName: リョウカイ！！／ＢＯＷ！！
jpnSearchText: リョウカイ！！／ＢＯＷ！！

engChrName: Ngh... Is everyone all right?!
engSearchText: Ngh... Is everyone all right?!
jpnChrName: っ…… 皆さん、大丈夫ですか……！？
jpnSearchText:
っ……
皆さん、大丈夫ですか……！？

engChrName: That malaak is even more deadly than we thought...
engSearchText: That malaak is even more deadly than we thought...
jpnChrName: 悪しき天使（メラク）…… ……ここまでとは……
jpnSearchText:
悪しき天使（メラク）……
……ここまでとは……

engChrName: Ugh... Pisses me off. You haven't been taking us seriously all this time, have you?!
engSearchText:
Ugh... Pisses me off. You haven't been taking us
seriously all this time, have you?!
jpnChrName: っ……てめえ……… 今まで本気じゃなかったな……！？
jpnSearchText:
っ……てめえ………
今まで本気じゃなかったな……！？

engChrName: Ahaha! Oh, I showed Beauty's Blade a little of what I'm capable of—just not you.
engSearchText:
Ahaha! Oh, I showed Beauty's Blade a little of what
I'm capable of—just not you.
jpnChrName: アハハ、剣の乙女さんには ちょっとは見せたけどねぇ……？
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、剣の乙女さんには
ちょっとは見せたけどねぇ……？

engChrName: Your strength is within my predicted parameters— including those orbal drones.
engSearchText:
Your strength is within my predicted parameters—
including those orbal drones.
jpnChrName: 戦力、想定の範囲内ですか。 そちらの導力ドローンも含めて。
jpnSearchText:
戦力、想定の範囲内ですか。
そちらの導力ドローンも含めて。

engChrName: As if that doll wasn't bad enough. Now we've got those bomb artifacts to deal with, too.
engSearchText:
As if that doll wasn't bad enough. Now we've got
those bomb artifacts to deal with, too.
jpnChrName: チッ、“人形”に加えて “爆弾”の古代遺物とはな……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、“人形”に加えて
“爆弾”の古代遺物とはな……

engChrName: The Gardens' overseers are capable of even more than we feared, it would seem...
engSearchText:
The Gardens' overseers are capable of even more than
we feared, it would seem...
jpnChrName: ええ…… これが《庭園（ガーデン）》ですか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……
これが《庭園（ガーデン）》ですか。

engChrName: Ugh. If only I could make better use of FIO and XEROS' potential...
engSearchText:
Ugh. If only I could make better use of FIO and
XEROS' potential...
jpnChrName: くっ、もっとＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳの ポテンシャルを引き出せれば……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、もっとＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳの
ポテンシャルを引き出せれば……！

engChrName: Heehee. You're just so much fun to play with that you've got me all worked up.
engSearchText:
Heehee. You're just so much fun to play with that
you've got me all worked up.
jpnChrName: うふふ、ホントいいねぇ君たち…… 揃いも揃って嬲りがいがありそうでさァ♪
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、ホントいいねぇ君たち……
揃いも揃って嬲りがいがありそうでさァ♪

engChrName: Ahh... I don't think I can resist the urge anymore.
engSearchText: Ahh... I don't think I can resist the urge anymore.
jpnChrName: ああもう、我慢できなくなってきたよ……
jpnSearchText: ああもう、我慢できなくなってきたよ……

engChrName: I know they've got the boss curious, but surely there's no harm in slicing them open while he's not looking?
engSearchText:
I know they've got the boss curious, but surely there's
no harm in slicing them open while he's not looking?
jpnChrName: ……ボスが気にしてたみたいだけど 内緒で食べちゃってもいいかなァ……？
jpnSearchText:
……ボスが気にしてたみたいだけど
内緒で食べちゃってもいいかなァ……？

engChrName: I am not your boss and will not speak for him. Do as you please.
engSearchText:
I am not your boss and will not speak for him. Do as
you please.
jpnChrName: 私のボスではありません。 お好きにどうぞ、メルキオル。
jpnSearchText:
私のボスではありません。
お好きにどうぞ、メルキオル。

engChrName: Heh heh. Bring it, you son of a bitch!
engSearchText: Heh heh. Bring it, you son of a bitch!
jpnChrName: ククク、上等だ…… とことんやってやろうじゃねぇか──！！
jpnSearchText:
ククク、上等だ……
とことんやってやろうじゃねぇか──！！

engChrName: The flames of the Kruga have only just begun to burn!
engSearchText: The flames of the Kruga have only just begun to burn!
jpnChrName: クルガの“焔”はここからです──！
jpnSearchText: クルガの“焔”はここからです──！

engChrName: Wha...?
engSearchText: Wha...?
jpnSearchText: え──
………！？

engChrName: Decoding process complete. Executing emergence program.
engSearchText:
Decoding process complete. Executing
emergence program.
jpnChrName: “デコード”完了── 自己創発プログラムを起動します。
jpnSearchText:
“デコード”完了──
自己創発プログラムを起動します。

engChrName: Where am I...?
engSearchText: Where am I...?
jpnSearchText: ………ここ………は…………

engChrName: I see. So it was a success.
engSearchText: I see. So it was a success.
jpnChrName: ……そうか──成功したのだな。
jpnSearchText: ……そうか──成功したのだな。
────────！？

engChrName: That sounds like...
engSearchText: That sounds like...
jpnChrName: ……この声は………
jpnSearchText: ……この声は………

engChrName: Well, would you look at that? It worked!
engSearchText: Well, would you look at that? It worked!
jpnChrName: アハハ、上手くいったみたいだね！
jpnSearchText: アハハ、上手くいったみたいだね！

engChrName: So how does it feel, Professor? What's it like living in the digital world?
engSearchText:
So how does it feel, Professor? What's it like living in
the digital world?
jpnChrName: どうだい、教授── １（イチ）と０（ゼロ）の世界の居心地は！？
jpnSearchText:
どうだい、教授──
１（イチ）と０（ゼロ）の世界の居心地は！？

engChrName: It is even more comfortable than I had imagined.
engSearchText: It is even more comfortable than I had imagined.
jpnChrName: ああ──この上なく快適だとも。
jpnSearchText: ああ──この上なく快適だとも。

engChrName: I'm frankly surprised by how comfortable it is...but I suppose it also makes complete logical sense.
engSearchText:
I'm frankly surprised by how comfortable it is...but I
suppose it also makes complete logical sense.
jpnChrName: ううむ、実に気分がいい。 そうか……こういう事なのだな。
jpnSearchText:
ううむ、実に気分がいい。
そうか……こういう事なのだな。

engChrName: This is how it feels to be liberated of burdens and distractions. I can think more clearly than ever.
engSearchText:
This is how it feels to be liberated of burdens
and distractions. I can think more clearly than ever.
jpnChrName: 余計なものを脱ぎ捨てたおかげか、 思考もかつてなくクリアになった……！
jpnSearchText:
余計なものを脱ぎ捨てたおかげか、
思考もかつてなくクリアになった……！

engChrName: The final stage of my work will be a breeze like this. Your expectations will be met!
engSearchText:
The final stage of my work will be a breeze like this.
Your expectations will be met!
jpnChrName: これならば最後の一歩も余裕だ！ 君たちの期待にも応えてやれるだろう！
jpnSearchText:
これならば最後の一歩も余裕だ！
君たちの期待にも応えてやれるだろう！

engChrName: Aww. That's my big professor! You will be... handsomely rewarded for your work. ❤
engSearchText:
Aww. That's my big professor! You will be...
handsomely rewarded for your work. ❤
jpnChrName: ウフフ、さすがは教授❤ ご褒美もたくさん用意しないとねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、さすがは教授❤
ご褒美もたくさん用意しないとねぇ！
…………ぁ………………

engChrName: A recording...? No, wait...
engSearchText: A recording...? No, wait...
jpnChrName: ……記録映像……いえ───
jpnSearchText: ……記録映像……いえ───

engChrName: You are correct, young lady. This is no mere recording.
engSearchText:
You are correct, young lady. This is no
mere recording.
jpnChrName: ──そうだ、お嬢さん。 これは映像などではない。
jpnSearchText:
──そうだ、お嬢さん。
これは映像などではない。

engChrName: I am the genuine David Callaghan.
engSearchText: I am the genuine David Callaghan.
jpnChrName: 私はデビッド・キャラハン──
jpnSearchText: 私はデビッド・キャラハン──

engChrName: Professor of engineering science at the Basel Institute of Science—and a researcher whose name will go down in history.
engSearchText:
Professor of engineering science at the Basel Institute
of Science—and a researcher whose name will go
down in history.
jpnChrName: バーゼル理科大学の物理工学教授にして、 ゼムリア大陸の歴史に名を刻む研究者だ。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル理科大学の物理工学教授にして、
ゼムリア大陸の歴史に名を刻む研究者だ。

engChrName: How the hell is this even possible?
engSearchText: How the hell is this even possible?
jpnChrName: っ……どうなってやがる……！？
jpnSearchText: っ……どうなってやがる……！？

engChrName: W-We saw your body in the swamp!
engSearchText: W-We saw your body in the swamp!
jpnChrName: さ、さっき峡谷の沼で……
jpnSearchText: さ、さっき峡谷の沼で……

engChrName: No way... Don't tell me...
engSearchText: No way... Don't tell me...
jpnChrName: ……まさか、こいつは──！
jpnSearchText: ……まさか、こいつは──！

engChrName: His knowledge, personality, and memories have all been converted into an AI.
engSearchText:
His knowledge, personality, and memories have all
been converted into an AI.
jpnChrName: ……知性と人格、記憶の全てを ＡＩとして“変換”したのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……知性と人格、記憶の全てを
ＡＩとして“変換”したのでしょう。

engChrName: Most likely through the power of the Genesis.
engSearchText: Most likely through the power of the Genesis.
jpnChrName: おそらく《ゲネシス》の力で……
jpnSearchText: おそらく《ゲネシス》の力で……

engChrName: All so that he could surpass the limitations of the human mind and become a singularity!
engSearchText:
All so that he could surpass the limitations of the
human mind and become a singularity!
jpnChrName: ──人としての“枷”を外れて 《技術的特異点（シンギュラリティ）》その物とならんがために！
jpnSearchText:
──人としての“枷”を外れて
《技術的特異点（シンギュラリティ）》その物とならんがために！
………ぁ…………

engChrName: Professor Callaghan, how could...?
engSearchText: Professor Callaghan, how could...?
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン、先生……
jpnSearchText: ……キャラハン、先生……

engChrName: Well, well. You're even more perceptive than I expected. What a vexatious little maid you are.
engSearchText:
Well, well. You're even more perceptive than
I expected. What a vexatious little maid you are.
jpnChrName: ウフフ、そこまで見抜くのか。 思った以上に厄介なメイドだなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、そこまで見抜くのか。
思った以上に厄介なメイドだなぁ……

engChrName: Must you be like this every time, Melchior?
engSearchText: Must you be like this every time, Melchior?
jpnChrName: メルキオル──悪い癖です。
jpnSearchText: メルキオル──悪い癖です。

engChrName: Our work here is done. We have no reason to stay any longer.
engSearchText:
Our work here is done. We have no reason to stay
any longer.
jpnChrName: この場での目標は達成されました、 行きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
この場での目標は達成されました、
行きましょう。

engChrName: Fine, fine. I suppose you're right. We'll see you later, Professor.
engSearchText:
Fine, fine. I suppose you're right. We'll see you
later, Professor.
jpnChrName: はいはい、そうだね。 ──それじゃ、教授もまた後で。
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、そうだね。
──それじゃ、教授もまた後で。

engChrName: Very good, then. I will be waiting for you.
engSearchText: Very good, then. I will be waiting for you.
jpnChrName: ああ──待っているよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──待っているよ。

engChrName: Warning! Explosives detected!
engSearchText: Warning! Explosives detected!
jpnChrName: 警告──爆発物ヲ検知！
jpnSearchText: 警告──爆発物ヲ検知！

engChrName: That little bastard!
engSearchText: That little bastard!
jpnChrName: 仕掛けてやがったか……！
jpnSearchText: 仕掛けてやがったか……！

engChrName: ...! The Aurora!
engSearchText: ...! The Aurora!
jpnChrName: ！　《アウローラ》が……！
jpnSearchText: ！　《アウローラ》が……！

engChrName: XEROS! Use your stun mode to stop—
engSearchText: XEROS! Use your stun mode to stop—
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳ！ スタンモードで封じて──
jpnSearchText:
ＸＥＲＯＳ！
スタンモードで封じて──

engChrName: Ah-ah! No, you don't!
engSearchText: Ah-ah! No, you don't!
jpnChrName: おっと、それはダメさ！
jpnSearchText: おっと、それはダメさ！

engChrName: ARGH!
engSearchText: ARGH!
jpnChrName: ＧＹＡＮ……！？
jpnSearchText: ＧＹＡＮ……！？

engChrName: ...?! Noooooo!
engSearchText: ...?! Noooooo!
jpnChrName: ッ……！？ ──うああああっ……！！
jpnSearchText:
ッ……！？
──うああああっ……！！

engChrName: Ahh!
engSearchText: Ahh!
jpnChrName: ああっ！？
jpnSearchText: ああっ！？

engChrName: Quatre, you can't!
engSearchText: Quatre, you can't!
jpnChrName: カトル君、駄目ですっ！
jpnSearchText: カトル君、駄目ですっ！

engChrName: Get back here!
engSearchText: Get back here!
jpnChrName: よせえええっ──！！
jpnSearchText: よせえええっ──！！

engChrName: (I won't let it happen! I won't let anyone damage the place she holds so dear!)
engSearchText:
(I won't let it happen! I won't let anyone damage the
place she holds so dear!)
jpnChrName: （僕が守るんだ……！！   博士の場所を、絶対に──）
jpnSearchText:
（僕が守るんだ……！！
博士の場所を、絶対に──）
ッ─────

engChrName: Risette!
engSearchText: Risette!
jpnChrName: リゼットさんっ！！
jpnSearchText: リゼットさんっ！！

engChrName: Shit!
engSearchText: Shit!
jpnChrName: チィッ……！
jpnSearchText: チィッ……！

engChrName: Damn it!
engSearchText: Damn it!
jpnChrName: クソがッ……！！
jpnSearchText: クソがッ……！！
！！？？

engChrName: Wha...?
engSearchText: Wha...?
jpnSearchText: え───
………ッ…………

engChrName: There it is! I thought something was off about you, but I never figured it ran THAT deep!
engSearchText:
There it is! I thought something was off about you,
but I never figured it ran THAT deep!
jpnChrName: アハハ、妙な気配はしてたけど そこまでだったんだ……！？
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、妙な気配はしてたけど
そこまでだったんだ……！？

engChrName: I wonder if this is what came out of analyzing that other Emperor and the rest of those types?
engSearchText:
I wonder if this is what came out of analyzing that
other Emperor and the rest of those types?
jpnChrName: これも“あの皇帝”あたりを 観測・研究した成果なのかな！？
jpnSearchText:
これも“あの皇帝”あたりを
観測・研究した成果なのかな！？

engChrName: I will need to revise my expectations of Marduk's capabilities.
engSearchText:
I will need to revise my expectations of
Marduk's capabilities.
jpnChrName: マルドゥック社…… 想定以上と言うべきでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
マルドゥック社……
想定以上と言うべきでしょうか。

engChrName: Oh, and speak of the devil. I suppose it's time we made our exit, then, hmm?
engSearchText:
Oh, and speak of the devil. I suppose it's time we
made our exit, then, hmm?
jpnChrName: おっと、噂をすればか。 ──それじゃあ今日は退散するよ。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、噂をすればか。
──それじゃあ今日は退散するよ。

engChrName: As someone connected to another being not of flesh, you have my respect. Till we meet again.
engSearchText:
As someone connected to another being not of flesh,
you have my respect. Till we meet again.
jpnChrName: 同じ“傀儡”に関わる身として 敬意を表します──それでは。
jpnSearchText:
同じ“傀儡”に関わる身として
敬意を表します──それでは。

engChrName: No...way...
engSearchText: No...way...
jpnChrName: マジ……かよ………
jpnSearchText: マジ……かよ………

engChrName: Ri... Risette...
engSearchText: Ri... Risette...
jpnChrName: ……リゼット、さん…………
jpnSearchText: ……リゼット、さん…………

engChrName: This is... This is all my fault...
engSearchText: This is... This is all my fault...
jpnChrName: ……僕の……僕のせいで……………
jpnSearchText: ……僕の……僕のせいで……………

engChrName: ...You gonna be okay?
engSearchText: ...You gonna be okay?
jpnChrName: ……大丈夫そうか？
jpnSearchText: ……大丈夫そうか？

engChrName: ...Yes. I think so...
engSearchText: ...Yes. I think so...
jpnSearchText: ………ええ、何とか…………

engChrName: Basel Institute of Science Conference Room
engSearchText: Basel Institute of Science Conference Room
jpnChrName: バーゼル理科大学・会議室
jpnSearchText: バーゼル理科大学・会議室

engChrName: I apologize for our sudden arrival during the frenzied events of yesterday.
engSearchText:
I apologize for our sudden arrival during the frenzied
events of yesterday.
jpnChrName: ──昨日は慌ただしい中、 あのような形での訪問失礼しました。
jpnSearchText:
──昨日は慌ただしい中、
あのような形での訪問失礼しました。

engChrName: To start this off, I am general manager of Marduk Total Security Company, Gilliam Thorndyke.
engSearchText:
To start this off, I am general manager of Marduk
Total Security Company, Gilliam Thorndyke.
jpnChrName: 改めて、マルドゥック総合警備保障のＧＭ（ゼネラルマネージャー）、 ギリアム・ソーンダイクと申します。
jpnSearchText:
改めて、マルドゥック総合警備保障のＧＭ（ゼネラルマネージャー）、
ギリアム・ソーンダイクと申します。

engChrName: This is our chief of security, Kasim Al-Fayed.
engSearchText: This is our chief of security, Kasim Al-Fayed.
jpnChrName: こちらは警備主任のカシム・アルファイド。
jpnSearchText: こちらは警備主任のカシム・アルファイド。

engChrName: A pleasure to meet you all.
engSearchText: A pleasure to meet you all.
jpnChrName: どうぞ、お見知りおきを。
jpnSearchText: どうぞ、お見知りおきを。

engChrName: ('Al-Fayed'? Is he...?)
engSearchText: ('Al-Fayed'? Is he...?)
jpnChrName: （“アルファイド”ってまさか……）
jpnSearchText: （“アルファイド”ってまさか……）

engChrName: (No doubt about it.)
engSearchText: (No doubt about it.)
jpnChrName: （ハン、なるほどな……）
jpnSearchText: （ハン、なるほどな……）

engChrName: I was not expecting you to travel all the way to Basel, but it is an honor to meet you all the same.
engSearchText:
I was not expecting you to travel all the way to Basel,
but it is an honor to meet you all the same.
jpnChrName: フフ、直接出張ってくるとは思わなかったが 見（まみ）えられて光栄だよ、マルドゥックの方々。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、直接出張ってくるとは思わなかったが
見（まみ）えられて光栄だよ、マルドゥックの方々。

engChrName: I've heard many a rumor about how shrewd a manager you are, Mr. Thorndyke.
engSearchText:
I've heard many a rumor about how shrewd a
manager you are, Mr. Thorndyke.
jpnChrName: 噂はかねがね── かなりの辣腕（らつわん）だそうじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
噂はかねがね──
かなりの辣腕（らつわん）だそうじゃないか？

engChrName: Together with your chief of security's combat exploits.
engSearchText:
Together with your chief of security's
combat exploits.
jpnChrName: そちらの警備主任殿の勇名も 耳にしているよ。
jpnSearchText:
そちらの警備主任殿の勇名も
耳にしているよ。

engChrName: You make me blush, Your Highness.
engSearchText: You make me blush, Your Highness.
jpnChrName: フフ、これは汗顔の至り。
jpnSearchText: フフ、これは汗顔の至り。

engChrName: ...I am humbled by your words.
engSearchText: ...I am humbled by your words.
jpnChrName: ……恐縮です。
jpnSearchText: ……恐縮です。

engChrName: I arrived in my home country a few days ago, so I'm afraid I'm not up to date on all the latest developments...
engSearchText:
I arrived in my home country a few days ago, so I'm
afraid I'm not up to date on all the
latest developments...
jpnChrName: つい先日帰国したばかりで よく状況が分かっていないんだが……
jpnSearchText:
つい先日帰国したばかりで
よく状況が分かっていないんだが……

engChrName: ...but am I to understand that Marduk will be responsible for 'securing' the city of Basel for the remainder of the day?
engSearchText:
...but am I to understand that Marduk will be
responsible for 'securing' the city of Basel for the
remainder of the day?
jpnChrName: 結局、ＭＫ社が今日一杯バーゼル市内の “警備”を引き受けた認識でいいのかな？
jpnSearchText:
結局、ＭＫ社が今日一杯バーゼル市内の
“警備”を引き受けた認識でいいのかな？

engChrName: That is correct. Off the record, a presidential executive order was issued yesterday to that effect.
engSearchText:
That is correct. Off the record, a presidential
executive order was issued yesterday to that effect.
jpnChrName: ええ──非公式ですが昨日付けで 第二種大統領令が発令されました。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──非公式ですが昨日付けで
第二種大統領令が発令されました。

engChrName: A CID Special Ops unit will be arriving in the city this evening. Marduk's task will be to secure key facilities in Basel until they are ready.
engSearchText:
A CID Special Ops unit will be arriving in the city
this evening. Marduk's task will be to secure key
facilities in Basel until they are ready.
jpnChrName: 本日夕刻、ＣＩＤ特務部隊（タスクフォース）が到着、 展開するまで重要施設の警備を任せる契約です。
jpnSearchText:
本日夕刻、ＣＩＤ特務部隊（タスクフォース）が到着、
展開するまで重要施設の警備を任せる契約です。

engChrName: A Special Ops unit...
engSearchText: A Special Ops unit...
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの、特務部隊……
jpnSearchText: ＣＩＤの、特務部隊……

engChrName: Sending in Hercules, huh? Wouldn't shock me if you belonged to 'em, too, miss.
engSearchText:
Sending in Hercules, huh? Wouldn't shock me if you
belonged to 'em, too, miss.
jpnChrName: たしか《ハーキュリーズ》だったか。 そっちの姉さんも所属してそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
たしか《ハーキュリーズ》だったか。
そっちの姉さんも所属してそうだな？

engChrName: ...You're very astute.
engSearchText: ...You're very astute.
jpnChrName: ……察しがいいですね。
jpnSearchText: ……察しがいいですね。

engChrName: We've also brought one of the Ix-Alba series of airships that we're currently testing on behalf of the Republican Army.
engSearchText:
We've also brought one of the Ix-Alba series of
airships that we're currently testing on behalf of the
Republican Army.
jpnChrName: 合わせて弊社が試験運用を行っている、 共和国軍新型艦《イクス＝アルバ級》──
jpnSearchText:
合わせて弊社が試験運用を行っている、
共和国軍新型艦《イクス＝アルバ級》──

engChrName: Said airship will allow us to ensure the integrity of the orbal network.
engSearchText:
Said airship will allow us to ensure the integrity of the
orbal network.
jpnChrName: それを介して、導力ネットワークの “保守”も行うこととなっております。
jpnSearchText:
それを介して、導力ネットワークの
“保守”も行うこととなっております。

engChrName: Which is how we're able to have this conversation, I suppose.
engSearchText:
Which is how we're able to have this conversation,
I suppose.
jpnChrName: 今まさにこの会話も それで成り立っているわけか。
jpnSearchText:
今まさにこの会話も
それで成り立っているわけか。

engChrName: Your concierge isn't the only way you've gotten your hooks into Basel, I see.
engSearchText:
Your concierge isn't the only way you've gotten your
hooks into Basel, I see.
jpnChrName: 御社の出向ＳＣといい、想像以上に バーゼルに食い込んでるじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
御社の出向ＳＣといい、想像以上に
バーゼルに食い込んでるじゃないか？

engChrName: Our goals on this particular occasion are simply to protect this city and its orbal network.
engSearchText:
Our goals on this particular occasion are simply to
protect this city and its orbal network.
jpnChrName: 今回はあくまで都市の警備と ネットワーク保守に限定されています。
jpnSearchText:
今回はあくまで都市の警備と
ネットワーク保守に限定されています。

engChrName: Rest assured that much like your country, we have no intention of getting too deeply involved in Basel's affairs.
engSearchText:
Rest assured that much like your country, we have no
intention of getting too deeply involved in
Basel's affairs.
jpnChrName: 貴国同様、一線は引かれていますので どうかご容赦いただければと。
jpnSearchText:
貴国同様、一線は引かれていますので
どうかご容赦いただければと。

engChrName: That is our stance as well. We are only doing what we consider necessary.
engSearchText:
That is our stance as well. We are only doing what we
consider necessary.
jpnChrName: ええ、そこはご安心を。 あくまで必要措置だと考えて頂ければ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そこはご安心を。
あくまで必要措置だと考えて頂ければ。

engChrName: Very well. I will take your word on that—for now. Quelling the chaos unfolding before us clearly does come first.
engSearchText:
Very well. I will take your word on that—for now.
Quelling the chaos unfolding before us clearly does
come first.
jpnChrName: まあいい──ひとまずは 事態の収拾が最優先なのは確かだからね。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい──ひとまずは
事態の収拾が最優先なのは確かだからね。

engChrName: However, given our stake in Verne and connection to the institute, this current state of affairs is of grave concern to us.
engSearchText:
However, given our stake in Verne and connection to
the institute, this current state of affairs is of grave
concern to us.
jpnChrName: だが、ヴェルヌの株主としても、 理科大学関係者としても見過ごせない事態だ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、ヴェルヌの株主としても、
理科大学関係者としても見過ごせない事態だ。

engChrName: You have a lot to answer for here as CEO, Mr. Tausend.
engSearchText:
You have a lot to answer for here as CEO,
Mr. Tausend.
jpnChrName: ──タウゼントＣＥＯ、今回の件に 貴方はどう責任を取られるおつもりかな？
jpnSearchText:
──タウゼントＣＥＯ、今回の件に
貴方はどう責任を取られるおつもりかな？

engChrName: P-Please! If I may defend myself, I never could have seen this coming!
engSearchText:
P-Please! If I may defend myself, I never could have
seen this coming!
jpnChrName: っ……お、お待ちください殿下！ 今回は予測不能の事態と言いますか……！
jpnSearchText:
っ……お、お待ちください殿下！
今回は予測不能の事態と言いますか……！

engChrName: There is some merit to that argument, but it also leaves out a number of key facts.
engSearchText:
There is some merit to that argument, but it also
leaves out a number of key facts.
jpnChrName: ま、心中お察しするけど 管理責任は決して軽くないでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、心中お察しするけど
管理責任は決して軽くないでしょうね。

engChrName: You're to see that shareholders' mira is used to generate a profit, and yet you covered up a huge potential problem for over a month.
engSearchText:
You're to see that shareholders' mira is used to
generate a profit, and yet you covered up a huge
potential problem for over a month.
jpnChrName: 実利最優先の体制下における 一ヶ月以上もの異常現象の隠蔽。
jpnSearchText:
実利最優先の体制下における
一ヶ月以上もの異常現象の隠蔽。

engChrName: We confirmed last night that it wasn't just Almata's money being used for ill. Elsaim's investments were also misappropriated.
engSearchText:
We confirmed last night that it wasn't just Almata's
money being used for ill. Elsaim's investments were
also misappropriated.
jpnChrName: 昨夜の時点でアルマータの裏金以外にも 公国の資金の不正利用も確認されている。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜の時点でアルマータの裏金以外にも
公国の資金の不正利用も確認されている。

engChrName: And if these are the result of you turning a blind eye to Professor Callaghan's behavior all this time...
engSearchText:
And if these are the result of you turning a blind eye
to Professor Callaghan's behavior all this time...
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授の暴走を放置した結果が 今のこの状況だと考えると──
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授の暴走を放置した結果が
今のこの状況だと考えると──

engChrName: Y-You keep your mouth shut! Just who do you think you are? Who gave you the right to speak?!
engSearchText:
Y-You keep your mouth shut! Just who do you think
you are? Who gave you the right to speak?!
jpnChrName: だ、黙りたまえ！ そもそも君はなんなんだね！？
jpnSearchText:
だ、黙りたまえ！
そもそも君はなんなんだね！？

engChrName: I don't care if you ARE Student Council president at Aramis! This is none of your—
engSearchText:
I don't care if you ARE Student Council president
at Aramis! This is none of your—
jpnChrName: 首都の名門校の生徒会長とはいえ、 学生ごときがこの場に──
jpnSearchText:
首都の名門校の生徒会長とはいえ、
学生ごときがこの場に──

engChrName: I am here as a special advisor for Liberl's ZCF.
engSearchText: I am here as a special advisor for Liberl's ZCF.
jpnChrName: ──この場での私の立場は リベールＺＣＦの“特別顧問”になるわ。
jpnSearchText:
──この場での私の立場は
リベールＺＣＦの“特別顧問”になるわ。

engChrName: I also serve as a negotiator representing the Epstein Foundation.
engSearchText:
I also serve as a negotiator representing the
Epstein Foundation.
jpnChrName: 加えてエプスタイン財団から “代理折衝役”も請け負っている。
jpnSearchText:
加えてエプスタイン財団から
“代理折衝役”も請け負っている。

engChrName: In other words, I'm here to speak up against anything that threatens their interests—which this has. Now do I have the right to speak?
engSearchText:
In other words, I'm here to speak up against anything
that threatens their interests—which this has.
Now do I have the right to speak?
jpnChrName: 今回の件で少なからず権益を侵害された 両社の代理人として──何か問題でも？
jpnSearchText:
今回の件で少なからず権益を侵害された
両社の代理人として──何か問題でも？

engChrName: Wh... Wh... Wh...
engSearchText: Wh... Wh... Wh...

engChrName: Renne...
engSearchText: Renne...
jpnChrName: レン先輩……
jpnSearchText: レン先輩……

engChrName: Now that's a dramatic twist straight out of a play.
engSearchText: Now that's a dramatic twist straight out of a play.
jpnChrName: オイオイ……劇画（コミック）かよ。
jpnSearchText: オイオイ……劇画（コミック）かよ。

engChrName: I've heard rumors swirling about you, but I never expected you to show up here.
engSearchText:
I've heard rumors swirling about you, but I never
expected you to show up here.
jpnChrName: フフ、噂程度には聞いていたが。
jpnSearchText: <C1>フフ、噂程度には聞いていたが。

engChrName: Still, she's right. We aren't the only shareholder that will be concerned by this. Other related companies will be as well.
engSearchText:
Still, she's right. We aren't the only shareholder that
will be concerned by this. Other related companies
will be as well.
jpnChrName: 公国以外の株主に、関連企業にとっても 見過ごせない事態になっているのは確かだ。
jpnSearchText:
公国以外の株主に、関連企業にとっても
見過ごせない事態になっているのは確かだ。

engChrName: I hope you don't need me to spell out exactly what kind of a situation you're in here.
engSearchText:
I hope you don't need me to spell out exactly what
kind of a situation you're in here.
jpnChrName: それを踏まえて何が問われているのか── みなまで言わずとも承知の上だと思うがね？
jpnSearchText:
それを踏まえて何が問われているのか──
みなまで言わずとも承知の上だと思うがね？

engChrName: Ugh... B-But...
engSearchText: Ugh... B-But...
jpnChrName: ……ぐうっ、ですがっ…………
jpnSearchText: ……ぐうっ、ですがっ…………

engChrName: When will you grow a damned SPINE?!
engSearchText: When will you grow a damned SPINE?!
jpnChrName: ──だからいい加減に腹ァ括れや！！
jpnSearchText: ──だからいい加減に腹ァ括れや！！

engChrName: The danger here isn't over! Anyone can see that!
engSearchText: The danger here isn't over! Anyone can see that!
jpnChrName: 聞いている限りヤバいのはまだ続いている！！
jpnSearchText: 聞いている限りヤバいのはまだ続いている！！

engChrName: And you still intend to do NOTHING after what happened to Callaghan?!
engSearchText:
And you still intend to do NOTHING after what
happened to Callaghan?!
jpnChrName: キャラハンがあんな事になっちまった今 アンタがシャキッとしなくてどうする！？
jpnSearchText:
キャラハンがあんな事になっちまった今
アンタがシャキッとしなくてどうする！？

engChrName: Professor Hamilton left YOU in charge of Verne! Of Basel! Don't you feel any shame?!
engSearchText:
Professor Hamilton left YOU in charge of Verne!
Of Basel! Don't you feel any shame?!
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌを──バーゼルを託してくれた博士に 顔向けできねえとは思わねえのかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌを──バーゼルを託してくれた博士に
顔向けできねえとは思わねえのかよ！？
っ……わ、私は…………

engChrName: In any event, we now have half a day before the cogs start turning again.
engSearchText:
In any event, we now have half a day before the cogs
start turning again.
jpnChrName: ──いずれにせよ、今日半日は “空白期間”となりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
──いずれにせよ、今日半日は
“空白期間”となりそうだ。

engChrName: Even if we do nothing, the Calvardian government will see to it that matters are resolved...
engSearchText:
Even if we do nothing, the Calvardian government
will see to it that matters are resolved...
jpnChrName: 何もしなければ“共和国”が 全てを片付けてしまうだろう──
jpnSearchText:
何もしなければ“共和国”が
全てを片付けてしまうだろう──

engChrName: ...but knowing how egregiously my country's funds have been misused, I refuse to stand by and do nothing.
engSearchText:
...but knowing how egregiously my country's funds
have been misused, I refuse to stand by and
do nothing.
jpnChrName: だが我が国も資金を悪用された手前、 何も手を打たないというのは有り得ない。
jpnSearchText:
だが我が国も資金を悪用された手前、
何も手を打たないというのは有り得ない。

engChrName: So, Arkride Solutions. Might I enlist your services for the remainder of the day?
engSearchText:
So, Arkride Solutions. Might I enlist your services for
the remainder of the day?
jpnChrName: ──アークライド解決事務所の諸君、 今日一杯は事件への対応をお願いできるかな？
jpnSearchText:
──アークライド解決事務所の諸君、
今日一杯は事件への対応をお願いできるかな？

engChrName: Of course, you can approach the task in whatever way best suits you—just as you did in Tharbad and have done many times before.
engSearchText:
Of course, you can approach the task in whatever way
best suits you—just as you did in Tharbad and have
done many times before.
jpnChrName: 君たちならではの流儀で構わない、 サルバッドのように、それ以前までのように。
jpnSearchText:
君たちならではの流儀で構わない、
サルバッドのように、それ以前までのように。

engChrName: My only true wish is that you put a stop to Almata's plans before they can bear fruit. Does this sound doable?
engSearchText:
My only true wish is that you put a stop to Almata's
plans before they can bear fruit. Does this
sound doable?
jpnChrName: そして叶うならば──アルマータの目論見が 実を結ぶ前に叩き潰してくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
そして叶うならば──アルマータの目論見が
実を結ぶ前に叩き潰してくれたまえ。

engChrName: We'll be well compensated for this, I trust?
engSearchText: We'll be well compensated for this, I trust?
jpnChrName: ──当然、 報酬は弾んで頂けるんでしょうね？
jpnSearchText:
──当然、
報酬は弾んで頂けるんでしょうね？

engChrName: After the conference...
engSearchText: After the conference...
jpnChrName: 会議後──
jpnSearchText: 会議後──

engChrName: Kasim...why?
engSearchText: Kasim...why?
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃん、どうして……
jpnSearchText: お兄ちゃん、どうして……

engChrName: It's been some time, Ferida.
engSearchText: It's been some time, Ferida.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりだな、フェリーダ。
jpnSearchText: 久しぶりだな、フェリーダ。

engChrName: I suspected you two were related...
engSearchText: I suspected you two were related...
jpnChrName: やっぱり……
jpnSearchText: やっぱり……

engChrName: Your brother, right? Never expected him to be one of Marduk's hunting dogs.
engSearchText:
Your brother, right? Never expected him to be one of
Marduk's hunting dogs.
jpnChrName: ……ハン、聞いてた出稼ぎ先が マルドゥックの“猟犬”だったとはな。
jpnSearchText:
……ハン、聞いてた出稼ぎ先が
マルドゥックの“猟犬”だったとはな。

engChrName: I hear you've been taking good care of my sister, Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
I hear you've been taking good care of my sister,
Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 妹が世話になっているようだ。 アークライド解決事務所の諸君。
jpnSearchText:
妹が世話になっているようだ。
アークライド解決事務所の諸君。

engChrName: As for you, Van...it's been two years, I believe?
engSearchText: As for you, Van...it's been two years, I believe?
jpnChrName: それとヴァン──君とも２年ぶりか。
jpnSearchText: それとヴァン──君とも２年ぶりか。

engChrName: I understand you've greatly improved your use of the stun caliber and your martial arts.
engSearchText:
I understand you've greatly improved your use of the
stun caliber and your martial arts.
jpnChrName: 撃剣に零式勁術── また随分と腕を上げたらしい。
jpnSearchText:
撃剣に零式勁術──
また随分と腕を上げたらしい。

engChrName: Risette mentioned as much. As your former instructor, that fills me with great pride.
engSearchText:
Risette mentioned as much. As your former
instructor, that fills me with great pride.
jpnChrName: リゼット嬢から聞いてはいたが、 元教官として鼻が高い。
jpnSearchText:
リゼット嬢から聞いてはいたが、
元教官として鼻が高い。

engChrName: I try. Still not so hot with the tactics stuff you taught me, though.
engSearchText:
I try. Still not so hot with the tactics stuff you taught
me, though.
jpnChrName: ま、それなりにはな。 アンタの戦術指南はボチボチって所だが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、それなりにはな。
アンタの戦術指南はボチボチって所だが。

engChrName: I've heard all kinds of stories about you, too, but I never expected our first meeting to be like this.
engSearchText:
I've heard all kinds of stories about you, too, but I
never expected our first meeting to be like this.
jpnChrName: ＧＭ殿も、話くらいは聞いちゃいたが こんな形で直接会うなんてな。
jpnSearchText:
ＧＭ殿も、話くらいは聞いちゃいたが
こんな形で直接会うなんてな。

engChrName: Heh. In that we are agreed.
engSearchText: Heh. In that we are agreed.
jpnChrName: フフ、それはこちらの台詞さ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、それはこちらの台詞さ。

engChrName: Still, while we might be providing our services and your weapon, I believe the contract between us to be an equal one.
engSearchText:
Still, while we might be providing our services and
your weapon, I believe the contract between us to be
an equal one.
jpnChrName: 武装とサービスを提供しているとはいえ、 君との“契約”はあくまで対等──
jpnSearchText:
武装とサービスを提供しているとはいえ、
君との“契約”はあくまで対等──

engChrName: I hope that we can continue our fine partnership, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
I hope that we can continue our fine partnership,
Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: これを機会に、改めて宜しく頼むよ。 ヴァン・アークライド君。
jpnSearchText:
これを機会に、改めて宜しく頼むよ。
ヴァン・アークライド君。

engChrName: Yeah, let's not get too friendly. I'm not interested in becomin' any more than just a contractor to you.
engSearchText:
Yeah, let's not get too friendly. I'm not interested in
becomin' any more than just a contractor to you.
jpnChrName: 馴れ合いは止めとこうぜ。 契約以上になる気もないんでね。
jpnSearchText:
馴れ合いは止めとこうぜ。
契約以上になる気もないんでね。

engChrName: Still, since we're here, there is one thing I wanna ask.
engSearchText: Still, since we're here, there is one thing I wanna ask.
jpnChrName: だが、この機会にって言うなら アンタには聞いておきたいことがある。
jpnSearchText:
だが、この機会にって言うなら
アンタには聞いておきたいことがある。

engChrName: Just how long has she been like that?
engSearchText: Just how long has she been like that?
jpnChrName: ──彼女はいつからああなんだ？
jpnSearchText: ──彼女はいつからああなんだ？

engChrName: Information on our concierge is classified, I'm afraid.
engSearchText: Information on our concierge is classified, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: 弊社所属ＳＣの“詳細”については 基本的に秘匿事項とさせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
弊社所属ＳＣの“詳細”については
基本的に秘匿事項とさせてもらおう。

engChrName: However, if an approximate timeframe will suffice, I suppose I can oblige: about a year ago.
engSearchText:
However, if an approximate timeframe will suffice, I
suppose I can oblige: about a year ago.
jpnChrName: だが“時期”程度なら構わない。 ──およそ１年ほど前からになるかな？
jpnSearchText:
だが“時期”程度なら構わない。
──およそ１年ほど前からになるかな？

engChrName: Something's seemed off about her all this time.
engSearchText: Something's seemed off about her all this time.
jpnChrName: ……おかしいとは思っていた。
jpnSearchText: ……おかしいとは思っていた。

engChrName: We first started talkin' three years ago, but the first time we actually met was just in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
We first started talkin' three years ago, but the first
time we actually met was just in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: 通信越しの付き合いが３年── 初対面はついこの間のサルバッドだ。
jpnSearchText:
通信越しの付き合いが３年──
初対面はついこの間のサルバッドだ。

engChrName: Even when I visited Ored for lessons on tactics, she was conveniently unavailable.
engSearchText:
Even when I visited Ored for lessons on tactics, she
was conveniently unavailable.
jpnChrName: 戦術指南でオレド本社を訪れた時ですら 都合が合わずに会えなかったからな。
jpnSearchText:
戦術指南でオレド本社を訪れた時ですら
都合が合わずに会えなかったからな。

engChrName: (That sounds like...)
engSearchText: (That sounds like...)

engChrName: (Does that mean...?)
engSearchText: (Does that mean...?)
jpnChrName: （まさか──）
jpnSearchText: （まさか──）

engChrName: Still, I know she's in good hands with Associate Professor Archette.
engSearchText:
Still, I know she's in good hands with Associate
Professor Archette.
jpnChrName: 幸い、アーチェット准教授がいる。 彼女の処置については心配無用だろう。
jpnSearchText:
幸い、アーチェット准教授がいる。
彼女の処置については心配無用だろう。

engChrName: I also happened to bring some compatible parts that she can use.
engSearchText:
I also happened to bring some compatible parts that
she can use.
jpnChrName: 念の為、適合するタイプの “予備パーツ”も運んできているからね。
jpnSearchText:
念の為、適合するタイプの
“予備パーツ”も運んできているからね。

engChrName: Though I regret that Ms. Twinings will not be able to provide you with any more of her services for the time being.
engSearchText:
Though I regret that Ms. Twinings will not be able to
provide you with any more of her services for the
time being.
jpnChrName: 今回はこれ以上“出向ＳＣ”として 力になれないのは申し訳ないが。
jpnSearchText:
今回はこれ以上“出向ＳＣ”として
力になれないのは申し訳ないが。

engChrName: You ain't got nothin' to apologize for.
engSearchText: You ain't got nothin' to apologize for.
jpnChrName: ……アンタに謝られる筋合いはねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ……アンタに謝られる筋合いはねぇ。

engChrName: I doubt any amount of workers' comp I could give her would make up for forcing her to do somethin' that crazy...
engSearchText:
I doubt any amount of workers' comp I could give her
would make up for forcing her to do somethin'
that crazy...
jpnChrName: あんな無茶をさせちまった分の借りが 負傷手当程度で返せるかは分からんが……
jpnSearchText:
あんな無茶をさせちまった分の借りが
負傷手当程度で返せるかは分からんが……

engChrName: ...but either way, that's my problem to deal with, not yours.
engSearchText:
...but either way, that's my problem to deal with,
not yours.
jpnChrName: その辺はあくまで“こっち”の話だ。
jpnSearchText: その辺はあくまで“こっち”の話だ。

engChrName: Well, I apologize for meddling in your affairs, then.
engSearchText: Well, I apologize for meddling in your affairs, then.
jpnChrName: フフ、余計なお世話だったかな？
jpnSearchText: フフ、余計なお世話だったかな？

engChrName: With that said, we must take our leave. We've negotiations with the Republican Army to attend to.
engSearchText:
With that said, we must take our leave.
We've negotiations with the Republican Army to
attend to.
jpnChrName: それでは、我々はこれで失礼する。 これから共和国軍との折衝もあってね。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、我々はこれで失礼する。
これから共和国軍との折衝もあってね。

engChrName: As I mentioned during the conference, we've no intention of interfering in this crisis any more than is necessary.
engSearchText:
As I mentioned during the conference, we've no
intention of interfering in this crisis any more than
is necessary.
jpnChrName: 先ほども言ったが今回は これ以上踏み込むことはない。
jpnSearchText:
先ほども言ったが今回は
これ以上踏み込むことはない。

engChrName: ...Fascinated though I am by what a genius can achieve through an obsession that knows no bounds.
engSearchText:
...Fascinated though I am by what a genius can
achieve through an obsession that knows no bounds.
jpnChrName: かつての天才の“執念の研究”── 非常にそそられはするがね。
jpnSearchText:
かつての天才の“執念の研究”──
非常にそそられはするがね。

engChrName: K-Kasim, wait!
engSearchText: K-Kasim, wait!
jpnChrName: お、お兄ちゃん……！
jpnSearchText: お、お兄ちゃん……！

engChrName: There are a number of matters Abi and I disagree on.
engSearchText: There are a number of matters Abi and I disagree on.
jpnChrName: ──俺の考えは父（アブ）とは違う。
jpnSearchText: ──俺の考えは父（アブ）とは違う。

engChrName: Whether you are suited to being a warrior is very much one of them.
engSearchText:
Whether you are suited to being a warrior is very
much one of them.
jpnChrName: 特にお前が“戦士”に 向いているかどうかの見解はな。
jpnSearchText:
特にお前が“戦士”に
向いているかどうかの見解はな。

engChrName: Still, I can only assume it was the guidance of the flames and Arusha that led you here.
engSearchText:
Still, I can only assume it was the guidance of the
flames and Arusha that led you here.
jpnChrName: だが今回、この地に来たのは 焔と翼の女神（アルーシャ）の導きではあるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
だが今回、この地に来たのは
焔と翼の女神（アルーシャ）の導きではあるだろう。

engChrName: Battle is almost upon us—and I will be watching to see how you fare through it.
engSearchText:
Battle is almost upon us—and I will be watching to
see how you fare through it.
jpnChrName: 戦場（いくさば）は近い──クルガの戦士として どう乗り越えるか見せてもらうぞ？
jpnSearchText:
戦場（いくさば）は近い──クルガの戦士として
どう乗り越えるか見せてもらうぞ？

engChrName: Feri...
engSearchText: Feri...
jpnChrName: ……フェリちゃん……
jpnSearchText: ……フェリちゃん……

engChrName: As much as I'd love to write him off as an arrogant asshole, I can't get enough of a read on him.
engSearchText:
As much as I'd love to write him off as an arrogant
asshole, I can't get enough of a read on him.
jpnChrName: 偉そうに……と言いてぇトコだが “底”が全く読めねぇとはな。
jpnSearchText:
偉そうに……と言いてぇトコだが
“底”が全く読めねぇとはな。

engChrName: Just how tough is he?
engSearchText: Just how tough is he?
jpnChrName: どのくらいやるんだ──あの野郎？
jpnSearchText: どのくらいやるんだ──あの野郎？

engChrName: I'd say he's one of the strongest jaegers who ever lived.
engSearchText:
I'd say he's one of the strongest jaegers who
ever lived.
jpnChrName: 恐らく── “史上最強の猟兵”の一人だろう。
jpnSearchText:
恐らく──
“史上最強の猟兵”の一人だろう。

engChrName: Your conversation is over, then?
engSearchText: Your conversation is over, then?
jpnChrName: 話は終わったみたいね？
jpnSearchText: 話は終わったみたいね？

engChrName: Renne! Where are the others?
engSearchText: Renne! Where are the others?
jpnChrName: 先輩、オデットたちは……？
jpnSearchText: 先輩、オデットたちは……？

engChrName: They're still here. There was talk of them returning to the capital, but that's not going to be possible now with the whole area on lockdown.
engSearchText:
They're still here. There was talk of them returning to
the capital, but that's not going to be possible now
with the whole area on lockdown.
jpnChrName: 首都に戻るか話してたけど…… 今日一杯はバーゼルにカンヅメになりそうね。
jpnSearchText:
首都に戻るか話してたけど……
今日一杯はバーゼルにカンヅメになりそうね。

engChrName: The roads, the railways...even the airspace around Edith is sectioned off. Not like that comes as any surprise after what happened.
engSearchText:
The roads, the railways...even the airspace around
Edith is sectioned off. Not like that comes as any
surprise after what happened.
jpnChrName: 車道と鉄道、空路の全面封鎖── あんな事があれば無理もないけど。
jpnSearchText:
車道と鉄道、空路の全面封鎖──
あんな事があれば無理もないけど。

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: あんな事……？
jpnSearchText: あんな事……？

engChrName: What happened now?
engSearchText: What happened now?
jpnChrName: ……首都周辺で何かあったか？
jpnSearchText: ……首都周辺で何かあったか？

engChrName: There was an explosion in Anchorville City.
engSearchText: There was an explosion in Anchorville City.
jpnChrName: ええ──アンカーヴィル市で 爆発事件があったそうよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──アンカーヴィル市で
爆発事件があったそうよ。

engChrName: There were no casualties, fortunately, but we suspect that Almata might have been involved.
engSearchText:
There were no casualties, fortunately, but we suspect
that Almata might have been involved.
jpnChrName: 幸い死傷者は出なかったそうだけど、 アルマータのテロの疑いがあってね。
jpnSearchText:
幸い死傷者は出なかったそうだけど、
アルマータのテロの疑いがあってね。

engChrName: Anchorville's a decent-sized city north of the capital, right?
engSearchText:
Anchorville's a decent-sized city north of the
capital, right?
jpnChrName: 首都の北にある それなりにデカい街だったな。
jpnSearchText:
首都の北にある
それなりにデカい街だったな。

engChrName: Yeah. That must've been just a diversion, while this is their real target.
engSearchText:
Yeah. That must've been just a diversion, while this is
their real target.
jpnChrName: 間違いなくこっちが本命の “陽動”ってところか。
jpnSearchText:
間違いなくこっちが本命の
“陽動”ってところか。

engChrName: Oh, I think that's almost certain. However, given its proximity to the capital, we can't afford to take it lightly.
engSearchText:
Oh, I think that's almost certain. However, given its
proximity to the capital, we can't afford to take
it lightly.
jpnChrName: ええ──ほぼ確実だけど 首都との近さを考えると捨て置けなくてね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──ほぼ確実だけど
首都との近さを考えると捨て置けなくてね。

engChrName: Both the CID and the guild are being pushed to their limits right now. We won't be able to give you any backup.
engSearchText:
Both the CID and the guild are being pushed to their
limits right now. We won't be able to give you
any backup.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤは勿論、ギルドも対応に追われている── バックアップは期待しないでちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤは勿論、ギルドも対応に追われている──
バックアップは期待しないでちょうだい。

engChrName: That's fine. We weren't expectin' any to begin with.
engSearchText: That's fine. We weren't expectin' any to begin with.
jpnChrName: ま、元より期待はしてないさ。
jpnSearchText: ま、元より期待はしてないさ。

engChrName: But you can at least share whatever info you manage to gather, surely? That goes for stuff from ZCF and the foundation, too.
engSearchText:
But you can at least share whatever info you manage
to gather, surely? That goes for stuff from ZCF and
the foundation, too.
jpnChrName: だがせめて情報だけは回してくれねぇか？ ＺＣＦや“財団”方面もな。
jpnSearchText:
だがせめて情報だけは回してくれねぇか？
ＺＣＦや“財団”方面もな。

engChrName: That sounds fair to me—insofar as our interests align, of course.
engSearchText:
That sounds fair to me—insofar as our interests align,
of course.
jpnChrName: ……いいでしょう。 利害が一致する範囲でなら。
jpnSearchText:
……いいでしょう。
利害が一致する範囲でなら。

engChrName: I'll also do what I can. Just take care of Agnès for me in return, please.
engSearchText:
I'll also do what I can. Just take care of Agnès for me
in return, please.
jpnChrName: こちらも頼まれてあげるわ。 そっちもアニエスをよろしくね。
jpnSearchText:
こちらも頼まれてあげるわ。
そっちもアニエスをよろしくね。

engChrName: Thank you, Renne.
engSearchText: Thank you, Renne.
jpnChrName: 先輩……ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: 先輩……ありがとうございます。

engChrName: I hear the initial work is done on your concierge, too.
engSearchText: I hear the initial work is done on your concierge, too.
jpnChrName: そうだ── ＳＣさんの処置が終わったみたいよ？
jpnSearchText:
そうだ──
ＳＣさんの処置が終わったみたいよ？

engChrName: That's Professor Hamilton's family for you. Geniuses to the last.
engSearchText:
That's Professor Hamilton's family for you.
Geniuses to the last.
jpnChrName: さすがハミルトン一門、天才揃いね。
jpnSearchText: さすがハミルトン一門、天才揃いね。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: Thanks for tellin' us.
engSearchText: Thanks for tellin' us.
jpnChrName: ……わざわざすまねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ……わざわざすまねぇな。

engChrName: That's so good to hear...
engSearchText: That's so good to hear...
jpnChrName: リゼットさんが……
jpnSearchText: リゼットさんが……

engChrName: She was being seen to in Associate Professor Esmeray's room, wasn't she?
engSearchText:
She was being seen to in Associate Professor
Esmeray's room, wasn't she?
jpnChrName: 処置はエスメレー准教授の研究室で 行われているんでしたか……
jpnSearchText:
処置はエスメレー准教授の研究室で
行われているんでしたか……

engChrName: Let's go say hi, then.
engSearchText: Let's go say hi, then.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 一応、顔を出しとくか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
一応、顔を出しとくか。

engChrName: Oh! Hellooo there.
engSearchText: Oh! Hellooo there.
jpnChrName: あ、皆さん～………
jpnSearchText: あ、皆さん～………

engChrName: I hope everything went well.
engSearchText: I hope everything went well.
jpnChrName: ……お疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText: ……お疲れ様です。

engChrName: Thanks. Sounds like you pulled an all-nighter, huh?
engSearchText: Thanks. Sounds like you pulled an all-nighter, huh?
jpnChrName: アンタたちの方こそな。 ほぼ、徹夜してたみてぇじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
アンタたちの方こそな。
ほぼ、徹夜してたみてぇじゃねえか。

engChrName: Looks like XEROS is up and running again.
engSearchText: Looks like XEROS is up and running again.
jpnChrName: あ……ＸＥＲＯＳは 何とか治ったみたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
あ……ＸＥＲＯＳは
何とか治ったみたいですね？

engChrName: RUFF.
engSearchText: RUFF.
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ．
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ．

engChrName: Mm-hmm. Fortunately for us, the damage for him wasn't so bad.
engSearchText:
Mm-hmm. Fortunately for us, the damage for him
wasn't so bad.
jpnChrName: うん、そこまで大変な 損傷じゃなかったから～。
jpnSearchText:
うん、そこまで大変な
損傷じゃなかったから～。

engChrName: I just wish I could say the same about Risette. Putting her back to the way she was is going to take a while...
engSearchText:
I just wish I could say the same about Risette.
Putting her back to the way she was is going to take
a while...
jpnChrName: ……リゼットさんの方はかなり 時間がかかっちゃいそうだけど～……
jpnSearchText:
……リゼットさんの方はかなり
時間がかかっちゃいそうだけど～……

engChrName: Please, don't be so downhearted.
engSearchText: Please, don't be so downhearted.
jpnChrName: ……どうか、お気になさらずに。
jpnSearchText: ……どうか、お気になさらずに。

engChrName: The first-rate care you've been giving me has stabilized my vitals a considerable amount.
engSearchText:
The first-rate care you've been giving me has
stabilized my vitals a considerable amount.
jpnChrName: 的確な処置をしていただいたおかげで バイタルも随分と安定しました。
jpnSearchText:
的確な処置をしていただいたおかげで
バイタルも随分と安定しました。

engChrName: ...I'm relieved to hear that.
engSearchText: ...I'm relieved to hear that.
jpnChrName: ………安心、しました。
jpnSearchText: ………安心、しました。

engChrName: Have you spoken to Mr. Thorndyke?
engSearchText: Have you spoken to Mr. Thorndyke?
jpnChrName: ……ソーンダイクＧＭとは 話されましたか？
jpnSearchText:
……ソーンダイクＧＭとは
話されましたか？

engChrName: Did before comin' here, yeah. He's as much of a questionable character as I was expecting.
engSearchText:
Did before comin' here, yeah. He's as much of a
questionable character as I was expecting.
jpnChrName: ああ、ついさっきな── 分かっちゃいたが相当性格が悪そうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ついさっきな──
分かっちゃいたが相当性格が悪そうだ。

engChrName: Their chief of security's the same ol' standoffish grump, too. You'd think it'd kill him to put on a smile.
engSearchText:
Their chief of security's the same ol' standoffish
grump, too. You'd think it'd kill him to put on
a smile.
jpnChrName: 警備主任も相変わらずの堅物でな。 もう少し愛想よくしてもいいだろうに。
jpnSearchText:
警備主任も相変わらずの堅物でな。
もう少し愛想よくしてもいいだろうに。

engChrName: Haha... That's just how they are, I'm afraid...
engSearchText: Haha... That's just how they are, I'm afraid...
jpnChrName: ふふ……そういう方々ですから……
jpnSearchText: ふふ……そういう方々ですから……

engChrName: It's fine, you know. You don't need to force yourself to speak.
engSearchText:
It's fine, you know. You don't need to force yourself
to speak.
jpnChrName: ハン…… 無理して喋ってんじゃねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
無理して喋ってんじゃねえぞ。

engChrName: Umm... For what it's worth, her life isn't in any danger here.
engSearchText:
Umm... For what it's worth, her life isn't in any
danger here.
jpnChrName: その、心配しなくても “命”に別状はないから～。
jpnSearchText:
その、心配しなくても
“命”に別状はないから～。

engChrName: The medicine you helped me with yesterday seems to have been working wonders.
engSearchText:
The medicine you helped me with yesterday seems to
have been working wonders.
jpnChrName: 昨日、みんなが手伝ってくれた あの薬も効いてくれたみたい～。
jpnSearchText:
昨日、みんなが手伝ってくれた
あの薬も効いてくれたみたい～。

engChrName: She's right. It has really made this easier for me.
engSearchText: She's right. It has really made this easier for me.
jpnChrName: ええ……おかげさまで 随分と楽になりました……
jpnSearchText:
ええ……おかげさまで
随分と楽になりました……

engChrName: Good to hear. We sure didn't think it'd end up bein' used on you when we took that job on.
engSearchText:
Good to hear. We sure didn't think it'd end up bein'
used on you when we took that job on.
jpnChrName: そうか……まさか お前さんに使う事になるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……まさか
お前さんに使う事になるとはな。

engChrName: The artificial limbs that Mr. Thorndyke brought with him are compatible with her, too.
engSearchText:
The artificial limbs that Mr. Thorndyke brought with
him are compatible with her, too.
jpnChrName: ＧＭさんが持ってきてくれた “擬体パーツ”も使えそうだし～。
jpnSearchText:
ＧＭさんが持ってきてくれた
“擬体パーツ”も使えそうだし～。

engChrName: That's not to say you shouldn't take it easy. Anything that involves the nervous system is a heavy burden on the body.
engSearchText:
That's not to say you shouldn't take it easy.
Anything that involves the nervous system is a heavy
burden on the body.
jpnChrName: でも、だからといって無理は禁物だよ～。 神経系の処置って負担が大きいから。
jpnSearchText:
でも、だからといって無理は禁物だよ～。
神経系の処置って負担が大きいから。

engChrName: The best thing you can do for yourself right now is get looots and looots of rest.
engSearchText:
The best thing you can do for yourself right now is
get looots and looots of rest.
jpnChrName: 今はとにかく、ちゃんと休まないと。
jpnSearchText: 今はとにかく、ちゃんと休まないと。

engChrName: I will... Thank you.
engSearchText: I will... Thank you.
jpnChrName: ……はい…… 宜しくお願い致します……
jpnSearchText:
……はい……
宜しくお願い致します……

engChrName: Though I truly am sorry for not being able to support you all when you need it most.
engSearchText:
Though I truly am sorry for not being able to support
you all when you need it most.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様に皆様も……肝心な時に 離脱してしまい申し訳ありません……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様に皆様も……肝心な時に
離脱してしまい申し訳ありません……

engChrName: Don't sweat it. We can take things from here—you just kick back and relax.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it. We can take things from here—you
just kick back and relax.
jpnChrName: ……ま、後のことは 任せてゆっくりしてるといいさ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、後のことは
任せてゆっくりしてるといいさ。

engChrName: Next time you wake up, you can bet we'll have good news to share—and a hell of a big bonus, too.
engSearchText:
Next time you wake up, you can bet we'll have good
news to share—and a hell of a big bonus, too.
jpnChrName: 次に起きたら臨時ボーナスも込みで いい報告を聞かせてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
次に起きたら臨時ボーナスも込みで
いい報告を聞かせてやるよ。

engChrName: Heehee. I'll have to look forward to that, then, won't I...? Follow your hearts and act as you always do, and everything will be fine...
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'll have to look forward to that, then, won't
I...? Follow your hearts and act as you always do, and
everything will be fine...
jpnChrName: ふふ、楽しみにしておきますね…… ……どうか、皆様なりの流儀で……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、楽しみにしておきますね……
……どうか、皆様なりの流儀で……

engChrName: ...S-Sorry, but I'd like to ask you something!
