engSearchText: ...S-Sorry, but I'd like to ask you something!
jpnChrName: っ……待って……！
jpnSearchText: っ……待って……！

engChrName: Why? Why did you risk your life to save mine?
engSearchText: Why? Why did you risk your life to save mine?
jpnChrName: どうして── あんな風に僕を庇ったんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
どうして──
あんな風に僕を庇ったんですか！？

engChrName: No one should have to put themselves through something like this over someone like me!
engSearchText:
No one should have to put themselves through
something like this over someone like me!
jpnChrName: こんな目に遭ってまで…… ……なんで、僕なんかのために──
jpnSearchText:
こんな目に遭ってまで……
……なんで、僕なんかのために──

engChrName: Haha... It was because you were just so...dazzlingly radiant in that moment, I suppose.
engSearchText:
Haha... It was because you were just so...dazzlingly
radiant in that moment, I suppose.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… 眩しかったから、でしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
眩しかったから、でしょうか……

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnSearchText: え………………

engChrName: You have so many people who care about you—and you care about them just as much in return.
engSearchText:
You have so many people who care about you—and
you care about them just as much in return.
jpnChrName: ……私と違って貴方には…… 大切な方々がいらっしゃるでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
……私と違って貴方には……
大切な方々がいらっしゃるでしょう……

engChrName: To someone who's lost her bonds, memories, and even body, the sight was almost blinding.
engSearchText:
To someone who's lost her bonds, memories, and
even body, the sight was almost blinding.
jpnChrName: 絆も……想い出も…… ……身体すら失くした私にとって……
jpnSearchText:
絆も……想い出も……
……身体すら失くした私にとって……

engChrName: I'm a little jealous of all you have, if I'm to tell the truth...
engSearchText:
I'm a little jealous of all you have, if I'm to tell
the truth...
jpnChrName: それは何よりも眩しくて…… ……羨ましいものです……
jpnSearchText:
それは何よりも眩しくて……
……羨ましいものです……

engChrName: So please, treat yourself like an irreplaceable treasure.
engSearchText: So please, treat yourself like an irreplaceable treasure.
jpnChrName: ですからどうか…… ご自身を大切になさってください……
jpnSearchText:
ですからどうか……
ご自身を大切になさってください……

engChrName: Not just for you, but for those who love you, too...
engSearchText: Not just for you, but for those who love you, too...
jpnChrName: 貴方を大切に思う方々のためにも……
jpnSearchText: 貴方を大切に思う方々のためにも……

engChrName: Umm... About Risette...
engSearchText: Umm... About Risette...
jpnChrName: その、リゼットさんって……
jpnSearchText: その、リゼットさんって……

engChrName: Just how much of her is artificial, anyways?
engSearchText: Just how much of her is artificial, anyways?
jpnChrName: ……ぶっちゃけ どこまでが“造り物”なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
……ぶっちゃけ
どこまでが“造り物”なんだ？

engChrName: I don't know for sure, but my guess is 'a lot.'
engSearchText: I don't know for sure, but my guess is 'a lot.'
jpnChrName: 分からんが…… 多分かなりの割合なんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
分からんが……
多分かなりの割合なんだろう。

engChrName: You were indirectly involved in makin' her who she is, too, right?
engSearchText:
You were indirectly involved in makin' her who she is,
too, right?
jpnChrName: ──直接じゃないにしろ、 アンタも関わってたみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
──直接じゃないにしろ、
アンタも関わってたみたいだな？

engChrName: That's right. We assisted Marduk in researching artificial biological limbs some time ago.
engSearchText:
That's right. We assisted Marduk in researching
artificial biological limbs some time ago.
jpnChrName: うん、マルドゥック社とは以前、 “生体義肢”を共同開発していたから～。
jpnSearchText:
うん、マルドゥック社とは以前、
“生体義肢”を共同開発していたから～。

engChrName: Our partnership only produced a prototype, though. I never imagined they would actually start using that technology like this.
engSearchText:
Our partnership only produced a prototype, though.
I never imagined they would actually start using that
technology like this.
jpnChrName: あくまで試験品で、まさかこんな形で 実用化してるとは思わなかったけど～……
jpnSearchText:
あくまで試験品で、まさかこんな形で
実用化してるとは思わなかったけど～……

engChrName: Risette was clearly the result of multiple different technologies being used together—not just the one they developed with us.
engSearchText:
Risette was clearly the result of multiple different
technologies being used together—not just the one
they developed with us.
jpnChrName: この研究室以外にも、幾つもの技術が 統合されているみたいだね～。
jpnSearchText:
この研究室以外にも、幾つもの技術が
統合されているみたいだね～。

engChrName: I've heard this is also a field that the Institute of Technology over in the Empire has been looking into.
engSearchText:
I've heard this is also a field that the Institute of
Technology over in the Empire has been
looking into.
jpnChrName: 帝国の工科大学でも研究が 進んでいる分野だそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
帝国の工科大学でも研究が
進んでいる分野だそうですけど……

engChrName: Umm, Van... You seem like you've known the truth for a while.
engSearchText:
Umm, Van... You seem like you've known the truth
for a while.
jpnChrName: その…… ヴァンさんは気付いていたんですね？
jpnSearchText:
その……
ヴァンさんは気付いていたんですね？

engChrName: I couldn't be sure, but I had a feelin'.
engSearchText: I couldn't be sure, but I had a feelin'.
jpnChrName: あくまで何となく、だがな。
jpnSearchText: あくまで何となく、だがな。

engChrName: I could tell the image I was seein' during our video calls was artificially generated.
engSearchText:
I could tell the image I was seein' during our video
calls was artificially generated.
jpnChrName: ３年間交わした通信越しの会話も 擬似的な映像だったのは察していた。
jpnSearchText:
３年間交わした通信越しの会話も
擬似的な映像だったのは察していた。

engChrName: So it took me really off guard when she just showed up in person in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
So it took me really off guard when she just showed
up in person in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: だからサルバッドで“本人”が現れたのは 正直、予想外だったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
だからサルバッドで“本人”が現れたのは
正直、予想外だったんだが……

engChrName: It was only when I noticed that she moved faster and kinda different from normal people that I started puttin' two and two together.
engSearchText:
It was only when I noticed that she moved faster and
kinda different from normal people that I started
puttin' two and two together.
jpnChrName: それでも“勁（けい）”とは違う身体操作や 超加速なんかを見ちまったら、な。
jpnSearchText:
それでも“勁（けい）”とは違う身体操作や
超加速なんかを見ちまったら、な。

engChrName: Makes sense.
engSearchText: Makes sense.
jpnChrName: ハッ……そういう事かよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……そういう事かよ。

engChrName: I did feel like there was something strange about her, but I never would have imagined it was because of this.
engSearchText:
I did feel like there was something strange about her,
but I never would have imagined it was because
of this.
jpnChrName: 不思議な“息吹”を されてるとは思いましたが……
jpnSearchText:
不思議な“息吹”を
されてるとは思いましたが……

engChrName: She's capable of far greater power and speed than an ordinary human, but she also has less precise control over her body in exchange.
engSearchText:
She's capable of far greater power and speed than an
ordinary human, but she also has less precise control
over her body in exchange.
jpnChrName: “出力”は常人よりは遙かに高いけど 細胞レベルでの身体操作は出来ないしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
“出力”は常人よりは遙かに高いけど
細胞レベルでの身体操作は出来ないしねぇ。

engChrName: I can't imagine just how much effort she must've put in to be able to move as naturally as she does.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine just how much effort she must've put
in to be able to move as naturally as she does.
jpnChrName: それでも、あんな風に自然に動ける時点で どれだけ頑張ったか分からないくらいだよ～……
jpnSearchText:
それでも、あんな風に自然に動ける時点で
どれだけ頑張ったか分からないくらいだよ～……

engChrName: ...She'll be able to return to the way she was, won't she?
engSearchText:
...She'll be able to return to the way she was,
won't she?
jpnChrName: ……リゼットさん、 元通りになれますよね……？
jpnSearchText:
……リゼットさん、
元通りになれますよね……？

engChrName: I'm sure she will... Right, Professor?
engSearchText: I'm sure she will... Right, Professor?
jpnChrName: ええ、大丈夫ですよ…… ……ですよね、准教授？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、大丈夫ですよ……
……ですよね、准教授？

engChrName: I think there's every chance of that. The technology involved seems to be fairly well established by Marduk at this point.
engSearchText:
I think there's every chance of that. The technology
involved seems to be fairly well established by
Marduk at this point.
jpnChrName: そうだね～、技術自体はＭＫ社で ある程度確立しているみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
そうだね～、技術自体はＭＫ社で
ある程度確立しているみたいだし。

engChrName: It won't be easy to make all the precise adjustments after reattaching her limbs, but I'll make sure it happens.
engSearchText:
It won't be easy to make all the precise adjustments
after reattaching her limbs, but I'll make sure
it happens.
jpnChrName: 接合処置後の調整は難しそうだけど なんとか上手くやってみせるよ～。
jpnSearchText:
接合処置後の調整は難しそうだけど
なんとか上手くやってみせるよ～。

engChrName: We're countin' on ya. She might be on loan to us from Marduk, but she's as much a member of Arkride Solutions as the rest of us.
engSearchText:
We're countin' on ya. She might be on loan to us
from Marduk, but she's as much a member of Arkride
Solutions as the rest of us.
jpnChrName: 悪いが、よろしく頼むぜ。 出向だがウチの大切な“所員”だ。
jpnSearchText:
悪いが、よろしく頼むぜ。
出向だがウチの大切な“所員”だ。

engChrName: Anyway, time for us to get outta here.
engSearchText: Anyway, time for us to get outta here.
jpnChrName: ──そろそろ行くぞ、お前ら。
jpnSearchText: ──そろそろ行くぞ、お前ら。

engChrName: Right. We need to do what we can—and put Risette at ease.
engSearchText:
Right. We need to do what we can—and put Risette
at ease.
jpnChrName: はい、リゼットさんの分まで なんとか頑張らないと──
jpnSearchText:
はい、リゼットさんの分まで
なんとか頑張らないと──

engChrName: Wait! Please.
engSearchText: Wait! Please.
jpnChrName: ──待ってください。
jpnSearchText: ──待ってください。

engChrName: If it's not too much to ask, could I keep helping you?
engSearchText: If it's not too much to ask, could I keep helping you?
jpnChrName: 改めてお願いします── 僕も手伝わせてくれませんか？
jpnSearchText:
改めてお願いします──
僕も手伝わせてくれませんか？

engChrName: I want to stop Professor Callaghan and the devils who've done this to him by my own hand—no matter what it takes.
engSearchText:
I want to stop Professor Callaghan and the devils
who've done this to him by my own hand—no matter
what it takes.
jpnChrName: あの連中とキャラハン教授を この手で止めるために……！
jpnSearchText:
あの連中とキャラハン教授を
この手で止めるために……！

engChrName: Quatre...
engSearchText: Quatre...
jpnChrName: カトル君……
jpnSearchText: カトル君……

engChrName: Sorry, but no can do.
engSearchText: Sorry, but no can do.
jpnChrName: ──悪いが、お断りだな。
jpnSearchText: ──悪いが、お断りだな。

engChrName: ...I suppose that's the right decision after I landed Risette in a hospital bed.
engSearchText:
...I suppose that's the right decision after I landed
Risette in a hospital bed.
jpnChrName: ……そう、ですよね。 僕のせいでリゼットさんは……
jpnSearchText:
……そう、ですよね。
僕のせいでリゼットさんは……

engChrName: I wasn't able to use FIO and XEROS at even half of their potential, either.
engSearchText:
I wasn't able to use FIO and XEROS at even half of
their potential, either.
jpnChrName: 昨日も……ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳを ロクに使いこなせませんでした……
jpnSearchText:
昨日も……ＦＩＯやＸＥＲＯＳを
ロクに使いこなせませんでした……

engChrName: If all I'm going to be is a burden to the team—
engSearchText: If all I'm going to be is a burden to the team—
jpnChrName: また足手まといにでもなったら──
jpnSearchText: また足手まといにでもなったら──

engChrName: That ain't what I'm sayin'.
engSearchText: That ain't what I'm sayin'.
jpnChrName: ──違う、そうじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: ──違う、そうじゃねえ。

engChrName: You're no burden. We're gonna need you and your engineering knowhow here for sure.
engSearchText:
You're no burden. We're gonna need you and your
engineering knowhow here for sure.
jpnChrName: この状況で、エンジニアでもある お前さんの助力は間違いなく必要だろう。
jpnSearchText:
この状況で、エンジニアでもある
お前さんの助力は間違いなく必要だろう。

engChrName: But we're also not a charity. We only do favors for people if the client and price are a good fit.
engSearchText:
But we're also not a charity. We only do favors for
people if the client and price are a good fit.
jpnChrName: だが裏解決屋（俺たち）は慈善事業じゃない── 頼みを聞くかは報酬と、依頼人次第でな。
jpnSearchText:
だが裏解決屋（俺たち）は慈善事業じゃない──
頼みを聞くかは報酬と、依頼人次第でな。

engChrName: You heard what Risette said, right?
engSearchText: You heard what Risette said, right?
jpnChrName: さっき、彼女がお前にかけた言葉……
jpnSearchText: さっき、彼女がお前にかけた言葉……

engChrName: If you did, then you should know what you gotta do, and where you went wrong.
engSearchText:
If you did, then you should know what you gotta do,
and where you went wrong.
jpnChrName: もう、分かってるんじゃねぇのか？ ──通すべき“筋”が何なのか。
jpnSearchText:
もう、分かってるんじゃねぇのか？
──通すべき“筋”が何なのか。
………ぁ…………

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ヘッ……
jpnSearchText: ヘッ……

engChrName: You're right. I should never have done something that would upset the people who care about me—and I never will again.
engSearchText:
You're right. I should never have done something that
would upset the people who care about me—and I
never will again.
jpnChrName: ええ──もう絶対にしません。 大切な人たちを悲しませる真似は。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──もう絶対にしません。
大切な人たちを悲しませる真似は。

engChrName: I just want to stop the chaos unfolding in Basel and the misuse of technology that created it...
engSearchText:
I just want to stop the chaos unfolding in Basel and
the misuse of technology that created it...
jpnChrName: この街の裏で起きた“技術危機（テクノクライシス）”を 何とか収束してみせる──
jpnSearchText:
この街の裏で起きた“技術危機（テクノクライシス）”を
何とか収束してみせる──

engChrName: ...and if I'm gonna do that, it's not the help of the police or guild I need—it's you.
engSearchText:
...and if I'm gonna do that, it's not the help of the
police or guild I need—it's you.
jpnChrName: それにはギルドでも警察でもなく、 裏解決屋である皆さんの力が必要です。
jpnSearchText:
それにはギルドでも警察でもなく、
裏解決屋である皆さんの力が必要です。

engChrName: As compensation, I can offer you my skills and expertise on technology.
engSearchText:
As compensation, I can offer you my skills and
expertise on technology.
jpnChrName: “報酬”は僕からの技術支援提供──
jpnSearchText: “報酬”は僕からの技術支援提供──

engChrName: I can also give you my word that I'll help Essy put Risette back to the way she was as fast as possible.
engSearchText:
I can also give you my word that I'll help Essy put
Risette back to the way she was as fast as possible.
jpnChrName: そして、エレ姉を手伝って リゼットさんを一刻も早く回復させること。
jpnSearchText:
そして、エレ姉を手伝って
リゼットさんを一刻も早く回復させること。

engChrName: ...Is that enough to make me a 'good fit' for you?
engSearchText: ...Is that enough to make me a 'good fit' for you?
jpnChrName: ……それで、いかがでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: ……それで、いかがでしょうか？

engChrName: It sure is. We'd be happy to take that 4SPG on.
engSearchText: It sure is. We'd be happy to take that 4SPG on.
jpnChrName: ──いいだろう。 その４ｓｐｇ、引き受けた。
jpnSearchText:
──いいだろう。
その４ｓｐｇ、引き受けた。

engChrName: We'll be countin' on you, now. Couldn't ask for better than a student of Professor Hamilton's.
engSearchText:
We'll be countin' on you, now. Couldn't ask for better
than a student of Professor Hamilton's.
jpnChrName: こっちもハミルトン門下としての力、 せいぜいアテにさせてもらうからな？
jpnSearchText:
こっちもハミルトン門下としての力、
せいぜいアテにさせてもらうからな？

engChrName: Thank you! I won't let you down!
engSearchText: Thank you! I won't let you down!
jpnChrName: はい、任せてください……！
jpnSearchText: はい、任せてください……！

engChrName: Promise me you'll take goooood care of him, okay? I'll be working 'round the clock, too!
engSearchText:
Promise me you'll take goooood care of him, okay?
I'll be working 'round the clock, too!
jpnChrName: カトル君のこと、お願いしますね。 わたしもなんでも力になりますから～！
jpnSearchText:
カトル君のこと、お願いしますね。
わたしもなんでも力になりますから～！

engChrName: Promise. Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Promise. Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: はい、心強いです……！
jpnSearchText: はい、心強いです……！

engChrName: Time to get down to business!
engSearchText: Time to get down to business!
jpnChrName: 頑張りましょう、みんなでっ！
jpnSearchText: 頑張りましょう、みんなでっ！

engChrName: The CID's Special Ops unit is gonna be here this evening. That means we've only got half a day left to do what we want.
engSearchText:
The CID's Special Ops unit is gonna be here
this evening. That means we've only got half a day
left to do what we want.
jpnChrName: 猶予は半日──予告通り夕刻には 特務部隊がバーゼル入りするはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
猶予は半日──予告通り夕刻には
特務部隊がバーゼル入りするはずだ。

engChrName: Once they're here, we're done. We gotta make this time count.
engSearchText:
Once they're here, we're done. We gotta make this
time count.
jpnChrName: そうなりゃ、あとは身動きが取れなくなる。 的確に動いていく必要があるな。
jpnSearchText:
そうなりゃ、あとは身動きが取れなくなる。
的確に動いていく必要があるな。

engChrName: Sure felt to me like Almata's work was done after making that AI a success.
engSearchText:
Sure felt to me like Almata's work was done after
making that AI a success.
jpnChrName: あのＡＩ化ってのが成功した時点で 殆ど目的は達成した雰囲気だったが。
jpnSearchText:
あのＡＩ化ってのが成功した時点で
殆ど目的は達成した雰囲気だったが。

engChrName: You sure they didn't just bounce?
engSearchText: You sure they didn't just bounce?
jpnChrName: そもそもの話、アルマータ共が とっくに逃げた可能性はねぇのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
そもそもの話、アルマータ共が
とっくに逃げた可能性はねぇのかよ？

engChrName: No. I'm certain they're still in the region.
engSearchText: No. I'm certain they're still in the region.
jpnChrName: いや──そうは思えない。
jpnSearchText: いや──そうは思えない。

engChrName: The abnormalities in the orbal net and distribution network are less pronounced than yesterday, but they're still present.
engSearchText:
The abnormalities in the orbal net and distribution
network are less pronounced than yesterday, but
they're still present.
jpnChrName: 昨日までの規模じゃあないけど……
jpnSearchText: 昨日までの規模じゃあないけど……

engChrName: Something's still happening—I'm sure of it.
engSearchText: Something's still happening—I'm sure of it.
jpnChrName: 導力ネットと導力供給網の異常は いまだに続いているみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットと導力供給網の異常は
いまだに続いているみたいでね。

engChrName: R-Really?!
engSearchText: R-Really?!
jpnChrName: ！　そうなんですか……！？
jpnSearchText: ！　そうなんですか……！？

engChrName: Then Almata's research is still going on somewhere in the city?
engSearchText:
Then Almata's research is still going on somewhere in
the city?
jpnChrName: するとバーゼル市のどこかで まだ“研究”は続けられている……？
jpnSearchText:
するとバーゼル市のどこかで
まだ“研究”は続けられている……？

engChrName: ...Risette mentioned something earlier that I think will help me.
engSearchText:
...Risette mentioned something earlier that I think
will help me.
jpnChrName: ……リゼットさんも 処置中に指摘していたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……リゼットさんも
処置中に指摘していたんだ。

engChrName: This might be fundamentally different to what happened in Crossbell, but I still think that is our closest reference point.
engSearchText:
This might be fundamentally different to what
happened in Crossbell, but I still think that is our
closest reference point.
jpnChrName: ……根本が異なるとはいえ、参考となるのは やはり一年半前の“クロスベル再事変”……
jpnSearchText:
……根本が異なるとはいえ、参考となるのは
やはり一年半前の“クロスベル再事変”……

engChrName: The orbal network and septium veins were used in the development of highly advanced technology then as well.
engSearchText:
The orbal network and septium veins were used in
the development of highly advanced technology then
as well.
jpnChrName: あの時も超技術開発のために、導力ネットと 七耀脈のリソースが最大限に利用されました……
jpnSearchText:
あの時も超技術開発のために、導力ネットと
七耀脈のリソースが最大限に利用されました……

engChrName: Basel City also has both, making it the perfect environment to finish what they started.
engSearchText:
Basel City also has both, making it the perfect
environment to finish what they started.
jpnChrName: その意味でバーゼル市という環境は “最後の一押し”を行うにも最適なのでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
その意味でバーゼル市という環境は
“最後の一押し”を行うにも最適なのでしょう……

engChrName: With the orbal network and the septium veins at their disposal, they have access to effectively unlimited resources for their research.
engSearchText:
With the orbal network and the septium veins at their
disposal, they have access to effectively unlimited
resources for their research.
jpnChrName: 導力ネットと七耀脈を自在に制御することで 無制限のリソースを研究開発に充てられる──
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットと七耀脈を自在に制御することで
無制限のリソースを研究開発に充てられる──

engChrName: If Professor Callaghan has reached the heights that the singularity in Crossbell did...
engSearchText:
If Professor Callaghan has reached the heights that
the singularity in Crossbell did...
jpnChrName: 再事変の《技術的特異点》と同じ次元に キャラハン先生が届いているとしたら……
jpnSearchText:
再事変の《技術的特異点》と同じ次元に
キャラハン先生が届いているとしたら……

engChrName: ...then our foes are probably lurkin' somewhere in the region finishin' what they started.
engSearchText:
...then our foes are probably lurkin' somewhere in the
region finishin' what they started.
jpnChrName: バーゼル周辺のどこかに潜んで “最後の一押し”をしている可能性は高い、か。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル周辺のどこかに潜んで
“最後の一押し”をしている可能性は高い、か。

engChrName: That's still a very large area to try and find them in, though... We'll have to find some way to narrow our search down.
engSearchText:
That's still a very large area to try and find them
in, though... We'll have to find some way to narrow
our search down.
jpnChrName: 範囲は広いですけど…… 何とか絞り込む方法を探してみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
範囲は広いですけど……
何とか絞り込む方法を探してみましょう。

engChrName: If we could get close enough to their location, the Genesis might react and show us we're on the right track, too.
engSearchText:
If we could get close enough to their location, the
Genesis might react and show us we're on the right
track, too.
jpnChrName: 近づくことができさえすれば 《ゲネシス》も反応するかもしれませんし。
jpnSearchText:
近づくことができさえすれば
《ゲネシス》も反応するかもしれませんし。

engChrName: Using the damn thing like a metal detector, huh? Suppose we gotta try anything we can at this point.
engSearchText:
Using the damn thing like a metal detector, huh?
Suppose we gotta try anything we can at this point.
jpnChrName: ハッ、探知器代わりってワケか。 こうなりゃ形（なり）振りは構ってられねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、探知器代わりってワケか。
こうなりゃ形（なり）振りは構ってられねぇな。

engChrName: Let's see if there are any more 4SPGs to take care of while we start asking around!
engSearchText:
Let's see if there are any more 4SPGs to take care of
while we start asking around!
jpnChrName: ４ｓｐｇにも目を光らせながら 聞き込みをしていきましょう！
jpnSearchText:
４ｓｐｇにも目を光らせながら
聞き込みをしていきましょう！

engChrName: There's no telling where we might find a clue that'll lead us to the truth. I'll help however I ca—
engSearchText:
There's no telling where we might find a clue that'll
lead us to the truth. I'll help however I ca—
jpnChrName: 何が真実に繋がるか分からない。 出来ることは何でも協力するよ──
jpnSearchText:
何が真実に繋がるか分からない。
出来ることは何でも協力するよ──

engChrName: Er... Wait. Should I not be meddling in your other jobs now that I'm a client instead of a guide?
engSearchText:
Er... Wait. Should I not be meddling in your other
jobs now that I'm a client instead of a guide?
jpnChrName: いや、しますよ。
jpnSearchText: いや、しますよ。

engChrName: Don't be silly. You're one of us now.
engSearchText: Don't be silly. You're one of us now.
jpnChrName: もう敬語はいらねぇ。 “相談窓口”でもねえしな。
jpnSearchText:
もう敬語はいらねぇ。
“相談窓口”でもねえしな。

engChrName: You are our client, but how about we just treat you more like a temp for now?
engSearchText:
You are our client, but how about we just treat you
more like a temp for now?
jpnChrName: そうだな──依頼者にして 臨時バイト扱いってことでどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
そうだな──依頼者にして
臨時バイト扱いってことでどうだ？

engChrName: Oh... Okay! That works for me!
engSearchText: Oh... Okay! That works for me!
jpnChrName: あ…… ──うん、それで構わない！
jpnSearchText:
あ……
──うん、それで構わない！

engChrName: Heehee...
engSearchText: Heehee...
jpnChrName: えへへ……
jpnSearchText: えへへ……

engChrName: We're happy to have you with us!
engSearchText: We're happy to have you with us!
jpnChrName: ふふ、改めてお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、改めてお願いしますね。

engChrName: Even if it means the kid-to-adult ratio's evened out here.
engSearchText:
Even if it means the kid-to-adult ratio's evened
out here.
jpnChrName: ハッ、またガキ率が 上がっちまった気がするが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、またガキ率が
上がっちまった気がするが。

engChrName: Well, then, let's get to work.
engSearchText: Well, then, let's get to work.
jpnChrName: ──とにかく“業務”開始だ。
jpnSearchText: ──とにかく“業務”開始だ。

engChrName: I wanna stop by the guild, Verne, Giscard's workshop... Should probably talk to our resident genius professor, too.
engSearchText:
I wanna stop by the guild, Verne,
Giscard's workshop... Should probably talk to our
resident genius professor, too.
jpnChrName: ギルドに技術長にヴェルヌ社── 天才教授にも話を聞きたいところだな。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドに技術長にヴェルヌ社──
天才教授にも話を聞きたいところだな。

engChrName: Those sound like good places to start to me.
engSearchText: Those sound like good places to start to me.
jpnChrName: うん、一通り当たってみよう！
jpnSearchText: うん、一通り当たってみよう！

engChrName: So you're Lilia's granddaughter.
engSearchText: So you're Lilia's granddaughter.
jpnChrName: そう…… 貴女がリリヤさんのお孫さんになるのね。
jpnSearchText:
そう……
貴女がリリヤさんのお孫さんになるのね。

engChrName: You do resemble her—not just the way you look. I can see you also possess her kindness and strong spirit.
engSearchText:
You do resemble her—not just the way you look.
I can see you also possess her kindness and
strong spirit.
jpnChrName: ……確かに面影があるわ。 優しくて、芯の強さもあって……
jpnSearchText:
……確かに面影があるわ。
優しくて、芯の強さもあって……

engChrName: ...This is one of my great-grandfather's diaries.
engSearchText: ...This is one of my great-grandfather's diaries.
jpnChrName: ……こちらが曾祖父の手記です。
jpnSearchText: ……こちらが曾祖父の手記です。

engChrName: This brings me back... I would catch him writing entries from time to time.
engSearchText:
This brings me back... I would catch him writing
entries from time to time.
jpnChrName: 懐かしいわね…… 確かにたまに付けていたわ。
jpnSearchText:
懐かしいわね……
確かにたまに付けていたわ。

engChrName: Oh, this here—this one is about me, Gerhard, and Albert...
engSearchText:
Oh, this here—this one is about me, Gerhard,
and Albert...
jpnChrName: ああ、これはあの時の…… 私やアルバート、ゲルハルトの事も……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、これはあの時の……
私やアルバート、ゲルハルトの事も……

engChrName: Haha. I still remember that time like it was yesterday.
engSearchText: Haha. I still remember that time like it was yesterday.
jpnChrName: ふふ……まるで昨日のことのようだわ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ……まるで昨日のことのようだわ。

engChrName: I only met him once back when I was a youngster... Makes me nostalgic thinking back on it now.
engSearchText:
I only met him once back when I was a youngster...
Makes me nostalgic thinking back on it now.
jpnChrName: 俺もガキの頃に一度会ったきりだな…… 懐かしくなっちまうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺もガキの頃に一度会ったきりだな……
懐かしくなっちまうぜ。

engChrName: I don't mean to interrupt your reminiscing, but those words toward the end are rather ominous.
engSearchText:
I don't mean to interrupt your reminiscing, but those
words toward the end are rather ominous.
jpnChrName: 立ち入るつもりはないけど、 その最後の言葉──確かに不気味ね。
jpnSearchText:
立ち入るつもりはないけど、
その最後の言葉──確かに不気味ね。

engChrName: I can see why it inspired you to risk so much to collect the Geneses.
engSearchText:
I can see why it inspired you to risk so much to collect
the Geneses.
jpnChrName: 貴女が何としても集めたくなるのも 分かる気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
貴女が何としても集めたくなるのも
分かる気がするわ。

engChrName: Yes...
engSearchText: Yes...
jpnSearchText: ……はい………

engChrName: 'Else all that we know will come to an end...'
engSearchText: 'Else all that we know will come to an end...'
jpnChrName: 全てが終わる──ですか……
jpnSearchText: 全てが終わる──ですか……

engChrName: I can't imagine it's meant to be taken any way other than literally—especially when you consider how the Geneses have been used so far...
engSearchText:
I can't imagine it's meant to be taken any way other
than literally—especially when you consider how the
Geneses have been used so far...
jpnChrName: うーん、《ゲネシス》も含めて 冗談とかじゃなさそうですね～……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、《ゲネシス》も含めて
冗談とかじゃなさそうですね～……

engChrName: Yeah. The kinda shit they're capable of almost feels like a bad joke sometimes.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The kinda shit they're capable of almost feels
like a bad joke sometimes.
jpnChrName: ……冗談みてぇな出来事なら 今回も含めて何度も起きてるがな。
jpnSearchText:
……冗談みてぇな出来事なら
今回も含めて何度も起きてるがな。

engChrName: So far, we've managed to gather five of the Eight Geneses.
engSearchText:
So far, we've managed to gather five of the
Eight Geneses.
jpnChrName: ……８つのうち、 ５つが今、私の手元にあります。
jpnSearchText:
……８つのうち、
５つが今、私の手元にあります。

engChrName: But do you think it would be better if I left them in the hands of you and the other disciples?
engSearchText:
But do you think it would be better if I left them in
the hands of you and the other disciples?
jpnChrName: やっぱり、三高弟の皆さんに 預けた方がいいのでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、三高弟の皆さんに
預けた方がいいのでしょうか……？

engChrName: Agnès...
engSearchText: Agnès...
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: No. I think they are too much for even us to handle.
engSearchText: No. I think they are too much for even us to handle.
jpnChrName: ……いえ。 それは私たちの手にも余るでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……いえ。
それは私たちの手にも余るでしょう。

engChrName: If they truly are experimental apparatuses that Professor Epstein somehow created to gauge the world...
engSearchText:
If they truly are experimental apparatuses that
Professor Epstein somehow created to gauge
the world...
jpnChrName: エプスタイン先生が何らかの方法で形にした、 “世界を計る”８つの観測実験器──
jpnSearchText:
エプスタイン先生が何らかの方法で形にした、
“世界を計る”８つの観測実験器──

engChrName: ...then—and this will sound rather unscientific of me—it's as if destiny willed them to be in your hands.
engSearchText:
...then—and this will sound rather unscientific of
me—it's as if destiny willed them to be in your hands.
jpnChrName: 研究者らしからぬ言い方だけれど、 ここまでの経緯も運命的な物を感じるわ。
jpnSearchText:
研究者らしからぬ言い方だけれど、
ここまでの経緯も運命的な物を感じるわ。

engChrName: I plan to stay in Calvard for a while, so I'll get in contact with Albert and Gerhard about this.
engSearchText:
I plan to stay in Calvard for a while, so I'll get in
contact with Albert and Gerhard about this.
jpnChrName: しばらくこちらに留まることにしたし、 ラッセルたちにも連絡を取ってみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
しばらくこちらに留まることにしたし、
ラッセルたちにも連絡を取ってみましょう。

engChrName: Fortunately, we happen to have someone else who knows both of them right here with us.
engSearchText:
Fortunately, we happen to have someone else who
knows both of them right here with us.
jpnChrName: ちょうど、どちらにも縁がある子が 来てくれたことだしね。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど、どちらにも縁がある子が
来てくれたことだしね。

engChrName: I'd be happy to serve as a mediator between all parties. We have much to discuss about the West Zemuria Tech Union as well.
engSearchText:
I'd be happy to serve as a mediator between
all parties. We have much to discuss about the West
Zemuria Tech Union as well.
jpnChrName: うふふ、橋渡し役は任せてちょうだい。 《技術連盟》の話も進められるし。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、橋渡し役は任せてちょうだい。
《技術連盟》の話も進められるし。

engChrName: I will also do what I can to help Risette.
engSearchText: I will also do what I can to help Risette.
jpnChrName: それと──リゼットさんについても どうか任せてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
それと──リゼットさんについても
どうか任せてちょうだい。

engChrName: Is everything still in order with regards to attaching Risette's new parts, Esmeray?
engSearchText:
Is everything still in order with regards to attaching
Risette's new parts, Esmeray?
jpnChrName: エスメレー、擬体パーツの接合調整の 目処はついているのよね？
jpnSearchText:
エスメレー、擬体パーツの接合調整の
目処はついているのよね？

engChrName: As in order as can be! Our prospects were already bright with her being such a capable engineer, but with you, they'll be eeeven brighter.
engSearchText:
As in order as can be! Our prospects were already
bright with her being such a capable engineer, but
with you, they'll be eeeven brighter.
jpnChrName: ええ、ご本人も優秀なＳＥですし、 博士が手伝ってくれるなら万全ですよ～。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ご本人も優秀なＳＥですし、
博士が手伝ってくれるなら万全ですよ～。

engChrName: Me and the other artisans'll be happy to pitch in with any precise adjustments, too. We'll see they aren't even a milirege off.
engSearchText:
Me and the other artisans'll be happy to pitch in with
any precise adjustments, too. We'll see they aren't
even a milirege off.
jpnChrName: 細けぇパーツ調整は任せてくれや。 職人街でｍｌ（ミリリジュ）単位で仕上げてやるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
細けぇパーツ調整は任せてくれや。
職人街でｍｌ（ミリリジュ）単位で仕上げてやるぜ。

engChrName: And I'll help, too, of course!
engSearchText: And I'll help, too, of course!
jpnChrName: ……もちろん僕も手伝います！
jpnSearchText: ……もちろん僕も手伝います！

engChrName: I don't think we have anything to worry about with this many people on the case!
engSearchText:
I don't think we have anything to worry about with
this many people on the case!
jpnChrName: えへへ……頼もしいですねっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ……頼もしいですねっ。

engChrName: Yes! It really is wonderful to see...
engSearchText: Yes! It really is wonderful to see...
jpnChrName: はい、本当に良かったです……
jpnSearchText: はい、本当に良かったです……

engChrName: Well, can't say I give a damn about Marduk at the end of the day.
engSearchText:
Well, can't say I give a damn about Marduk at the
end of the day.
jpnChrName: まぁ、マルドゥックの方はともかく。
jpnSearchText: まぁ、マルドゥックの方はともかく。

engChrName: Risette's a different story, though. She's one of the team—so take good care of her, if you don't mind.
engSearchText:
Risette's a different story, though. She's one of the
team—so take good care of her, if you don't mind.
jpnChrName: ウチのスタッフのこと…… くれぐれも宜しくお願いしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチのスタッフのこと……
くれぐれも宜しくお願いしますよ。

engChrName: I don't mind one bit.
engSearchText: I don't mind one bit.
jpnChrName: ええ、任されました。
jpnSearchText: ええ、任されました。

engChrName: You said your name was Van, I believe? This may be a strange favor to ask...
engSearchText:
You said your name was Van, I believe? This may be
a strange favor to ask...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんと言ったかしら── 私が頼むのは変かもしれないけれど。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんと言ったかしら──
私が頼むのは変かもしれないけれど。

engChrName: ...but I'd like you to look after my teacher's dear descendant. It would mean the world to me.
engSearchText:
...but I'd like you to look after my teacher's
dear descendant. It would mean the world to me.
jpnChrName: 恩師の遠い忘れ形見のこと、 これからもどうかお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText:
恩師の遠い忘れ形見のこと、
これからもどうかお願いしますね。

engChrName: And if you could please look after her young friends—but you were planning to do that even if I didn't ask, weren't you?
engSearchText:
And if you could please look after her young
friends—but you were planning to do that even if I
didn't ask, weren't you?
jpnChrName: それと他の子たちも── とっくにそのつもりみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
それと他の子たちも──
とっくにそのつもりみたいだけど。

engChrName: ...Heh. You got me.
engSearchText: ...Heh. You got me.
jpnChrName: ……参ったな。
jpnSearchText: ……参ったな。

engChrName: I'll do what I can to meet my obligation as their employer, at the very least.
engSearchText:
I'll do what I can to meet my obligation as their
employer, at the very least.
jpnChrName: ま、雇用主としての務めなら きちんと果たさせてもらいますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、雇用主としての務めなら
きちんと果たさせてもらいますよ。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Heehee.
engSearchText: Heehee.
jpnChrName: えへへ……
jpnSearchText: えへへ……

engChrName: Eh, we save his ass way more than he saves ours.
engSearchText: Eh, we save his ass way more than he saves ours.
jpnChrName: ハン、宜しくしてやってんのは むしろコッチだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、宜しくしてやってんのは
むしろコッチだけどな。

engChrName: Is something wrong, Quatre?
engSearchText: Is something wrong, Quatre?
jpnChrName: どうしたの、カトル？
jpnSearchText: どうしたの、カトル？

engChrName: It's just...
engSearchText: It's just...
jpnChrName: ……ううん。
jpnSearchText: ……ううん。

engChrName: I'm so happy you're back. I am. But...
engSearchText: I'm so happy you're back. I am. But...
jpnChrName: 博士が戻ってきてくれたのは 本当に嬉しい、けど……
jpnSearchText:
博士が戻ってきてくれたのは
本当に嬉しい、けど……

engChrName: But I wasn't able to do a thing in your absence. I feel like such a failure.
engSearchText:
But I wasn't able to do a thing in your absence. I feel
like such a failure.
jpnChrName: 結局、何も出来なかったなって。 ……自分の未熟さがつくづく嫌になるよ。
jpnSearchText:
結局、何も出来なかったなって。
……自分の未熟さがつくづく嫌になるよ。

engChrName: Quatre...
engSearchText: Quatre...
jpnChrName: カトル……
jpnSearchText: カトル……

engChrName: You been sleepwalking these past few days or somethin'?
engSearchText:
You been sleepwalking these past few days
or somethin'?
jpnChrName: コラ、なに言ってやがる。
jpnSearchText: コラ、なに言ってやがる。

engChrName: We couldn't've dreamed of dealing with this whole mess without you. You were our guide through and through.
engSearchText:
We couldn't've dreamed of dealing with this whole
mess without you. You were our guide through
and through.
jpnChrName: 今回──俺たち裏解決屋（スプリガン）を この解決に導いたのはお前だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
今回──俺たち裏解決屋（スプリガン）を
この解決に導いたのはお前だろうが。
…………！

engChrName: We never would have thought to go to that factory without you, and I doubt we could have gotten through to Professor Callaghan, either.
engSearchText:
We never would have thought to go to that factory
without you, and I doubt we could have gotten
through to Professor Callaghan, either.
jpnChrName: はい、廃工場に至る手がかりも キャラハン教授が自分を取り戻せたのも。
jpnSearchText:
はい、廃工場に至る手がかりも
キャラハン教授が自分を取り戻せたのも。

engChrName: We owe everything to your efforts and perseverance.
engSearchText: We owe everything to your efforts and perseverance.
jpnChrName: カトル君が諦めずに 頑張ってくれたおかげだと思います。
jpnSearchText:
カトル君が諦めずに
頑張ってくれたおかげだと思います。

engChrName: Plus your orbal drones were a huge help.
engSearchText: Plus your orbal drones were a huge help.
jpnChrName: 導力ドローンでのサポートも すごく助かりましたしっ。
jpnSearchText:
導力ドローンでのサポートも
すごく助かりましたしっ。

engChrName: You weren't too bad for someone who still looks and thinks like a kid.
engSearchText:
You weren't too bad for someone who still looks and
thinks like a kid.
jpnChrName: ま、フィジカルもメンタルも まだまだの小僧にしちゃ上出来だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、フィジカルもメンタルも
まだまだの小僧にしちゃ上出来だぜ。

engChrName: So, you know, good job on this one, or whatever.
engSearchText: So, you know, good job on this one, or whatever.
jpnChrName: 誉めてやるよ、特別にな。
jpnSearchText: 誉めてやるよ、特別にな。

engChrName: Why d'you always gotta be so far up your own ass?
engSearchText: Why d'you always gotta be so far up your own ass?
jpnChrName: なんでお前が偉そうなんだっつの。
jpnSearchText: なんでお前が偉そうなんだっつの。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: へっ……
jpnSearchText: へっ……

engChrName: Haha...
engSearchText: Haha...
jpnChrName: ……えへへ……
jpnSearchText: ……えへへ……

engChrName: See now? Not just anyone can be blessed with so many in their corner, you know.
engSearchText:
See now? Not just anyone can be blessed with so
many in their corner, you know.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… ほんと恵まれた一門ねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
ほんと恵まれた一門ねぇ。

engChrName: Thank you. For all you have done in my absence.
engSearchText: Thank you. For all you have done in my absence.
jpnChrName: ……ありがとう、 私の留守をちゃんと守ってくれて。
jpnSearchText:
……ありがとう、
私の留守をちゃんと守ってくれて。

engChrName: It's good to be home. I've missed you, Quatre.
engSearchText: It's good to be home. I've missed you, Quatre.
jpnChrName: それから改めて──ただいま、カトル。
jpnSearchText: それから改めて──ただいま、カトル。

engChrName: Yeah...but not half as much as I've missed you, Gran!
engSearchText: Yeah...but not half as much as I've missed you, Gran!
jpnChrName: うんっ…… おかえり、グランマ（おばあちゃん）！！
jpnSearchText:
うんっ……
おかえり、グランマ（おばあちゃん）！！
────────！？

engChrName: Oh! I remember seeing you yesterday.
engSearchText: Oh! I remember seeing you yesterday.
jpnChrName: あなた方は昨日も来て下さった……
jpnSearchText: あなた方は昨日も来て下さった……

engChrName: Were you looking to speak with Professor Cronkite? He just left, sorry.
engSearchText:
Were you looking to speak with Professor Cronkite?
He just left, sorry.
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授でしたら先ほどお出かけに なりましたが、何かご用事でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授でしたら先ほどお出かけに
なりましたが、何かご用事でしょうか？

engChrName: Shoot, we just missed him...
engSearchText: Shoot, we just missed him...
jpnChrName: あ……入れ違いになってしまいましたね……
jpnSearchText: あ……入れ違いになってしまいましたね……

engChrName: He does seem to be spending a lot of time outside his lab lately...
engSearchText:
He does seem to be spending a lot of time outside his
lab lately...
jpnChrName: そういえば最近は、 ヤン兄も外出が増えていたと思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば最近は、
ヤン兄も外出が増えていたと思うけど……

engChrName: You wouldn't happen to know where he went, would you?
engSearchText:
You wouldn't happen to know where he went,
would you?
jpnChrName: ナディールさん、クロンカイト教授の 行き先は判りませんか？
jpnSearchText:
ナディールさん、クロンカイト教授の
行き先は判りませんか？

engChrName: We're lookin' into Callaghan's disappearance. We thought he might know a thing or two about the guy.
engSearchText:
We're lookin' into Callaghan's disappearance. We
thought he might know a thing or two about the guy.
jpnChrName: 行方不明になったキャラハン教授の件もある…… 何か聞けるんじゃないかと踏んでいるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
行方不明になったキャラハン教授の件もある……
何か聞けるんじゃないかと踏んでいるんだが。

engChrName: I'm not sure where he went, I'm afraid. If I had to guess, though, I think he's taking a quick break right now.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure where he went, I'm afraid. If I had to
guess, though, I think he's taking a quick break
right now.
jpnChrName: そうですねぇ、多分ですが今回の外出は、 仕事の関係ではないかと思います。
jpnSearchText:
そうですねぇ、多分ですが今回の外出は、
仕事の関係ではないかと思います。

engChrName: There's this café he's taken to visiting lately. He usually heads out for a pick-me-up around this time.
engSearchText:
There's this café he's taken to visiting lately.
He usually heads out for a pick-me-up around
this time.
jpnChrName: 教授は最近、行きつけのお店がありまして。 いつもこの時間に行っているので、恐らく……
jpnSearchText:
教授は最近、行きつけのお店がありまして。
いつもこの時間に行っているので、恐らく……

engChrName: Oh? Where is it?
engSearchText: Oh? Where is it?
jpnChrName: んで、その行きつけの店ってのはどこにあんだ？
jpnSearchText: んで、その行きつけの店ってのはどこにあんだ？

engChrName: Well, that's the million mira question. The owner, Willy, roams around town all throughout the day.
engSearchText:
Well, that's the million mira question. The owner,
Willy, roams around town all throughout the day.
jpnChrName: 《ウィリー》というキッチンカーを使った 移動カフェなんですが。
jpnSearchText:
《ウィリー》というキッチンカーを使った
移動カフェなんですが。

engChrName: The café is never in one place for long. He just packs up and goes wherever his heart guides him.
engSearchText:
The café is never in one place for long. He just packs
up and goes wherever his heart guides him.
jpnChrName: 気ままに街を回っているので 営業場所は定まっていないみたいなんです。
jpnSearchText:
気ままに街を回っているので
営業場所は定まっていないみたいなんです。

engChrName: The professor has his pattern down to a science, though. I have no idea how he does it.
engSearchText:
The professor has his pattern down to a
science, though. I have no idea how he does it.
jpnChrName: 教授は統計から次の営業場所を予測してるみたいですが、 私にはまだ法則性が判らず何とも……
jpnSearchText:
教授は統計から次の営業場所を予測してるみたいですが、
私にはまだ法則性が判らず何とも……

engChrName: Oh, that's the place we visited yesterday. I do remember the guy sayin' some professor type stopped by a lot.
engSearchText:
Oh, that's the place we visited yesterday. I do
remember the guy sayin' some professor type stopped
by a lot.
jpnChrName: 昨日聞き込みもしたあの店か…… 確かに大学関係者がよく来るとは言っていたな。
jpnSearchText:
昨日聞き込みもしたあの店か……
確かに大学関係者がよく来るとは言っていたな。

engChrName: Neither Essy nor I can make sense of the café's movements either.
engSearchText:
Neither Essy nor I can make sense of the café's
movements either.
jpnChrName: あのお店が移動する基準は、 僕やエレ姉にもよく分からないんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
あのお店が移動する基準は、
僕やエレ姉にもよく分からないんですよね。

engChrName: Well, process of elimination it is, then. Let's start with where we saw it last.
engSearchText:
Well, process of elimination it is, then. Let's start
with where we saw it last.
jpnChrName: まあ、迷っていても仕方がねぇ。 一旦前に見かけた場所に行くのが良いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、迷っていても仕方がねぇ。
一旦前に見かけた場所に行くのが良いだろう。

engChrName: Maybe we'll run into somebody who saw him pack up—and then we just follow the trail from there.
engSearchText:
Maybe we'll run into somebody who saw him pack
up—and then we just follow the trail from there.
jpnChrName: もしかしたらキッチンカーが向かった方向を 覚えている客なんかもいるかもしれねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
もしかしたらキッチンカーが向かった方向を
覚えている客なんかもいるかもしれねぇしな。

engChrName: It was in the Artisanal District last night.
engSearchText: It was in the Artisanal District last night.
jpnChrName: 昨日の夜、結構遅い時間に、 件の店は職人街にいたはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日の夜、結構遅い時間に、
件の店は職人街にいたはずだ。

engChrName: Doubt he went anywhere else that night given how late it was, so that can be our starting point.
engSearchText:
Doubt he went anywhere else that night given how
late it was, so that can be our starting point.
jpnChrName: あの後場所を変えてまで営業したとは思えねぇし、 その次に向かった場所を特定するのもアリだろう。
jpnSearchText:
あの後場所を変えてまで営業したとは思えねぇし、
その次に向かった場所を特定するのもアリだろう。

engChrName: I heard from some students that he was over by the church in the Artisanal District last night.
engSearchText:
I heard from some students that he was over by the
church in the Artisanal District last night.
jpnChrName: 確か、昨日の晩には職人街の教会前にいるのを 見かけたと学生たちが話していたと思います。
jpnSearchText:
確か、昨日の晩には職人街の教会前にいるのを
見かけたと学生たちが話していたと思います。

engChrName: It sounded like it was late enough that he would've called it a night instead of packing up and heading somewhere else.
engSearchText:
It sounded like it was late enough that he would've
called it a night instead of packing up and heading
somewhere else.
jpnChrName: それなりに遅い時間までいたようですし、昨日の 最後の営業場所だと思って良いのではないかと。
jpnSearchText:
それなりに遅い時間までいたようですし、昨日の
最後の営業場所だと思って良いのではないかと。

engChrName: We have a lead, then. We should ask if anyone in the area saw the café the following day.
engSearchText:
We have a lead, then. We should ask if anyone in the
area saw the café the following day.
jpnChrName: となると、まずは職人街で移動カフェの目撃情報を聞き、 追跡するという流れで良さそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
となると、まずは職人街で移動カフェの目撃情報を聞き、
追跡するという流れで良さそうですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Let's head on over to the church and see what's up.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Let's head on over to the church and see
what's up.
jpnChrName: ああ、さっそく礼拝堂前の様子を見に行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、さっそく礼拝堂前の様子を見に行くぞ。

engChrName: I wasn't expecting Essy to have a request for us.
engSearchText: I wasn't expecting Essy to have a request for us.
jpnChrName: あ、エレ姉から依頼が来てるね。
jpnSearchText: あ、エレ姉から依頼が来てるね。

engChrName: Though really, she could've just told us in person...
engSearchText: Though really, she could've just told us in person...
jpnChrName: というか、直接言ってくれればよかったのに。
jpnSearchText: というか、直接言ってくれればよかったのに。

engChrName: Heh heh. Guessin' she just heard this is how we do things and rolled with it.
engSearchText:
Heh heh. Guessin' she just heard this is how we do
things and rolled with it.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、わざわざ裏解決屋（こっち）の流儀に 合わせてくれるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ、わざわざ裏解決屋（こっち）の流儀に
合わせてくれるとはな。

engChrName: We'll have to go talk to her later.
engSearchText: We'll have to go talk to her later.
jpnChrName: 後で話を聞きに行ってみるとするか。
jpnSearchText: 後で話を聞きに行ってみるとするか。

engChrName: Agreed. We really owe it to her.
engSearchText: Agreed. We really owe it to her.
jpnChrName: はい、ぜひ力になりたいです。
jpnSearchText: はい、ぜひ力になりたいです。

engChrName: A professor abusing their authority, you say...? That's a bit of a stretch to me, not gonna lie.
engSearchText:
A professor abusing their authority, you say...?
That's a bit of a stretch to me, not gonna lie.
jpnChrName: この大学の教授がパワハラ……ですか。 うーんあまりピンときませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
この大学の教授がパワハラ……ですか。
うーんあまりピンときませんけど……

engChrName: I can say for certain that Professor Cronkite and Professor Tain would never do that! It can't be them.
engSearchText:
I can say for certain that Professor Cronkite and
Professor Tain would never do that! It can't be them.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも、クロンカイト教授と トウェイン准教授はありえないと思います！
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも、クロンカイト教授と
トウェイン准教授はありえないと思います！

engChrName: Oh? What makes you so sure of that?
engSearchText: Oh? What makes you so sure of that?
jpnChrName: へぇ、そう言い切る根拠は何だ？
jpnSearchText: へぇ、そう言い切る根拠は何だ？

engChrName: Well... So, Professor Cronkite's a man of few words, so he can come across as kinda scary...
engSearchText:
Well... So, Professor Cronkite's a man of few words,
so he can come across as kinda scary...
jpnChrName: ええと、クロンカイト教授は 口数が少なくて誤解されやすいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
ええと、クロンカイト教授は
口数が少なくて誤解されやすいですけど……

engChrName: ...but he means well, really! I mean, he's one of the greatest minds of our time—he lives and breathes science.
engSearchText:
...but he means well, really! I mean, he's one of the
greatest minds of our time—he lives and
breathes science.
jpnChrName: 共和国の物理学と導力工学を牽引している、 稀代の天才と呼ばれた尊敬すべき方ですから。
jpnSearchText:
共和国の物理学と導力工学を牽引している、
稀代の天才と呼ばれた尊敬すべき方ですから。

engChrName: And then, Professor Tain is just really friendly to everybody. He's always looking out for people.
engSearchText:
And then, Professor Tain is just really friendly
to everybody. He's always looking out for people.
jpnChrName: それにトウェイン准教授は、 気さくで面倒見がいい方なんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
それにトウェイン准教授は、
気さくで面倒見がいい方なんですよ。

engChrName: He's known the world over for his work in civil engineering and urban planning.
engSearchText:
He's known the world over for his work in civil
engineering and urban planning.
jpnChrName: 都市デザインやインフラ──建築を専門にしていて、 大陸中から注目を浴びている高名な方ですし。
jpnSearchText:
都市デザインやインフラ──建築を専門にしていて、
大陸中から注目を浴びている高名な方ですし。

engChrName: The Basel Institute of Science certainly earns its reputation.
engSearchText:
The Basel Institute of Science certainly earns
its reputation.
jpnChrName: 流石は共和国一とうたわれる バーゼル理科大学ですね。
jpnSearchText:
流石は共和国一とうたわれる
バーゼル理科大学ですね。

engChrName: Its faculty are all accomplished scientists and engineers in their own right.
engSearchText:
Its faculty are all accomplished scientists and
engineers in their own right.
jpnChrName: 高名な方々ばかりで、改めて感服いたします。
jpnSearchText: 高名な方々ばかりで、改めて感服いたします。

engChrName: Yup! Lotsa famous people come to study and lecture here.
engSearchText:
Yup! Lotsa famous people come to study and
lecture here.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そうなんです。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、そうなんです。

engChrName: Professor Callaghan's a real celebrity, too.
engSearchText: Professor Callaghan's a real celebrity, too.
jpnChrName: それを言ったら、共和国の前世代兵器群を 開発した物理工学の権威──
jpnSearchText:
それを言ったら、共和国の前世代兵器群を
開発した物理工学の権威──

engChrName: He's a real whiz when it comes to mechanical engineering. He's the brain behind the military's new weapons.
engSearchText:
He's a real whiz when it comes to mechanical
engineering. He's the brain behind the military's
new weapons.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授だって この大学にいらっしゃいますしね。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授だって
この大学にいらっしゃいますしね。

engChrName: Last I heard, though, his new big proposal got shot down in favor of someone else's.
engSearchText:
Last I heard, though, his new big proposal got shot
down in favor of someone else's.
jpnChrName: まあ以前、とある教授と出し合った 技術構想案が負けてしまったとのことで。
jpnSearchText:
まあ以前、とある教授と出し合った
技術構想案が負けてしまったとのことで。

engChrName: He didn't really take that very well...
engSearchText: He didn't really take that very well...
jpnChrName: しばらく気落ちされているご様子でしたが……
jpnSearchText: しばらく気落ちされているご様子でしたが……

engChrName: But he's bounced back, from what I can tell. He's really putting his all into his new project!
engSearchText:
But he's bounced back, from what I can tell.
He's really putting his all into his new project!
jpnChrName: 近頃は以前にも増して 研究熱心に取り組んでいるそうですよ。
jpnSearchText:
近頃は以前にも増して
研究熱心に取り組んでいるそうですよ。

engChrName: I'm really humbled to get to work with so many hard-working and talented people.
engSearchText:
I'm really humbled to get to work with so many
hard-working and talented people.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そんな偉大な方々に囲まれて誇らしいです。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そんな偉大な方々に囲まれて誇らしいです。

engChrName: 'Hard-working and talented' people can still be assholes. Are they good PEOPLE, is what we're asking?
engSearchText:
'Hard-working and talented' people can still
be assholes. Are they good PEOPLE, is what
we're asking?
jpnChrName: ま、だからって、パワハラをしねえとは 限らねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、だからって、パワハラをしねえとは
限らねえけどな。

engChrName: Could you maybe have phrased that a little less aggressively...?
engSearchText:
Could you maybe have phrased that a little less
aggressively...?
jpnChrName: もう、アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: もう、アーロンさん……

engChrName: Well, thanks for takin' the time to talk to us. You were a big help.
engSearchText:
Well, thanks for takin' the time to talk to us.
You were a big help.
jpnChrName: とある教授に負けた、ねえ…… ありがとな、貴重な話を聞かせてもらったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
とある教授に負けた、ねえ……
ありがとな、貴重な話を聞かせてもらったぜ。

engChrName: All right. I think we've combed this area over pretty well now.
engSearchText:
All right. I think we've combed this area over pretty
well now.
jpnChrName: さてと……大学内の聞き込みは これくらいで十分だろう。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……大学内の聞き込みは
これくらいで十分だろう。

engChrName: Let's go sit down somewhere and try piecin' things together.
engSearchText:
Let's go sit down somewhere and try piecin'
things together.
jpnChrName: そろそろどこかで 今までの情報をまとめるか。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろどこかで
今までの情報をまとめるか。

engChrName: I recommend that open space at the front of the institute grounds.
engSearchText:
I recommend that open space at the front of the
institute grounds.
jpnChrName: でしたら、大学に入ってすぐ右手にあった 広場が丁度いいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
でしたら、大学に入ってすぐ右手にあった
広場が丁度いいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: I saw some benches there that we could use.
engSearchText: I saw some benches there that we could use.
jpnChrName: そちらのベンチで腰を落ち着けて 情報整理を行うのがよろしいかと。
jpnSearchText:
そちらのベンチで腰を落ち着けて
情報整理を行うのがよろしいかと。

engChrName: Sounds like a plan to me.
engSearchText: Sounds like a plan to me.
jpnChrName: だな、そうと決まればさっさと向かおうぜ。
jpnSearchText: だな、そうと決まればさっさと向かおうぜ。

engChrName: Huh? A power-tripping professor, you say? Hmm...
engSearchText: Huh? A power-tripping professor, you say? Hmm...
jpnChrName: ああ？　大学の教授がパワハラだって？
jpnSearchText: ああ？　大学の教授がパワハラだって？

engChrName: Well, if it were anybody, I'd put my money on Cronkite.
engSearchText:
Well, if it were anybody, I'd put my money
on Cronkite.
jpnChrName: あー……それならアイツの事じゃねえか？ クロンカイト教授。
jpnSearchText:
あー……それならアイツの事じゃねえか？
クロンカイト教授。

engChrName: He's awfully quick to dismiss people. Haughty, in a word.
engSearchText:
He's awfully quick to dismiss people. Haughty, in
a word.
jpnChrName: アイツ、仕事が出来ないヤツが相手だと 相当冷たいそうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
アイツ、仕事が出来ないヤツが相手だと
相当冷たいそうじゃねえか。

engChrName: 'Kind' and 'helpful' aren't exactly synonymous with him...at least, from what I've seen and heard.
engSearchText:
'Kind' and 'helpful' aren't exactly synonymous
with him...at least, from what I've seen
and heard.
jpnChrName: それに、アイツが面倒見がいいなんて話は 一度も聞いた事がねえな。
jpnSearchText:
それに、アイツが面倒見がいいなんて話は
一度も聞いた事がねえな。

engChrName: I see.
engSearchText: I see.
jpnChrName: あら、そうなのですか。
jpnSearchText: あら、そうなのですか。

engChrName: Have you heard anything about any of the other professors that might relate to these allegations?
engSearchText:
Have you heard anything about any of the other
professors that might relate to these allegations?
jpnChrName: ちなみに……他の教授に関しても 何かご存じではありませんか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに……他の教授に関しても
何かご存じではありませんか？

engChrName: Let me think now...
engSearchText: Let me think now...
jpnChrName: そうだな、他の教授ってんなら……
jpnSearchText: そうだな、他の教授ってんなら……

engChrName: Well, I can't see Professor Aurelie doing anything like that. She's just a bundle of sunshine—not a mean bone in her body.
engSearchText:
Well, I can't see Professor Aurelie doing anything
like that. She's just a bundle of sunshine—not a mean
bone in her body.
jpnChrName: 化学が専門のオレリー教授……彼女は かなりの人格者でまず間違いなくシロだろう。
jpnSearchText:
化学が専門のオレリー教授……彼女は
かなりの人格者でまず間違いなくシロだろう。

engChrName: Sometimes I even see her in here picking up research materials for her students.
engSearchText:
Sometimes I even see her in here picking up research
materials for her students.
jpnChrName: 研究員の為に資料を集めてる姿を 何度も見た事があるしな。
jpnSearchText:
研究員の為に資料を集めてる姿を
何度も見た事があるしな。

engChrName: Then there's Professor Callaghan... He always made a point of helping out his assistants.
engSearchText:
Then there's Professor Callaghan... He always made a
point of helping out his assistants.
jpnChrName: あとは物理工学が専門のキャラハン教授…… あの人も研究員の面倒見はいい方だったな。
jpnSearchText:
あとは物理工学が専門のキャラハン教授……
あの人も研究員の面倒見はいい方だったな。

engChrName: He's certainly not a bad person in my view, but he's gotten a bit of a bad rap after his work went south.
engSearchText:
He's certainly not a bad person in my view, but he's
gotten a bit of a bad rap after his work went south.
jpnChrName: 最近は余裕がないみたいで評判が落ちてる 気はするが、悪い人間じゃねえのは確かだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
最近は余裕がないみたいで評判が落ちてる
気はするが、悪い人間じゃねえのは確かだぜ。

engChrName: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We greatly appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Thank you for sharing your experience with us.
We greatly appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 成程……情報提供、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: 成程……情報提供、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: All right. I think we've combed this area over pretty well now.
engSearchText:
All right. I think we've combed this area over pretty
well now.
jpnChrName: さてと……大学内の聞き込みは これくらいで十分だろう。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……大学内の聞き込みは
これくらいで十分だろう。

engChrName: Let's go sit down somewhere and try piecin' things together.
engSearchText:
Let's go sit down somewhere and try piecin'
things together.
jpnChrName: そろそろどこかで 今までの情報をまとめるか。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろどこかで
今までの情報をまとめるか。

engChrName: I recommend that open space at the front of the institute grounds.
engSearchText:
I recommend that open space at the front of the
institute grounds.
jpnChrName: でしたら、大学に入ってすぐ右手にあった 広場が丁度いいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
でしたら、大学に入ってすぐ右手にあった
広場が丁度いいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: I saw some benches there that we could use.
engSearchText: I saw some benches there that we could use.
jpnChrName: そちらのベンチで腰を落ち着けて 情報整理を行うのがよろしいかと。
jpnSearchText:
そちらのベンチで腰を落ち着けて
情報整理を行うのがよろしいかと。

engChrName: Sounds like a plan to me.
engSearchText: Sounds like a plan to me.
jpnChrName: だな、そうと決まればさっさと向かおうぜ。
jpnSearchText: だな、そうと決まればさっさと向かおうぜ。

engChrName: Workplace harassment? Goodness...
engSearchText: Workplace harassment? Goodness...
jpnChrName: 教授からのパワハラ、ですか……
jpnSearchText: 教授からのパワハラ、ですか……

engChrName: I've heard these bits and pieces, but I'm just... I'm a bit nervous to talk about it.
engSearchText:
I've heard these bits and pieces, but I'm just... I'm a
bit nervous to talk about it.
jpnChrName: 大きな声じゃ言えませんけど…… 少しだけなら教えられますよ。
jpnSearchText:
大きな声じゃ言えませんけど……
少しだけなら教えられますよ。

engChrName: We won't tell anyone, don't worry. Anything helps.
engSearchText: We won't tell anyone, don't worry. Anything helps.
jpnChrName: はい、それで構いませんので よろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
はい、それで構いませんので
よろしくお願いします。

engChrName: I've heard loud shouting from one of the other labs, yes. It stunned me out of the work I was doing.
engSearchText:
I've heard loud shouting from one of the other
labs, yes. It stunned me out of the work I was doing.
jpnChrName: ええ、初めてあの研究室から怒鳴り声が 聞こえて来た時は私も驚きました……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、初めてあの研究室から怒鳴り声が
聞こえて来た時は私も驚きました……

engChrName: I heard stuff like... 'You idiots! Can't you do ANYTHING right?!' and, 'You're a disgrace to the institute! Get out!'
engSearchText:
I heard stuff like... 'You idiots! Can't you do
ANYTHING right?!' and, 'You're a disgrace to
the institute! Get out!'
jpnChrName: 『お前のような無能は生きている価値はない』 『役立たずは今すぐ消えろ』と……
jpnSearchText:
『お前のような無能は生きている価値はない』
『役立たずは今すぐ消えろ』と……

engChrName: He's just lashing out at everything and everyone now. It's really disturbing...
engSearchText:
He's just lashing out at everything and
everyone now. It's really disturbing...
jpnChrName: 研究員を大声で怒鳴りつけたり、 物に八つ当たりしているようなんです。
jpnSearchText:
研究員を大声で怒鳴りつけたり、
物に八つ当たりしているようなんです。

engChrName: Which professor was the one doing that?
engSearchText: Which professor was the one doing that?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、 その怒鳴っていた人は誰なんですか？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、
その怒鳴っていた人は誰なんですか？

engChrName: Er... I just can't say it, sorry. If... If THEY find out it was me, I'd have hell to pay!
engSearchText:
Er... I just can't say it, sorry. If... If THEY find out it
was me, I'd have hell to pay!
jpnChrName: それは私の口からは言えませんよ……！ バレたら後でなんて言われるか……
jpnSearchText:
それは私の口からは言えませんよ……！
バレたら後でなんて言われるか……

engChrName: It's really gnawing at me. The abuse is only getting worse and worse, from what I'm told...
engSearchText:
It's really gnawing at me. The abuse is only getting
worse and worse, from what I'm told...
jpnChrName: でも、今も研究が進むにつれて どんどん過激になってるって噂ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、今も研究が進むにつれて
どんどん過激になってるって噂ですよ。

engChrName: I've heard the works: fatigue, depression, exhaustion, even a couple researchers fainting on the job.
engSearchText:
I've heard the works: fatigue, depression, exhaustion,
even a couple researchers fainting on the job.
jpnChrName: みな心身共に参っていて、 倒れる研究員が後を絶たず……
jpnSearchText:
みな心身共に参っていて、
倒れる研究員が後を絶たず……

engChrName: That whole department looks visibly shaken these days—the stress is just too much for them.
engSearchText:
That whole department looks visibly shaken
these days—the stress is just too much for them.
jpnChrName: 過剰なストレスによって 言動がおかしくなる者もいるとか……
jpnSearchText:
過剰なストレスによって
言動がおかしくなる者もいるとか……

engChrName: I worry they'll all end up like Cindy...
engSearchText: I worry they'll all end up like Cindy...
jpnChrName: だからシンディまであんな事に……
jpnSearchText: だからシンディまであんな事に……

engChrName: Cindy? What happened to her?
engSearchText: Cindy? What happened to her?
jpnChrName: シンディか…… そいつに何があったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
シンディか……
そいつに何があったんだ？

engChrName: She's...at her breaking point, from what I hear. I hardly see her at the institute anymore.
engSearchText:
She's...at her breaking point, from what I hear.
I hardly see her at the institute anymore.
jpnChrName: その……心身共にガタが来て、 今は休みがちになっているそうです。
jpnSearchText:
その……心身共にガタが来て、
今は休みがちになっているそうです。

engChrName: We've all been trying to support her however we can, but...it's rough. It really is.
engSearchText:
We've all been trying to support her however we can,
but...it's rough. It really is.
jpnChrName: ウチの准教授をはじめ、僕たち研究員も 見かけたら声をかけたりしてたんですけどね……
jpnSearchText:
ウチの准教授をはじめ、僕たち研究員も
見かけたら声をかけたりしてたんですけどね……

engChrName: Damn. Yeah, that's not good. Who's the professor helping her, out of curiosity?
engSearchText:
Damn. Yeah, that's not good. Who's the professor
helping her, out of curiosity?
jpnChrName: へぇ、准教授がねえ。 ちなみに名前はなんて言うんだ？
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、准教授がねえ。
ちなみに名前はなんて言うんだ？

engChrName: That would be Professor Esmeray. She's in the bioengineering department.
engSearchText:
That would be Professor Esmeray. She's in the
bioengineering department.
jpnChrName: エスメレー准教授ですよ。 生体工学を専門にしている方です。
jpnSearchText:
エスメレー准教授ですよ。
生体工学を専門にしている方です。

engChrName: She's known the world over for her cutting-edge research. A real upstanding woman.
engSearchText:
She's known the world over for her
cutting-edge research. A real upstanding woman.
jpnChrName: 複数の最先端技術に貢献していて、 大陸中から注目を浴びる研究者なんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
複数の最先端技術に貢献していて、
大陸中から注目を浴びる研究者なんですよ。

engChrName: She's always up to her neck in her own work, though—she probably doesn't know the extent of the abuse at the other labs.
engSearchText:
She's always up to her neck in her own work,
though—she probably doesn't know the extent of the
abuse at the other labs.
jpnChrName: とはいえ准教授も忙しい身ですから…… 他の研究室について詳しくは知らないと思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ准教授も忙しい身ですから……
他の研究室について詳しくは知らないと思いますよ。

engChrName: Yeah... Thanks for fillin' us in. This still helps us a lot.
engSearchText:
Yeah... Thanks for fillin' us in. This still helps us
a lot.
jpnChrName: ふむ……色々と参考になった。 ありがとな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……色々と参考になった。
ありがとな。

engChrName: All right. I think we've combed this area over pretty well now.
engSearchText:
All right. I think we've combed this area over pretty
well now.
jpnChrName: さてと……大学内の聞き込みは これくらいで十分だろう。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……大学内の聞き込みは
これくらいで十分だろう。

engChrName: Let's go sit down somewhere and try piecin' things together.
engSearchText:
Let's go sit down somewhere and try piecin'
things together.
jpnChrName: そろそろどこかで 今までの情報をまとめるか。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろどこかで
今までの情報をまとめるか。

engChrName: I recommend that open space at the front of the institute grounds.
engSearchText:
I recommend that open space at the front of the
institute grounds.
jpnChrName: でしたら、大学に入ってすぐ右手にあった 広場が丁度いいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
でしたら、大学に入ってすぐ右手にあった
広場が丁度いいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: I saw some benches there that we could use.
engSearchText: I saw some benches there that we could use.
jpnChrName: そちらのベンチで腰を落ち着けて 情報整理を行うのがよろしいかと。
jpnSearchText:
そちらのベンチで腰を落ち着けて
情報整理を行うのがよろしいかと。

engChrName: Sounds like a plan to me.
engSearchText: Sounds like a plan to me.
jpnChrName: だな、そうと決まればさっさと向かおうぜ。
jpnSearchText: だな、そうと決まればさっさと向かおうぜ。

engChrName: All right. We about ready to sit down and get crackin'?
engSearchText:
All right. We about ready to sit down and
get crackin'?
jpnChrName: どれ、パワハラ教授に関して 集めた情報を整理するか……
jpnSearchText:
どれ、パワハラ教授に関して
集めた情報を整理するか……

engChrName: Well, that was pretty good. We got our hands on some nice info there.
engSearchText:
Well, that was pretty good. We got our hands on
some nice info there.
jpnChrName: さて……これで一通り パワハラ被害に関する情報は集まったな。
jpnSearchText:
さて……これで一通り
パワハラ被害に関する情報は集まったな。

engChrName: We learned a lot of professors' names, too!
engSearchText: We learned a lot of professors' names, too!
jpnChrName: はいっ、沢山の教授の名前が挙がりましたよね。
jpnSearchText: はいっ、沢山の教授の名前が挙がりましたよね。

engChrName: There's Professor Callaghan, the engineering science authority, Professor Aurelie in the chemistry department...
engSearchText:
There's Professor Callaghan, the engineering science
authority, Professor Aurelie in the
chemistry department...
jpnChrName: 物理工学の権威であるキャラハン教授、 そして化学が専門のオレリー教授……
jpnSearchText:
物理工学の権威であるキャラハン教授、
そして化学が専門のオレリー教授……

engChrName: Professor Cronkite, a well-respected expert in physics and orbal engineering, and Professor Tain, an architectural researcher.
engSearchText:
Professor Cronkite, a well-respected expert in physics
and orbal engineering, and Professor Tain, an
architectural researcher.
jpnChrName: 物理・導力工学のクロンカイト教授…… それに建築系のトウェイン准教授。
jpnSearchText:
物理・導力工学のクロンカイト教授……
それに建築系のトウェイン准教授。

engChrName: And then one Professor Esmeray, over in bio.
engSearchText: And then one Professor Esmeray, over in bio.
jpnChrName: 後は、生体工学系のエスメレー准教授だったな。
jpnSearchText: 後は、生体工学系のエスメレー准教授だったな。

engChrName: They all sounded really capable, but of course, the stat sheets don't tell the whole story. They all sounded like oddballs in their own right.
engSearchText:
They all sounded really capable, but of course, the stat
sheets don't tell the whole story. They all sounded
like oddballs in their own right.
jpnChrName: どいつもこいつもやり手で 相当クセも強そうだったが。
jpnSearchText:
どいつもこいつもやり手で
相当クセも強そうだったが。

engChrName: I think we can pretty safely narrow the perp down to one of those five.
engSearchText:
I think we can pretty safely narrow the perp down to
one of those five.
jpnChrName: 出た情報から考えると、この中の一人が 例のパワハラの犯人で間違いねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
出た情報から考えると、この中の一人が
例のパワハラの犯人で間違いねぇ。

engChrName: I agree. We have pretty strong evidence to suggest that.
engSearchText:
I agree. We have pretty strong evidence to
suggest that.
jpnChrName: そうですね、決定的な証拠となる お話も聞く事ができましたし。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、決定的な証拠となる
お話も聞く事ができましたし。

engChrName: All right. Let's take our evidence from the top, then.
engSearchText: All right. Let's take our evidence from the top, then.
jpnChrName: 改めて状況を整理した方が いいかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
改めて状況を整理した方が
いいかもしれねえな。

engChrName: All the people we talked to, all the testimonies, they all had this one thing in common.
engSearchText:
All the people we talked to, all the testimonies, they
all had this one thing in common.
jpnChrName: まず、散々聞き込んで回ったが。 全体を通して印象的な共通点があったよな。
jpnSearchText:
まず、散々聞き込んで回ったが。
全体を通して印象的な共通点があったよな。

engChrName: Ah... I see what you mean.
engSearchText: Ah... I see what you mean.
jpnChrName: 共通点というと、 やはりあの点でしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
共通点というと、
やはりあの点でしょうか……

engChrName: (Nah... It wasn't that they were tryin' to brush it off. They were pretty blunt about it.)
engSearchText:
(Nah... It wasn't that they were tryin' to brush it off.
They were pretty blunt about it.)
jpnChrName: （パワハラを隠ぺい……はしてねえよな。）
jpnSearchText: （パワハラを隠ぺい……はしてねえよな。）

engChrName: (It's that they didn't name the culprit. Some of 'em knew who it was, but they kept their mouths shut.)
engSearchText:
(It's that they didn't name the culprit. Some of 'em
knew who it was, but they kept their mouths shut.)
jpnChrName: （だが、パワハラ犯が誰かは   教えてもらえなかった訳だが……）
jpnSearchText:
（だが、パワハラ犯が誰かは
教えてもらえなかった訳だが……）

engChrName: (Nah, threats or blackmail never came up. They were pretty forthcoming about what happened...)
engSearchText:
(Nah, threats or blackmail never came up. They were
pretty forthcoming about what happened...)
jpnChrName: （パワハラの犯人に脅されていた……訳じゃねえよな。）
jpnSearchText: （パワハラの犯人に脅されていた……訳じゃねえよな。）

engChrName: (...which makes it all the weirder that nobody mentioned the suspect by name.)
engSearchText:
(...which makes it all the weirder that nobody
mentioned the suspect by name.)
jpnChrName: （どいつもこいつも、自分の意志で   明言する事を避けてやがった。）
jpnSearchText:
（どいつもこいつも、自分の意志で
明言する事を避けてやがった。）

engChrName: Not a single one named the culprit. Some of those guys knew who it was, but it kept soundin' like they were too scared to name 'em.
engSearchText:
Not a single one named the culprit. Some of those
guys knew who it was, but it kept soundin' like they
were too scared to name 'em.
jpnChrName: パワハラの犯人を知っていても 明言を避けるヤツばかりだったっつう点だ。
jpnSearchText:
パワハラの犯人を知っていても
明言を避けるヤツばかりだったっつう点だ。

engChrName: Would've made our job a hell of a lot easier if they just named the guy, but nope.
engSearchText:
Would've made our job a hell of a lot easier if they
just named the guy, but nope.
jpnChrName: すんなり教えてくれりゃあ こうして頭を捻る必要もなかったんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
すんなり教えてくれりゃあ
こうして頭を捻る必要もなかったんだがな。

engChrName: Yeah, now that you mention it, that IS kinda weird.
engSearchText: Yeah, now that you mention it, that IS kinda weird.
jpnChrName: うーん……おかしな話ですよね。
jpnSearchText: うーん……おかしな話ですよね。

engChrName: I can understand not wanting to be labeled a snitch...
engSearchText: I can understand not wanting to be labeled a snitch...
jpnChrName: 告げ口がバレてしまうのを 警戒するのは分かりますけど。
jpnSearchText:
告げ口がバレてしまうのを
警戒するのは分かりますけど。

engChrName: ...but it felt like there was more to it than that.
engSearchText: ...but it felt like there was more to it than that.
jpnChrName: なんというか、それだけじゃない雰囲気でした。
jpnSearchText: なんというか、それだけじゃない雰囲気でした。

engChrName: They were afraid of the culprit, but you could tell they respected them, too—they didn't want to sully this professor's good name.
engSearchText:
They were afraid of the culprit, but you could tell they
respected them, too—they didn't want to sully this
professor's good name.
jpnChrName: 恐れの他に、尊敬や信頼といいますか…… 相手の名誉を守りたい配慮を感じました。
jpnSearchText:
恐れの他に、尊敬や信頼といいますか……
相手の名誉を守りたい配慮を感じました。

engChrName: And some people said the guy wasn't always like that. Something changed them.
engSearchText:
And some people said the guy wasn't always like that.
Something changed them.
jpnChrName: 前までは、そんな事をするような 奴じゃなかったっつう話だったしな。
jpnSearchText:
前までは、そんな事をするような
奴じゃなかったっつう話だったしな。

engChrName: Probably the conflict over that proposal we heard about. Something about hard feelings.
engSearchText:
Probably the conflict over that proposal we
heard about. Something about hard feelings.
jpnChrName: 多分、きっかけは とある教授ってのとひと悶着あった件だろ。
jpnSearchText:
多分、きっかけは
とある教授ってのとひと悶着あった件だろ。

engChrName: That one guy said they had to crunch after the proposal fell through. Telltale sign of abuse to me.
engSearchText:
That one guy said they had to crunch after the
proposal fell through. Telltale sign of abuse to me.
jpnChrName: 研究熱心になった……とか言われてたが。 その頃からパワハラをするようになった訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
研究熱心になった……とか言われてたが。
その頃からパワハラをするようになった訳だ。

engChrName: That does seem likely—though we can't say for certain what changed the professor's behavior, that would be a reasonable explanation.
engSearchText:
That does seem likely—though we can't say for
certain what changed the professor's behavior, that
would be a reasonable explanation.
jpnChrName: その教授の心境の変化に 何があったのかは存じ上げませんが。
jpnSearchText:
その教授の心境の変化に
何があったのかは存じ上げませんが。

engChrName: That said, no circumstance justifies such an abuse of power and status. This professor is truly incorrigible.
engSearchText:
That said, no circumstance justifies such an abuse of
power and status. This professor is truly incorrigible.
jpnChrName: 信頼を笠に着て、裏ではパワハラを働く── 非情に悪質な手口と言えます。
jpnSearchText:
信頼を笠に着て、裏ではパワハラを働く──
非情に悪質な手口と言えます。

engChrName: So, that's who you think the culprit is?
engSearchText: So, that's who you think the culprit is?
jpnChrName: という事は……犯人はあの人っていう事ですか？
jpnSearchText: という事は……犯人はあの人っていう事ですか？

engChrName: Yeah. You ask me, there's only one professor who fits the bill...
engSearchText:
Yeah. You ask me, there's only one professor who fits
the bill...
jpnChrName: ああ、大勢から信頼されておきながら、 研究員にパワハラを働いてた教授といえば──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、大勢から信頼されておきながら、
研究員にパワハラを働いてた教授といえば──

engChrName: (Yeah, no, it can't be Aurelie. Nobody had anything bad to say about her.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, no, it can't be Aurelie. Nobody had anything
bad to say about her.)
jpnChrName: （オレリー教授……いや、   そいつはシロだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（オレリー教授……いや、
そいつはシロだろう。）

engChrName: (It's gotta be somebody else.)
engSearchText: (It's gotta be somebody else.)
jpnChrName: （研究員にパワハラをしてんのは別の奴だな。）
jpnSearchText: （研究員にパワハラをしてんのは別の奴だな。）

engChrName: (Cronkite is... Nah, he's not our guy.)
engSearchText: (Cronkite is... Nah, he's not our guy.)
jpnChrName: （クロンカイト教授……いや、   そいつはシロだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（クロンカイト教授……いや、
そいつはシロだろう。）

engChrName: (People said he was abrasive, but not actually malicious. He doesn't strike me as the abuser.)
engSearchText:
(People said he was abrasive, but not
actually malicious. He doesn't strike me as
the abuser.)
jpnChrName: （疑わしい噂も聞いたが、   研究員にパワハラをしてんのは別の奴だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（疑わしい噂も聞いたが、
研究員にパワハラをしてんのは別の奴だな。）

engChrName: (Nah, pretty sure it ain't Tain. He didn't really stand out.)
engSearchText:
(Nah, pretty sure it ain't Tain. He didn't really
stand out.)
jpnChrName: （トウェイン准教授……いや、   そいつはシロだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（トウェイン准教授……いや、
そいつはシロだろう。）

engChrName: (It's gotta be somebody else.)
engSearchText: (It's gotta be somebody else.)
jpnChrName: （研究員にパワハラをしてんのは別の奴だな。）
jpnSearchText: （研究員にパワハラをしてんのは別の奴だな。）

engChrName: (Esmeray... No. Everybody was sayin' she was cool.)
engSearchText: (Esmeray... No. Everybody was sayin' she was cool.)
jpnChrName: （エスメレー准教授……いや、   そいつはシロだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（エスメレー准教授……いや、
そいつはシロだろう。）

engChrName: (It's gotta be somebody else.)
engSearchText: (It's gotta be somebody else.)
jpnChrName: （研究員にパワハラをしてんのは別の奴だな。）
jpnSearchText: （研究員にパワハラをしてんのは別の奴だな。）

engChrName: Professor Callaghan's our guy.
engSearchText: Professor Callaghan's our guy.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授──そいつこそが犯人だろうな。
jpnSearchText: キャラハン教授──そいつこそが犯人だろうな。

engChrName: He's one of the foremost authorities on engineering science—perhaps the smartest man in the whole field.
engSearchText:
He's one of the foremost authorities on engineering
science—perhaps the smartest man in the whole field.
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン教授の専門は物理工学── その代表格とも呼べるほど有名な方ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
……キャラハン教授の専門は物理工学──
その代表格とも呼べるほど有名な方ですよね。

engChrName: I've seen him in the papers plenty of times before.
engSearchText: I've seen him in the papers plenty of times before.
jpnChrName: 共和国軍の前世代兵器群の開発を 一手に引き受けた、天才──
jpnSearchText:
共和国軍の前世代兵器群の開発を
一手に引き受けた、天才──

engChrName: He's always described as a savant—notably, he helped modernize the military's weapons and equipment.
engSearchText:
He's always described as a savant—notably, he helped
modernize the military's weapons and equipment.
jpnChrName: そんな風に、新聞で何度か名前を 見かける事がありましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
そんな風に、新聞で何度か名前を
見かける事がありましたけど……

engChrName: But he's got revenge on the mind, sounds like. Some other professor one-upped him, and that's got him pissed.
engSearchText:
But he's got revenge on the mind, sounds like.
Some other professor one-upped him, and that's got
him pissed.
jpnChrName: 今はとある教授を 見返す為に躍起になってるって訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
今はとある教授を
見返す為に躍起になってるって訳だ。

engChrName: I get it sucks, but you'd think a world-renowned scientist would be less...childish about it.
engSearchText:
I get it sucks, but you'd think a world-renowned
scientist would be less...childish about it.
jpnChrName: 事情があるのかもしれねぇが、 少々大人げねえ野郎だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
事情があるのかもしれねぇが、
少々大人げねえ野郎だぜ。

engChrName: You'd know a thing or two about acting like a child, wouldn't you?
engSearchText:
You'd know a thing or two about acting like a child,
wouldn't you?
jpnChrName: それを言ったらアンタも大概だけどな。
jpnSearchText: それを言ったらアンタも大概だけどな。

engChrName: I dunno, you usually call me a grandpa. Which is it, bud?
engSearchText:
I dunno, you usually call me a grandpa. Which is
it, bud?
jpnChrName: 飛び火してきやがったな…… 俺はそこまでじゃねえだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
飛び火してきやがったな……
俺はそこまでじゃねえだろ！？

engChrName: Is now the time?
engSearchText: Is now the time?
jpnChrName: ふふ……
jpnSearchText: ふふ……

engChrName: So...what do we do now?
engSearchText: So...what do we do now?
jpnChrName: えと、それじゃあこの後はどうしますか？
jpnSearchText: えと、それじゃあこの後はどうしますか？

engChrName: We have all the recordings of the people we talked to.
engSearchText: We have all the recordings of the people we talked to.
jpnChrName: 聞き込み中ずっと付けていた ボイスレコーダーもありますし……
jpnSearchText:
聞き込み中ずっと付けていた
ボイスレコーダーもありますし……

engChrName: That all points to Professor Callaghan being the suspect.
engSearchText:
That all points to Professor Callaghan being
the suspect.
jpnChrName: 依頼主の人を追い詰めていた犯人も ほぼ確定できましたよね。
jpnSearchText:
依頼主の人を追い詰めていた犯人も
ほぼ確定できましたよね。

engChrName: So what's our next move?
engSearchText: So what's our next move?
jpnChrName: 次はどう出るつもりだ？
jpnSearchText: 次はどう出るつもりだ？

engChrName: Do we hunt down our client next and give them the tapes?
engSearchText:
Do we hunt down our client next and give them
the tapes?
jpnChrName: 匿名の依頼主を探し出して レコーダーを渡しでもすんのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
匿名の依頼主を探し出して
レコーダーを渡しでもすんのかよ。

engChrName: Nah. I'm thinkin' we get Professor Callaghan's opinion on it without accusin' him directly.
engSearchText:
Nah. I'm thinkin' we get Professor Callaghan's
opinion on it without accusin' him directly.
jpnChrName: いや……ここはキャラハン教授に 直談判といこうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
いや……ここはキャラハン教授に
直談判といこうじゃねえか。

engChrName: We nudge him in the right direction and he might just turn himself in.
engSearchText:
We nudge him in the right direction and he might
just turn himself in.
jpnChrName: 依頼者が告発しちまう以外の 落とし所もあるかもしれねえ。
jpnSearchText:
依頼者が告発しちまう以外の
落とし所もあるかもしれねえ。

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: 告発以外の落し所ですか……？
jpnSearchText: 告発以外の落し所ですか……？

engChrName: Simple: we tell him about these abuse rumors goin' around, we talk about all these exhausted students, and he connects the dots on his own.
engSearchText:
Simple: we tell him about these abuse rumors goin'
around, we talk about all these exhausted students,
and he connects the dots on his own.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授から 自発的に和解の提案をしてもらうんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授から
自発的に和解の提案をしてもらうんだよ。

engChrName: Failing that? Well, we already know it's him.
engSearchText: Failing that? Well, we already know it's him.
jpnChrName: もしくは、俺達が被害者との間を取り持つとかな。
jpnSearchText: もしくは、俺達が被害者との間を取り持つとかな。

engChrName: He's bound to figure out his reputation's on the line, the more he hears about this. If he's smart, he'll fess up.
engSearchText:
He's bound to figure out his reputation's on the line,
the more he hears about this. If he's smart, he'll
fess up.
jpnChrName: 前までは周囲から人望があったヤツだ。 これ以上名誉に傷が付くのを避けたいはずだろう。
jpnSearchText:
前までは周囲から人望があったヤツだ。
これ以上名誉に傷が付くのを避けたいはずだろう。

engChrName: So that's what we do: we give him a subtle li'l nudge, and he does all the work Elsaim wanted for us. Two birds with one stone right there.
engSearchText:
So that's what we do: we give him a subtle li'l nudge,
and he does all the work Elsaim wanted for us.
Two birds with one stone right there.
jpnChrName: その弱みに付け込んで、公国からの 依頼の件も調べさせてもらえれば一石二鳥だ。
jpnSearchText:
その弱みに付け込んで、公国からの
依頼の件も調べさせてもらえれば一石二鳥だ。

engChrName: That sounds really...scheming. I'm not so sure we're the good guys all of a sudden...
engSearchText:
That sounds really...scheming. I'm not so sure we're
the good guys all of a sudden...
jpnChrName: あんまり優しい理由じゃなかったです……
jpnSearchText: あんまり優しい理由じゃなかったです……

engChrName: Well, haha...
engSearchText: Well, haha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: It is a quintessentially spriggan-like way of solving our problem.
engSearchText:
It is a quintessentially spriggan-like way of solving
our problem.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋らしい名案かと思います。
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋らしい名案かと思います。

engChrName: Fine by me. To the power-tripper's lab, then?
engSearchText: Fine by me. To the power-tripper's lab, then?
jpnChrName: ハッ……それじゃ、次に向かうのは キャラハンの野郎の研究室って事だな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……それじゃ、次に向かうのは
キャラハンの野郎の研究室って事だな。

engChrName: ...Actually, where is it? I don't remember seeing it while we were taking our tour.
engSearchText:
...Actually, where is it? I don't remember seeing it
while we were taking our tour.
jpnChrName: さっき周った時には見かけなかったが、 どこにあるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
さっき周った時には見かけなかったが、
どこにあるんだ？

engChrName: I suspect it's in the special research building. We'd need some form of clearance to enter, of course.
engSearchText:
I suspect it's in the special research building.
We'd need some form of clearance to enter, of course.
jpnChrName: おそらく、警備員が配備されていた 特別研究棟と呼ばれる場所でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
おそらく、警備員が配備されていた
特別研究棟と呼ばれる場所でしょう。

engChrName: We passed by a door with a guard in front earlier. They won't let any ordinary civilian inside.
engSearchText:
We passed by a door with a guard in front earlier.
They won't let any ordinary civilian inside.
jpnChrName: 教授の研究室こそが、 この認証カードで守りたい情報の宝庫。
jpnSearchText:
教授の研究室こそが、
この認証カードで守りたい情報の宝庫。

engChrName: I suspect we would need an A-rank card, at the very least.
engSearchText:
I suspect we would need an A-rank card, at the
very least.
jpnChrName: 勿論セキュリティは最高位の Ａランク相当でしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
勿論セキュリティは最高位の
Ａランク相当でしょうね。

engChrName: It was hard enough for us to get a C-rank card. I think getting an A-rank one is off the table...
engSearchText:
It was hard enough for us to get a C-rank card.
I think getting an A-rank one is off the table...
jpnChrName: うーん……やっとＣランクを貰えたのに、 Ａなんて難しすぎますよ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん……やっとＣランクを貰えたのに、
Ａなんて難しすぎますよ。

engChrName: What should we do, then? Maybe wait for him to leave the building and ambush him?
engSearchText:
What should we do, then? Maybe wait for him to
leave the building and ambush him?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、教授が研究室から出て来るのを 待ち伏せするとか……？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、教授が研究室から出て来るのを
待ち伏せするとか……？

engChrName: Nah. Ol' Van's the man with a plan.
engSearchText: Nah. Ol' Van's the man with a plan.
jpnChrName: 心配すんな、 そこに関しては俺に考えがある。
jpnSearchText:
心配すんな、
そこに関しては俺に考えがある。

engChrName: All that matters is that we get inside the building— doesn't matter HOW we do it.
engSearchText:
All that matters is that we get inside the building—
doesn't matter HOW we do it.
jpnChrName: ようは一時的にでも 特別研究棟に入れればいい訳だろ。
jpnSearchText:
ようは一時的にでも
特別研究棟に入れればいい訳だろ。

engChrName: And bein' a spriggan, I've got a few tricks up my sleeve.
engSearchText:
And bein' a spriggan, I've got a few tricks up
my sleeve.
jpnChrName: こういう時こそ“裏の手”を使わねえと 裏解決屋の名が廃るってもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
こういう時こそ“裏の手”を使わねえと
裏解決屋の名が廃るってもんだ。

engChrName: Umm, Van? You're kinda scaring me with that smile there...
engSearchText:
Umm, Van? You're kinda scaring me with that
smile there...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、 少し悪い顔になってますけど……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、
少し悪い顔になってますけど……

engChrName: Heehee... We defer to you. What's your strategy, master spriggan?
engSearchText:
Heehee... We defer to you. What's your strategy,
master spriggan?
jpnChrName: ふふ、頼もしい限りですね。 それではこの後どう致しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、頼もしい限りですね。
それではこの後どう致しましょうか。

engChrName: So first, we just roll on up to the building like anybody else would.
engSearchText:
So first, we just roll on up to the building like
anybody else would.
jpnChrName: ここは直接、特別研究棟に行ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: ここは直接、特別研究棟に行ってみるぞ。

engChrName: Once we get there, we convince the guard to let us in. Just act naturally and we're golden.
engSearchText:
Once we get there, we convince the guard to let us in.
Just act naturally and we're golden.
jpnChrName: 警備員に“納得”してもらって 正々堂々とお目通り願おうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
警備員に“納得”してもらって
正々堂々とお目通り願おうじゃねえか。
